SA16hvsatssu:18: samyak śāstrecchayā gacchet gabhīrajñāninaṃ sa ca //
SA16hvsatssu:24: cirakālañca dharmasya sthitaye na tu kīrtaye //
SA16hvsatssu:30: (pṛ) nanu bhavatā satyasiddhiśāstraṃ vakṣyata iti jñātmasmābhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:35: (u) bhagavān prakṛtyā manuṣyabhūtaḥ sarvākārajñānena sarvadharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇavibhāgān prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:36: sarvākuśalavinirmuktaḥ sañcitasarvakuśalaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ [SSS_3] hitaiṣī cetyato buddha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:38: taṃ dharmaṃ ye pratipadyante te saṅgha ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:50: ājanma yo maitrīmabhyasyati tasyākuśalacittamudeti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:57: tathāgata imaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya sarvajñajñānaṃ labdhavān /
SA16hvsatssu:59: yathā ghṛtatailabahulaḥ pradīpaḥ vartikāmahimnā mahān prakāśate /
SA16hvsatssu:64: tathāgatasya samādhiḥ puruṣaṃ sthānaṃ dharmopadeśaṃ vā ityādipratyayagaṇān nopakṣate /
SA16hvsatssu:67: yathā kaścit ātmānaṃ saṃrakṣan sadā smarati na vismarati /
SA16hvsatssu:69: tadyathā kaścit svāvasaṃthaṃ prāpya vadati kṣemaprāptaḥ akhinna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:72: dhyānasamādhiprakampino [SSS_4] mahāprāmodyādayo dharmāḥ tathāgatasya sarve prahīṇāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:74: ṛddhividhinā ekasminneva kṣaṇe daśadikṣu apramāṇadhātuṣu parikrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:79: asukhe ca sukhasaṃjñotpadyate sukhāsukhe ca upekṣāsaṃjñotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:93: dhyānāvaraṇaṃ kleśotpāda iti dvividhāvidyā tathāgatasya sarvathā prahīṇā /
SA16hvsatssu:97: anye sattvā steṣu kauśalaṃ na saṃpādayāṃbabhūvuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:107: prajñāprakarṣāt prakṛṣṭeryāpathaśca bhavati ityādibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ prajñāskandhasampannaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:114: yathā kaścit vṛkṣaṃ chettuṃ haste dhṛtakuṭhāraḥ pāryantikaṃ jānānaḥ prajānāti śākhāḥ praśākhāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:115: tathā bhagavānapi saṃyojanaprahāṇajñānasya pratikṣaṇaṃ kṣīyamāṇaṃ sarvamavayavaśaḥ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:119: kiñca bhagavān kālaṃ jñātvā dharmamupadiśati yathā timburukabrāhmaṇādinām /
SA16hvsatssu:122: yathā bhagavānānandamāmantrya chandakasya yogyaṃ bhāvābhāvavyāvartakaṃ sūtramupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:124: kiñcopāyakuśalaḥ sattvamalaṃ hāpayati yathā nandasya kāmaprajihīrṣāyai [dharma]mupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:125: sattvānāñca śraddhendriyādiparipākaṃ jñātvā paścāt dharmamupadiśati yathā rāhulasya /
SA16hvsatssu:126: kecit sattvāḥ karmavipākāvṛtāḥ na vimuktiṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:128: kecit sattvāḥ kālapakṣye kṣīṇāsravā bhavanti yathā jāyāpatisūtra upadiṣṭam /
SA16hvsatssu:129: kecit sattvāḥ puruṣaviśeṣamapekṣya kṣīṇāsravāḥ bhavanti yathā śāriputra aśvajitamapekṣya /
SA16hvsatssu:130: kecit sattvā deśamapekṣya kṣīṇāsravāḥ yathā rājā pukkasātiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:131: kecit sattvā satīrthyamapekṣya [SSS_6] kṣīṇāsravāḥ yathā gopāla nandaḥ ajitagrāmīṇādīnapekṣya /
SA16hvsatssu:132: kecit sattvā bhagavataḥ tāttvikakāyamapekṣya nirmitakāya ñcāpekṣya kṣīṇāsravā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:134: kiñca bhagavān vividhān saddharmānupadiya sarvān vimuktyāvaraṇadharmān paribhedayati ato vimuktijñānadarśanasampanna ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:138: bhagavān satvānāṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ kuśalamūla ñca jñātvā kramaśo dharmamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:139: bhagavān vimuktiṃ pratyakṣīkṛtya parasyopaśati na parataḥśratvā /
SA16hvsatssu:142: tathā jinaśāsanamapi pratipakṣakalāpamukhena sarvān kleśān vyāvartayati /
SA16hvsatssu:143: yathā navasaṃjñādīn mahatyo 'lpā vā saṃyojanā na punaḥ kṣapayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:146: kadācit sukumāravacanaiḥ kadācit kaṭuvacanaiḥ kadācit punaḥ sukumārakaṭuvacanaiśca /
SA16hvsatssu:155: asmāt īdṛśaṃ phalaṃ bhavati na tādṛśam /
SA16hvsatssu:156: ayamācāraḥ akuśalo 'vayaṃ duḥkhavipākaḥ na sukhavipāka iti jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:161: yathā yavādyava eva jāyate na brīhyādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:162: (u) sthānāsthānabalena karmādīnāṃ jñānāt idaṃ balamatigahanaṃ paramaṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ na prāptuṃ śakyam /
SA16hvsatssu:163: jātadharmasya hetusamanantarādhipatipratyayān pratyāyayatītyata idaṃ balaṃ praṇītam /
SA16hvsatssu:164: (2) yat atitānāgatapratyutpannāni karmāṇi sarvadharmasamādānāni ca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:165: teṣāṃ sthānaṃ prajānāti vastu prajānāti hetuṃ prajānāti vipākañca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:170: ato bhagavataḥ teṣāṃ kathanaṃ balaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:173: kecit kuśalakarmavanto dṛṣṭe duḥkhavedanāḥ yathā śīlaṃ dhṛtvā kleśānanubhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:174: kecitpāpakarmāṇaḥ dṛṣṭe sukhavedanāḥ yathā śīlaṃ bhitvā svairaṃ caranti /
SA16hvsatssu:175: ataḥ kecit saṃśerate anāgatādhvāpi pratyutpannasama iti /
SA16hvsatssu:178: catvāri dharmasamādānāni pratyutpannaṃ duḥkhaṃ āyatyāṃ sukhavipākam,
SA16hvsatssu:188: yathoktaṃ sūtre pūrvañca pramuditacittaḥ dānakāle ca viśuddhacitto dattvā ca yanna vipratisarati /
SA16hvsatssu:190: bhagavāneva prajānāti taratamaṃ karma yadi niyatamaniyataṃ vā dṛṣṭavipākam upapadyavipākaṃ tadūrdhvavipākaṃ vā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:193: (3) bhagavān sarvadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ saṃkleśaṃ prajānāti sthitiṃ prajānāti upacayaṃ prajānāti vyavadānañca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:194: tatra dhyānaṃ nāma catvāri dhyānāni catvāra ārūpyasamādhayaśca /
SA16hvsatssu:199: samāpattayaścaturdhā vibhaktāḥ saṃkleśataḥ sthitita upacayato vyavadānataśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:214: atha śraddhāpratipat dharmapratipat iti dvividho mārgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:220: prājñajanā viśiṣṭendriyā adhimuktita upakṛtā średdhendriyapradhānāśca bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:227: tathāgato yathādhimukti pratipattiṃ prajānāti yadutāyaṃ sattvaḥ pañcakāmanāsvadhimuktaḥ bhāvanāmārge bādhimukta ityevaṃ viditvā yathārhaṃ dharmamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:230: sattvānāṃ yat dīrghakālamabhyasya abhirocate sa dhātuḥ sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:233: kecit sattvāḥ svabhāvataḥ pravṛttarāgāḥ kecit dṛṣṭaṃ pratītya pravṛttarāgāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:236: imāṃ pratipadaṃ pratipanno naraka utpadyate yāvatsvarge iti ca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:247: narakapratitasyāpi pravibhāgo 'sti anena karmaṇā sañjīvanarake patiṣyati,
SA16hvsatssu:249: atastathāgataḥ saptamabale sthitaḥ sukṣmaṃ karma prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:253: tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ pūrvamācaritāṃ pratipadaṃ jñātvā dharmamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:255: tathāgato 'tītaṃ sarvamupapattisthānaṃ rūpadhātau vā ārupyadhātau vā ityanusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:259: (9) tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati anāgatādhvani tribhavasantānān trividhāni karmāṇi caturdharmasamādānāni ca jñātvā vyākaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:279: eṣu caturṣu yadi kaścidāgatya yathā dharmaṃ codayet /
SA16hvsatssu:285: tathāgato vyākaroti āntarāyikamāntarāyikamārgadharmān yadutākuśalaṃ sāsravaṃ kuśalañca /
SA16hvsatssu:300: keṣāñcitpuruṣāṇāṃ jñāne satyapi vyākaraṇakauśalābhāvāt parapuruṣāṇāṃ vijayo vaiśāradyam /
SA16hvsatssu:310: ya ājanma paritrastaḥ sa paścāt kiñcit jñānaṃ labdhvā viśārado bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:311: kiṃ punarbhagavān sudūrakālāt mahodāracittaḥ sarvākārābhisambodhiñca labdhvā bibheṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:313: tatra na kaścidasti yaṃ tathāgato na vijitavān /
SA16hvsatssu:316: yo vādī vacanakuśalaḥ arthakuśalaśca sa viśāradaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:322: sarvasūtrāṇi sarvaśāstrāṇi ca pratividhya praśnavisarjanaṃ paridīpayatīti viśāradaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:323: kecitpunaḥ kule gotre rūpe śīlabāhuśrutyajñānādiṣu vā vikalā ityataḥ sāvadyaṃ śāstramadhigacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:328: yathāvocat asurabrāhmaṇo bhagavantam- yathābhūtadharmavādī durjayo duṣprakampaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:331: yaḥ punaścaturbhirvāda dharmaiḥ samanvitaḥ so 'pi durjayaḥ duṣprakampaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:336: devamanuṣyā api taṃ na jetuṃ śaknuvanti ityato viśāradaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:337: yaśca kalyāṇamitramanupasevya vādaṃ karoti sa sukampaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:338: tathāgatastu dīpaṅkarādiṣu apramāṇabuddheṣu pūrvamevābhyastavādadharmā ityato na prakampyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:348: śāstraṃ puna dvividhaṃ tattvaśāstraṃ śaṭhaśāstram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:354: tīrthikānāṃ śāstrāṇi sahetvābhāsāni na sahetukāni iti na vijayasamarthāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:355: bhagavataḥ sūtrāṇi pariśuddhapravacanārthagatikāni tattvalakṣaṇāvilomakāni na tīrthikīyasamānāni /
SA16hvsatssu:358: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantyāha mā bhikṣavo mama vacanādhimuktikā bhavata /
SA16hvsatssu:362: prātarvo dharmaṃ bhāṣamāṇe mayi sāyaṃ mārga labhedhvam /
SA16hvsatssu:373: bhagavān sattvānāmuttamo mahān iti alpajñānāṃ śāstraṃ jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:375: tīrthikānāṃ śāstraṃ yāṃ kāñcit dṛṣṭimupādāya pravṛttam /
SA16hvsatssu:383: tathāgatastu sarvākārajñaḥ sarvadharmajñaḥ sarvaparaśāstrāṇāṃ dārako na paraśāstrairdāryo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:394: sa śrāvakaḥ śāstā kṣayajñānasampanna ityataḥ sarvāṇi vaiśāradyāni sāmānyata uktāni /
SA16hvsatssu:395: (pṛ) sattvāḥ kasmāt saṃśerate tathāgato 'sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:397: tadyathā bhagavān pratyāha- kuto yūyamāgacchatha ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:398: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaḥ kaścit nagaraṃ praviśya tannāma nāgarikān pṛcchati /
SA16hvsatssu:400: śrotāsya sūtrasya saṃśete tathāgato 'sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:402: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānāha svāgataṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ anena [SSS_14] kāyena mahārthalābhāya mama śāsanamanuvartadhvam /
SA16hvsatssu:405: yathoktam- tvaṃ khalu devadatta śavabhūtaḥ kheṭāśano 'si /
SA16hvsatssu:408: yathātmānamadhikṛtyāha ahaṃ pariṣadi siṃhakalpo daśabalaiścaturbhirvaiśāradyaiśca samanvitaḥ mahāpariṣadi siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:411: āha ca devadattam- nāhaṃ dadāmi saṅghaṃ śāriputramaugdalyāyanādibhyo 'pi kiṃ punardāsyāmi tubhyam /
SA16hvsatssu:413: alpajñā imāni vacanāni śrutvā vadanti tathāgatasyasravā akṣīṇā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:421: ato 'lpajñāḥ saṃśerate āryamārgaḥ saṃyojanānāṃ na kṣayakṛta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:426: yathā laukikā jānanto 'pi praṣṭāro na duṣyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:428: laukikā anāsaṅgacittā api āsaṅgikalpaṃ vadanti īdṛśamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:430: kāmā nāntarāyikadharmā iti sati vacane tatra tathāgata upadiśati kāmā vastuta āntarāyikadharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:431: yasya kāmāścittagatāḥ sa na mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:432: ato 'vaśyaṃ kāmān pūrvaṃ parityajya paścānmārgaṃ spṛśati /
SA16hvsatssu:433: āpattidharme satyapi [SSS_15] mārgaḥprāpyata iti brūvato 'vaśyaṃ paribhinne 'pyāpattidharme mārgo na prāpyate /
SA16hvsatssu:435: tasya gurupratyayatvāt bhagavān punaḥkhayamāśrāvayet nāstyāpattidharmo vināśayitum iti /
SA16hvsatssu:445_0: atha sūtra uktaṃ- tathāgatādīnāṃ daśa guṇāḥ yaduta tathāgataḥ arhan samyak sambuddho
SA16hvsatssu:445_1: vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavit anuttarapuruṣadaumyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ
SA16hvsatssu:446: tathāgata iti yathābhūtamārgayānena saṃsādhitasamyaksambodhitvāt tathāgata ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:447: yadyadupadiśati sarvaṃ tattvameva bhavati na mṛṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:453: atrāntarāle yat bhāṣate tat satyameva bhavati nānyathā /
SA16hvsatssu:455: sarvākārasarvajñajñānena pūrvāparaṃ parīkṣya paścādupadiśatītyata upadiṣṭaṃ satyameva bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:456: kiñca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ smṛtirdṛḍhā bhavati na muṣitā /
SA16hvsatssu:457: kecidanumāya yadupadiśaṃti tat kadācit sūtrānuyāyi bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:459: tairupadiṣṭhaṃ lābhāya vā bhavati hānāya vā /
SA16hvsatssu:460: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anumāturvacanaṃ lābhāya kadācit bhavati hānāya vā kadācit /
SA16hvsatssu:466: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān sattvānāṃ cittaprāmodyamadhimukti ñca prajñāya mārgamupadiśati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:469: yathoktaṃ kiṃśukaśirṣaka sūtre yo dharma upadeśārhaḥ tamupadiśati saṃkṣepato vistarato vā skandhāyatanādimukhena iti /
SA16hvsatssu:471: atha punardharmāvavādo dvividhaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ paramārthata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:472: tathāgata idaṃ satyadvayaṃ niśrityopadiśatītyata upadiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ tattvaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:473: bhagavān nopadiśati yat saṃvṛtisatyaṃ tat paramārthasatyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:474: na ca yat paramārthasatyaṃ tat saṃvṛtisatyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:476: atha tathāgatena yadi vā saṃvriyate yadi vā vivriyate tadubhayamapyaviruddham /
SA16hvsatssu:477: yat saṃvaraṇāya bhavati na tat vibriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:478: yat vivaraṇāya bhavati na tat saṃvriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:483: santi ca caturvidhā avavādāḥ darśanaśravaṇamananidhyaptidharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:484: bhagavāneṣu caturṣu dharmeṣu yadyadupadiśati tat sarvaṃ cittavyavadānāya bhavati nāsaṅgāya /
SA16hvsatssu:486: eṣu pañcasu bhagavān sambuddhaḥ san vyaktaramabhijñāyopadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:494: anityatādinā dharmān samyak bhāvayataḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:497: pūrvāntāparāntayośca nāsti santatiriti samyak pratisambudhyata iti samyak sambuddha iti nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:499: anye 'pi puruṣā anādisaṃsāre dānādīn dharmānācaranti na samyagācarantīti na sugata ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:500: bhagavān punardānādicaryāḥ samyaṅmārgeṇa caritavāniti sugata ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:509: kecit vicikitsante kathaṃ manuṣyeṇa devā avavadituṃ śakyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:510: ata āha- ahaṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ śāstā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:511: buddha iti atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtasakṣayākṣayāṇāṃ sthūlasūkṣmādīnāṃ vā sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇām /
SA16hvsatssu:512: bodhimūle niṣadya avidyāmiddhamavidhya sarvajñānojvalitāṃ mahābodhiṃ labdhavāniti buddhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:513: evaṃ navabhirguṇaiḥ sampanna triṣu adhvasu daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu ca pūjya iti bhagavān /
SA16hvsatssu:514: bhagavān daśanāmasampannaḥ svātmasampadā parasampadā ca ātmānamupakaroti parāṃścopakarotītyato 'bhivandyaḥ //
SA16hvsatssu:519: na hi santi tathāgatasya kāyikavācikamānasikaduścaritāni yāni[tathāgato rakṣitu]micchet mā paro drakṣyāt mā ca jñāsīt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:520: anyeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ santi kadācidavyākṛtābhāsāni kāyikavācikamānasikaduścaritāni vidvadgarhaṇīyāni /
SA16hvsatssu:528: tathāgataḥ kāyena subhāvitavān śīlasamādhiprajñā stattulyān dharmāśca /
SA16hvsatssu:529: ataḥ sarvāṇyakuśalāni akuśalābhāsāni ca karmāṇi sarvathā parikṣīṇāni /
SA16hvsatssu:532: tathāgataḥ sadā śīlamācarati adhimuktito na durgatipatanabhayādinā /
SA16hvsatssu:533: tathāgatasya ca sarvāṇi kāyikavācikamānasikakarmāṇi paropakārāya bhavanti iti nākuśalāni /
SA16hvsatssu:537: dharma upadiśyamāne yadi śrotā ekāgracitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:544: sarvadharmāṇāmatyantaśūnyatāṃ jñātavāniti na daurmanasyaṃ na vā saumanasyam /
SA16hvsatssu:545: susañcitamahākaruṇācittatvāt tathāgataḥ kuśale akuśale ca vinā saumanasyadaurmanasyādi mahākaruṇāmevotpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:546: tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ pṛthak pṛthak svabhāvamatigahanaṃ parijñātavānityato yadi kaścit kuśalacittaḥ śṛṇoti nānena sumanasko bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:547: yadi akuśacittaḥ śṛṇoti nānena durmanasko bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:559: mahākaruṇayā saṃsādhito 'nuttaro mārgo na punaranyaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:560: atha punastathāgatasya nāsti kāpīcchā- mama paramā santuṣṭiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:563: mahākāruṇikatvāt bhavaduḥkhahṛdvacanena mahopāye na sattvānāmuddharaṇāya vyavasāyaduḥkhānyupādatte /
SA16hvsatssu:564: tathāgato mahākaruṇayā sattvānāmuddharaṇāya loke 'smin taptāyaḥpiṇḍavat kṣaṇamapyasahyaṃ pañcaskandhātmakaṃ kāyamupādāya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:565: bhagavān buddhaḥ subhāvitopākṣācittaḥ tadupekṣācittamupekṣya sadā mahākaruṇācittamācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:570: ātmano mahāhitaṃ prāpayati parāṃśca mahāhitaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:572: tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ cittaparijñāne paramakuśalaḥ yathoktaṃ sūtre- ahaṃ sattvaparamārthasya suvijñaḥ kṛpāvān hitakārī ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:577: yathoktamekottarāgame tathāgatavarge- svayamāha- ahaṃ puruṣasārathiḥ puruṣāvataṃsaḥ puruṣahastī śramaṇānāṃ paramo brāhmaṇānāmapyuttamaḥ āryāṇāmadhipo 'pramattacārī,
SA16hvsatssu:589: yathā vyavadāna sūtre śāriputrastathāgatasyābhimukhaṃ tathāgataguṇān stauti /
SA16hvsatssu:600_0: (u) tathāgataḥ svayaṃ pravacanaṃ praśaṃsati- mayā bhāṣito dharma ādau madhye 'vasāne
SA16hvsatssu:600_1: ca kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātamanulomakaṃ brahmacaryamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:602: jinaśāsanamakālikaṃ kalyāṇañca bālye yauvane vārdhakye ca kalyāṇam /

SA16hvsatssu:612: nānyasūtravat rādau mahat madhye sūkṣmamavasāne sūkṣmataram /
SA16hvsatssu:627: [tadyathā] yo duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ yo vā duṣṭasvaraḥ śabdaḥ sa yajamānaṃ hinasti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:637: santi kānicana anyāni sūtrāṇi ca deva[putra]bhāṣitāni /
SA16hvsatssu:641: yathoktaṃ vinaye- dharmo nāma yat buddhabhāṣitaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:642: śrāvakabhāṣitaṃ nirmitabhāṣitaṃ devabhāṣitaṃ vā saṃkṣipya yāni loke subhāṣitāni tāni sarvāṇi buddhabhāṣitāni /
SA16hvsatssu:659: tathāgatāt śrutastu samyagarthe nikṣiptaṃ yathārthaṃ vacanaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:665: ayaṃ paryavadātadharma ucyate [yo] na sūtramātrānuyāyī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:666: santi ca jinaśāsanasya tisro dharmamudrāḥ- sarvamanātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:667: sarve saṃskṛtadharmāḥ kṣaṇikā anityāḥ- śāntaṃ nirodho nirvāṇam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:668: imā stisro dharmamudrāḥ sarvairapi vādibhirna śakyāḥ khaṇḍayitum /
SA16hvsatssu:677: atha tathāgataḥ svayaṃ svadharmaṃ stauti- mama dharmo nirodho nirvāṇagāmī samyak sambodhijanaka aupanāyika iti /
SA16hvsatssu:685: buddhāgama ucyate sarve saṃskṛtāḥ sādīnavā nāniśaṃsāsthānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:686: na tu yathā brāhmaṇāḥ brahmalokādīn praśaṃsanti /
SA16hvsatssu:689: tathāgatasya san dharmo nirvāṇāya bhavati ityataḥ samyaksambodhijanakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:697: buddha dharmaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ- svākhyāto [bhagavatā] sāndṛṣṭikaḥ akālikaḥ aupanāyika ehipaśyakaḥ pratyātmaṃ vedayitavyo vijñaiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:705: buddhadharmo dṛṣṭa eva loke vipākaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:711: ataḥ sāndṛṣṭikaṃ pūjāsatkāraṃ prāpayan aurdhvavipākaṃ nirvāṇaśca prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:715: buddhadharmo na kañcana divasaṃ māsaṃ vatsaraṃ nakṣatraṃ vāpekṣya mārgo bhāvyate /
SA16hvsatssu:716: asmin divase māse vatsare va mārgo na bhāvyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:717: na brāhmaṇadharmavat vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīnādadhīta grīṣme rājanya ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:726: baddhadharmaḥ svakāyena sākṣātkartavyo bhaviṣyati na parānuvartanena /

SA16hvsatssu:728: svayameva parīkṣadhvam ayaṃ dharma ācāritavyaḥ ayamanācaritavya iti /

SA16hvsatssu:748: yathā pārāyaṇa sūtre bhagavānāha- nāhaṃ [bhikṣava] ucchetsyāmi vaḥ kāṃkṣām /
SA16hvsatssu:753: pṛthagjanā avidyāparvatapraticchannā na śraddhadhanta imaṃ dharmam /
SA16hvsatssu:761: laukikā hi bahavo dṛṣṭaphalaṃ paśryanto na jānanti tatkāraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:765: uttānacetanā laukikā buddhadharme na gabhīrasaṃjñāṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:767: tṛṇamapi hetupratyayaiḥ sañcitaṃ parīkṣayituḥ tallakṣaṇaṃ gabhīraṃ vivartate /
SA16hvsatssu:768: yathā bhagavatā bhāṣitaḥ pratītyasamutpādadharmo gahanaṃ vastu /
SA16hvsatssu:773: (u) kecidvā dino vadanti- nedaṃ vacanaṃ yuktam /

SA16hvsatssu:777: na hi sa karmakleśān suvivicya paśyati /

SA16hvsatssu:786: bālā api jānanti yathā sudā ya śrāmaṇerādayaḥ /

SA16hvsatssu:789: yathā vā rāghabrāhmaṇa āha- bhagavān bhikṣūn arthadharme paramārthadharme yogaṃ śikṣāpayati yadutāsravakṣaye / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:791: na brāhmaṇā iva brāhmaṇadharmaṃ vadanta ātmana eva bodhimanuprāpnuvanti;

SA16hvsatssu:822: kecidāhu- śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ na kāvyapratirūpayā gāthayā racayitavyamiti /

SA16hvsatssu:854: dvividhāṃ gāthāṃ vihāyānyat gāthārahitaṃ sūtram udānamityucyate /

SA16hvsatssu:955: ayaṃ śrutacintāmayaprajñāyāṃ sthito dharmaṇāṃ kṣāntikāmasukhacittaṃ samyak bhāvayan anātmaśūnyatājñānamalabhamāno 'pi laukikaṃ dharmakṣāntyābhāsacittamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:959: sa krameṇa uṣmādidharmeṣu sthitau bhāvanāmayīṃ prajñāṃ labhamāno 'pi maulanāmnaiva śraddhānusārītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:961: asmāt sūtrāt vaktavyamavaśyaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ lapsyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:962: na vaktavyaṃ jīvitānte na lapsyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:965: yathogreṇa saṅghe nimantrite devatā upasaṃgamyārocayanti- amuko 'rhan amuko 'rhatpratipannako yāvadamukaḥ śrotaāpannaḥ amukaḥ srotaāpattipratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:970: ayaṃ labdhānātmajñāna ūṣmamūrdhakṣāntyagradharmeṣusthito dharmamanusṛtya pratipadyate yadanātmaśūnyādi /
SA16hvsatssu:972: imau dvau pratipannakau satyadarśanamārgamavatārya nirodhasatyaṃ paśyata ityato 'nimittapratipannaka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:974: laukikamārge saṃyojanaprahāṇāt phalatrayapratipanna iti na prathāṃ labhante /

SA16hvsatssu:1108: pūrvoktā aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā navāśaikṣāśca [militvā] saptaviṃśati [pudgalāḥ] laukikaṃ sarvapuṇyakṣetram /

SA16hvsatssu:1170: atha kānicitsūtrāṇi maṅgalādīni śaikṣāṇāmāyuryaśaḥprasaravardhanāni iti sūtrakartāro 'bhiprayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1187: bhagavato mahākaruṇācittena sarvalokānāṃ hitakaratvāt taddharmo 'pāryantikabādha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1189: bhagavadupadiṣṭaṃ śāstrantu cāturvargīyāṇāṃ sattvānāmātiryagjantūnāñca santārakaṃ bhavati iti nāsti pāryantikabādhā /
SA16hvsatssu:1199: bhagavadabhisandhimajānatāmupadiṣṭaṃ vṛtheti tat ātmanaḥ kleśāyaiva bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1200: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dvau puruṣau bhagavantaṃ nindataḥ eko 'śraddhādveṣābhyāṃ nindati,
SA16hvsatssu:1203: vidvānapi buddhābhisandhimanavabudhya buddhabhāṣitaṃ na vicārayituṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1207: sarve bhikṣavo nānāvidhāḥ parapravādino nālabhanta tathāgatāśayam /
SA16hvsatssu:1209: yathā ca kaścit mahāntaṃ vṛkṣaṃ chitvā atikramyaiva mūlamatikramyaiva skandhaṃ śākhāpalāśāni paryeṣayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1213: kiñca bhagavān śariputramapṛcchat ke śaikṣāḥ ke ca sāṅkhyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1217: iti ānanda stathāgatamāmantyāha- abhisambodhisamadhigamāt pratilabdhe mārge hitaṃ bhavatītyatadapi yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1219: dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ samyak dṛṣṭirbhavati parato ghoṣāt yoniśaśca [SSS_39] manaskārāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1221: yathā cāha bhagavān- yadi mayā kasyacit dharma upadiṣṭaḥ so 'pratilabdhamadabhisandhitvāt kalahāyate / iti / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1225: ato jñātavyameva vādinaḥ tathāgatamapratipadyamānā yathārutamanuvartamānāḥ kalahāyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1227: tadā bhagavān bhikṣūnabravīt- bhāvayathemamartha nānandopamitākāram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1228: sarve vādina āhuḥ- arhan agradakṣiṇīya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1231: [evam] annapāne sthūlavastunyeva na jānanti [yathāvat] kaḥ punarvādastathāgatenabhisandhāya bhāṣite sūkṣmadharme /
SA16hvsatssu:1238: jānantyapi ca vaktuśca vivakṣā yasya vastunaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1239: tatrāsti dvidhā mārga āryamārgo laukikamārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1242: atha parapravāda sūtre 'pi bhagavān saṃśrāvayati sma /
SA16hvsatssu:1244: [SSS_40] udāyibhikṣudharmadinnādibhibhikṣuṇībhiḥ kṛtaṃ bhagavacchāsanaṃ bhagavān śrutvā [tadeva punaḥ] śrāvayati sma /
SA16hvsatssu:1247: evamanyaḥ "tathāgatamūlāḥ sarvadharmā" ityādi praśnaḥ sarvaḥ pratyuktaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1250: śāstre viracitte hi arthaḥ sugamaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1253: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānavocadbhikṣūn- yathāpraṇītaṃ śāstraṃ samyagdhārayata /
SA16hvsatssu:1255: ataḥ sūtrādarthamādāya śāstraṃ nikāyānta rātmanā pṛthak sthāpyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1257: kiñca bhagavān nānāsattvānāṃ santaraṇīyānāṃ kṛte lokādīni śāstramukhānyuktavān /
SA16hvsatssu:1259: svātyādayo bhikṣava āhuḥ- tadevedaṃ vijñānaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati /
SA16hvsatssu:1269: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:1275: āha ca- dīrgharātraṃ bhāvitacitto mṛta ūrdhvajanmabhāk bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1282: yathoktaṃ sūtre eṣu pañcasu skandheṣu nāstyātmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1287: yathā bhagavān āha- skandhānāṃ santatyāsti saṃsāra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1293: [yathā vā] mṛgā ramāteti snuṣāṃ māteti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1295: yathoktaṃ sūtre- jihvā rasaṃ vijānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1296: jihvāvijñānaṃ rasaṃ vijānāti na tu jihvā /
SA16hvsatssu:1297: yathā śaktipratihataṃ puruṣaṃ prati vadanti puruṣo 'yaṃ duḥkhaṃ vijānātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1300: yathā vā daridraḥ puruṣaḥ prabhuriti vyapadiśyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1302: kiñca bhagavān tīrthikānākārayati brāhmaṇāniti śramaṇāniti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:1303: kṣatriyabrāhmaṇādaya iva buddho 'pi vyavahārataḥ pūjyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1310: yathoktaṃ sūtre- pratītyasamutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ cakṣurādīnāmindriyāṇāṃ mūlaṃ mahāsamudravat /
SA16hvsatssu:1311: yathāha sūtram- skandhāyatanadhātūnāṃ pratyayāḥ sāmagrīmātram na kārakaḥ nāpi vedakaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1313: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat laukikā vadanti sukhamiti [tat] āryā duḥkhaṃ vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1314: yat āryā duḥkhaṃ vadanti [tat]laukikāḥ sukhaṃ vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1319: yatra rūpamityākhyāyate tatra yadatītaṃ yadanāgataṃ vartamānam sarvaṃ tat rūpamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1324: na tu sarvaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśasya hetūkriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1325: tṛṣṇasti cet avaśyaṃ sā vedanāmupādāyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1326: na tu sarvā vedanā tṛṣṇāyā hetūkriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1327: kadācit samagraheturucyate yathā sparśapratyayā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1328: kadācidasamagra heturucyate yathā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1334: iti ca caturbhirdhyānaiḥ prasrabdhimānapi na sukhaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1337: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaścai- tyavandanāya pādāvutkṣipati sa āyuṣo 'nte deveṣūtpadyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1339: sūtrāntaramāha- anantaryasya kartā na deveṣūtpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1341: uktañca sūtre- kāmānāmanubhavitā nāpāpakaṃ karoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1343: srotaāpannaḥ puruṣaḥ kāmānupabhuñjāno 'pi na durgatipatanīyaṃ karma karoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1345: api coktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1347: yadi tadaiva sarvāṇi rūpāṇi pratītya cakṣurvijñānamutpadyata [SSS_43] iti vadet /
SA16hvsatssu:1349: atha coktaṃ sūtre- śrotraṃ pratītya śabdañca śrotravijñānamutpadyate na cakṣurvijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1354: viniścitam- yathocyate- buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1357: kiñcāha- sarve saṃskṛtadharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmānaḥ [teṣāṃ]nirodho nirvāṇam ityādi mukhaṃ viniścitam /
SA16hvsatssu:1374: yathocyate- adbhuta mūlikā surabhipuṣpañca na vātarogapratikūlam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1378: kiñca vadanti tisro vedanā- duḥkhā vedanā sukhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1383: āha ca- duḥkhamidaṃ trividhaṃ navaṃ purāṇaṃ madhyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1396: yathā ekavastukathane anyadapi vastu samalakṣaṇamuktaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1400: yathā bhagavānā ha- ya udayavyayalakṣaṇadṛṣṭidvayaṃ na prajānāti sa sarvaḥ sarāgī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1406: yathocyate- annadānaṃ prayacchati pañca guṇān- āyuḥ varṇaṃ balaṃ sukhaṃ pratibhānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1411: api tu kārṣāpaṇamupādāya labdhamadyate ityataḥ kārṣāpaṇamadyata ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1421: yathā vadanti- upacitadharmāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sukha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1423: yathā vadanti- mūḍhaiḥ saha saṃvāso duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1430: yathāha saptāsravasūtram- tatra dvau vastuta āsravau,
SA16hvsatssu:1441: yathoktaṃ sūsre- dvau puruṣau staḥ jño 'jñaśca /
SA16hvsatssu:1449: yathā vadanti- kaścinmuṇḍitakeśaśmaśruko dharmapaṭaṃ paridadhānaḥ parigṛhītabuddheryāpatho 'pi bhagavacchāsanād dūrībhūtaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1451: yastu śraddhendriyādisamanvāgataḥ sa gṛhastho 'pi aprākṛta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1452: yathoktaṃ sūtre- caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ kaścit saṅghasyeryāpathe 'vatīrṇaḥ na saṅghagaṇitaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1463: śraddhendriyalipsunā bhagavacchāsanaṃ śrutvā uddiṣṭaṃ prātimokṣamādāya yathāvaccaritavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1465: kiñcānena śāstreṇa dvividhaṃ hitaṃ bhavati ātmahitaṃ parahitamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1471: ya ātmanā śīlādīn sampādayati na parān śīlādiṣu sthāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1474: yat kaścidātmahitāya pratipanno 'pi pareṣāñca dānādimahāphalaṃ sampādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1479: sa ātmanā dharmacaryāmanuvartamāno 'pi parārthamupadeśāt ātmano 'pi hitamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1480: yathoktaṃ sūtre- parasyadharmamupadiśan pañcavidhaṃ hitaṃ labhate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1482: tatra pravacanamātrasyottamaṃ hitaṃ bhavati yadyathoktamācarata āsravāḥ kṣīyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1486: atha sa puruṣa idānīṃ jyotiṣi sthitaḥ paścādapi jyotiḥ parāyaṇo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1487: laukikāḥ sarve bhūyasā tamastamaḥ parāyaṇāḥ jyotiṣo jyotiḥ parāyaṇā vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1488: yaḥ kaścid buddhaśāsanamācarati sa tamaso jyotiḥ parāyaṇaḥ jyotiṣo jyotiḥ parāyaṇo vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1490: dānādīnācaran na [tādṛśaṃ] hitaṃ vindate yādṛśaṃ buddhadharmaṃ śṛṇvan [vindate] /
SA16hvsatssu:1491: yaścālpa[mapi] buddhapravacanaṃ śṛṇoti sa prativedhajñānalābhī san sarvakleśān bhaṅktvā apramāṇahitaṃ prasavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1492: yaktoktaṃ sūtre- catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ- tamastamaḥparāyaṇaḥ tamojyotiḥparāyaṇaḥ jyotirjyotiḥ parāyaṇaḥ jyotistamaḥparāyaṇaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1493: kiñca caturvidhāḥ parāyaṇāḥ anussrotogāmī pratisrotogāmī sthitātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:1495: yaścittaikāgryeṇa bhagavaddharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa eva pañca nīvaraṇāni prahāya saptabodhyaṅgāni bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1498: punaścaturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- sadābhavanimagnaḥ kañcit kālaṃ bhavānnirgatya punarnimagnaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1502: kaścit laukikaśraddhādīnutpādya na dṛḍhayati panaḥ parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1504: yaḥ śraddhādīnutpādya śubhāśubhaṃ vivecayati sa nirgamaparīkṣakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1506: yo bhagavaddharmasya samyagarthaṃ vetti sa naiva sadā nimagno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1509: sa ca guṇābhāvayitetyucyate yaḥ kāyena śīlaṃ manasā prajñāṃ ca bhāvayati sa kiñcid duṣkarma kurvannapi durgatau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:1510: yastu bhāvayati kāyena śīlaṃ manasā prajñāṃ sa bahu duṣkarma kurvannapi na durgatau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:1512: kāyaṃ bhāvayan krameṇa śīlasamādhiprajñāskandhānutpādya karmāṇi prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1514: - uktañca sūtre caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- kecit agambhīratīkṣṇānuyāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1519: samanantaro yo mṛdumadhyānuśayaḥ sa sadāgatya cittaniviṣṭo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1521: caturtho yo mṛdumadhyānuśayaḥ sa kaśmiṃñcitkāla āgacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1522: sa yadi bhagavataḥ śāsane samyacchāsraṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1527: nāsti puṇyapāpaṃ [nāsti] karmaphalamiti mithyādṛṣṭau yaḥ patati saparāneva vyābādhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1528: yaddānamācarati sa ātmānamapi vyābādhate parānapi vyābādhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1536: yathoktaṃ sūtre kathāsamprayogeṇa [pudgalo] veditavyo yadi vā kathyo yadi vākathya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1537: yo viduṣāṃ dharmaṃ pṛṣṭhaḥ sthānāsthāne na santiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:1545: yathā nāthaputrādayaḥ svayaṃ vadanti asmākaṃ śāstā āptaḥ tadvacanamevānuvartāmaha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1559: ātmano vā mānasikī tuṣṭhiḥ āryapravacanadharmaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1560: tatra yo bhagavaddharma samyak jñātvā pravakti sa kathyo bhavati / nānye /
SA16hvsatssu:1563: vibhajya vyākaraṇīyaṃ praśnaṃ na vibhajya vyākaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:1564: pratipṛcchāvyākaraṇīyaṃ praśnaṃ na patipṛcchya vyākaroti sthapanīyaṃ praśnaṃ na sthapayitvā vyākaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:1568: [tena] yathā buddho bhagavān [tathā] loke nāsti tatsama itīdṛśamanumānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1575: sthapanīyaḥ praśna iti yo dharmo 'bhūtarūpaḥ kintu prajñaptisan /
SA16hvsatssu:1577: kiṃ śāśvataḥ utāśāśvata ityādi yadi kaścit pṛcchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1581: kiñca santi caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- sāvadyaḥ badyabahulaḥ alpāvadyaḥ anavadya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1582: sāvadya iti yasya kevalamakuśalaṃ naiko 'pi kuśaladharmo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:1589: bhagavacchāsanasya samyagarthavedī dvaividhyaṃ bhajate alpavadyo 'navadya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1596: yathoktaṃ sūtre- catvāri saṅgrahavastūni- dānaṃ priyavacanamarthacaryā samānārthatā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1610: tadā te sattvā na prakampyā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1614: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dharmapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyam na pudgalapratiśaraṇeneti /
SA16hvsatssu:1615: yadyapi kaścidevaṃ vadet mayā bhagavataḥ sammukhāt śrutaṃ bhadantaśca sammukhādvā pūrvānte śrutamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1617: yadvacanantu sūtre 'vatīrṇaṃ dharmalakṣaṇāviruddhaṃ vinayānuloimitañca tatpunarādeyaṃ syāt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1622: tadyathā kaścit saṃskṛtadharmāḥ śāśvatāḥ [SSS_50] sukhāḥ sātmāna iti bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1624: anityā duḥkhā anātmāna iti yo bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1626: anityatādijñānameva dharmalakṣaṇam dharmo 'yaṃ śaraṇīkartavyo na pudgalāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1627: dharmapratiśaraṇaṃ vadatā sarve dharmāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1628: ataḥ punarucyate nitārthasūtrapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na neyārthasūtrapratiśaraṇeneti /
SA16hvsatssu:1630: yaducyate arthapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na vyañjanapratiśareṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1631: yo 'yaṃ vyañjanārthaḥ sūtre 'vatīrṇo dharmalakṣaṇāvirodhī vinayānulomakaśca tatpratiśaraṇena bhavitavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1643: uktañca sūtre- catvāri devamanuṣyāṇāṃ cakrāṇi śubhavardhakāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1644: pratirūpadeśavāsaḥ satparuṣopāśrayaḥ ātmanaḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ pūrve ca kṛtapuṇyatā /
SA16hvsatssu:1648: pūrve ca kṛtapuṇyatā nāma yat bādhiryamūkatādyabhāvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1649: ātmanaḥ samyak praṇidhānaṃ nāma samyak darśanamidam /
SA16hvsatssu:1651: asya śāstrasyādhyetā cāsminnevāyuṣi satyaprativedhākhyaṃ mahāsārārthaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1652: yathoktaṃ sūtre- catvāraḥ sāradharmāḥ vacanasāraḥ samādhisāro darśanasāro vimuktisāra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1655: sarve anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirodho nirvāṇamiti yadvacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1658: imaṃ samādhimupādāya saṃskṛtadharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ ityādi bhāvanā samyagdarśanaprāpiṇī bhāvanāmayaprajñāparipūraṇamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1667: śrutasaddharmā san yoniśo manaskāramutpādya anityādinā dharmān samyagbhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1668: anayā bhāvanayā dharmānudharmaṃ pratipadyate yadutānāsravaṃ darśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1675: śūnyatādarśanena kleśānāṃ viyogaṃ labhata iti tyāgādhiṣṭhānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1677: kiñca bhagavacchāsanasya samyacchāstraṃ śrutavataścatvāri nirvāṇagāmini kuśalamūlāni aṅkurībhavanti yaduta ūṣmadharmo mūrdhadharmaḥ kṣāntidharmo laukikāgradharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1678: anityādyākāreṇa pañcaskandhān bhāvayato 'varaṃ mṛdu nirvāṇagāmi kuśalamūlaṃ cittasyoṣmakaramutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1690: yastathāgatasya dharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa hānabhāgīyaṃ visaṃyujya trīṇi kuśalamūlāni pratilabhate //
SA16hvsatssu:1693: atha yastāthāgatadharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa catussatyāni savibhaṅgāni samprajānāti duḥkhasatyaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:1700: santi ca catasro vijñānasthitayo rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1703: santi ca catasro jātayaḥ- aṇḍajo jarāyujaḥ saṃsvedeja aupapāduka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1707: catvāra āhārāḥ- kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ audārikaḥ sūkṣmo vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1711: manaḥsañcetanāhāro yat kadācit puruṣāḥ sañcetanāpraṇidhānena jīvati /
SA16hvsatssu:1712: vijñānāhāraḥ antarābhavikanārakārūpyā nirodhasamāpattipraviṣṭhāḥ satvā adṛṣṭavijñānā api vijñānapratilambhe vartanta ityato vijñānāhārā ityucyante /
