SA16hvsatssu:2390: atha yadi ghaṭādayaḥ padārthāḥ anāgatāḥ santi /
SA16hvsatssu:2394: kiñca bhagavānāhasaṃskṛtadharmā utpādavyayasthityanyathātvai strilakṣaṇā upalabhyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2395: utpāda iti yo dharmaḥ [SSS_71] pūrvamabhūtvā idānīṃ savyāpāro dṛśyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2406: apicāha- yatkiñcana rūpamādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vā atītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ vā [sarva]mabhisaṃkṣipya rūpaskandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2416: uktañca sūtre- yadatītaṃ vastusat hitakaraṃ tadbhagavānupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:2425: tathāgataḥ svayameva vadati- yasya nāstyatītaṃ kṛtaṃ pāpakarma sa puruṣo naiva durgatau patiṣyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2428: smṛtiryadi nāsti atītānāgatayoḥ tadā puruṣo nānusmaretpañcaviṣayān /
SA16hvsatssu:2430: nahi manovijñānaṃ dṛṣṭe pañca viṣayān prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:2433: tadā arhan na kīrtayet- ahaṃ dhyānasamādhimupasampanna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2435: caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu adhicittamadhivedanañca bhāvanā na bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:2444: dīrghamalpakālaṃ vā śīlābhyāsaśca na syādityato na yujyate //
SA16hvsatssu:2448: bhavatā yadyapyuktaṃ sati dharme cittamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2451: yaducyate bhavatā- rūpalakṣaṇena rūpasaṃjñayā [atītaṃ] rūpaṃ lakṣyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2462: bhavatoktaṃ- yat vastu sat hitakaraṃ tadbhagavānupadiśatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2467: yasmātsattvā atītānanāgatān dharmān sātmano manyante tasmāt bhagavānevamavocat /
SA16hvsatssu:2470: tacca karma phalasya hetuṃ kṛtvā niruddham /
SA16hvsatssu:2473: tathāgataśāsane asti vā nāsti vā iti sarvamupāya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2480: cittasyotpādo nātmani niśrayata iti ca viśadam /
SA16hvsatssu:2483: tathāgataḥ prajānāti- karmaniruddhamapi phalasya hetuṃ karotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2488: tasya ca karmaṇo nirodhe 'pi vipāko na praṇaśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:2499: prākṛto jano mohādabhūtasmṛtyā pūrvagṛhītaṃ niyatalakṣaṇaṃ paścānniruddhamapi utpadyamāna[mivā]nusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:2504: bhavānāha- na kīrtayet- ahaṃ dhyānasamādhiṃ labdhavāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:2507: bhavān bravīti- adhicittamadhivedanañca bhāvanā na bhavet iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2519: uktañca bhavatā- sūdīrghamalpakālaṃ vā śīlābhyāsaśca na syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:2532: bhagavānāha- sarvaṃ sarvamiti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva dvādaśāyatanāni /
SA16hvsatssu:2534: pṛthivyādīni dravyāṇi saṃkhyādayo guṇāḥ utkṣepaṇāvakṣepaṇādikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:2539: ākāśe [ca] padaṃ nāsti śramaṇo nāsti bāhyataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2549: bhagavataḥ śāsana upāyatayā sarvamastīti vā sarvaṃ nāstīti vocyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2562: āśvalāyanasūtre hi bhagavānāha- yadā pitarau sannipatitau bhavataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2565: vatsasūtrañcāha- yasmin samaye sattva imaṃ kāyaṃ nikṣipati punaścittotpādanakāyamanupādāno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2569: uktañcasūtre- vyavakīrṇaṃ karmābhisaṃskṛtya vyavakīrṇaṃ kāyamupādāya vyavakīrṇe loka utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2571: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- catvāro bhavāḥ pūrvakālabhavo maraṇabhavo 'ntarābhava upapattibhava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2572: āha ca- saptabhavāḥ- pañcagatayaḥ [SSS_76] karmabhavo 'ntarābhava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2573: āha ca- yamarājo 'ntarābhave pāpinaḥ santarjya vyatyastaṃ pātayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:2575: tathāgato 'ntarābhavamupādāya sattvānāṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ prajānāti ayaṃ sattvo 'smin upapattisthāna utpadyate sa sattvastasminnupapattisthāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2576: uktañca sūtre- divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati sattvān cyavamānānupapadyamānāṃśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:2579: laukikā api astyantarābhava iti śraddhadhānā vadantimriyamāṇasya sūkṣmāṇi catvāri mahābhūtāni asmādbhavāt [bhavāntaraṃ] krāmanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2583: imaṃ kāyaṃ visṛjya parakāyamanupādānasyāntarā vyucchedaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2588: yadyapyuktaṃ bhavatā- āśvalāyanasūtra uktam astyantarābhava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2591: yadyāryā na jānanti- ayaṃ kaḥ kuta āgata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2598: anena brāhmaṇena kalpitam- anyaḥ kāyo 'nyo jīva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2599: ata evaṃ prativakti- santyantarābhave pañcaskandhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2601: sa kāmarūpadhātvorantarā kāyamupādāya tatra parinirvṛta iti antarāparinirvāyī /
SA16hvsatssu:2603: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kaścinmriyamāṇaḥ kutra gacchati kutrotpadyate kutra tiṣṭhati itīdamekārthakam /
SA16hvsatssu:2604: bhavānāha- vyavakīrṇaṃ kāyamupādāya vyavakīrṇe loka utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2605: kāyamupādāyeti vacanaṃ loka utpadyata iti cedamekārthakam /
SA16hvsatssu:2606: catvāro bhavāḥ sapta bhavā iti ca bhavaduktaṃ sūtramayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:2619: bhavānāha- mriyamāṇasya sūkṣmāṇi catvāri mahābhūtāni bhavāntaraṃ krāmantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2625: pūrvanivāsajñāna uktaṃ jānāti ayaṃ puruṣo 'smiṃlloke mṛtastasmiṃlloka utpadyata iti na tūktam antarābhave tiṣṭhatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2635: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadimaṃ kāyaṃ nikṣipan kāyāntaramupādatte tadahaṃ vadāmi upapattiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:2661: nahi pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate cittaṃ santatyotpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2663: na tatra pāde sthitaṃ [SSS_78] vijñānaṃ bhavapratyayaṃ śirasi saṅkrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:2674: yathoktaṃ sūtre lokasya samudayaṃ paśyato nāstitādṛṣṭirna bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2678: tasya virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dharmacakṣurbhavati / āha ca-
SA16hvsatssu:2679: anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokaṃ stokaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe /
SA16hvsatssu:2681: āsravakṣayasūtramāha jānataḥ paśyataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2682: pratipattupratidinaṃ kṣīyamāṇaṃ svayamajānato 'pi sadā bhāvitatvāt āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2683: [SSS_79] bhagavānāha satyeṣu udapadyata cakṣuḥ jñānaṃ vidyā prajñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2686: sūtre ca bhagavān kaṇṭhata āha anupūrveṇa satyābhisamaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2689: kleśānāñca catussatyeṣu caturdhā mithyācārā bhavanti yaduta nāsti dukhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:2694: yogī ca cittaṃ samādhāya idaṃ duḥkhaṃ ayaṃ duḥkhanirodha iyaṃ duḥkhanigāminī patipat iti vikalpayet /
SA16hvsatssu:2695: yadyekasmin citte syāt kathamevamanupūrveṇa samādhivikalpo bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:2700: bhavānāha lokasya samudayaṃ paśyato nastitādṛṣṭirna bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2703: tathā cet ṣoḍaśabhiḥ cittakṣaṇaiḥ dvādaśabhirākāraiśca mārgo labhyata iti na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2704: bhavatoktaṃ yatsamudayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ tannirodhalakṣaṇamiti prajānato dharmacakṣurbhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2705: tathā cet cittadvayena mārgalābhaḥ syāt- adyaṃ samudayacittaṃ dvitīyaṃ nirodhacittaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2707: bhavānāha anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokaṃ stokaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe /
SA16hvsatssu:2709: bhavatoktaṃ āsravakṣayasūtramāha rūpādīn jānataḥ paśyataḥ āsravānāṃ kṣayo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2712: bhagavān svayaṃ bravīti caturṣu satyeṣu jñānaṃ cakṣurvidyā prajñodapadyateti na bravīti anupūrveṇa ṣoḍaśacittakṣaṇāni bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2713: [SSS_80] bhavatoktaṃ bhagavān kaṇṭhenāha- anupūrveṇa satyabhisamayaḥ śreṇyārohaṇavat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2720: evaṃ ca ṣoḍaśabhireva cittakṣaṇairmārgalābha iti na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2724: [yogino] na [nānā]satyāni bhavanti kintu ekameva satyaṃ bhavati yaduta duḥkhanirodhadarśanamādyābhisambodhi nāmakam /
SA16hvsatssu:2725: dṛśyadharmādīnāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt yogī ūṣmagatādidharmānupūrveṇa caramanirodhasatyarūpaṃ satyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:2731: (pṛ) kena kāraṇena parihīyate kena kāraṇena na parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2733: yathoktaṃ sūtre- pañca hetavaḥ pañca pratyayāḥ samayavimuktasyārhataḥ parihāṇāya saṃvartante /
SA16hvsatssu:2741: āha ca sūtram dvividho 'rhan parihāṇalakṣaṇo 'parihāṇalakṣaṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2742: api coktaṃ sūtre yadyamuko bhikṣuḥ vimuktimukhāt parihīyate tadidaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2744: kumbhopamaṃ kāyamidaṃ viditvā nagaropamaṃ cittamidaṃ sthāpayet /
SA16hvsatssu:2745: yudhyeta māraṃ prajñāyudhena jitañca rakṣedaniveśanaḥ syāt // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2754: dapadyata ityādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ jñātavyaṃ parihīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2757: kecidvadanti āryamārgānna parihīyate dhyānasamādheḥ paraṃ parihīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2758: (pṛ) tathā cet arhan dvividho na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2763: yathā gaudhiko bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍvāraṃ [cetovimukteḥ] parihīṇaḥ asinā ātmānaṃ jaghāna /
SA16hvsatssu:2766: tathāgatāśāsane hi vimuktiḥ pradhānā na samādhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2768: tasmāt samādheḥ cyutasyānāsravaṃ cyavate na tu anāsravātparihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2771: kṣīṇaṃ purāṇaṃ na navo 'sti sambhavo viraktacittā āyatike bhave ca /
SA16hvsatssu:2772: te kṣīṇabījā aviruḍhacchandā nirvānti dhīrā yathāyaṃ pradīpaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2774: śailo yathā caikaghano vātena na samīryate /
SA16hvsatssu:2775: evaṃ nindāpraśaṃsāsu na samiñjanti paṇḍitāḥ / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2780: kiñcāha- āryasya kṣīyamāṇaḥ samudayo na punarbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2786: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ye śaikṣā nirvāṇamārgaṃ paryeṣante /
SA16hvsatssu:2788: yeṣāmāsravāḥ kṣīṇāḥ na teṣāṃ punarāsravā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:2790: kiñcāha- vidvāna kuśalabhāvanaḥ kuśalavāk kuśalakāyakarmāntaḥ karaṇīyānna cyavata iti / api cāha-
SA16hvsatssu:2802: āha ca- dharmān mithyābhāvayato bhikṣostraya āsravāḥ prādurbhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2803: arhan punarna mithyābhāvayatīti na ta āsravāḥ prādurbhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2804: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ya āryaprajñayā prajānāti na sa parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2806: kīñcārhan tisro vedanāḥ samyak prajānāti [tāsā]mutpādalakṣaṇaṃ nirodhalakṣaṇamāsvādalakṣaṇaṃ mārgalakṣaṇaṃ nissaraṇalakṣaṇañcetyato notpādayati saṃyojanam /
SA16hvsatssu:2807: kiñcāha- yo bhikṣuḥ śīlasamādhiprajñākhyai stribhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa na parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2811: yathoktaṃ sūtre- satyavihārī āryo naiva parihīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2815: kiñcārhan akopyāṃ [ceto]vimuktiṃ sākṣātkṛtatvān ityato na parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2816: arhan tathāgataśāsane sāramarthaṃ pratilabdhavān yadutākopyā cetovimuktiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2817: kasyacit karacchedavat tatsmaraṇe 'smaraṇe ca sadā karacchedo 'styeva /
SA16hvsatssu:2820: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- śraddhādināmindriyāṇāṃ tīkṣṇatvāt arhan bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2823: tadyathā dahano 'dagdhaṃ dahati dagdhvā ca napunastatra pratyāvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:2824: evaṃ bhikṣuḥ ekā daśabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgata ityato na kadāpi parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2825: (pṛ) dvividho 'rhan iti bhavatodāhṛtasūtramāha- asti aparihāṇa[lakṣaṇa] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2830: jinaścet punarutpannaḥ syāt ucyate na tu so jinaḥ
SA16hvsatssu:2831: jino bhūtvā na jāyet tātvikaḥ sa jino mataḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2832: yo 'rhan punaḥ kleśānutpādayati na sa jino bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:2833: arhataḥ kṣīṇajātitvāt na punaḥ kāyo vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2834: bhavataḥ sūtraṃ yadyapyāha- arhan parihāṇadharmā punaḥ parihīyeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2849: kleśā hi sadā cittena saha saṃprayogajāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2856: yaḥ kleśaḥ sahajo bhavati na sa āgantuka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2861: cittamidaṃ tatkāla eva niruddhaṃ na malanimittavat bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2862: cittaṃ tatkāla eva vinaṣṭaṃ kena malena lipyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2871: kintu tathāgataḥ cittaṃ nityaṃ sthāyīti vadatāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛta āha āgantukamalakliṣṭaṃ sat cittamapariśuddhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:2872: kiñca kusīdasattvā ye śṛṇvanti cittaṃ prakṛtito 'pariśuddhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:2874: na te cittavyavadānamārabheran ityataḥ tathāgata āha prakṛtipariśuddhamiti //
SA16hvsatssu:2886: bhavatāṃ śāsane yadyapyucyate cittaviprayukto 'nuśayaḥ cittasamprayuktasaṃyojanaparyavasthānasya hetuṃ karotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2889: uktaṃ hi sūtre- avidyāyoniśomanaskāramithyāsaṅkalpādibhyo rāgādīni saṃyojanani prādurbhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2891: yadyapi bhavatāṃ śāsana uktaṃ- cirābhyastasaṃyojanaparyavasthāpako 'nuśayo nāma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2897: yujyata iti cet sarve 'pi dharmāḥ pratyutpanna hetorupadyeran nātītahetoḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2898: tathā ca na karmajo vipākaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2900: anuśayānāmeṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt kathaṃ punaste janakahetavaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2909: śāstramāha- kāśyapīyā vadanti ananubhūtavipākaṃ karma atīte 'dhvani asti /
SA16hvsatssu:2920: yathā payo nirodhe daghno hetukṛtyaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:2932: śāstramāha- mahīśāsakā vadanti tathāgata saṅghavartī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2934: yadi mataṃ tathāgataḥ catasṛṣu pariṣatsu antargataḥ yaduta sattvapariṣat prāṇipariṣat manuṣyapariṣat āryapariṣat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2936: yadi mataṃ tathāgataḥ śrāvakapariṣadi antargata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2940: (pṛ) saṅghārāmāgragasya tathāgatasya dāyakaḥ puruṣaḥ saṅghadāyaka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2945: (pṛ) bhagavān gautamīmavocat- imaṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghe dehi /
SA16hvsatssu:2946: tadā ahamapi pūjito bhaviṣyāmi saṅgho 'pi ca /
SA16hvsatssu:2949: yathoktaṃ sūtre yo rogaprekṣī sa māṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:2956: ato jñāyate na bhagavān saṅgāntargata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2957: kiñca bhagavān na saṅghakarmapraviṣṭaḥ nāpi anyasaṅghavastusamaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2961: śāstramāha- vātsīputrīyā vadanti asti pudgala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2966: yathā bahuṣu sūtreṣu tathāgato bhikṣūnāha- nāmamātrataḥ prajñaptimātrata upayogamātrataḥ pudgala ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2968: nāmamātrata ityādinā jñāyate na paramārtha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2970: yo na paśyati duḥkhañca sa ātmānantu paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:2971: duḥkhadarśī yathābhūtaṃ sa ātmānaṃ na paśyati // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2975: api ca sūtre bhagavānavocat- yatrāsmīti tatreñjitam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2976: yadvastu sat na tatreñjitaṃ bhavati yathā cakṣuḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:2978: tatra tatra sūtre ca ātmavādaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2981: kiṃ nu satveti pratyeṣi māradṛṣṭigataṃ nu te /
SA16hvsatssu:2989: nāstyātmā na cātmīyaṃ na sattvo nāpi mānavaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3007: bimbisārapratyudgamanasūtre bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha- vibhāvayata yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ prākṛtānāṃ prajñaptimanurudhya vadāmi astyātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:3010: kiñcāha- pañcaskandhānupādāyāsti nānāvidhaṃ nāma yaduta ātmā sattvo mānavo deva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3014: sthavirapūrṇakaḥ kaścit tīrthikaḥ āha- yadi puruṣo mithyādṛṣṭayā asantamastīti vadati /
SA16hvsatssu:3016: yamakasūtre śāriputro yamakamavocat- kiṃ yamaka samanupaśyasi rūpaskandho 'rhan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3018: kiṃ samanupaśyasi vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānamarhan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3024: yadevaṃ parimṛgya [dṛṣṭa eva dharme satyataḥ sthirataḥ] nopalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3025: tatkalyaṃ nu te vyākaraṇaṃ arhan [kāyasya bhedāducchidyate vinaśyati] na bhavati paraṃ maraṇāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:3026: abhūtkhalu me [āyuṣman] śāriputra pūrvaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigatam,
SA16hvsatssu:3027: idaṃ punarāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā tacca pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ prahīṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:3034: uktañcaśreṇikasūtre- trayāṇāṃ śāstṝṇāṃ yo nopalabhate pratyutpannamātmānamūrdhvabhāvinaṃ vātmānaṃ tamahaṃ śāstāraṃ buddhaṃ vadāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3037: yadi mataṃ satyātmani ātmeti saṃjñā na viparyāsa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3058: astyekāntata ātmeti yo vadati sa ṣaṇṇāṃ mithyādṛṣṭīnīmanyatamasyāmanupatati /
SA16hvsatssu:3064: paramārthatastu astyātmeti brūvato hi doṣo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3068: api cātmadṛṣṭimūloddharaṇāyāha bhagavān yathā mogharāja [māṇava]pṛcchāyāṃ bhagavān mogharājaṃ pratyāha-
SA16hvsatssu:3071: evaṃ lokamavekṣantaṃ] mṛtyurājo na paśyati // iti
SA16hvsatssu:3077: kasmāt caturṣu vyākaraṇeṣu caturtha sthapanīyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yaduta bhavati puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt na bhavati [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt] bhavati ca na bhavati ca [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt],
SA16hvsatssu:3078: naiva bhavati na na bhavati [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt] /
SA16hvsatssu:3081: ūrdhvakāyavedakaḥ [SSS_91] sattvo nāstīti yat keṣāñcit vacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:3084: tatra bhagavānevamāha- tasmin samaye ahameva mahāsudarśano rājā evaṃkāya ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3085: pūrvakebhya utpannā idānīntanāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ na tu purāṇā eva /
SA16hvsatssu:3088: iha nandati pretya nandati kṛtapuṇyo ubhayanna nandati / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3094: ekatyaḥ pudgala utpadyate loke bahūnāṃ vipattyanutāpāya /
SA16hvsatssu:3095: ekatyaḥ pudgala utpadyate loke bahūnāṃ lābhāya /
SA16hvsatssu:3096: yat kuśalākuśalakarmaṇāṃ samudācaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ tat sattvopagam /
SA16hvsatssu:3097: tatra tatra ca sūtre bhagavān svayamāha- ahaṃ vadāmi sattvā ūrdhvakāyaṃ vedayante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3112: yathā bālakānāṃ nāmamātreṇa vastudānaṃ savipākaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:3115: nāmamātrato 'sadapi astīti vādina āryā mṛṣāvādinaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3121: yadi vyavahārato 'sadapi astīti vadatāṃ punaḥ sūtragatāni pāramārthikāni dvādaśanidānāni trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā ityādi vacanaṃ na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:3122: asti paraloka iti vādinamanusṛtya vadanti astīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3124: vadanti ca loke ayutāni vastūni īśvarādutpannani /
SA16hvsatssu:3128: ato bhavatodāhṛtaṃ sūtraṃ sarvaṃ sāmānyato dūṣitameva /
SA16hvsatssu:3130: atrocyate / yadbhavatā pūrvamuktaṃ sthapanīyavyākaraṇāt astyātmeti jñāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3134: ato nāsti paramārthata ātmā avaktavya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3137: yathāha bhavatāmāgamaḥ cakṣuṣā dṛśyamānaṃ rūpamupādāyetyato vināśyātmā /
SA16hvsatssu:3139: tadā na vaktavyaṃ na rūpaṃ nārūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3143: sūtre hyuktam- pañcendriyāṇi nānyopyasya viṣayān pratyanubhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3149: yat cakṣurvijñānavijñeyaṃ na tat rūpamiti bravīṣi /
SA16hvsatssu:3151: sūtre bhagavān svayaṃ bhikṣūnāmantryāha- asatyapyātmani saṃskārāṇāṃ [SSS_93] santānamupādāya jananamaraṇamastīti vadāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:3152: paśyāmi ca divyena cakṣuṣā sattvānutpadyamānān mriyamāṇāṃśca /
SA16hvsatssu:3155: bhavatāṃ śāsane hyucyate ātmā na jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3158: anyānyapi pāpakarmāṇi na santi ityato bhavatāṃ śāsanameva mithyādarśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:3161: ta eva pañcaskandhāḥ santatyā buddho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3163: bhavatāṃ śāsane ātmana ekatvāt viśeṣo na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:3165: sūtre bhagavān idaṃ vastu pratiṣidhyāha- nāhaṃ vadāmi kaścidimān pañcaskandhān parityajya tān skandhānupādatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3166: kintu tatpañcaskandhānāṃ santatyā bhedābhāvādāha- ubhayatna nandatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3173: na hi sambhavati tasya saṃkleśasamayaṃ [sattva] upādatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3174: kintu prajñaptyā hetupratyayānāṃ saṃkliṣṭatvāt āha- sattvāḥ saṃkliśyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3177: bhavatāṃ śāsane cocyate na pañcaskandhā evātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:3179: vayantu vadāmaḥ pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā ātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:3180: imamātmānamupādāya asti janma asti nirodhaḥ puṇyapāpamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3184: abhūtasaṃjñayā bhavānevaṃ kalpayati na tathā bhagavadāśayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3185: vividhā ātmavādāḥ sarve duṣṭāḥ yathā bhavān bravīti- pañcaskandhān vihāya anyo 'styātmeti tīrthikā manyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3191: atha skandhasya santi trayo bhedāḥ- śīlasamādhiprajñāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:3204: loke ca nāsti ko 'pi dharma eka ityavaktavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3206: (pṛ) yathā agnirindhanañca na vaktuṃ śakyata evaṃ vā nānā veti /
SA16hvsatssu:3225: evamātmāpi pañcaskandhaiḥ saha triṣu adhvasu vartamānaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:3228: yadyapi bhavānāha- agnirindhanena naiko na nānā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3237: bhavāṃstu abhūtasaṃjñayā imamātmānaṃ vikalpya keṣāṃ hitaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:3239: ṣaḍvijñānavijñeya iti bhavatokta ātmā na ṣaḍviṣayarūpo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3242: caturṣu satyeṣu asaṅgraprahītaśca na satyeṣu bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3245: bhavatāṃ śāsana ucyate jñeyadharmā yaduta pañcadharmakośāḥ- atītā anāgatāḥ pratyutpannā asaṃskṛtā avaktavyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3248: sa caturbhyo dharmebhyo 'nya itīcchanti khalu bhavantaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3252: ato bhavatā pūrvamuktam- tīrthikāḥ pañcaskandhān vihāya pṛthagātmāstīti manyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3255: yadbhavānāha- ātmā prajñaptimātramitīdaṃ gāḍhataraṃ cintanīyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3258: jinaśāsane hyucyate lokasatyavastu na pragāḍhaṃ cintanīyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3263: yadavocadbhavān lokoktāni sarvāṇi anusartavyāni yadvadanti īśvarādutpannāni na yutāni vastūni ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3270: savijñānānāṃ skandhānāṃ santatyā samudācāre sati asti karma asti vipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3272: tasmāt pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā ātmā ityākhyāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3281: (u) satyaṃ nāma catvāri [ārya]satyāni yaduta duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasamudayo duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī patipat /
SA16hvsatssu:3287: tathāgataḥ svayamimaṃ dharmaṃ sādhayannapi sattvānāṃ tāraṇāya tatra tatra viprakīrṇaṃ deśitavān /
SA16hvsatssu:3298: rūpaskandho yaduta catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya dharmāśca /
SA16hvsatssu:3320: (pṛ) uktaṃ khalu sūtre- yatkiñcana rūpaṃ sarvaṃ tat catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya [rūpam] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3322: (u) yatkiñcit tatsarvamiti vadan rūpalakṣaṇaṃ nirdhārayati nānyadastīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3324: tatpratyākhyānāyāha catvāri [eva] mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya [rūpam] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3332: (pṛ) kasmāt pṛthivyādaya eva rūpaṃ na śabdaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3347: yathā gandharasādayaḥ saukṣmyāt ekamākāraṃ yugapadāśrayante na mithaḥ pratighnanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3348: ataḥ śabdādayaḥ sāvaraṇāḥ sapratighā ityato rūpamityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3350: yat chidyate bhidyate vihiṃsyata ityādi tat sarvaṃ rūpāśritam /
SA16hvsatssu:3363: tīrthikāḥ kecidvadanti rūpādireva mahābhūtaṃ bhavatīti yathā sāṃkhyādīnām /
SA16hvsatssu:3364: kecidvadanti rūpādi vihāyāsti mahābhūtam iti yathā vaiśeṣikādīnām /
SA16hvsatssu:3365: ata idaṃ sūtramavadhārayati rūpādyupādāya pṛthivyādi mahābhūtaṃ sidhyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3367: kiñcāha sūtram- khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3371: te hi vadanti pṛthivīṃ paśyāmi pṛthivīṃ jighremi (dharmi)
SA16hvsatssu:3373: sūtre coktaṃ yathā sparśavatī pṛthivī draṣṭavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:3374: pṛthivyādisarvāyata nagato 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyati rūpaṃ na kaṭhinyādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3385: kiñcāha- ahamimāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ dagdhvā vidhūmaṃ bhasmasātkariṣyāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3386: atra prajñaptisatīṃ pṛthivīṃ dahati na kāṭhinyamātraṃ dahati /
SA16hvsatssu:3389: kūpopame coktam- āpo dṛśyante ca spṛśyante ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:3395: kiñcāha bhagavān- aṣṭaguṇā āpaḥsusaṃsthitaṃ śītalaṃ mṛdu madhuraṃ śuci adurgandhaṃ pātuḥ prahlādanaṃ paridāhanivāraṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3396: tatra yat susaṃsthitaṃ śītalaṃ sukumāraṃ tat sarvaṃ sparśāntargatam /
SA16hvsatssu:3403: upādāya dharmāḥ sarve prajñaptisantaḥ na dravyasantaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3406: evaṃ skandheṣu satsveva bhavati sattveti saṃvṛtiḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3411: [SSS_101] tattu sāśrayayaṃ sādhiṣṭhānakamiti na tathāgataśāsanaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:3414: khakkhaṭādayaścatvāro dharmāḥ kimarthā bhavantiiti kevalaṃ mahābhūtārthā bhavati iti prāpyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3416: ato jñāyate catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptimātrāṇi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3425: khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ snehalakṣaṇo 'bdhātuḥ ūṣmalakṣaṇastejodhātuḥ īraṇalakṣaṇo vāyudhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3427: rūpādi bhautikaṃ rūpaṃ caturbhyo mahābhūtebhyaḥ samutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3429: khakkhaṭādinā ca catvāri mahābhūtāni nirucyante yat khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sā pṛthivīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3433: ato jñāyate khakkhaṭaṃ vastudharmaḥ kharagataṃ prajñaptidharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3441: sūtre cāha bhagavān- yaccakṣuṣi [māṃsa]piṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ iyaṃ pṛthivī /
SA16hvsatssu:3445: asmin māṃsapiṇḍe bhagavānāha santi catvāri mahābhūtāni iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3450: yadi kaścit brūyāt catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3452: yadi kharagataṃ pṛthivīti āpaḥ kharagatā iti tā api pṛthivī syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3453: mṛtpiṇḍaḥ snehagata iti so 'pi āpaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:3457: ato na vaktuṃ śakyate kharagataṃ pṛthivī,
SA16hvsatssu:3461: yathoktaṃ sūtre yatkiñcidrūpaṃ sarvaṃ tat caturmahābhūtakṛtamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3463: catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti vaktustāni vinirbhaktāni syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3466: tathā ca sati cakṣurmāsapiṇḍe catvāri mahābhūtāni na syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3468: sūtrasyāvirodhaṃ kāmayānasya bhavataḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni dravyāṇi bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3472: sarve hi tīrthikā vadanti catvāri mahābhūtāni rūpādibhirekāni yadi vānakānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3475: kiñca vayaṃ vadāmaḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭāni khakkhaṭādīni caturmahābhūtāni na tu vaiśeṣikāṇāmiva tānyapratyakṣadṛṣṭānyapi /
SA16hvsatssu:3479: āha ca cittaṃ mahatāṃ dharmāṇāmāśraya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3480: asminnartha uktam khakkhaṭameva svaragataṃ na punardhamāntaramiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3482: laukikāḥ sarve śraddadhante yāvadaṣṭaguṇā āpa iti yadbhavato vacanaṃ tat vyavahārānuvartanamātrato vadanti na dravyamahābhūtā [nuvartana]taḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3483: kiñcoktaṃ bhavatā- upādāyadharmāḥ sarve prajñaptyātmakā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3486: uktaṃ hi sūtre- yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānyupādāya dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3488: bhagavān pratyāha- cakṣu[rbhikṣo] catvāri mahāmūtānyupādāya rūpaprasāda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3492: dharme dharmo vartata iti mātraṃ vadāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3493: yadbhavānāha- khakkhaṭādayaḥ kimarthā bhavantīti kevalaṃ mahābhūtārthā iti bhavanti iti prāpyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3494: khakkhaṭādayaḥ sārthakā yaduta khakkhaṭa lakṣaṇaṃ sandhatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3504: yadyapyuktaṃ bhavatā abhidharma uktaṃ- khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3508: [SSS_104] bhagavān hi svayamāha- khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataśca pṛthivī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3511: rūpādikaṃ caturbhyo mahābhūtebhyaḥ samutpadyata iti bhavaduktaṃ na yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3518: yathā cānando bhikṣuṇīśikṣaṇāya bhaginīmāha- ayaṃ kāyaḥ āhārasambhūtaḥ tṛṣṇāsambhūto mānasambhūto maithunasambhūta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3519: ato jñāyate rūpādi rna caturmahābhūtasambhūt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3521: tathāpi catvāri mahābhūtāni ca aṃśena hetavaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3524: tathā cakṣurādīnāṃ karmasambhūtatve 'pi catvāri mahābhūtāni aṃśato hetavo bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3526: yathā kalpāvasāne kalpādau ca mahatī vṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3532: yathā ca rūpasantānaḥ vyucchidya punaḥ pratisandhīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3538: utkaṭakarmabalastu na bāhyapratyayamapekṣate tathā dharmā api syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3545: kenārthena khakkhaṭādito rūpādirutpadyate na rūpāditaḥ khakkhaṭādiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3550: na vaktuṃ śakyaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe hetū iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3555: pradīpo hi rūpaṃ prakāśa iti dharmadvayasamavāyātmakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3556: rūpameva prakāśa iti na pradīpaḥ pṛthagbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3566: yathā sapratidhe vijñānasya cakṣūrūpaṃ hetupratyayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3570: pūrvaniruddhaṃ cittaṃ hetuḥ iti kathaṃ yugapajjāyamānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3571: yo dharmo yaṃ hetumanuvartyotpadyate sa tasya hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3572: yaccittaṃ yadindriyāṇyupādāya bhavati sa tadupādāya dharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3583: (u) na vayaṃ vadāmaḥ asarūpahetorna jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3584: kintu sarūpahetau ca sati jāyata iti vadāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3585: tasmāducyate rūpādibhyo [SSS_106] rūpādayo jāyante na caturmahābhūtebhya eva jāyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3586: ato nābadhāraṇaṃ bhavati rūpādayaścaturmahābhūtebhya eva jāyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3587: khakkhaṭādinā catvāri mahābhūtāni nirūpyanta iti yadavocadbhavān /
SA16hvsatssu:3591: saukumāryādestu aniyataḥ kadācit khakkhaṭabahule saṅghāte vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:3600: yathoktaṃ sūtre- khakkhaṭā[di]gatānīti caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ vibhāgā nirdiśyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3601: ato jñāyate khakkhaṭagatadharmaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ na tu khakkhaṭamātralakṣaṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3606: saṃjñākriyāyai yat kiñcan khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sarvaṃ tat pṛthividhātuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3616: prajñaptitaḥ prasiddhe hetau prajñaptitaḥ saṃjñā bhavati yathā vadanti- paśyāmyahaṃ vṛkṣasya chettāraṃ puruṣamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3624: kiñca tathāgate tejovatī samādhimupasampanne tatkāyā dvividhāni jvālārūpāṇi niścaranti /
SA16hvsatssu:3629: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santi kāye 'smin nakhalomakeśādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3632: uktañcabīja sūtre yataḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ syāt nābdhātuḥ na bījāni vṛddhiṃ [virūḍhiṃ vipulatā] māpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3633: tatra kiṃ pṛthivīdhātuḥ yaduta prajñaptitaḥ kṣetram,
SA16hvsatssu:3636: ekasya dharmasya dravyatvaṃ prajñaptitvamiti dviprakāro 'pi nopalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3639: mahābhūtāni tu dravyataśca prajñaptitaśca santīdaṃ mithyāśāstram /
SA16hvsatssu:3640: ṣaḍdhātu sūtre ca bhagavānāha- keśalomanakhādīni pṛthivīdhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3641: hastipadopamasūtre coktam- keśā lomā nakhā ityādīni ayamucyate pṛthivīdhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3645: yadavādīḥ bhagavānāha- yaccakṣurmāsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ iyaṃ pṛthivī ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3646: vacanenānena bhagavān pradarśayati pañcendriyāṇi catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3649: kecidvadanti indriyāṇi nānāsvabhāvajāni yaduta pṛthivīmahābhūtāt sambhūtaṃ ghrāṇamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3650: tatpratyākhyānāya bhagavānāha- cakṣurādīndriyāṇi caturmahābhūtasamavāyātmakāni śūnyānyavastūni iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3653: asmin māṃsapiṇḍe santi catvāro bhāgāḥ khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatamityādi vacanena bhagavān pradarśayati sarvapadārthāḥ caturmahābhūtasambhūtā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3658: pṛthivyādīnāṃ khakkhaṭagatadharmādayo viśiṣṭāḥ vāyostu na tathā /
SA16hvsatssu:3660: yadavādīḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti vaktuḥ tanmahābhūtalakṣaṇāni vinirbhaktāni syuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:3664: yo dharmo lakṣaṇādanya na sa āśrayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3668: (u) āśraya iti saṃjñāyate nānyadvastu lakṣaṇasyāśraya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3674: yathā ātape kevalaṃ rūpayuktaḥ sparśa upalabhyate nānye dharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3675: candrikāyāṃ kevalaṃ rūpayuktaḥ śītasparśa upalabhyate nānye dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3695: ataścatvāri mahābhūtāni na vinirbhāgalābhina iti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3698: (u) tathā cet vāyau kadācidgandho 'stīti gandho vāyugataḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:3710: evaṃ kiṃ saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpena yaduta catvāri mahābhūtāni sahajātāni apṛthagbhāgavartīnīti //
SA16hvsatssu:3714: pūrvaṃ yadavādīḥ- na vayaṃ brūmaḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni rūpādibhirekāni yadi vānekāni ityato 'navadyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3717: tīrthikāḥ sarve siṣādhayiṣantītyata ścaturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāmekatvanānātve udāharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3718: ato bhagavān prajñaptau catarṇāṃ mahābhūtānāmudāhṛtatvāt teṣāmarthamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:3720: laukikāḥ svabhāvataḥ pṛthivyādimahābhūtāni jānanto 'pi na vidanti [teṣāṃ] vastubhāvam /
SA16hvsatssu:3725: asti dvidhā āśrayārtha ityuktvā mahābhūtāni dravyāṇīti yadavocaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3728: [aṣṭaguṇā āpa iti] vyavahārānuvartanato vadanti na tu dravyamahābhūtā[nuvartana]ta iti yadvacanaṃ tadayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:3730: yadi vā pravacane yadi vā loke na hetupratyayairvinā rūpādiṣu caturmahābhūta saṃjñāṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3732: rūpādiṣu hi puruṣa iti saṃjñā na hetupratyayairvinā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3733: yo vināpi sudṛḍhahetupratyayaiḥ saṃjñāṃ karoti so 'śvaṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣa ityāhvayet /
SA16hvsatssu:3736: laukikāḥ sadā [pṛthag] vadanti pṛthivīti śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3743: yathārūpamidaṃ prajñapterhetuṃ sādhayati tatra puruṣa iti saṃjñā /
SA16hvsatssu:3746: evaṃ rūpādiṣu dharmeṣu catvāri mahābhūtānīti saṃjñāṃ vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3748: yadavocaḥ- yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānyupādāya siddhā [dharmā] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3750: yathā bhavatāṃ śāsane bhautikaṃ rūpaṃ na kasyacijjanakam /
SA16hvsatssu:3751: tathā mama śāsane 'pi prajñaptau na [tat]kasyacit janyam /
SA16hvsatssu:3754: yadavādīḥ- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhautiko rūpaprasādaḥ cakṣuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:3759: yadyupyuktaṃ bhavatā dharme dharmo vartate nirāśrayo niradhiṣṭhātā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:3760: [tatra yo dharmaḥ] sa evāśrayaḥ adhiṣṭhātā ca /
SA16hvsatssu:3771: (pṛ) yadāha bhavān- khakkhaṭabahulo rūpādi [samavāyaḥ] pṛthivīmahābhūtamityataḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ prajñaptisanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3776: (1) yo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ sa eva [kadācit] mṛduḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3783: yena khakkhaṭaḥ kāyaḥ mṛduḥ kāya iti buddhirbhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:3792: anenaiva kāraṇena mṛdvādayaḥ sparśā api na santi //
SA16hvsatssu:3796: yadyapyāha bhavān- yo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ sa eva [kadācit] mṛduriti (1) /
SA16hvsatssu:3800: bahūnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā mṛtpiṇḍa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3803: mama saṃśliṣṭasaṃṅghātāṇuṣu idaṃ khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaṃ labhyata iti asti khakkhaṭatā /
SA16hvsatssu:3810: upalabhyante kilāsmābhiḥ ekasminneva dharme bahavaḥ sparśāḥ khakkhaṭo 'pi mṛdurapīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3811: yadapyuktam- khakkhaṭatā mṛdutā cānyonyamapekṣata iti nāsti niyateti (4)
SA16hvsatssu:3824: yathāgniṃ dṛṣṭvā ūṣma jñāyate iti noṣma dṛśyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3825: yathā puruṣaḥ kambalaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimidaṃ kaṭhinaṃ kiṃ vā mṛdu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3852: yo dharmaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataḥ sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3855: āpaḥ snigdhā atiśaityāt karakā bhāvanti iti kathaṃ mahābhūtāni na svalakṣaṇaṃ jahati /
SA16hvsatssu:3856: yathāha sūtram- caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kadācit vikāryaṃ catvāraḥ śrāddhā nānyathopalabhyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3863: (pṛ) abhidharma uktam- apāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sneha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3869: ato drava eva [lakṣaṇam] na tu snehaḥ syandanaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:3888: (u) karmeti kevalaṃ lokasatyato vadāmaḥ na tu paramārthataḥ laghudharmamupādāya deśāntare jananadharmaḥ karmeti saṃjñāṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:3893: yathā daśapalaṃ vastu viṃśatipalavastvapekṣya laghu pañcapalavastvapekṣa tu guru /
SA16hvsatssu:3909: gurutvavarjitā anye rūpādayo dharmā atulyatvāt laghavaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3912: (u) na vayamaṅgīkurmo rūpādīn vihāya dharmāntaraṃ guru bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3913: rūpādaya eva dharmāḥ [SSS_115] kecit tulyasvabhāvā utpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3914: yathā khakkhaṭamakhakkhaṭaṃ balamabalaṃ navaṃ purāṇamupacitamanucitaṃ kṣīṇamakṣīṇaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmam ityādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3917: ayaṃ rūpādisaṅghāto yadi pārthiva āpyo vā /
SA16hvsatssu:3927: gurulaghutvavikalpo 'vaśyaṃ kāyendriyeṇeṣyata ityato na gururlaghuḥ rūpādisaṅghātaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3928: (u) te ca khakkhaṭādayaḥ kadācit cakṣuṣā kadācit śrotrādīnā vikalpyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3929: te ca khakkhaṭādayaḥ padārthā na rūpādīn vihāya santi /
SA16hvsatssu:3936: (pṛ) na tasmin samaye jñāyata idaṃ gurulakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3937: (u) yathā parihitavastraḥ puruṣo 'spṛṣṭo 'pi jñāyate [ayaṃ] balavān abalavān iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3948_0: kecitsparśāḥ sadākāyagatāḥ na śītoṣṇādivat bāhyamapekṣyāgāminaḥ yaduta praśrabdhisukhaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:3948_1: styānaprakarṣaḥ astyānaprakarṣaḥ rogo viśeṣovā kāyataikṣṇyaṃ kāyamāndyam ālasyagurutā
SA16hvsatssu:3954: yathā khakkhaṭākhakkhaṭatvādayo rūpādisaṅghātavartino 'pi [SSS_116] cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā jñātuṃ śakyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3955: yathā ca praśrabdhisukhādayo rūpādisaṅghātātmakakāyenāpi vijñāya vikalpyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3957: yadi gururlaghuḥ sparśamātram [ityabhyupagamyate] ko doṣaḥ kimanayā rūpādisaṅghātavikalpakriyayā /
SA16hvsatssu:3976: kiṃntu yo laghuḥ san samudīraṇasya hetuṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:3979: tatra laghutvaṃ vāyorlakṣaṇaṃ samudīraṇatvaṃ vāyoḥ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:3992: kadācit kevalaṃ rūpasparśau staḥ yathā suvarṇajatādiṣu /
SA16hvsatssu:3994: kadācit trayo rūparasasparśāḥ santi tejasi kadācit rūparasagandhasparśāḥ santi /
SA16hvsatssu:3999: (u) śītoṣṇakaṭhinasukumārādayaḥ sparśāḥ yanmahābhūtasantatāvavinirbhāgavartinaḥ tasya mahābhūtasya sparśā iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:4003: yathā vātarogiṇo mukhe tiktaraso 'stīti na sa bhiṣagvavati vāyau raso 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4005: (pṛ) kecidvadanti vāyuḥ śīto na tu laghuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:4008: yathā himaṃ śītaṃ sat na vāyurbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4017: sattve 'pi saukṣmyānnopalabhyata iti vaktuścitta eva saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ syāt yaduta vāyau rūparasau sta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4020: tasmāt yatphala upalabhyate nāvaśyaṃ taddhetau pūrvamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:4027: cakṣurvikalpayan bhagavānevaṃ vacanamāha yaccakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivīdhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:4031: bhagavān cakṣuḥ śūnyamiti janānāṃ jijñāpayiṣayaivedṛśaṃ vacanamāha /
SA16hvsatssu:4032: tathā no cet cakṣuṣi khakkhaṭādikamanyadasti khakkhaṭādau vā anyadāsti cakṣuḥ [iti]khakkhaṭādīnāṃ vikalpe 'pi nāsti kaścanopakāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4036: tadā cakṣurādīni na puruṣapratyayā iti sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4042: bhagavān pratyāha- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpi anidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ cakṣuḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4046: laukikāḥ sarve prajānanti rūpadarśanaṃ cakṣuryāvat sparśanaṃ kāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4051: pañcendriyāṇi caturmahābhūtamayānīti parididṛkṣayā bhagavān pratyāha- cakṣurbhikṣo [ādhyātmikamāyatana] catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpamanidarśanaṃ sapratighamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:4052: yo dharmo dravyasan na sa upādāyāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:4059: tathā nocet asya bhikṣoścakṣurādiṣu indriyeṣu śaṅkā naivocchidyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:4061: bhagavān prāha- cakṣurādīnindriyāṇi catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhavantītyato 'yaṃ bhikṣurjānāti adravyasan cakṣurdharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4063: bhagavān cakṣuṣaḥ śūnyatvapradarśanāya tatra catvāri mahābhūtāni vikalpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:4064: yathā prajñayā aprapañcayitā vadati- ayaṃ kāyaḥ ṣaṭsu dhātuṣu vibhaktaḥ yat khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivīdhāturityādi pratyavekṣeteti /
SA16hvsatssu:4067: hastipadopamasūtre catvāri mahābhūtāni vikalpitāni na punaścakṣuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4070: vātsaputrīyādaya abhidharmikā api īdṛśaṃ vacanaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4085: yāni catvāri mahābhūtāni karmajāni cakṣurādisaṅgṛhītāni [tāni] ādhyātmikamāyātanam indriyam iti ca kathyante /
SA16hvsatssu:4093: (u) na yujyata [idam] yathā prasādamupādāya āpaḥ sphaṭikam /
SA16hvsatssu:4094: āpa eva prasannā āpa iti prasāda āpa eva /
SA16hvsatssu:4100: na ca prajñaptiḥ tatsādhanahetoranyeti vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4125: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu anindriyāṇāṃ vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4130: dharmatā ca tathā- ya indriyavirahitāḥ teṣāṃ vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4131: na bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni anindriyāṇi janayanti iti dharmatā tadapekṣeta /
SA16hvsatssu:4133: yathā dhānyakāraṇakarmapratilambhāt dhānyaṃ bījāṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrāṇyapekṣyāpi kramaśo jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4136: yathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurindriyakaṃ samanantaraniruddhacittamupādāya ca bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4142: cittadharmaśca tathā syāt- yat samanantaraniruddhacittendriyakaṃ bhavati nānyatkiñcidapekṣata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4160: yathoktaṃ sūtre- manaḥ pratītya dharmāṃśca manovijñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4177: yathokta sūtre- paṭaṃ datvā rūpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:4188: vadanti ca mriyamāṇasya cakṣuḥ sūryaṃ pratigacchatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4203: yathā vadanti- annaṃ datvā pañcavastu- vipākān labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4212: yathā kṣālitacakṣuṣkasya puruṣasya cakṣuḥ sphuṭameva pratyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:4225: yathā cakṣurākāśādipratyayaṃ labdhvā rūpamaprāpyāpi sudūraṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4227: ato na kāryaḥ saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpoi yaduta tejobahulaṃ [cakṣu]riti /
SA16hvsatssu:4232: yathā ulūkādayaḥ pakṣiṇo viḍālasṛgālādayastīryañca bāhyāmālokamanapekṣyāpi draṣṭuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4236: yadbhavānavādīḥ- cakṣuḥ saprabhatvāt sudūraṃ rūpaṃ patihantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4246: upari devānāṃ mriyamāṇānāṃ cakṣuḥ kutra pratigacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:4256: tasmādindriyeṣu mahābhūtāni nyūnādhikāni bhavantīti bhavadvacanaṃ dūṣitameva /
SA16hvsatssu:4260: abtejovāyuṣu rūparasasparśāḥ santi iti rūparasasparśajñānotpādakā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4274: apāṃ śītasparśamātraṃ tejasa uṣṇasparśamātraṃ jivhācakṣurbhyāṃ jñātuṃ śaknuyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4283: (pṛ) indriyāṇi viṣayān kiṃ prāpya vijānanti utāprāpya vijānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4290: bhavato hṛdayam- yatkecidvadanti indriyaṃ vijñānamapekṣya saha vijānāti na tu vijñānaviyuktaṃ vijānātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4295: yadīndriyaṃ vijānāti idamindriyakarma idaṃ vijñānakarma iti vivektavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:4300: bhavatāṃ śāsane śrotrādīnīndriyāṇi na tejaḥprakṛtikāni iti na prakāśayeyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4304: tadā prakāśakasya punaḥ prakāśaka ityevamanavasthā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4305: yadi punaḥ prakāśakaṃ vināpi indriyamātraṃ prakāśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:4314: yathā sati tejasi ūṣma nāsati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4315: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:4320: uktañca sūtre- vayaṃ māṇavakāḥ susūkṣmamaṣi vastu jānīmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4326: indriyeṇa viṣayo gṛhyate vijñānena vikalpyate ityayamevendriyavijñānayorbhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4327: (u) sūtre bhagavān svayamāha- cakṣu[brāhmaṇa]dvāraṃ[yāvadeva] rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4331: (pṛ) āha ca- mano dvāraṃ [yāvadeva] dharmāṇāṃ vijñānāye ti /
SA16hvsatssu:4344: kiñca laukikā vyavaharanti- cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4347: āha ca bhagavān- paśyāmi rāgādīn doṣān iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4348: candraḥ kṣīṇa iti laukikānāṃ vacanaṃ bhagavānapyanuvadati /
SA16hvsatssu:4355: (u) cakṣuṣo vijñānāśrayahetutāmanusṛtya tasmin hetau paśyatīti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4356: yathā vadanti sa puruṣaḥ paśyati ayaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4357: yathā ca vadanti janāḥ puṇyapāpādīni kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4359: yathā ca vadanti vāmacakṣuṣā paśyati dakṣiṇacakṣuṣā paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4360: vadanti ca sūryācandramasābhyāṃ paśyati sūryācandramasau paśyataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4362: kadācinmadhyaṃ paśyati [SSS_126] yat dvāramadhyaṃ [tat] paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4377: cakṣurupādāya vijñāne paśyati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4378: yathā mañcastheṣu puruṣeṣu krośatsu mañcāḥ krośantīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4379: cakṣuḥpratisaṃyuktaṃ vijñānakarma ityatastatra cakṣuṣi vijñānakarma vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4380: yathā hastapādapratisaṃyukte puruṣe vartamānaṃ puruṣakarma hastakarmeti vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4383: yathā vadanti amukaḥ puruṣo 'mukaṃ grāmaṃ dahatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4388: evaṃ cakṣurbhyomutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ rūpaṃ paśyatītyataścakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4389: cakṣuḥsannikṛṣṭe vijñāne rūpaṃ paśyati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4391: cakṣuṣā cākṣuṣaṃ vijñānaṃ vivicyata ityataścakṣuṣi cākṣuṣavijñānakarmāropyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4394: yathā dhane prahīṇe puruṣaḥ prahīṇa iti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4395: pravivṛddhe ca dhane pravivṛddhaḥ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4396: cakṣurvijñāne cakṣuṣā saṃyujya paśyati sati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4397: yathā vṛkṣe puruṣeṇa saṃyujya chidyamāne sati puruṣo vṛkṣaṃ chinnattīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4398: yathā vā kṛṣṇavarṇasaṃyukte paṭe kṛṣṇaḥ paṭa iti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4399: sarve ca dharmā mithaḥ saṃkīrya vyavahriyante /
SA16hvsatssu:4401: cakṣūṣā rūpaṃ paśyatīti vaktavye saṃkṣipya vyavaharantaḥ kevalamāhuḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4405: bhavānidaṃ prativaktavyaḥ cakṣurādayaḥ pañcadharmā stadanyarūpādīnatiśerata ityata indriyamiti vyavahriyante /
SA16hvsatssu:4409: tathā yadi rūpādīnāṃ viyoge 'pi vijñānaṃ notpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4418: rūpavijñānamityukte saṃśayaḥ prasajyate kimidaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ kiṃ vā rūpaṃ pratītya manovijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:4426: prasanne tu indriye vijñānaṃ viśadaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4430: eko viṣayo bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ sādhāraṇa upalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4439: yadbhavānavādīḥ- vayaṃ māṇavakāḥ susūkṣmamapi vastu jānīmaḥ tadyathā cakṣurmyāṃ dṛśyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4441: laukikāścakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadantītyata āhuḥ tadyathā cakṣurbhyāṃ dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4445: acetanāpi jihvā tu na darvībhājanopamā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4447: jihvāśritaṃ mano jihvāvijñānaṃ janayatītyata āha jihvā [sūpa]rasaṃ vettīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4448: tathā cakṣurāśritya samutpanne vijñāne cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4449: ata āha- jinaurasāḥ paśyanti tadyathā cakṣurbhyāṃ dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4450: yadbhavānavādīḥ- indriyeṇa viṣayo gṛhyate vijñānena vikalpyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4453: na ca yūyaṃ bravītha indriyasyaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ viśiṣṭalakṣaṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4467: idānīṃ kiṃ viṣayendriyasaṃyogādvijñānamutpadyate kiṃ vā tadviyogāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4476: ato jñātavyaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ na prāpya vijānāti / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4477: śrotrādivijñānaṃ dvividham- kiñcitprāpya vijānāti kiñcidaprāpya vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4482: dṛṣṭaṃ khalu trayāṇāmeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ viṣayaiḥ saṃyogāt vijñānaṃ labhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4497: yathoktaṃ sūtre- trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4502: ghrāṇaṃ gandhe jihvā rase kāyaḥ spraṣṭavye cakṣūrūpe śrotraṃ śabde yadyaprāptam /
SA16hvsatssu:4508: bahupratyayasāmagryā ca jñānamutpadyate iti cakṣūraśmirviṣayasaṃyogāya gacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:4512: viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe mandaṃ bhāṣamāṇe na śrūyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4522: aprāpya śravaṇe tu sa vibhāgo na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4523: ato jñāyate śabdaḥ prāpya śrūyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4528: aprāpya śravaṇe tu na sākalyena śrūyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:4529: yathā rūpasyāprāptyā darśānāt na sākalyena darśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:4530: ato jñāyate na rūpasamaḥ śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4532: yathā rūpasyekadeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā avaśiṣṭamapi ālokamapekṣya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4545: śabdaṃ yadi ghananibiḍaṃ jalādyāvṛtamapi śrotraṃ śrotuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:4554: ekāṃ diśaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaknoti naikasmin samaye sarvā diśo draṣṭuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:4555: yathā pūrvābhimukhaḥ puruṣaḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ rūpañca paśyati nānyā diśaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4562: parispandatīdaṃ cittaṃ svābhīṣṭañca yathā caratyadaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4566: yathā puruṣo dūrataḥ sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimayaṃ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4573: kasmāt sthūlaṃ paśyati na sūkṣmaṃ [SSS_131] vivecayati /
SA16hvsatssu:4574: rūpadarśane 'sti dvibhāgaḥ yaduta pūrvasyāṃ paścimāyāṃ vā diśi rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:4596: tasya nayanaraśme rasati draṣṭari sa na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4600: (pṛ) rūpa dharmā avaśyaṃ bāhyaṃ prakāśamapekṣya dṛśyante /
SA16hvsatssu:4616: yat rūpaṃ jñānasya [SSS_132] gocaraṃ tat dṛśyam /
SA16hvsatssu:4626: yathā bhavataścakṣū rūpaṃ prāpyāpi kadācitpaśyati kadācinna paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4627: tadyathā cakṣuḥ sūryaṃ prāpya sūryamaṇḍalaṃ paśyati na tu sūryakarma /
SA16hvsatssu:4637: kasmād dūrasthaṃ sūryamaṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi karma na paśyati tat pāṭaliputrādi āsannaṃ janapadanagaram /
SA16hvsatssu:4638: yadi bhavān manyate pāṭaliputrādi na ābhāsagatamityato na paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4639: mama cakṣuraprāpyāpi rūpaṃ nābhāsāgatamityato na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4643: rūpasyābhibhāvakaviśeṣānna dṛśyate yathā rātrau tejo dṛśyamanyadadṛśyam /
SA16hvsatssu:4644: bhūmiviśeṣānna dṛśyate yathā prathamadhyānagatacakṣuṣā dvitīyadhyānagataṃ rūpaṃ na dṛśyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4645: tama āvāvaraṇānna dṛśyate yathā tamasi ghaṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4651: aprāptyā na dṛśyate yathā prabhāgatā aṇavoḥ dṛśyāḥ prabhābāhyāstu adṛśyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4652: saukṣmyānna dṛśyate yathā puruṣākāraḥ sthāṇurna vivektuṃ śakyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4658: yat vātopahataṃ cakṣuḥ tat viparyastaṃ nīlakṛṣṇādirūpaṃ paśyet /
SA16hvsatssu:4661: yat jāgaraṇopahataṃ [SSS_133] cakṣuḥ tat kampitavṛkṣādirūpaṃ prāyaḥ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4662: yat parikhedopahataṃ cakṣuḥ tat rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na budhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4674: (pṛ) pañca viṣayāḥ jñānābhāsagatatvāt jñeyā bhavantīti jñātameva /
SA16hvsatssu:4676: (u) ūrdhvabhūmikatvānna jñāyate yathā prathamadhyānacittaṃ dvitīyadhyānatadūrdhvadharmān na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4677: indriyaviśeṣānna jñāyate yathā mandendriyasya cittaṃ tīkṣṇendriyasya cittagatadharmān na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4678: puruṣaviśeṣānna jñāyate yathā śrotraāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāminaścittagatadharmān na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4679: balaprabhedānna jñāyate yathā yanmanovijñānaṃ yasmin dharme balavihīnaṃ na tena manovijñānena sa dharmo jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4681: manovijñānavijñeyadharmo na vikṣiptacittakamanovijñānena vijñātuṃ śakyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4682: yathā pratyekabuddhamanovijñānabalavijñeyadharmo na śrāvakamano[vijñāna]balena vijñātuṃ śakyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4688: yathā janāḥ saṃsāre pūrvānubhūtaṃ dharmaṃ smaranti /
SA16hvsatssu:4690: āryāstu yadi vānubhūtaṃ yadivānanubhūtaṃ sarvaṃ tadāryajñānabalādvijānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4691: viśiṣṭaviṣayatvāt jñāyate yathā rūpadhātukacittamanubhūya kāmadhātukadharmān vijānānti /
SA16hvsatssu:4692: viparyayāvṛtatvānna jñāyate yathā satkāyadṛṣṭikacittaṃ pañcaskandhālambanaṃ nairātmyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4694: balāvṛtatvānna jñāyate yathā mṛdvindriyaḥ puruṣastīkṣṇendriyasya cittamāvṛtatayā na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4697: (u) vikṣepaviparyayabhūtāveśā mānamadacittapramoṣā madyena vā auṣadhavyāmohena vā cittavibhramaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:4704: tasmādyadyaprāpya paśyati kasmānna sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśyatīti bhavadvacanamayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:4712: pratyutpanneṣu jñānamutpadyata iti yadavādīḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhaṃ vijñānamapi pratyutpannamātraṃ jñāpayet paracittajñānavat /
SA16hvsatssu:4714: tat ṣaṣṭhamanaindriyeṇa pratyuktameva yaduta indriyaviṣayavijñānānugamakālaḥ sannipāta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4715: pratītya mano dharmāṃśca manovijñānamutpadyata itīdaṃ vacanañca tadā vyarthaṃ syāt prāptyabhāvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4722: yadavādīḥ viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe mandaṃ bhāṣamāṇe na śabdaḥ śrūyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4726: yathā bhavānāha viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe bhāṣamāṇe śabdāt śabdasantatyā tanurbhūtvā na punarudbhavatītyato na śrūyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4729: yathā bhavato nayanaraśmirgatvāpi sūryamaṇḍalamātraṃ paśyati na sūryasya karma /
SA16hvsatssu:4731: śrotramaprāpyāpi [SSS_135] śabda audārikaḥ san śrūyate sūkṣmastu na śrūyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4732: yathā bhavato nayanaraśmiḥ sudūraṃ gacchannapi na śatasahasrāyutayojanāni prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:4733: prasannasalilādyāvṛtaṃ suṣṭhu paśyannapi bhittyādyāvṛtaṃ tu na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4740: tadā tu na kaścitpratikūle vāyau śṛṇotīti syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4742: tadā śabdo 'pi pratikūlavāyau na kiñcidapi na śrotavyaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4748: yadavocaḥ śabdaḥ sākalyena śrūyata ityataḥ prāptipakṣe na rūpasama iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4763: idānīṃ śabde kaḥ punaḥ śabdaḥ yaḥ śabdāntaraṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:4775: evaṃ ghaṇṭātaḥ śabda [udgate] sati ghaṇṭā niśśabdā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4777: ato jñāyate śabdo ghaṇṭāyāṃ vartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4780: yadi śabdo ghaṇṭāmāśrito ghaṇṭātaścāpi viyujyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4783: dṛṣṭe vyavahāre ca nāsti kiñcit yathā ghaṇṭāsantatirutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4784: śabdasya cāsti digbhāgabhedo yaduta prācīśabdaḥ karṇadeśaṃ prāpnoti tadā na syāt ayaṃ vibhāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4792: tathā no cet viddhaśabda iti nocyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:4793: yaḥ śabdo viprakṛṣṭaḥ sannikṛṣṭaśca tau yugapat śrūyetām /
SA16hvsatssu:4795: na hi paśyāmaḥ kṣaṇikadharmaḥ kasyacijjanaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4800: ekañca na karma karmotpādakamiti vacanaṃ praṇaṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4801: bhavatāṃ śāsane śabdaḥ śabdāntareṇa viruddhaḥ pṛthak,
SA16hvsatssu:4813: (u) paśyasi khalu saṃyoga ekaḥ san yaṃ śabdamutpādayati [so] 'pi tathā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4816: evañca dravyaṃ pañcasvabhāvaṃ trisvabhāvaṃ dvisvabhāvaṃ na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4819: yathā vadanti śabdo guṇo 'pi [SSS_137] karmaṇā tulyo nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4822: evaṃ śabdo 'pi karagṛhīte khaḍge śabdaḥ spandena sahoparamati /
SA16hvsatssu:4825: yathā kalpayasi ādyakarmaṇaḥ saṃskāra uttarottarakarmotpādaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4833: pūrvaṃ karmaṇi niruddhe hi tadanantaraṃ dravyamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4845: kiṃ yathā khalu viṣaṃ viṣauṣadhena viruddham /
SA16hvsatssu:4847: tathā no cet ghaṇṭā na śabdadvayavatīti [na] syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4853: tathā no cet ekasminneva kṣaṇe ghaṇṭā śabdadvayavatī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4856: yadi śabdāt śabdāntaramutpadyate tadā na hetumanuvarteta /
SA16hvsatssu:4870: tasya rūpamupādāya jala ādarśe rūpamutpannaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4871: evaṃ jale candra ādarśe pratibimbameva rūpaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:4872: tathā ca vaiśeṣikasūtraṃ sarvaṃ naṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4878: khaḍgavaṃśādīnāmavayaveṣu mithaḥ saṃśliṣṭeṣu vibhajyamāneṣu ca mitho nodanācchabdo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4879: na ca vayaṃ vadāmaḥ saṃyogācchabdo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4884: kevalaṃ caturṣu mahābhūteṣu saṃyukteṣu viyukteṣu vā śabda utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4889: (pṛ) yadyāha bhavān- gandho nāsikāṃ prāpto jighryata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4894: yadi manyase yat asmādgandhāt santatyā gandhakāraṇamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4899: yadi kusumāvayavā gacchanti kusumāvayavasya rūpamapi draṣṭavyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4906: (u) yatra sūkṣmāvayavarūpaṃ [tatra] tadgandho jighrayata iti pratyakṣadṛṣṭam /
SA16hvsatssu:4919: yathā ekapalaṃ kuṅkuma[kusumaṃ] sadā sagandhaṃ gatvāpi sadaikapalam /
SA16hvsatssu:4921: yathā jalaghaṭa ekabindvapagame tatkṣayo na budhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4936: nāpi vāyuḥ kusumasya gandhaṃ boḍhvā gamayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4938: tadupādāya gandhavāyuḥ tataḥ samutpanno gandhavāyurnāsikāṃ prāpya jighryate /
SA16hvsatssu:4948: sa kusumagandhaḥ kusume niṣpīḍite vā niṣpiṣṭe vā saṃparitāpite vā kṣīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4954: sa ca gandho dīrghakālaṃ tile vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:4959: (u) ayaṃ tilagandhaḥ kusumamupādāya samutpanno na tilādviyujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4975: tatra nāsti vinigamakaṃ yadudakāvayavā stejovayavā eva vā vāyumanugacchanti,
SA16hvsatssu:4977: yathā bhavatāṃ sūtram- trayaḥ sparśā sparśakāyā vā na pṛthivyudakatejasāmityadṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuriti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4978: anena vacanena trividhāḥ sparśā vāyau kadācidāgantukā vānāgantukā vā syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4982: bhavato mataṃ yat dṛṣṭa udake tejasi śītoṣṇaspaśau staḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4985: evaṃ dṛṣṭapṛthivyāmanuṣṇāśītasparśo 'stīti so 'pi vāyvayavīyo na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4989: kathaṃ jñātavyaṃ vāyusparśamātra manuṣṇāśītaṃ na tu pṛthivyavayava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4990: vayamapi vadāmo rūparasagandhasparśāḥ pṛthivyāmeva santi nābādiṣu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4991: yat bhavatāṃ matam- yat dṛṣṭeṣu abādiṣu rūpādikamastīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4992: tat pṛthivīyogād dṛśyate na tu tat tatrāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:4998: tadā sambhavati vaktum idaṃ rūpamabīyaṃ na pārthivamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5011: yatra nāsti tatra gandhamupādāya gandha utpadyate ityasya ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5012: yadavādīḥ pūrvaṃ gandho dūrāt jighryata ityaprāptyā syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:5020: ato jñāyate aprāpya na jighryata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5037: tathāpi tattejo vartate iti sparśātt jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5039: bhavatāṃ sūtre nāstyarūpaṃ teja ityayameva doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5051: yathā vā jvarārtasya puruṣasya tejaḥ kāyaniśritamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:5064: kiñca mano gacchatīti kiṃ jñātvā gacchet /
SA16hvsatssu:5072: yat cittaṃ manyate śrotraṃ gamiṣyāmīti tacchrotasmaraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:5078: yaḥ pumān pūrvaṃ nagarādīn dṛṣṭavān sa idānīṃ pūrvamanurudhya smarati na jānāti pratyutpannān /
SA16hvsatssu:5084: yo dharmo gacchati sontarāle sarvān viṣayān jānīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5085: yathā kaścitsañcaran madhyemārgaṃ rūpādīn padārthān jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:5087: yathā cittamasadapi jānāti yadutātītamanāgataṃ śagaśṛṅgaṃ kūrmaromāhipādaṃ vāyurūpaṃ lohitalavaṇagandhamityādīni [sarvāṇya]pijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:5115: tā vedanā stistraḥ- duḥkhāḥ vā sukhā vā aduḥkhāsukhā veti /
SA16hvsatssu:5125: ālambanaṃ vijñānasaṃyuktaṃ punaḥ sa vijñānamityucyate ato na gacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:5132: yathā kaścitsvapne pibati naiba tat tṛṣṇāmapanayati /
SA16hvsatssu:5135: cittaṃ dṛṣṭe śrute mate jñāte dharmamātre vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:5137: yadi gamanena prāpnoti tadā dharmāntaramapi jānīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5163: (pṛ) yadyuktaṃ sūtre- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādāḥ pañcendriyāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5168: bhagavān kāṃkṣāvataḥ svaśiṣyān pratyāha- karmajāni pañcendriyāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5174: ato bhagavānāha- indriyāṇi rūpīṇi rūpādīnupādāya siddhānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5175: kadācidyāni rūpādīnupādāya bhavanti tāni sanidarśanānīti brūyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5183: tīrthikā vadanti- saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve karma sāmānyaṃ viśeṣāśca [rūpi]dravyasamavāyādarūpiṇo 'pi cākṣuṣāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5184: ato bhagavānāha- eṣāṃ rūpamātraṃ sanidarśanam nānye dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5198: yo dharmaḥ pratiniyataḥ sa pratiniyataṃ dharmaṃ pratihanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5207: dharmo yadi pratiniyataḥ tadā [na] saṃkhyeyāni pañcendriyāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:5216: (pṛ) cakṣuṣo raśmirmahadalpaṃ paśyati sudūraṃ gatvāpi rūpamapratihataṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:5218: raśmirayaṃ dve cakṣuṣyupādāyaikatra militvā ekībhūto rūpaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:5219: cakṣurekaṃ śrotraṃ nāsikā ca kāyasyāntarvartamānā na vibhaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5220: ato bhavadvacanam anyatpaśyati anyadvijānāti idaṃ nirastam /
SA16hvsatssu:5253: yadavādīḥ sannikarṣo nigūḍha ityato na dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5265: karmabalena pariṇamitāni mahābhūtānīndriyāṇi bhūtvā vibhaktāni santi /
SA16hvsatssu:5292: atrocyate / yaduktaṃ bhavatā- indriyāṇi bhautikāni niyatānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5305: yathā catussatyābhisamaye dharmān sākṣātkṛtya [ta]ddharmatāṃ samyak bhāvayatīti sarvamidaṃ manovijñānenaiva /
SA16hvsatssu:5310: kiṃ prāpya vijānāti kimaprāpyeti sarvaṃ pratyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:5328: hrasvadīrghādilakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ rūpaṃ pratītya manovijñāne samutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5341: (u) [kasmiṃścit] dharme sthānāntara uddhite yadi parasyopakāro hiṃsā vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5357: na tu vadanti ghaṭe śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5362: sattvānāṃ pūrvākṣiptakarmavāsanatvādyadi padārthā nityaṃ saśabdāḥ syuḥ tadā na tātkālikaḥ [śabdaḥ] /
SA16hvsatssu:5366: mahābhūtānāṃ sadā mithaḥ sammardāt sarvaṃ saśabdaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5367: (u) na padārthānāṃ mithaḥ sammardaḥ sarvaḥ śabdahetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5381: (pṛ) saṃvṛtitaḥ sadā vadanti śabda ākāśaguṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5406: [SSS_151] ākāśe vartamāne 'pi auṣṇyamasti kadācit kadācinnetyākāśo nauṣṇyakāraṇamiti jñeyam /
SA16hvsatssu:5412: dṛṣṭe tāvanna paśyāmaḥ śabdaḥ ākāśamupādatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5436: yathā pūrvaṃ kusume gandhamāghrāya paścādvastre jighrataḥ ayamāgantukaḥ saṃbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5442: yadi bravīṣi jalādāvasti rūpaṃ svata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5443: [SSS_152] vayamapi vadema kāṃsyādau svata eva gandho 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5444: yo dharmo yasya vastuno 'vinirbhāgavartī sa tasyāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:5445: ato yo gandho yatrāvinirbhāgavartī sa tasyaiva dravyasya gandhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5448: yathā vadanti- asti candramasi tejaḥ tejasaḥ pratiniyatoṣṇatā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5449: vadanti ca gharmagṛhe 'gnyapagame 'pi śiṣyamāṇasya dharmaṇo 'sti sūkṣmaṃ rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5461: candrādayaḥ śītā api taijasā iti bravīṣi /
SA16hvsatssu:5474: ataḥ kāryata iti vacanaṃ na hetuḥ kalpate /
SA16hvsatssu:5480: tejaso rūpaṃ bhāskaraṃ śuklam kāṃsyādīnāntu abhāsvaram /
SA16hvsatssu:5481: kāṃsyāṃdīnāṃ tejasā vailakṣaṇye 'pi tāni taijasadravyāṇīti jñāpyante /
SA16hvsatssu:5489: asamyakcintanāt bravītha yūyaṃ- gandhaḥ pṛthivīmātre vidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5495: na tu caturṣu mahābhūteṣu tāratamyena bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5496: yathā vadanti pṛthivyā apāṃ bāhulyena madhura iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5499: ato jñātavyam - padārthāt pṛthak [pṛthak] svabhāvo raso jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5509: saṃvṛtyā rasā vibhaktāḥ yathā janā manyante madhuraṃ madhurameva bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5517_0: sparśo nāma kaṭhinaṃ mṛdu guru laghu prabalaṃ durbalaṃ śītamuṣṇaṃ karkaśaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:5517_1: kṛśaṃ śthūlaṃ praśrabdhiḥ klamathamaklamathaṃ rogo viśeṣo vā kāyataikṣṇyaṃ kāyamāndyamālasyaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:5517_2: gauravaṃ sammūrchanaṃ [SSS_154] sammohaḥ stambharna vyathā śūlaṃ vijṛmbhikā jighatsā
SA16hvsatssu:5517_3: pipāsā santṛptiḥ sātaṃ visātaṃ maurarvyam ityādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5518: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- trayaḥ sparśāḥ śīta uṣṇo 'nuṣṇāśīta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5522: (pṛ) aulūkyā vadanti- pṛthivyā anuṣṇāśītasparśastathā vāyorapi sparśaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5525: [tādṛśa]niyamo nāstīti pūrvamevoktam- yaduta sarpirādīnāṃ niyatā śītatā kāṃsyādīnāmanuṣṇateti /
SA16hvsatssu:5526: kiñcoktaṃ pūrvaṃ triṣu sparśeṣu yadi vāyavīya āgantukaḥ tadā sparśāntarābhāvādvāyuraniyatalakṣaṇaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5533: (u) kāṃsyādīni sarpirādīni ca kaṭhinadravyāṇi agnisaṃyogādravī bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5539: agnisaṃyoge sa sparśo yadi na vinaṣṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5549: [tadā] paro 'pi brūyāt payolakṣaṇamanirudhya kevalaṃ dadhilakṣaṇaṃ parāvartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5551: yadi bravīṣi na paśyāmaḥ payaḥ punaḥ payorūpeṇeti /
SA16hvsatssu:5554: anādau saṃsāre kiṃ dravyaṃ nāgninā dagdhaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5557: ato jñāyate pāko na nityo 'parāvṛtta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5558: evañca śītasparśe vinaṣṭe punaḥ śītasparśa utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5563: vaiśeṣikā vadanti- pṛthivīmātre pāko bhavati nāpsu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5564: bhiṣajastu vadanti- yastaptāṃ yavāgūṃ pāti sa vijātīyaṃ phalaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5584: yathā mārgavarge smṛterekasyā eva pañca nāmānyu[cyante] smṛtyupasthānaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ smṛtibalaṃ smṛtisambodhyaṅgaṃ samyaksmṛtiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:5587: sambodhirityādīni nānā pṛthak pṛthaṅ nāmāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5588: eka eva samādhiḥ dhyānaṃ vimuktiḥ nissṛtiḥ samāpattirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5592: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tasya kāmāsravāccittaṃ vimucyate avidyāsravaccittaṃ vimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5595: api coktaṃ sūtre- yadā bhagavān sattvānāṃ kallacittaṃ mṛducittaṃ dāntacittaṃ vimuktilābhapravaṇatāñca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:5598: api coktaṃ sūtre- cittasaṃkleśātsattvāḥ saṃkliśyanti cittavyavadānātsattvā viśudhyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5600: kiñcāha- yo bhikṣuścatvāri dhyānānyupasampadya viśuddhākopyacitto [SSS_157] bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5601: sa duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgamāryasatyañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5606: api coktaṃ sūtre rāṣṭrapālamāhūyāvadat idaṃ vastu punaḥ punarājavajjavaṃ mahārāja cittaṃ vadāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5607: āha ca ādhyātmiko vijñānakāyo bāhyaṃ nāparūpamiti dvidhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5613: ato jñāyate cittamātramasti na caitasikamasti pṛthagiti //
SA16hvsatssu:5623: yadbhavatāṃ mataṃ- cittamanyena cittena samprayujyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5626: uktaṃ hi sūtre- dūraṅgamamekacaramaśarīraṃ guhāśayam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5629: yathā bhikṣurekākī san satsvapi maśakā[di]prāṇiṣu sajātīyo nāstīti ekākītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5630: ato [SSS_158] jñāyate nānyacittena cittaṃ samprayujyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5633: caitasikāstu ekena dhātunā ekenāyatanena tribhiḥ skandhaiśca saṅgṛhītāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5643: yathoktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5651: tādṛśavibhāgāt jñāyate cittamanyat caitasikā anya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5657: bhagavān svayamāha- ye cittajāścittaniśritāste caitasikā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5660: paro 'pi vadet- caitasikāḥ santi na cittamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5675: puruṣasyāvidyayā [SSS_159] saṃkleśaḥ prajñayā vyavadānamiti na bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:5681: bhavatā yadyapyuktaṃ dharmālambanaṃ cittaṃ cittaviśeṣāścaitasikā mārgavargoktavat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5698: sūtre bhagavān na pariniṣṭhitaṃ vakti idamasyādhivacanamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5699: yathāha sūtram- ekaṃ dharmaṃ prajahītha ahamājānāmi anāgāmimārgaṃ pratilabhadhve yadidaṃ kāmacchandam /
SA16hvsatssu:5706: yaduktaṃ bāhyaṃ nāmarūpamiti sa eva caitasika[dharma] ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5711: yat bāhyaṃ sa eva viṣaya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5737: evaṃ cittaṃ cittamāśrayata iti na nāmāntaraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:5749: sa hi bravīti- pūrvaṃ vijñānasya kālaḥ paścātsaṃjñādīnām iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5754: cittameva dvidhā vadāmi ekaṃ jñānamaparaṃ vijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5756: yadāha bhavān- bhagavān svayamāha ye cittaniśritāste caitasikā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5760: kintu vadāmi cittaviśeṣā eva caitasikā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5768: cittañca caitasikaiḥ saha cittādutpadyata iti caitasikamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5769: caitasikamātramastīti yo vadati sa vadet caitasikadharmā arthākhyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5777: citta utpannaṃ cittameva citte vitarka udabhūdityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5791: vijñānasya buddhervā [anyeṣāṃ] sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇādiṣu nāsti viśeṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5794: yathā laukikā vadanti yadbhavān vijānātīmaṃ puruṣamiti tat jñānameva vedanā saṃjñā iti jñeyam /
SA16hvsatssu:5802: asmin cittaskandhe saṃkleśo 'vidyā ca sarvathā saṃprayuktā /
SA16hvsatssu:5809: ato jñāyate avidyāto 'pi cittameva vimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5812: yadi ca saṃkleśebhyaścittaṃ vimucyate avidyātaḥ prajñā vimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5814: ataścittaṃ vinā na kiñcidvimucyata iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:5820: laukikā bhūyasā sukhaṃ duḥkhamapi vijānantīti vedanādayo '[pi] vaktavyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5825: bhagavān sattvānāṃ kleśatāratamyavaśātsadā viṣādākrāntacittaḥ san vadati ayameko dharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5837: dharmāṇāṃ sasamprayogatve 'pi sparśa eva vedanādīnāṃ hetuḥ na vedanādayaḥ sparśasya /
SA16hvsatssu:5851: ato nāsti samprayogaḥ gambhīre pratītyasamutpāda[sūtre]bhagavānāha- asyotpādādidamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5852: yathā ca bījāṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrapuṣpādīni hetuphalābhyāṃ kramikāni dṛṣṭāni /
SA16hvsatssu:5854: yadbhavān manyate kāmādayaḥ kleśā rūpasya saha[bhū]hetavaḥ sahajāḥ syuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:5871: (u) kasya pratibandhādekaṃ kramikamālambanaṃ na kramaśaḥ ṣaḍvijñānānyutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:5872: jñātavyaṃ pūrvaṃ hetuḥ paścātkāryamiti kramaśa utpādaheturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5873: sūtre coktam- cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5877: yo nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti sa dṛṣṭvā gṛhṇāti na darśanakāle /
SA16hvsatssu:5879: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvānuprahṛṣṭacetano bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5882: ato jñāyate na sarvaṃ cittaṃ vedanādisamanvitamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5886: tasya [SSS_164] nāsti saṃjñā nāpi daurmanasyaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:5888: kecidāhuḥ tasyāpi kāmādayaḥ kleśā na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5893: kiñca bhavataḥ pañca vijñānāni na vikalpakāni /
SA16hvsatssu:5895: cetanāvikalpaḥ pūrvarbhaudārikaḥ san pañcātsūkṣmo bhavatītyato vitarkavicāraustaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5897: tadyathā vadasi mayi tava jñāpanāya prathamata evābhyūhādhīno vitarka utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5903: ato 'bhyupeyaṃ pañca vijñānāni asaṃjñāni avitarkāni avicārāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5905: na hi pañcavijñāneṣu strī puruṣa iti vikalpo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:5908: pañcavijñānānāṃ nirvikalpakatvāt tadanantaraṃ manovijñānamutpadyata iti yuṣmābhiruktam /
SA16hvsatssu:5921: avidyā prajñā ca viruddhe na yugapatsyātām /
SA16hvsatssu:5925: sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti naikasmin citte samudācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:5929: ayaṃ puruṣo mama jñāto māmupakṛtavāniti yat smaraṇam,
SA16hvsatssu:5930: smṛtvā ca prītijananam tata kathamekasmin citte syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5939: ekasminneva hi citte 'sti jñānamajñānaṃ saṃśayo niścayaḥ śraddhāśraddhā vīryaṃ kausīdyamityevamādyā doṣāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5940: sarve ca caitasikā ekasmina citte pariniṣṭhitāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5941: kasya pratibandhāt sukhaṃ dukhaṃ rāgo dveṣa ityādayo na bhavantyekasmin citte /
SA16hvsatssu:5942: yadyāha bhavān sukhaduḥkhādayo virodhānnaikasmin citte vartanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5946: "yo bhikṣuścaturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati ca smṛtisambodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:5955: upekṣāyāṃ prajānāti" iti caitasikāḥ kramikā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5961: śīladharaḥ puruṣo na kaukṛtyabhāvāya cittaṃ praṇidadhāti /
SA16hvsatssu:5975: yo bhikṣuralpeccho viharati sa santuṣṭo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6005: ārakṣāṃ pratītya daṇḍādānaśasrādānakalahavigrahavivādāḥ sarve duḥkhopāyāsādayaḥ sambhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6012: uktañca sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6014: cittacaittā ekakālikā iti vadatastrayāṇāṃ sannipāto nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:6015: ekaikaśa utpadyanta iti vadatastu asti trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6020: kasmāt yaḥ paśyati sa vedayata ayamātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:6025: puruṣasūtra uktam- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6028: asmin mate vividhaṃ nāmāsti yaduta sattvo devo manuṣyaḥ strī puruṣo mahānalpa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6029: evamādīni nāmāni sarvāṇi skandhān pratītya bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6030: yadi cittacaitasikāḥ kramikāḥ tadā skandhadvayaṃ pratītya puruṣo bhavet na skandhapañcakam /
SA16hvsatssu:6033: bhavānāha- pratyutpanne na santi pañcaskandhāḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6035: ucyate tu sarvaskandhān pratītya na skandhadvayamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:6037: asti ca sūtre samprayogo yadutendriyajñānasamprayuktā śraddhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6038: api coktaṃ sūtre- sparśo vedanāsaṃjñāvitarkaiḥ sahaja iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6042: [SSS_168] kathaṃ vijñānasthitiṣu vedanādiṣu sthitamidaṃ niśrayate tiṣṭhatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6046: āha ca- sattvānāṃ cittaṃ dīrgharātraṃ rāgadveṣādisaṃkliṣṭamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:6050: api coktaṃ sūtre- yasmin samaye cittamuddhataṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6051: akālastrayāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgānām yaduta dharmapravicayabodhyaṅgasya vīryabodhyaṅgasya prītibodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:6054: [yasmin samaye cittamuddhataṃ bhavati] kālastrayāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyai yaduta praśrabdhisambodhyaṅgasya samādhisambodhyaṅgasya upekṣāsambodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:6057: akāla[stasmin samaye] trayāṇāṃ sambodhyaṅgānāṃ yaduta praśrabdhisambodhyaṅgasya samādhisambodhyaṅgasya upekṣāsambodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:6061: ] kāla[stasmin samaye] trayāṇāṃ sambodhyaṅgānāṃ yaduta dharmapravicayasambodhyaṅgasya vīryasaṃmbodhyaṅgasya prītisambodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:6065: ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- ekakālaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuktasya bodhi[pakṣikā] dharmā na viyujyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6069: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- yaḥ paśyati sa vedayate sa ātmeti /

SA16hvsatssu:6076: yadavocaḥ- sarvān skandhān pratītya puruṣo bhavatīti /

SA16hvsatssu:6078: yathā loke vadanti- sukhī duḥkhī aduḥkhāsukhīti /

SA16hvsatssu:6098: pṛthagjanānāṃ vijñānasyālambanakriyāyāṃ catvāro dharmāḥ kramikā bhavanti- vijñānānantarajā saṃjñā,
SA16hvsatssu:6110: vitarkavicārau ca na saṃprayuktāviti pūrvameva pratyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:6112: tatsūtra uktā vijñānasya pratyaya[rūpā] sthitiḥ na niśrayarūpā /
SA16hvsatssu:6114: tasminneva hi sūtra uktam- vijñānaṃ rūpaṃ pratītya snehapramodābhyāṃ tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:6116: yadyupyuktaṃ bhavatā- yadi vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ pratītya tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:6122: tatra tṛṣṇodbhavati udbhūtatṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānasthiti rityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6141: yadi bravīṣi cittaṃ pūrvamutpadyate tanmahimnā caitasikānāmāśraya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6144: yadbravīṣi cittaṃ kleśasaṃkliṣṭamityato jñāyate 'smi samprayoga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6147: tadā sa eva pariśuddhadharmā dūṣyo bhavatīti dharmalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:6154: tathā ca sattvā api samprayuktāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6173: caitasikāścittajāścittaniśritā iti yat bhavato vacanaṃ tatpūrvameva pratyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:6176: na tu sāhāyyāya mitha ālambane samudācarantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6185: tasmin samaye praśrabdhyādīni trīṇi bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6201: (pṛ) ājñātaṃ na santi pṛthak caitasikāḥ nāsti ca samprayoga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6226: saṃyogato viyogato vā hetusamanantarālambanādhipatīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viśeṣāccittāni bhidyante /
SA16hvsatssu:6231: yathā sūryaraśmiḥ prakṛtito viśuddhā na kadāciddūṣyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6232: yat prakṛtito 'viśuddhaṃ na tat viśodhayituṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6233: yathā roma prakṛtitaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ nāvadātaṃ kartumarhati /
SA16hvsatssu:6238: yathocyate bhikṣurvijñānamupabhuṅkte keṣāṃ vijñānaṃ yaduta sukhaduḥkhāduḥkhāsukhānāṃ vijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:6253: yathā markaṭopasūtra uktam- yathā markaṭaḥ [araṇya upavane caramāṇaḥ] śākhāṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6255: evameva cittaṃ [rātryā divasasya ca] atyayena anyadevotpadyata anyannirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6260: yat citta- [mityucyate tat rātryāśca divasasya] atyayena anyadevotpadyate 'nyannirudhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6264: yathā caikaṃ karma [kṛtaṃ] na punarādeyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6276: ratnahārasūtra uktam- yaścittaṃ sadā śraddhayā śīlena tyāgena śrutena prajñayā ca bhāvayati sa mṛto deveṣūtpadyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6277: dhyānasūtre coktam- prathamadhyānalābhī cittasya paridamanāya prathamadhyānādvitīyadhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:6287: tiṣṭha markaṭa mā [dhāvī]rna hi te tat yathā purā /
SA16hvsatssu:6289: ato jñāyate- cittamekaṃ pañcendriyadvāreṣu kāyakuṭikāyāṃ paribhramati /
SA16hvsatssu:6291: ata āha "mā [dhāvī]rna hi te tat yathāpurā" / iti / āha ca-
SA16hvsatssu:6296: ekameva hi cittaṃ karmāṇyabhinirvṛttya punarvipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:6297: cittaṃ mriyate cittamutpadyate cittaṃ badhyate cittaṃ mucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6315: yadekaṃ cittaṃ tadeva rūpaśabdādigrahaṇarūpāṇi nānākarmāṇi karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:6316: yathaikaḥ puruṣaḥ pañcachidrake gṛhe sthitaḥ tatra tatra gatān viṣayān gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6317: tadeva cittaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnamālokadipratyayamapekṣya rūpaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:6318: yathā sa eva puruṣa anyatra sahāyamapekṣya [aparaṃ] kāryaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:6320: yathā sa eva pūrvaṃ jñānī san paścādajñānī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6321: evaṃ mithyājñānaṃ punaḥ samyak jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6322: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ viśuddhaḥ paścādaviśuddho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6323: evaṃ yat sandigdhaṃ jñānaṃ tadeva niścitaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6324: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ saṃśayitaḥ punarniścito bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6325: yadakuśalaṃ cittaṃ tadeva punaḥ kuśalamavyākṛtañca bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6326: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ kadācitkuśalaṃ smarati /
SA16hvsatssu:6329: yathā sa eva puruṣo 'tītānāgatādau nāneryāpathān karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:6332: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ prasannaḥ paścādaprasanno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6334: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvamanyaṃ sukhayati paścātpunarduḥkhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6336: yadavādīḥ- ekameva vijñānaṃ na ṣaḍvivaṣayān gṛhṇātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6340: yat vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnaṃ tat rūpamātraṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6346: yathā pradīpa ātmānaṃ prakāśayati anyānapi prakāśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6347: yathā gaṇaka ātmānaṃ gaṇayati anyānapi gaṇayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6350: yathā markaṭaḥ śākhāṃ gṛhṇāti tāṃ muttkāparāṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6354: svayameva punarvipākaṃ vedayate iti saṃkṣipya pratyavocam /
SA16hvsatssu:6358: anyadvedayate anyanmṛnmriyate anyajjāyata ityādayo doṣāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6362: atrocyate / yadabravīḥ- cittamekaṃ kāmādinā ciramupakliṣṭam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6375: tenaiva cittena tadeva smaryata iti kathaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:6389: idānīṃ kurvan paścātkariṣyan nitya eko 'vikārītyata ātmā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6396: brahmādayo vyāmohagatā evaṃ manyante kāyo 'yamanityaḥ cittaṃ vijñānantu nityam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6401: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- dakṣiṇena dṛṣṭvā vāmena vijānīyāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:6406: atītaṃ vastu asadapi smṛtvā vijānanti anāgatamasadapi [ārya]jñānabalādvijānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6424: evaṃ cakṣūrūpayoḥ kṣaṇikatvāt tadāśrityotpannaṃ vijñānamapi kṣaṇikam /
SA16hvsatssu:6428: yadavādiḥ- vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnaṃ sat ālokamapekṣya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:6429: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ paśyati śṛṇoti ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:6436: saṃśayajñānādīni niścayajñānādibhyo 'nyāni na saṃśayajñānādīnyeva niścayajñānādīni ityapi vadāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6450: ghaṭādi dravyamapi [paśyati] gaṇakastu ātmarūpamapi jānāti pararūpamapi jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6461: tathā bandhamokṣādirapi yadavādīḥ- anyat karoti anyadvedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6465: saṃvṛtisaṃjñayā karmādīnāṃ vacanaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6479: yadi kṣaṇikaṃ [cittaṃ] tadā rūpādīni na kadāpi pratīyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:6481: yathā vidyutprabhā kiñcitsthāyinyapi na punaḥ sujñeyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6486: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñāna[mutpadyate] ityanayorabhede vijñānamapyabhinnam /
SA16hvsatssu:6500: ekaikasmin tantau pratyekamasti kiñcidvalam iti tatsamavāyaḥ prabhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6518: tathā no cet śabdakarmaṇo na syātpratyāyanam /
SA16hvsatssu:6520: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalvidaṃ kṣaṇikamatha ca pratyāyakamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:6536: vijñānañca viṣayaṃ gṛhṇāti mandaṃ vā kṣipraṃ vā iti cittasya nāsti niyamaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6556: puruṣasya kadāciccittaṃ bhavati yadahamekakālaṃ sarvānalambanān gṛhṇāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6568: tasyaikameva jñānaṃ samyaṅ mithyā ca sambhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:6569: ayaṃ puruṣa iti graha eva ayaṃ na puruṣa iti graha iti yathā darśanaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6595: ato jñāyate bahūni vijñānāni yugapadekakālamutpannāni sarvān spraṣṭavyān gṛhṇanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6600: vahūni vijñānānīti kāyāvayaveṣu ca śīghrataraṃ jñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6603: na hi sambhavatyekameva vijñānaṃ sarvānavayavān gṛhṇātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6604: ato ekakālamutpannāni bahūni vijñānāni sarvānavayavān gṛhṇantīti //
SA16hvsatssu:6607: atrocyate / yaducyate bhavatā- bahūni vijñānāni yugapadekakālamutpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6615: ato jñāyate vijñānāni manaskāramapekṣya bhavanti naikakālikānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6629: tathā ca sarvadharmāṇāmutpattaye nāvaśyaṃ yatnaṃ kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:6639: cakṣuṣā paśyāmaḥ khalu bāhyān bījāṅkurādīn kalamāṃsapeśyādirūpāṇi kaumārayauvanajarākārān kramikān /
SA16hvsatssu:6641: uktañca sūtre- yadā sukhā vedanā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6642: tadā [anye] dve vedane niruddhe yaduta duḥkhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:6643: yadi vijñānānāṃ yugapadutpādaḥ tadā tisro vedanā ekakālaṃ vedyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:6645: ato jñāyate vijñānāni naikakāla mutpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6646: ekasmin kāya ekacittotpattyā ekaḥ puruṣa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6647: vijñānānāṃ yaugapadya ekasmin kāye bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6649: ata ekasmin kāye vijñānānāṃ yaugapadyaṃ na sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6650: yaugapadye hi ekakālaṃ sarvān dharmān jānīyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6662: tathā mamāpi ekasya manasa ekaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6675: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kecitparīttasaṃjñāḥ kecidbahusaṃjñāḥ kecidapramāṇasaṃjñāḥ kecidakiñcanasaṃjñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6676: vastutastu te bahu kiñcidādidharmā na santi /
SA16hvsatssu:6685: saṃjñā tridhā vibhaktā grahālambanā yaduta priyadvepyodāsīnāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6690: yathoktam- cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhvīta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6694: tathā saṃjñayā hi sarvān kleśān prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6695: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anityasaṃjñā sādhu bhāvitā sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6708: yathā ca vadanti akṛṣṇāśuklakarmaṇā sarvāṇi karmāṇi kṣapayatīti / vadanti ca-
SA16hvsatssu:6711: vastutastu prajñayā tarati na tu śraddhādinā /
SA16hvsatssu:6714: yathoktam- āryāstadantevāsino vā prajñābalena sarvān kleśān prajahatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6719: uktañca sūtre- jānan paśyan āsravakṣayaṃ pratilabhate nājānan nāpaśyan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6721: āha ca bhagavān- prajñāskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandho bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6724: anukramasūtre coktam- viśuddhaśīladhāriṇo na cittaṃ paritapati yāvadyathābhūtajñānāya cittaṃ samādadhāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6729: āha ca bhagavān- sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtajñānamanuttarā prajñā ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6731: prajñaiva sarvakleśānāṃ samucchedini na tu saṃjñeti yogo nyānyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6733: yathāha mahānidānasūtram- yacca sūtre 'vatarati vinaye ca sandṛśyate dharmatāñca na vilomayati tat grāhyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6734: api cāha- samyagarthe sthāpanā yathārtha [grahaṇam] samyak rute sthāpanā yathārūta [grahaṇam] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6735: ataḥ sūtre yadyapyuktam anityasaṃjñādayaḥ kleśānāṃ samucchedakā [SSS_185] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6740: ato jñāyate prajñayā sarve kleśāḥ prahīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6744: prajñaptidharmāḥ pañca atītaḥ anāgataḥ saṅketaḥ saṃyogaḥ pudgala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6752: yathoktam- siṃho mṛgarāja iha nadītīre sthitastratra tīre nimittaṃ gṛhītvā oghaṃ tīrtvā niṣkrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:6753: tatra yadi nimittaṃ nāsti tadā idaṃ tīraṃ pratinivṛtya [tannimitta]māmaraṇaṃ na muñcati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6760: kiñcāha- trīṇi nimittāni yaduta samādhinimittaṃ pragrahanimittamupekṣānimittamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:6765: tatra pañca dharmā eva nimittāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6769: uktañca sūtre- cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi [SSS_186] dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhṇīteti /
SA16hvsatssu:6770: dharmamudrāyāñcoktam- yo bhikṣuḥ rūpaśabdādinimittaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:6777: āha ca rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhṇīteti /
SA16hvsatssu:6779: kathaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6781: duṣṭanimittaniṣedhārthamāha- rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittaṃ gṛhṇātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6782: animitta[samādhe]rālambanamapi duṣṭamiti paścānnirodhasatya [varge]vakṣyate yat trividha cittanirodhī animittamādāvupasampadya viharatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6788: yathoktaṃ- dharmanimittasya grāhī na duṣyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6821: yathā kaścit yadā śītārtaḥ tadoṣṇasparśaḥ sukhamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6822: (pṛ) nanu sa evoṣṇasparśaḥ utkaṭaḥ san duḥkhakaro bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6830: yadi pūrvameva duḥkhaviyogaḥ tadoṣṇasparśo na sukhakaraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6840: kiñcāha- rūpasya ka āsvādāḥ ye rūpamupādāya prītisukhajananā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6841: kiñcāha- sukhavedanāyā utpadyamānāyāḥ sukhe sthite sukham /
SA16hvsatssu:6843: duḥkhavedanāyā utpadyamānāyā na duḥkhe sthite duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:6845: aduḥkhāsukhavedanāyā na duḥkhaṃ jñāyate na sukhaṃ jñāyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6858: na vaktavyaṃ duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6865: sarvo lokadhātu ā mahānarakamā ca bhavāgraṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhalakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:6867: yathā kaścit dharmataptaḥ śītasparśaṃ sukhaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6871: tathā no cet duḥkhālpatve sukhasaṃjñotpadyata ityapi na vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6875: na hi paśyāmaḥ kathamapi sūkṣmaṃ sukhamanubhavantaṃ puruṣaṃ bāhumudyamya sudīrghamucchvasantam /
SA16hvsatssu:6876: sukhā ca vedanā sūkṣmā pravṛttā upaśamalakṣaṇamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6878: ato yaduktaṃ sūkṣme sukhe duḥkhasaṃjñotpadyata iti tat vacanamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:6879: bālapṛthagjanānāmalpaduḥkhe sukhasaṃjñā mithyā prādurbhavati iti tu nyāyyam //
SA16hvsatssu:6884: cīvarabhojanādayo hi sarve dūḥkhahetavaḥ na sukhahetavaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6886: annavastrādiṣūtkaṭeṣu duḥkhamapi vardhata iti pratyakṣaṃ khalu /
SA16hvsatssu:6893: yathā janā maraṇabhītāḥ [anyaṃ] daṇḍaṃ sukhaṃ manyante /
SA16hvsatssu:6894: daṇḍādānaśastrādānakṣuraśaktayo duḥkhahetutayā niyatāḥ na tathā sukhahetutayā /
SA16hvsatssu:6895: sarveṣāmavaśyamātyantikaduḥkhatvāt jñātavyaṃ pūrvaṃ [duḥkhaṃ] sadevordhvakālaṃ budhyate pādukākṣayavat /
SA16hvsatssu:6905: yasya yatra sukhamabhūt tasya tadeva paścādduḥkhacittajanakamityato jñāyate nāsti sukhamiti /
