SA16hvsatssu:6910: kiñca janā duḥkhe sukhaviparyāsamutpādya paścāttatrābhiṣvajante sukhaṃ yadi kiñcidasti /
SA16hvsatssu:6912: yathā nitya ātmā viśuddhaḥ kimapi vastu nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:6918: sūtre ca bhagavatoktam- sukhā bhikṣavo vedanā duḥkhato draṣṭavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:6925: ato bhagavānāha- yatra pṛthagjanānāṃ sukhasaṃjñotpadyate tat duḥkhato draṣṭavyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:6938: apara ādau mṛdurapi ante puruṣaṃ hinasti /
SA16hvsatssu:6939: tadvatpadārthā api kecidādau subhakarā ante tu hiṃsrāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6947: sarve sattvāḥ kāyikaduḥkhena vā caitasikaduḥkhena vā sadānugamyanta ityataḥ kāyo duḥkhamiti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6956: kāyasya ca bahavaḥ śatravo yadutāśīviṣakāraṇḍaḥ pañcotkṣiptāsikā vadhakāḥ kalyāṇamitravañcanāścorāḥ śūnyagrāme grāmaghātakāścorā mahānadyā avaratīram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6959: kiñca jānīmaḥ sattvānāṃ kāyaḥ sarvaduḥkhairanugamyate yaduta jātiduḥkhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:6960: jarāduḥkhaṃ vyādhiduḥkhaṃ maraṇaduḥkhaṃ vipriyasamāgamaduḥkhaṃ priyaviyogaduḥkhaṃ prārthitādivighātaduḥkham ityādibhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6966: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāṃ vijñānañca duḥkhaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6967: rūpa utpadyamāne jarāvyādhimaraṇādayaḥ sarva upadravā utpadyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:6986: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā sūtre- rūpārāmā[bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā rūparatā rūpamuditā rūpavipariṇāmavirāganirodhāt [SSS_191] duḥkhaṃ [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā viharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7003: yathā vanyapakṣiṇāmāhāraḥ matsyānāṃ bhakṣaṇapraskandanañca sarvaṃ grahaṇāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7016: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tṛṣṇā duḥkhasya mūlam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7026: lābhakāle na tṛpyati srotaḥ kabalayan sāgara iva /
SA16hvsatssu:7030: sattvāḥ sukhasādhanānveṣaṇakāle prapātacaṅkramaṇā[di]doṣamapi sukhato matvā na citte parikhidyante /
SA16hvsatssu:7045: uktañca sūtre- dve ime bhikṣava āśe duṣprajahe /
SA16hvsatssu:7048: eṣāṃ kāmānāmupabhogāya yā jīvita pratilābhāyāśā sā jīvitasyāśā /
SA16hvsatssu:7050: ataḥ prajñāvatā yathābhūtaṃ sukhavedanālakṣaṇaṃ bhāvayatā duṣprahajā[pi] praheyā /
SA16hvsatssu:7057: loke hi prājñā avaśyamuttamabhūmyāsvādamupādāyādharāṃ bhūmiṃ tyajanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7066: idānīṃ kena vibhaṅgena santi tisro vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7067: (u) ekasyā eva duḥkhavedanāyā kālabhedena trayaḥ prakārā bhavanti yat viheṭhakaṃ tat duḥkhamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7078: (u) puruṣo 'yaṃ tribhiḥ sparśaiḥ spṛṣṭaḥ yaduta duḥkhasparśaḥ sukhasparśa aduḥkhāsukhasparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7084: yadbhavato matam- aduḥkhāsukhasparśe na vedanotpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7090: puruṣaṃ prati ālambanaṃ tridhā vibhaktaṃ priyaṃ dveṣyamudāsīnamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7104: pratikūlaṃ yatra cittaṃ tatra duḥkhā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7105: yatra na pratikūlaṃ nānukūlaṃ tatrāduḥkhāsukhā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7106: lokadharmāścāṣṭau lābho 'lābho nindā praśaṃsā yaśo 'yaśaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7115: ye cittopavicārāḥ kāyavartinaḥ te sarve 'pi sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā vā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7118: uktaṃ hi sūtre- aṣṭādaśa manaupavicārāḥ iti tatra kevalamekaṃ manaḥ aṣṭādaśadhāvibhaktaṃ yaduta ṣaṭ saumanasyopavicārāḥ ṣaṭ daurmanasyopavicārāḥ ṣaḍupekṣopavicārā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7120: ato jñāyate sarve 'pi cittopavicārā [SSS_194] nāvedanā bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:7121: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- sarvā vedanā duḥkham iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7122: ato jñāyate cittopavicāreṣu dehagateṣu sarvaṃ duḥkhamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7123: āha ca yo rūpasyotpādaḥ sa duḥkhasyotpāda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7127: ataḥ sarve 'pi cittopavicārā vedanā ityucyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7129: vipariṇāme duḥkhatvāt sukhāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhato bhāvayet /
SA16hvsatssu:7131: itīmāstisro vedanā duḥkhāḥ pratyayasāmagryāṃ samutpannāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7137: anāsravā vedanā api āryā anantaraṃ tyajanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7143: ya āryā anāsravacittavihāriṇaḥ te sarvatra paraṃ nirvidyante /
SA16hvsatssu:7151: te tasmin samaye sarve saṃskṛtā duḥkhamiti vyaktaṃ paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7152: yadyanāsravā vedanā sukhā tadā sukhe prāmodyeran na nirvāṇonmukhacittā bhaveyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7155: (u) ekaiva vedanā ālambane nānopavicaratīti vibhaktā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7159: imeṣu sarvadharmeṣu kāyagateṣu santi [SSS_195] hitādayo viśeṣā ityato vedanetyākhyāyante /
SA16hvsatssu:7164: aduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ moho 'nuśete iti tasmātsaṃjñāvikalpitā ālambane saumanasyādayo dharmā vedanā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:7175: puruṣasya tatra sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñānutpādādvastuno jñānadarśanābhāvācca kevalaṃ mohānuśayaḥ sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7176: upekṣālambane yadi rāgadveṣau na samudācarataḥ pṛthagjanāstadutkṛṣṭālambanamiti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7179: yathoktaṃ sūtre- prākṛtānāṃ yadrupe bhavatyupekṣā sa sarvā rūpaniścitā /
SA16hvsatssu:7181: yo nikṛṣṭaṃ karoti tasya punā rāgadveṣau samudbhavata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7189: yo jānāti tadālambanaṃ tasya sukhaduḥkhe spaṣṭaṃ pratīyete /
SA16hvsatssu:7193: (u) puruṣasyāsya tadā tadālambane na sukhacittamutpadyate na ca duḥkhacittam /
SA16hvsatssu:7199: (u) puruṣasyāsya tasmin ālambane pūrvaṃ nimittagrahāt tatrālambane yadyavidyānuśayo yadi vā rāgadveṣānuśayo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:7201: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sa tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayañcāstagamañcāsvādañcādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ na prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:7202: tasya tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayañcāstagamañcāsvādañcādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtamaprajānato yo 'duḥkhāsukhasyāvedanāyā avidyānuśayaḥ so 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7205: (u) sūtramidaṃ svayamāha- vedanānāṃ samudayāstagamādīnavādīn yathābhūtamaprajānato 'duḥkhāsukhāyāmavidyānuśayo 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7209: ata idaṃ sūtramevaṃ vaktavyam- aduḥkhāsukhāyāḥ samudayādyaprajānato 'duḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāmavidyānuśayo 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7218: aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā yathākālaṃ tridhā vibhaktā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7220: tasmin samaye duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ sukhasaṃjñotpadyate aduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñā cotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7225: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- tasya cet sukhā vedanotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7226: sa evaṃ prajānāti- utpannā khalu ma iyaṃ sukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7230: (u) sūtrasyāsya puruṣo [SSS_197] vedayata ityābhiprāyikaṃ vacanaṃ ityadoṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7231: sukhādivedanā kāya āgamya mana ālambate ityato 'pyanavadyam /
SA16hvsatssu:7235: ata ucyate sukhā vedanotpadyate cet sa yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7239: sūtre tūktam- sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7241: kena tadvedyata iti vedayatīti vedanā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7249: (u) ayaṃ padasyārthaḥ yat sanimittaṃ tat sakāritram /
SA16hvsatssu:7250: prajñaptau sanimittāmimāṃ sukhāṃ duḥkhāmaduḥkhāsukhāṃ [vedanāṃ] kāyagatāṃ cittamanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7254: kiṃ tasya tasmin samaye duḥkhasaṃjñā notpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7255: (u) sarvaṃ duḥkhamityalabdhvā sa tisro vedanā anusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:7258: (u) sarvāsu vedanāsu evaṃ smṛtyunubandhāt syāt idaṃ kāyikaṃ sukham idaṃ caitasikaṃ sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7264: tīrthikā hi vadanti vedanā ātmaniśritā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7265: ato bhagavānāha- vedanāḥ kāyaṃ cittañca niśritā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7274: (u) prahīṇāmiṣasya yā duḥkhā vedanā sā nirāmiṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:7275: āmiṣāṇāṃ viruddhā duḥkhā vedanā itīyaṃ nirāmiṣetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7281: yathocyate sūtre- asti sāmiṣā prītiḥ asti nirāmiṣā prītiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7283: sāmiṣā prītiriti pañcakāma guṇān pratītyotpadyate prītiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7288: (pṛ) pañcasvindriyeṣu kasmādduḥkhā vedanā sukhā vedaneti pratyaṅgaṃ dvidhā vibhaktā /
SA16hvsatssu:7297: atastṛtīyadhyāne prītiviśeṣaṃ niśrityocyate kāyena sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:7304: sattvāḥ duḥkhābhihatāḥ sukhārthitvāt ghaniṣṭhaṃ kleśamutpādayanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7306: yathā pañcakāmaguṇasampannasya puruṣasya maśakapataṅgadaṃśe yo duḥkhānubhavo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7313: bahavaḥ sattvāḥ [SSS_199] tisṛṣu durgatiṣūpapannā devamanuṣyebhyo nikṛṣṭāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7316: yathā kṣetre tṛṇavīraṇāni svayaṃ prarohanti na sasyāni /
SA16hvsatssu:7317: duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratītya guruke pāpakarmaṇi pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:7329: sā ca vedanā triṣu dhātuṣu vyāptā /
SA16hvsatssu:7332: tadvedanārāgaṃ pratītya jīvati aśīti mahākalpasahasrāṇi duḥkhalakṣaṇān skandhānanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7339: sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā tu laukikamārgasyāpi doṣaprāpiṇī /
SA16hvsatssu:7352: sukhendriyaṃ caturthadhyāne nirudhyate upekṣendriyaṃ nirodhasamāpattau nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7358: (pṛ) rūpārūpyadhātau kuśaladharmān samyak bhāvayato duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ nasyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7366: eṣāṃ vijñānānāṃ yā kācidvedanā sā duḥkhā vā sukhā vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7371: yatkiñcanarūpaṃ [sarvaṃ tat] anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharma iti rūpadhātoḥ sarūpatvāt astyāsvādacittaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:7380: yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya saṃjñā vedanā ca śalyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7387: rūpārūpyadhātvorapi tathāṣṭasaṃskārāḥ samānamuktā iti kasmānnāsti duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:7391: āha ca sūtram- atra santīrṣyāmātsaryādayaḥ kleśā [SSS_201] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7392: yathā brahmā brahmāṇamāmantyāha- dhrūvamidaṃ sthānam mā bhavantaḥ śramaṇaṃ gautamamupasaṅkramata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7395: api coktaṃ sūtre- tatrāsti mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kleśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7398: ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- sarve kleśā akuśalā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7400: uktañca sūtre- rūpārāmā [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyāḥ rūparatā rūpasamuditāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7407: prākṛtānāmajñānāṃ kasya śaktibalena priyaprāptipratyayaṃ saumanasyaṃ na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7409: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mārgaṃ pratipannasyaivāyuṣo 'nte rūpe saumanasyaṃ daurmanasya ñca nāsti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7410: ato jñāyate sarveṣāṃ prākṛtānāṃ saumanasyaṃ daurmanasyaṃ sadānuvartate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7411: bhagavān svayamāha- daurmanasyavigataṃ saumanasyavigatañcaikaṃ cittamupekṣāyāmupavicaratītyayamarhato guṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7415: yathoktaṃ sūtre- prākṛtānāṃ yadupekṣācittaṃ sarvaṃ tat rūpaniśritaṃ na rūparāgavimuktam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7417: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśayaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7422: uttamabhūmau ca pravṛtte kāyacitte śāntasukhe na mahadanugṛhīte staḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7424: yadi [te] duḥkhopavicāriṇaḥ [SSS_202] na te tadiryāpatheṣu dīrghakālaṃ sthātuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7425: yathoktaṃ sūtre- saptadināni samāviśya vimuktisukhaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7427: yathoktaṃ sūtre praśrabdhiriti sukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7428: ato jñāyate sarvāsu bhūmiṣu asti sukhā vedaneti /
SA16hvsatssu:7439: tasmāt ucyate [tatra] nāsti sukhaṃ nāsti duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7440: tatra ca sukhaduḥkhe sūkṣme na pratīte staḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7441: asiśastrādi duḥkhaṃ bandhamaraṇādi daurmanasyañca nāstītyato nāsti duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7445: yaducyate triṣu dhyāneṣu sattvā ekakāyā ekanimittā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7447: yathā vadanti- yo dhyānavihārī na samyak styānamiddhauddhatyānyapanayati so 'viśuddhābha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7449: yathā ca laukikā vadanti alpalavaṇe bhojane alavaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7450: evaṃ tatra saumanalyaṃ daurmanasya ñca na pratītamito nāstītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7452: uktañca sūtre bhagavatā saṃjñāpratyayo vitarka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7453: atra saṃjñāyāṃ satyāṃ kathaṃ nāsti vitarkaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7455: [cittasya] audārikatā vitarka iti dhyānadvaye niruddha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7461: sūtra uktam- ṣaṭ cetanākāyāḥ saṃskāraskandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7464: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avaracetanā avaraprārthanā avarapraṇidhānam / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7469: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- yathāpi [bhikṣavaḥ] yavakalāpī caturmahāpathe vikṣiptā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7474: kiṃ punaridaṃ bhikṣavo bhavatāṃ manasi vipacyate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:7478: evaṃ hi sa moghapuruṣaḥ suhatataro bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7488: yatrāsmīti tatreñjitaṃ manaskṛtaṃ prapañjitaṃ spanditaṃ rāgagatam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7491: kiñcāha- yo bālo janmaprabhṛti maitrīmabhyasyati so 'kuśalaṃ karma karoti cetayate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:7494: āha ca cetanā karma cetayitvā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:7498: upālisūtre uktam- nighaṇṭo nāthaputraḥ śītodakapratikṣipta uṣṇodakapratisevī /
SA16hvsatssu:7506: sahetusapratyayasūtra uktam- aśrutavataḥ pṛthagjanasya yatprārthitaṃ tṛṣṇaiva sā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7507: mahānidānasūtra uktam- tṛṣṇāṃ pratītya paryeṣaṇā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:7508: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- duḥkhī bhūyasā sukhārthī kiṃ na prārthayate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7509: āha ca- yadā puruṣaḥ pañcakāmaguṇeṣu rajyate sa rāga eva prārthanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7510: api cāha- tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānamiti paryeṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ bhavati paścādupādānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7515: kasmāt upālisūtra uktam- asañcetanikaṃ karma na mahāsāvadyam /
SA16hvsatssu:7518: yathā vadanti ko jñānī idaṃ kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7525: yathā kañcitpraṇidadhannāha- ahamanāgate 'dhvani īdṛśaṃ kāyaṃ pratilapsya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7529: yathoktaṃsūtre- manaḥsañcetanāyā [bhikṣavaḥ] āhāre parijñāte tisrastṛṣṇāḥ parijñātā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7543: kāryaprahāṇāddhetuprahāṇamuktaṃ yaduta manaḥsañcetanāhāraprahāṇāt tisṛṇāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ prahāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7546: tṛṣṇā hi dvividhā hetubhūtā phalabhūtā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:7549: codayati / yadi hetvavasthāyāṃ tṛṣṇā phalāvasthāyāṃ cetanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7552: yo dharmo hetvavasthaḥ so 'nyaḥ phalāvastha ścānyaḥ ityato jñāyate cetanā na tṛṣṇāṅgamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7553: yathoktaṃ sahetusapratyaya sūtre mūḍhasya yatprārthitaṃ tṛṣṇaiva sā /
SA16hvsatssu:7556: yasya yasmin vastuni rāgaḥ tasya tasmin vastuni prārthanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7571: manasā cet praduṣṭhena bhāṣate vā karoti vā /
SA16hvsatssu:7581: yadā puruṣaḥ parasattvānāṃ kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:7587: ato jñāyate ekaiva cetanā nānānāmabhirucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7602: ato jñāyate asti ca caitasika dharmaḥ sparśākhya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7603: ṣaṭ ṣaṭkasūtra uktaṃ- ṣaṭa sparśakāyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7606: na punaḥ pṛthak vaktavyaṃ sa [SSS_207] prajñaptidharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7607: sūtre cāsti dvividhaḥ sparśaḥ eka trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7609: ato jñāyate dvividhayoḥ sparśayorekaḥ svarūpasan aparaḥ prajñaptisanniti /
SA16hvsatssu:7614: yathā ca bhikṣūṇāṃ samavāyo na bhikṣubhyo 'nyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7619: evaṃ sparśo 'pi na cakṣurādibhyo bhidyata iti nāstyavadyam /
SA16hvsatssu:7621: prāguktaṃ mayā [yadā] cittamālambanaṃ gṛhāti tasmin samaye sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7626: na vayaṃ svīkurmaḥ sparśo 'yaṃ dvividha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7633: ato jñāyate sa sparśo na tribhyo bhidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7634: kiñca yadi sparśaścaitasikadharmaḥ tadā anyebhyaścaitasikebhyo bhidyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:7641: yathā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇāpratyayā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7642: (u) sparśasya kiṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ yadanyacaitasikānāṃ noktaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7645: vedanādyakālīnā tṛṣṇānantarakālīnā iti vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā na tu tṛṣṇāpratyayā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7648: na tūcyata iti jñātavyaṃ nāsti vibhinnaḥ [sparśa] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7650: yathāha yo duḥkhopaghātaḥ sa āgatya janakāyaṃ spṛśatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:7654: bhagavān sūcīlomaṃ yakṣamāha- tava [SSS_208] saṃsparśaḥ pāpaka iti kāyamapanayāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7655: yathā loke vadanti sukha uṣṇasaṃsparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7667: ato jñāyate nāsti pāramārthikaḥ pṛthak caitasikadharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7668: yo dharmaḥ kāyagataḥ sa sparśa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7669: yat vedanādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ hetukriyāṃ prayacchati tasmin samaye sparśa iti nāma pradīyate //
SA16hvsatssu:7680: (pṛ) kiṃ vijñānānāṃ jñānaṃ sarvaṃ manaskārabalenotpadyate kiṃ vā na /
SA16hvsatssu:7686: kadācidālambanabalādutpadyate yathā dūrataḥ pradīpaṃ paśyan tasya kampaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:7697: kadācitsamādhibalādutpadyate yathaikatra pratibaddhacitto vijñāne prakarṣaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:7703: saukumāryādutpadyate yathā lomākṣigataṃ sat cittasya duḥkhajanakaṃ nānyatra gatam /
SA16hvsatssu:7715: ata evamāha- kasyacit cittāntarajanakamanaskāre 'sati vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7728: yathā vadanti samyak praśnaḥ samyag dūṣaṇaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:7732: [SSS_210] ato jñāyate yuktayanuyāyimanaskāraḥ tattvamanaskāra ityādayaḥ samyaṅ manaskārāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7747: kiñcāha- yadi bhikṣavo mama śāsane tīvracchandā [vartadhve] /
SA16hvsatssu:7748: tada mama śāsanaṃ suciraṃ tiṣṭhet iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7753: ayaṃ vīryasahakāriṇā prajñāsamādhiṃ sañcinotītyebhyaścaturbhyo 'bhilaṣitamṛddhyaṅgamiti nāmabhāg bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7754: āha ca- tvaṃ vihāyasā gamanaṃ chandayasi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7755: tenakhalu samayena sa bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ svādhyāyabahulo viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:7757: atha khalu tasminvanaṣaṇḍe adhivasantī devatā tasya bhikṣordharmaśṛṇvantī yena sa bhikṣuḥ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7760: kasmāt dharmapadāni tvaṃ bhikṣurnādhyepi bhikṣubhiḥ sukhaṃ vasan /
SA16hvsatssu:7761: śrutvā ca dharmaṃ labhate prasādaṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme labhate praśaṃsām // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7762: abhūt pūrvaṃ dharmapadeṣu chando yāvadvirāgeṇa samāgato 'smi /
SA16hvsatssu:7763: yato virāgeṇa samāgato 'smi yatkiñcidṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vā mataṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:7774: bhagavān yat sattvānāṃ nānādhātūn prajānāti tat dhātujñānabalam /
SA16hvsatssu:7782: ata āha- sattvānāṃ yathādhātu santānamanuvartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7793: (pṛ) tathā cet svayaṃ dharmadarśinaḥ śraddhā na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7799: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ahaṃ bhagavan asmin vastuni yathā bhagavadvacanaṃ śraddhadha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7803: tasyeyaṃ cintā bhavati sa dharmaḥ paramārthasatyo na mṛṣeti,
SA16hvsatssu:7806: tadyathā rogī pūrvaṃ bhiṣagvacane śraddadhāna auṣadhamupasevya rogānmuktaḥ paścāttasmin bhiṣaji prasannacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7811: jñānajā yathā caturṣu [avetya] prasādeṣu buddhādiṣu cittaprasādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7812: sā tridhā vibhaktā kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:7818: tathā no cet akuśalā vedanā vedanā na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7821: yā śraddhā indriyeṣu gaṇitā vimuktyanugāminī saptatriṃśabdodhipakṣikeṣu gatā sā niyamena kuśalaiva /
SA16hvsatssu:7826: tatrāmyutsāhaḥ sadā cittaikāgratāsamudācāraḥ sa vyavasāya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7828: yat caturṣu samyakpradhāneṣu antargataḥ sa kuśalaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7831: tasya paścādutpadyate vyavasāyo 'kuśalānāṃ prahāṇāya kuśalānāṃ samādānāya /
SA16hvsatssu:7840: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat ciraviprakṛṣṭānubhūtaṃ smarati na pramuṣati sā smṛtirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7854: tatra pratyutpannā prajñaiva na tu smṛtiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7855: atastathāgato [yadā] pūrvaṃ smṛtināmnā vimuktimuktavān tadā tāmeva prajñetyavocat /
SA16hvsatssu:7857: (u) smṛterdharmaṃ evaṃ yat svasantāne yo dharmaḥ [pūrva]mutpannaniruddhaḥ tameva [svasantānikaṃ] viprakṛṣṭaṃ vijñānāntaramālambata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7858: jñānānāṃ vijñānadharmaśca tathā yat vijñānāntarānumūtaṃ vijñānāntaraṃ vijānātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:7859: yathā cakṣurvijñānena vijñātaṃ rūpaṃ manovijñānaṃ vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:7867: yathā bhagavān salyakaṃ nāthaputramavocat pūrvaṃ manasi kṛtvā vyākuruṣva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7869: ato vijñaptyādidharmā api pūrvavastvanusmaraṇarūpā smṛtaya ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:7873: samādhiḥ prajñā ca samādhivarge prajñāvarge ca vakṣyate //
SA16hvsatssu:7877: yat cittaṃ vyagraṃ muharmuhurālambhakaṃ sa vitarkaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7881: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānāha- savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ prathamadhyānamupasampadya viharāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:7883: yā cittasya vyagratā kiñcitsūkṣmatā sa vicāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7890: ato 'pratyakṣavastuno 'nuvitarkaḥ samyagvitarko vā mithyāvitarko vā iti taṃ kathayāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7894: samyagvitarkaḥ yadapratilabdhaṃ tattvajñānamanumitilakṣaṇena jñānena labdhvā yogī nirvedhabhāgīyakuśalamūle vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:7898: tasminneva vitarke anena hetunā evaṃ bhavati anena hetunā naivaṃ bhavati iti cintanā vicāraṇā vā sa vicāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7914: yat kuśalasyānācaraṇaṃ mithyācaraṇaṃ vā sa pramādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7939: [anye] kecidāhuḥ trīṇi tṛṣṇā avidyā prajñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7941: avyākṛtānugaṃ cittaṃ yaddhetujaṃ sa heturavyākṛtamūlaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7944: cittasamācaraṇakāle yat kāyaścittaṃ dauṣṭhalyavigataṃ praśāntaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7948: dhyāneṣu yat sukhaduḥkhaviviktaṃ vimuktiparāyaṇaṃ cittasamācaraṇaṃ sopekṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:7957: aprāptiḥ asaṃjñisamāpattiḥ nirodhasamāpattiḥ āsaṃjñikaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ jātiḥ vyayaḥ sthitiḥ anyathātvaṃ jarā maraṇaṃ nāmakāyaḥ padakāyo vyañjanakāyaḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ ityādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7969: uktaṃ hi sūtre yaḥ puṇyaṃ pāpañca karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:7972: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- mṛtasya puṇyaṃ na praṇaśyati yaduta phalaprāpakameva /
SA16hvsatssu:7996: na hi nirudhyante pṛthagjanānāṃ cittacaitasikadharmā iti paścādvakṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8012: bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ gabhīraṃ yatpratyayānāṃ sāmagryā dharmā [SSS_220] utpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8017: kiñca vadanti jātyādayo dharmā ekakālīnā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8021: yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmin tasmin [sattvanikāye] jātiḥ skandhānāṃ pratilābhaḥ....... [sā jātiḥ] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8024: āha ca- skandhānāṃ jīrṇatā bhugnatā jareti /
SA16hvsatssu:8027: vyañjanebhya utpannaṃ nāma yathā vadanti devadatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8040: tīrthikānāṃ hi sūtreṣūktaṃ- anyo ghaṭo 'nyat ghaṭatvam /
SA16hvsatssu:8050: ato gabhīramananuvicintya vavīṣi- asti pṛthagjanatvaṃ pṛthagiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8060: śāstramāha- duḥkhasatyaṃ parisamāpya samudayasatyamidānīṃ vakṣyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8070: (u) ghaṭādi kāyikakarmaṇaḥ phalam na kāyikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:8076: (u) idaṃ kṣaṇikavarge pratyuktaṃ yadekasmin dharma utpadyamāne 'nyasyāpacaya upacayo vā [tat] kāyikaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:8077: (pṛ) tathā cet kāya eva kāyikaṃ karma bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8079: na tu kāyena kṛtaṃ kāyikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:8090: atastatsamudayo yadi vā kuśalo [yadi vā] akuśalaḥ na tu sākṣātkāyikaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8093: [SSS_223] cittabalāt śabdavyavahārasamuditaṃ karma kuśalamakuśalaṃ vācikaṃ karmetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8095: ya imaṃ sattvaṃ hanmīti adhyavasitacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8100: (u) tat dvidhā bhavati mana eva mānasaṃ karma manasa utpannaṃ vā mānasaṃ karma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8101: sattvaṃ hanmīti yadadhyavasitaṃ manaḥ tadakuśalaṃ mana eva manasaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:8112: nahyasti tatra kāraṇaṃ kevalaṃ kāyikavācikāvijñaptirevāsti na mānasikāvijñaptiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:8113: sūtre coktaṃ dvidhā karma- cetanā vā cetayitvā vā [karme]ti /
SA16hvsatssu:8115: cetayitvā [karma] trividham- cetanāsañcitaṃ karma kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:8123: (u) cittaṃ pratītyotpadyamānaṃ puṇyapāpaṃ middhamūrchādikāle 'pi yannityaṃ pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:8129: teṣāṃ divā ca rātriñca sadā puṇyaṃ pravartate // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8145: uktaṃ hi sūtre- vīryavān puruṣa āyurvaśāt bahupuṇyaṃ prasavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8150: āha ca vanādiropasya divā rātriñca sadā puṇyaṃ pravardhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8153: kathaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt puṇyaṃ sadā pravardhate,
SA16hvsatssu:8169: idānīṃ kimidaṃ rūpaṃ kiṃ vā cittaviprayuktasaṃskāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8175: [SSS_225] (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ ṣaṭ cetanākāyāḥ saṃskāraskandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8177: (u) pratipāditamidaṃ pūrvaṃ yadasti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ cittaviprayuktamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8207: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- hetukṛtaṃ karma ahetukṛtaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:8219: yadi yodhājīvo vyavaharasi na tadā gaṇayiṣyāmīti yāvat tridhā pṛcchati /
SA16hvsatssu:8220: yadyakaraṇacittapūrvakaṃ karoti- yathā kaścidviharan pādanikṣepaṇena kīṭaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8226: kṛtānupacitamiti- yathā hananādikarma kṛtvā paścāccittaṃ paritapati /
SA16hvsatssu:8230: upacitākṛtamiti- yat anyaṃ hananādi kārayitvā pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8231: anyaṃ dānādi kārayitvā ca pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8232: kṛtopacitamiti- yat hananādi pāpaṃ kṛtvā dānādipuṇyaṃ kṛtvā ca pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8233: akṛtānupacitamiti- na ca karoti nāpi muditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8235: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat karma kṛtamupacitaṃ tasya karmaṇo 'vaśyamasti vipākapratisaṃvedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8236: ataḥ kṛtopacitakarmaṇo dṛṣṭadharme vā vipāko vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8239: (pṛ) yadi hetukṛtopacitakarmaṇo 'vaśyamasti vipākapratisaṃvedanā tadā nāsti vimuktiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8248: (u) yastattvajñānaṃ na bhāvayati sa pāpakarmaṇo 'nuśayaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8264: niyatavipākaṃ karma bahu vā alpaṃ vā avaśyavedanīyavipākam /
SA16hvsatssu:8273: yathā bhagavati tacchrāvake vā satkāraḥ athavālpamātrānindā /
SA16hvsatssu:8284: yathā rājadharme gurupātakī daṇḍya eva na kṣantavyaḥ //
SA16hvsatssu:8299: dharmo dharma iti [yat] tannāstīti tasmin vadati kuśaladharmāṇāmacaritāro bahavaḥ sattvāḥ pratihanyanta ityato bhavati gurutaraṃ pāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:8303: nāsti pāpaṃ nāsti puṇyaṃ nāsti mātāpitṛsajjānānāṃ satkāravipāka iti yadvacanaṃ tadādimithyādṛṣṭirapi tadvipākaprāpiṇī /
SA16hvsatssu:8304: anyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭau pātayan bahūn sattvānakuśalāni kārayaṃśca tadvipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:8305: īdṛśamithyādṛṣṭisūtrāṇi racayanti yathā pūraṇādayo mithyādṛṣṭināmācāryāḥ samyagdṛṣṭivihiṃsayā bahūnāṃ sattvānāmakuśalāya hetupratyayaṃ prakāśayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8314: śataṃ sahasrāṇāṃ nirarbudānāṃ ṣaṭ triṃśacca pañca ca arbudānām
SA16hvsatssu:8315: yadāryagarhī nirayamupaiti vācaṃ manaḥ praṇidhāya pāpakam / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8317: guruviparītaṃ laghu yaduta tapanapratapanādiṣu hīnanarakeṣu tīryakṣu preteṣu devamanuṣyeṣu cākuśalavipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:8333: evaṃ manuṣyeṣu caturmahārājikānāmadhaḥ pratyekaṃ karmavaśādvipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:8341: [SSS_230] tato jaghanyabhūteṣu caturapramāṇacitteṣu viharan śīlasamādhipratyayavaśācca rūpadhātāvutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8346: (pṛ) puṇyakṣetraṃ kiṃ bodhyotkṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ vā prahāṇena /
SA16hvsatssu:8350: yathā bhagavān bodhyā śrāvakebhyo 'tiricyate na prahāṇena /
SA16hvsatssu:8355: ato yadbodhisattvānāṃ saṃsāre dīrghakālāvāsaḥ sa samyak prahāṇārthaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8364: āha ca- dandhānāṃ hiṃsayā kāmarāgakalahacittaṃ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:8372: tasminneva sūtra uktaṃ- tiraścāṃ dānaṃ śataguṇaṃ hitaṃ prāpayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8373: vastutastu pārāvatapakṣyādīnāṃ dānena pratilabdho vipākaḥ tīrthikānāṃ pañcābhijñānāṃ dānamatiśete /
SA16hvsatssu:8375: sūtraṃ tat bahunā hetunāha- nissaraṇārthā prajñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8383: asmin śrāmaṇere utpannānuttara [bodhi]citte tu arhanneva tatpātracīvaramādāya svayamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā tamanugacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:8390: (u) yat karma pareṣāṃ priyaṃ prayacchati tat kuśalam /
SA16hvsatssu:8395: yat pareṣāṃ duḥkhaprāpakaṃ tena pāpena bhavitavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8396: yathā āñjanauṣadhaśalyavedhāḥ pareṣāṃ duḥkhajanakāḥ pāpāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8399: yathā paradāragamanaṃ tat tasya sukhajanakaṃ tat puṇyakaramapi syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8401: yat parānukuśaladharme pravartayati tat duḥkhāya bhavati na sukhāya /
SA16hvsatssu:8406: tadannapānaṃ kadācidajīryamāṇaṃ sat puruṣasya maraṇaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8407: tadannadāyakaḥ kiṃ pāpaṃ labheta kiṃ vā puṇyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8412: (u) idaṃ pūrvameva pratyuktaṃ yadabrahmacaryaṃ niyamena akuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8421: yathā corāṇāṃ nigrahe rāṣṭraṃ nirīti bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8442: iti prāṇātipātāt kathaṃ puṇyaṃ na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8448: āha ca ca sūtram- yo yuddhe hanyate sa svarga utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8449: yathāha gāthā- mriyamāṇañca saṅgrāme patiṃ barayatepsarāḥ iti / kiñcāha-
SA16hvsatssu:8451: hanyādeva na vai pāpaṃ āhantā vindate tu tat // iti
SA16hvsatssu:8454: brāhmaṇasya ṣaḍdharmāḥ kṣatriyasya catvāro vaiśyasya trayaḥ śūdrasyaikaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8455: ṣaḍ dharmā iti yajanamārvijya madhyayatamadhyāpanaṃ dānaṃ pratigrahaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8462: kṣatriyasya prajāpālanāya prāṇivadhe puṇyameva na pāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:8463: veda uktam- prāṇivadhaḥ puṇyaprāpakaḥ yaduta vaidikamantreṇa hatāḥ paśavaḥ svarga utpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8465: kiñcāha yadvastuto martavyaṃ taddhanane nāsti pāpam- yathā pañcābhijña ṛṣirmantreṇa puruṣaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8468: ato jñāyate prāṇivadho na pāpaprāpaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8476: atrocyate / yaduktaṃ bhavatā prāṇivadhenābhīpsitalābhādasti puṇyaguṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8488: kecitsattvā api pratyarpaṇīyajīvitadhanā ityato vadhahiṃsayā yadabhīpsitaṃ tallabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8491: yathā loka āhuḥ- ayaṃ puruṣo 'lpapuṇyo bahukurvannapi na vindata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8499: yadbravīṣi sūtra uktaṃ- yo yuddhe hanyate sa svarga utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8506: yadāha bhavān- caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ pṛthak santi svadharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8509: yathā sūnakādīnāṃ lokānāṃ gṛhyadharmāḥ prāṇivadhāḥ sadā kriyamāṇā na pāpavimuktāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8512: yadi kṣatriyo rājadharmatvena prāṇān vadhyan apāpo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8514: kṣatriyaḥ paraṃ prajāsu karuṇārdracittatayā vairamutsṛjya tadadhīnaṃ puṇyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8522: yo mumūrṣuḥ sa brāhmaṇādapyupādānaṃ labhate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8523: ime duṣkarmaṇā jīvanto 'pi nocyante śīlavyasanina iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8527: (u) ukta brāhmaṇa dharma eva- cauryakāle dhanasvāmyāgatya rakṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:8535: tadā ātmahanane parahanane vā tatpāpamapi tulyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8541: corahanane 'pyevaṃ syāt duṣkarmaṇā jīvanta iti yaduktaṃ tatra duṣkarmasattvātkathaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8542: yadavocaḥ coraṃ purata āgataṃ hanyādeva na vai pāpamahantā tu vindate tat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8549: yadabravīḥ veda uktaṃ prāṇivadhaḥ puṇyaprāpaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8551: yaduktaṃ vastuto martavyasya kasyacidvadhe nāsti pāpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8564: evaṃ yaḥ parasmai dadāti tasyāpi na puṇyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8565: pratigrahītā pūrvādhvani svācaritadānakarmaka idānīṃ tadvipākaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8566: na hi sambhavati nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8567: ato jñātavyaṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvādhvakṛtavadhakarmaṇāmapi vadhitā pāpaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8573: tathā nocedṛṣayo rāgadveṣādikleśānāmudaye ṛddhe na hīyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:8576: jñātavyaṃ pūrvādhvakṛtapratyayānāmapi sattvānāṃ vadhitā pāpavān syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:8582: yadabravīḥ- kaściccittabalena prāṇātipātaṃ kurvan puṇyaṃ prasūte /
SA16hvsatssu:8588: yaḥ kuśalacittena gurutalpago brāhmaṇahantā vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8590: pārasīkādi paryantabhūmigatānāṃ janānāṃ puṇyabuddhayā mātṛbhaginyādigāmināṃ kiṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8598: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ bahavaḥ sattvā vadhādīnācaranto bhūyasā tisṛṣu gatiṣu manuṣyagatau ca duḥkhapīḍā anubhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8604: devā api sadā yuddhe 'suraiḥ saha vadhyante /
SA16hvsatssu:8617: yo vadhahiṃsādibhyo viramati sa punarlābhasukhāyuḥpauṣkalyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8620: idānīmauttarā vadanti taṇḍulaṃ svābhāvikaṃ vasanaṃ vṛkṣajam /
SA16hvsatssu:8625: ye buddhā bodhisattvāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ śrāvakā anye ca bhadantāḥ te sarve tān parityajya viramanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8640: yo dharmo 'duṣṭaḥ na sa dharmaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8642: keciddharmāḥ svarūpato 'kuśalā ityataḥ pariharanti yathā madyapānavikālabhojanādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8646: yadanena hetunā janavidviṣṭaṃ kathaṃ tadakuśalaṃ na bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8647: yaḥ prāṇātipātavirataḥ sa bahūnāṃ [SSS_237] janānāṃ priyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8651: yathā kaścidrājārthaṃ duṣṭacorāṇāṃ hantā rājapriyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8653: yathā vadanti yo duṣkarmaṇā rājacittaṃ tarpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8661: vadhādidharmāḥ tāḍanahiṃsanavandhanādīnāṃ duḥkho padravāṇāṃ hetava ityato jñāyate 'kuśalā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8664: yo na vadhyati taṃ rājā hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8665: (u) yo na hanti sa hanyata ityahantāraḥ sarve mariṣyamāṇā bhaveyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8667: yadi rājā jānāti ayamavadhacitta iti tadā avadhitā pratyuta satkriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8668: ato jñāyate vadhādayo duḥkhahetavo na tvavadhādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8679: yathā sūnako na kadāpīdṛśakarmaṇā satkāraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8683: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu hiṃsādīnāṃ vipriyaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8691: gatāgate pādotkṣepaṇe pādāvakṣepaṇe vā sadā sūkṣmasattvān vihanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8698: teṣu sattvasaṃjñāmutpādya jighatsābuddhyā tān hatvā hananapāpaṃ labhanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8700: (pṛ) yathā viṣaṃ pītavāniti hetāvahetāvubhayathā puruṣaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8701: yathā ca vahniprakramaṇaṃ jñāne 'jñāne ca puruṣaṃ dahati /
SA16hvsatssu:8703: jñātavyaṃ prāṇihiṃsā hetāvahetau ca pāpaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8711: sati tu vijñāne budhyate evamasati hetucitte na karma sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:8720: yathā mātustanagrahaṇe bālako na pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8723: puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ sarvaṃ cittādhīnaṃ jāyata iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8725: tadā vimuktilabdho 'pi asati hetau sattvān pīḍayan pāpaṃ labheta /
SA16hvsatssu:8730: yathā kaścitpuṇyaṃ karma kurvan sattvaṃ hatavānasmīti bhrānto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8733: hetāvasati puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā nāstīti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8735: tadā kathamidaṃ kuśalaṃ idamakuśalaṃ idamavyākṛtamiti vibhāgaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8737: yathā trayaḥ puruṣāḥ sambhūya stūpapradakṣiṇaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8749: yadi cittavyatiriktaṃ karmāsti asattvasaṃkhyeṣvapi puṇyapāpaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8750: yathā sabhīraṇonmūlitaparvatopadruteṣu sattveṣu samīraṇe pāpaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8754: tīrthikā vadanti- upavāsasthaṇḍilaśayanaśalākāvedhādibhirjalapatanadahanapraveśa [SSS_239] bhṛgupatanādibhiśca duḥkhapratyayaiḥ puṇyaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8756: tathā cennārakāḥ sattvāḥ sadā dahyante pacyante ca /
SA16hvsatssu:8763: avaśyaṃ hetucittena tadduḥkhamanubhavatāṃ puṇyaṃ bhavati natvahetucittena /
SA16hvsatssu:8771: yadi hetucittaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:8779: vastutastu santi brahmakāyikādīnāṃ surucirāḥ kāyā ato jñāyate na hetuṃ vinā puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8783: pariśuddhena cittena bhojane na punarasti pāpamiti śrutaṃ dṛṣṭavānasi /
SA16hvsatssu:8784: tadā cittaṃ vinā nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8788: tathā no cet sarve prāṇivadhāḥ puṇyaprāpakāḥ pāpaprāpakā vā syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8794: ato jñāyate yo hetuṃ vinānyasya viṣaṃ prayacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:8810: yaḥ [SSS_240] prājñaḥ sa pañcakāmaguṇeṣu vasannapi na pāpamāk bhavatīti manaso balam /
SA16hvsatssu:8812: na hi prājño rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mithyāsaṃjñāmutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8817: tathā ca mānasaṃ karma niṣprayojanaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8832: annavastrābhyāṃ paramupakurvatā tasmin samaye puṇyaṃ labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8839: anyapuruṣe ca duṣṭacittamātramutpādayati na kāyavākkarma karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:8853: ato jñāyate ātmārthatā na puṇyavatī syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:8860: tat bhagavadguṇāḥ sattveṣu pūjyā iti smṛtvā janāḥ secante śodhayanti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:8863: uktañca sūtre- na tathāgataḥ san nāsan,
SA16hvsatssu:8864: nāpi sadasat nāpi ca na san nāsan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8867: tadā anirvṛtakālīnaṃ bhagavantaṃ smṛtvā pūjayantaḥ puṇyaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:8868: yathā janāḥ pitarau jananapoṣaṇakālaṃ smṛtvā yajanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8869: tathā no cet na pitṛpūjā bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8885: yathā ca vastradānaṃ yadyapi paraṃ hāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8887: tathā ca vastradānenāpi na puṇyaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8889: yathoktaṃ sūtre- eko bhikṣuḥ snānagṛhe anyasya dehaṃ hastena mārjayati sma /
SA16hvsatssu:8894: yadbhavānāha- na ca cittamātreṇa puṇyaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8896: yat kaścitparasyopakāraṃ cakāra karoti kariṣyati vā sarvaṃ tat kuśalacittamūlakam /
SA16hvsatssu:8897: yacca parasyāpakāraṃ cakāra karoti kariṣyati vā sarvaṃ tadakuśalacittamūlakam /
SA16hvsatssu:8898: karuṇācārī ca karuṇācittavipākena sarveṣāmupakaroti yaduta caṇḍavātavṛṣṭyanupatane 'pi sūryācandramasau nakṣatrāṇi ca na bhraśyanti sadā caranti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:8903: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadi sarve lokāḥ karuṇācittamācaranti /
SA16hvsatssu:8908: tatpratyayena apakarṣakaraṇe 'karaṇe vā sarvathā tadādhipatyena pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8909: bhagavati piḍājananānna pāpamastīti bhavato yadi matam /
SA16hvsatssu:8916: akuśalacittavattvāt tasmin śṛṇvati aśṛṇvati vāvaśyaṃ duḥkhaṃ janayet /
SA16hvsatssu:8921: yadi paraprabodhito jānāti tadā tasyāvaśyaṃ duḥkhopāyāso jāyeta eva /
SA16hvsatssu:8923: tadā [svāmī] prabudhya yadyapi na jānāti tathāpi tasya [paścāt] pīḍāṃ karotyeva /
SA16hvsatssu:8930: tathā ca sarve sattvāḥ sadā pāpaṃ labheran yathā parapīḍanā janāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8933: ato na svadehamātrātpuṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāstīti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8934: mārgahetutvādvinaye śīlamidaṃ paribaddhaṃ yaḥ kliṣṭacittenātmānaṃ hanti na saṃkleśātpāpaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8936: yatkarma na kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā na parasattvānāmupakārakaṃ nāpakārakaṃ tadavyākṛtamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8939: yatkarma na kuśalaṃ nākuśalaṃ tadavyākṛtamiti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8951: (u) bhagavānāha- dvidhā vipākaḥ mithyākāyacaryā apriyavipākaprāpiṇī samyakkāyacaryā priyavipākaprāpiṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8960: bhagavānāha- trīṇi duścaritāni kāyaduścaritaṃ vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8969: pāpamidaṃ svakāyenāpi kriyate yatra svakāyena sattvān hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8970: vācāpi kriyate yatna sattvān hantuṃ paramājñāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8971: manasāpi kriyate yat kaściccittamutpādayati yena paro mriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8975: kadāciccittotpāde paro jānāti anena pratyayenāpi pāpakaraṃ prāṇātipātādi kuryāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:8980: yat kenacitpraśne sthāpite taṃ purata eva vañcayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8989: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- sarvāṇi duścaritāni apriyavipākakarāṇi sucaritāni priyavipākakarāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8991: yathaikameva rūpaṃ [kasyacit] priyaṃ bhavati [anyasyā] priyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9005: (pṛ) samyak caritāni priyavipākakarāṇīti sūtra uktvā kasmātpunarucyate sucaritapratyayaṃ svarga utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9008: ataḥ sūtre punarucyate sucaritapratyayaṃ svarga upapadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9009: duścaritasucarite kuśalākuśalagatikakāyaṃ prāpayataḥ gṛhītakāyastatra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā [SSS_244] vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9011: sucaritapratyayaṃ deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā sukhaṃ vedayate //
SA16hvsatssu:9020: yadvandanavastradānādi kuśalaṃ kāyikaṃ karma tat kāyasucaritam /
SA16hvsatssu:9028: anye 'pi śīlasaṃvarasaṅgṛhītaṃ sucaritaṃ labhante yathā daśavarṣāyuṣkasya puruṣasya prāṇātipātaviratisamādānādviṃśativarṣāyuṣkaḥ putra utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9031: (u) ābhidhārmikā āhuḥ- pṛthagjanānāṃ yat kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ kuśalaṃ karma tat sucaritamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9036: kecidāhuḥ- imāni trīṇi caritāni ekasyaivārthasyavibhinnāni nāmāni /
SA16hvsatssu:9042: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- cittameva vyupaśamacaritaṃ na cetaneti /
SA16hvsatssu:9048: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃṃ- sucaritadṛṣṭisampanno devadṛśo vā bhavati devasaṃkhyātadṛśo vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9052: sucarītaśālī yadyapi nāvaśyaṃ deveṣūtpadyate tathāpi ya āryabahumatasthāna utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9056: yat samyaṅmithyāvyāmiśraṃ sucaritaṃ [tatra] mithyācaritasya prābalyānna deveṣūtpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:9057: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānānandamavocat- paśyāmyahaṃ kecana trīṇi suritāni caranto 'pi durgatāvutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:9059: idānīṃ sucaritasyāpi aparipūrṇatvānmaraṇa upasthite mithyādṛṣṭeścittābhimukhyāddargatau patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9065: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trividhaṃ karma kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma rūpadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma arūpyadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:9067: (u) yat karma ānarakādāca paranirmitavaśavartidevādantarāle vipākavedakaṃ tatkāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9070: (pṛ) avyākṛtaṃ karma aniyatavipākañca karma kimeteṣu nāntargatam /
SA16hvsatssu:9077: (pṛ) tathā cedidaṃ tīrthikaśāstraṃ yaduta sarvapratisaṃvedyaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhañca pūrvakarmahetupratyayaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9078: pūrvakarmavipāko yaduta kuśalamakuśalaṃ karma savipākamavipākamiti vyavasāyaguṇasya nāsti yatkiñcanaprayojanam /
SA16hvsatssu:9081: yasya [SSS_246] kleśāḥ karmāṇi karmavipākāśca santi tasya vimuktirnāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:9086: tīrthikā hi vadanti sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ paratvamaparatvaṃ pūrvavipākamātramiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9088: paśyāmastu vastutaḥ padārthāḥ pratyutpannebhyaḥ pratyayebhyaḥ samutpadyante yathā bījāṅkurādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9106: tatra bījādaṅkura utpadyate na tu tuṣādibhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9108: yaduktaṃ bhavatā prayāse na guṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9116: tadyathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:9118: kiñca ya utpannā dharmāḥ sarve te karmamūlakāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9131: purā kila janāḥ kuśalamācaritavanta ityataḥ śālitaṇḍulāḥ svata ajāyanta /
SA16hvsatssu:9132: ato jñāyate karmabhūlakatvāt māṣānmāṣo jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9135: sarvasattvānāṃ sādhāraṇakarmavipāko yaduta [SSS_247] caṅkramaṇāsthānakarmapratyayalābhāt kṣityādayo bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9136: prakāśakarmapratyayalābhāccandrasūryādayo bhavanti iti jñātavyaṃ janyaṃ vastu sarvaṃ karmamūlakamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9146: uktaṃ hi sūtre- asti aprasaṃyuktā vedeneti /
SA16hvsatssu:9152: (u) yaḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣu daśākuśalakarmāṇi samutpādayati sa kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9160: uktaṃ hi sūtre bhagavatā- mithyādṛṣṭirduḥkhakleśānāṃ heturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9162: yathā tiktakāravelle vidyamānāni catvāri mahābhūtāni sarvāṇi tiktarasāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9166: yathā bako brahmā brahmāṇamāmantrayāha- mopagaccha śramaṇaṃ gautamam /
SA16hvsatssu:9169: anye 'pi brahma [kāyikā] devāḥ tatra bhavantaṃ tādṛśaṃ puruṣaṃ dūṣayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9176: (u) yadīdamakuśalaṃ karma tadā kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayata ityataḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:9185: (pṛ) kathaṃ tatra samutpāditaṃ kuśalaṃ karma kāmadhātuvedanīyavipākaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:9187: tathā tatra vikṣiptacittasamutpāditakuśalakarmaṇo 'smin loke vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9188: yathā ca rūpārūpyadhātusamutpāditākuśalakarmaṇaḥ kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9190: (pṛ) yo rūpārūpyadhātugataḥ na sa utpādayati kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9191_0: (u) tatra nāstyayaṃ hetuḥ yat kāmadhātugato rūpārūpya[pratisaṃyuktaṃ] kuśalaṃ karmaiva
SA16hvsatssu:9191_1: samutpādayati na rūpārūpyadhātugataḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma samutpādayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9192: ucyate ca yuṣmābhiḥ kāmadhātugataḥ kāmadhātukamavyākṛtaṃ cittaṃ samutpādayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9195: sūtre bhagavān hastakadevaputrametadavocat- cittaviharaṇe audārikavedanāsaṃjñāṃ manasikuru iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9197: ayaṃ kuśalacittena yat dharmaṃ śṛṇoti buddhaṃ pūjayati tat sarvaṃ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ cittam /
SA16hvsatssu:9198: tathā no cet audārikasaṃjñeti nākhyā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9200: yathāha bhagavān triṣu vastuṣu atṛpto 'smin loke āyuṣo 'nte 'navataptadeveṣūpapatsye yaduta tathāgataṃ paśyāmi dharmaṃ śṛṇomi saṅghaṃ satkaromīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9218: (pṛ) kimetāni trīṇi karmāṇi niyatavipākāni niyatakālāni ca /
SA16hvsatssu:9224: tathā cet pañcānantaryāṇi niyatavipākānīti na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9231: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākaṃ karma nāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharma eva vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9232: vedyate cet dṛṣṭadharma eva vedanīyaṃ syāt nānyatra /
SA16hvsatssu:9235: (u) kecidāhuḥ- vyādhyarthakarmaṇo dṛṣṭadharma eva vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9236: yathā tathāgata āryeṣu mātāpitrādiṣu samutpāditaṃ yat kuśalamakuśalaṃ karma tat dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākam /
SA16hvsatssu:9240: yathā cakravartinaḥ karma bodhisattvasya vā karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9241: kecidāhuḥ- trividhakarmaṇāmeṣāṃ yathāpraṇidhānaṃ vipākaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9244: yathā mallikādevī svānnabhāgadānena praṇidadhāti dṛṣṭa evādhvani rājamahiṣī bhaveyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9249: (pṛ) yasmin kṣaṇe karmotpadyate tatsamanantarakṣaṇa eva kiṃ vipāko vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9255: yo garbhamadhyastho ye ca middhonmattādayaḥ te karma sañcinvanti na vā (u)
SA16hvsatssu:9258: (pṛ) yo 'syāṃ bhūmau vītarāgaḥ sa pṛthivīkarma karoti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9267: uktañca sūtre- prahīṇapuṇyapāpakarmako 'rhanniti sa nopacinoti puṇyakarmāṇi apuṇyakarmāṇyāneñjyakarmāṇi ca /
SA16hvsatssu:9268: ato vedanāparyavasannaṃ karmeti na nūtnaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:9272: sūtre hyuktaṃ- sa karmāṇi vidhvasya na sañcinoti nopacinoti niruddhaṃ na tathā bhavati ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:9277: aniyataṃ karma kimasti kiṃ vā nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:9279: yat karma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākaṃ vā upapadyavedanīyavipākaṃ vā tadūrdhvavedanīyavipākaṃ vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9284: (u) ya imāni trividhakarmāṇi vivecayati sa samyagdṛṣṭimutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:9288: udāsīnasya kadācinmithyādṛṣṭirbhavet yaduta kuśalasyākuśalasya vā nāsti vipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9292: pāpo 'pi paśyati bhadrāṇi yāvatpāpaṃ na pacyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9293: yadā ca pacyate pāpamatha pāpo pāpāni paśyati //
SA16hvsatssu:9294: bhadro 'pi paśyati pāpāni yāvadbhadraṃ na pacyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9295: yadā ca pacyate bhadramatha bhadro bhadrāṇi paśyati //
SA16hvsatssu:9298: yaḥ pūrvādhvani puṇyavān san āyuṣo 'nte prabalakuśalacittamutpādayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9300: ata eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prajānīyāt //
SA16hvsatssu:9321: hetau phalopacāraḥ yathānnasya dātā pañcārthānāṃ dāteti /
SA16hvsatssu:9350: tatra saumanasyamapi saṃjñāvikalpādutpadyata iti na vipākaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9359: tacca daurmanasyaṃ jñānapraheyaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhamapi pariharati /
SA16hvsatssu:9360: daurmanasya triṣvadhvasu kleśaṃ janayati yaduta pūrvamahaṃ duḥkhī idānīṃ duḥkhī āyatyāñca duḥkhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9367: yathā ca rogī kaścit [roga]duḥkhābhihataḥ punaḥ kāyacittapīḍanayātyadhikadaurmanasyopāyāso bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9375: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān [SSS_253] prasenajitaṃ rājānamapṛcchat- api tvaṃ [mahārāja] kāśīkosaleṣu priyo 'si iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9376: uktañca- devā rūpāsaktā rūpakāmāḥ rūpe vinaṣṭe daurmanasyajātā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9383: bahavaśca sattvā daurmanasyakaraṃ parān sampīḍayantaḥ sadaurmanasyasampīḍanavipākaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:9386: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- vītarāgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttatvānna vipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9389: narakādivipāko na vipāka iti kiṃ sambhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:9390: ato na sambhavati vītarāgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttamavipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9401: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trīṇyāvaraṇāni karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ vipākāvaraṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9407: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo 'yaṃ puruṣo nitayaṃ samāpattau vedanīyavipākaṃ karmopacinoti na sa supade 'vatarati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9410: yat kasyacit kleśā anivāryāḥ tadyathā ṣaṇḍādīnāṃ kāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9412: yannarakādau pāpākuśalopapattyāyatane yathopapattyāyanañca na mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:9415: (pṛ) kecit pūrvaṃ vidyāvihīnebhyaḥ pūrvapuruṣebhyo na prajānanti idaṃ kuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9416: tadā te na dadanti yat sa yadi matto dānaṃ labdhvā akuśalāni karoti tadā ahaṃ bhāgī syāmiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9432: kūṭamānādayaḥ kuhanāyāḥ pratyayāḥ iti kretāraḥ pāpinaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9433: pratigrahītā dānasya pratyaya iti puṇyabhāk syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9434: ye kūpataṭākādyupabhoktāraḥ te sarve puṇyabhājaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9435: tathā ca svasya puṇyaṃ na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9445: bhūyasā te trividhaviṣakaluṣitacittāḥ pañcakāmaguṇāsaktā na vyavasyanti kuśalabhāvanām /
SA16hvsatssu:9447: brāhmaṇādaya ātmānaṃ sujanabhāvitadharmacaya iti kīrtayanto na samyak paśyanti samāpatticittasamādhānāni dharmān /
SA16hvsatssu:9449: ato dātā avītarāgāya dadan pāpabāhulyaṃ labheta /
SA16hvsatssu:9450: janāḥ pitṝn pūjayantaḥ putrabhāryābandhūn samārādhayantaḥ [yadi] jñātvā vijānanti sarve pāpaṃ prāpayeyuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:9468: ghanikatvahetoḥ kṛtānāṃ pāpānāmapi dātā bhāgī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9469: tathā ca brāhmaṇā na dānaṃ pratigṛhṇīyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9471: idānīntu brāhmaṇāḥ kevalaṃ pratigṛhṇanti na prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9472: ato jñāyate sa duṣṭaḥ panthā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9473: [SSS_255] yathā ca rājāno yathādharmaṃ prajāḥ pālayantaḥ pāpino 'pi syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9484: avītarāga āsvādābhiniviṣṭa ityato dātā pāpī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9486: tvadannaṃ bhuktvā nākuśalaṃ kariṣyāmīti bhoktāraṃ sadā pratijñāpya paścāddāsyati /
SA16hvsatssu:9488: (pṛ) nanu sūtre 'pyuktam- yadi bhikṣurdānapaterannaṃ bhuktvā cīvarañca paridhāyāpramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati tatpratyayāt sa dānapatirapramāṇapuṇyaṃ prasūta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9489: tatpratyayena puṇyalābhī cet kathaṃ na pāpabhāk bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9490: (u) yadi sa bhikṣurdānapaterannaṃ bhuktvā cīvarañca paridhāyāpramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:9497: na tu pratigrahītuḥ puṇye pāpe vā dātā bhāgaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:9498: ato na tatpuṇyapāpapratyayena dātā puṇyapāpabhāk bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9500: tathāpi svaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā svakṛtatrividhakarmāpekṣya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9504: (u) tathā cet pravrajinaḥ śīlādin dhṛtvā sapuṇyo bhavatīdamupekṣitaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9511: tāni hi karmāṇi hetukāla eva vāryāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:9513: ato buddhā [bhagavanto] hetukāla eva vinayāya dharmamupadiśanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9534: yena karmaṇā savyābādhye loke yathāvaivartinaraka upapadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9535: anyatra ca savyābādhye 'kuśala vipākāyatane samupapadyate yadi vā tiryañca ekatyāḥ pretā vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9537: yena karmaṇā avyābādhye loka upapadyate yathā rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ kāmadhātau ca devā manuṣyā ekatyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9539: yena karmaṇā samutpadyate savyābādhye 'vyābādhye ca loke yadi vā tiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyā ekatyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9541: yat karmalokadvayavigarhitaṃ iha vigarhitamamutra ca vigarhitam /
SA16hvsatssu:9542: tat pāpaṃ karma puruṣaḥ kṛtvā tamasi patitaḥ san na yaśaḥ śrutavān bhavatīti kṛṣṇamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9549: akuśalakriyā ca gurujaneṣu yanmātāpitṛṣu anyeṣu sajjaneṣu ca /
SA16hvsatssu:9550: sattvānāmahitaṃ kṛtvā na kiñcidapi kṛpāṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:9551: yathā sattvān hanti samastaṃ taddhanaṃ vāpaharati /
SA16hvsatssu:9567: tṛtīyaṃ karma durbalaṃ kuśalākuśalavyāmiśratvāt tadvipākaṃ yugapatpratisaṃvedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9570: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- yadakuśalaṃ karma durgatau vipākapratisaṃvedakaṃ tadādyaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9572: yat kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu vyāmiśravipākapratisaṃvedakaṃ tat tṛtīyaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9579: sa savyābādhyaṃ kāyasaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhyaṃ vāksaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhyaṃ manaḥsaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhye loke utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9580: tatra savyābādhye loka utpannaṃ santaṃ savyābādhyāḥ sparśāḥ spṛśanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9581: ato jñāyate yat sattvānāṃ kṛṣṇaduḥkhalokotpādakaṃ tadādyaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:9584: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhināṃ manuṣyāṇāmapi santi ṣaṭ sparśā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9585: devamanuṣyairanubhūyamānā viṣayā yena amanorūpā na bhavanti tat dvitīyaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9608: loke ślādhyataraṃ sāsravaṃ kuśalaṃ karma śuklamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9617: yadi dṛṣṭa eva dharme vedyate tadā savyābādhavipāko laghurbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9618: tasya gurutvātkrameṇa kṣipraṃ vā avaivartike narake patati /
SA16hvsatssu:9619: trīṇyānantaryāṇi puṇyakṣetraguṇagauravādānantaryāṇītyucyante yaduta saṅghabhedaḥ tathāgataśarīre duṣṭacittena lohitotpādanamarhadvadhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9624: (pṛ) anyeṣāmāryajanānāṃ vadha ānantaryaṃ labhate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9627: yastathāgataṃ tāḍayati na tu lohitamutpādayati sa gurutaraṃ pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:9632: tadā ekasminneva kāye vipākavedanā kṣīyate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9636: (u) yadyadharmamadharmato jñātvā imaṃ dharmaṃ dharmato jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:9640: yat kaścit buddhātsaṅghaṃ prabhidya ātmānaṃ praśaṃsati mahān śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pūjya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9649: kecidāhuḥ imāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni pūrvādhvani parān vighnayantaḥ kuśalamūlamārgalabdhāstatpratyayamidānīṃ tadvipākaṃ vindanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9680: ato madyapānaṃ yaḥ śāsti sa pāpāṅgaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:9695: (u) narakavedanīyavipākaṃ karmeti [SSS_260] yathā ṣaṭpādābhidharme lokaprajñaptau vistṛtam /
SA16hvsatssu:9697: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaḥ prāṇātipātanirataḥ sa naraka utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9703: bhavāṃstu kevalamāha narakeṣu manuṣyeṣu votpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9704: idānīṃ viśiṣya vaktavyaṃ kiṃ karma narakavipākamātravedakamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9710: śīlabhedinā dṛṣṭibhedinā ca kṛtamakuśalaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9717: yathā kaścidakuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā paścātprīyā praśaṃsan na parityaktumicchati /
SA16hvsatssu:9726: akuśalasvabhāvena janena kṛtaṃ pāpakarma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9728: sadākuśala karmacāriṇā kṛtamakuśalaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9733: yaḥ kāyena śīlaṃ manasā ca prajñāṃ nābhyasyati /
SA16hvsatssu:9746: sa gurukaṃ pāpakarma kṛtvā narakavipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9747: yaḥ pāpaṃ kṛtvā na kuśalaṃ pratiśrayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9754: sa duṣparipācanamāhāraṃ bhuṅktvā na paripaktuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:9756: yathā kaściccauryaṃ kṛtvā laghutaraṃ gurutaraṃ vā badhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9757: yaḥ sarvakuśalamūlaviviktaḥ yathā hastinā yudhyamānaḥ [tasya] hastaṃ na parirakṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:9765: gaṇḍasyāntaḥ srāvavat pāpasya mrakṣaṇe narakaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9766: yo dīrghakālaṃ cittagatamakuśalaṃ na sahasā niyacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:9768: yathā cikitsāyai dattaṃ viṣameva puruṣaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9771: yathā rāṣṭrapālā bahavo vijñāḥ pūrṇādivadakuśalamithyācāramācarantonyānyapi bahūn śikṣayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9772: yacca kṛtaṃ karma bhūyasā sattvānāṃ byābādhāya bhavati yathā vanadāhādi /
SA16hvsatssu:9773: bahūnāṃ śāsanaṃ yena adharme te patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9780: karoti sa tathātmānaṃ yathainaṃ icchanti dviṣaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9788: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dveṣaḥ pāpīyānapi sunigraha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9790: yat hetupratyayaiḥ pāpaṃ karma karoti tadaṇīyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9791: yaḥ pramādāya vyutsṛṣṭaḥ tena kṛtamaśubhaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9792: yo vijñaiḥ paripālito bhavati sa deveṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9796: [SSS_262] śāriputraprabhāsvaramāhātmyamavalokyācintayat ayaṃ mahātmā na hantavya iti viśuddhacittena saptakṛtvaḥ śāriputramūrdhvamadho vyavālokayat /
SA16hvsatssu:9800: yathā cāṅgulimālaḥ pāpakaṃ karma bahukṛtvā mātara[mapi]hantumaicchat /
SA16hvsatssu:9801: bhagavān tatkuśalābhijñatvāt tasya vimuktiṃ prāpayati sma /
SA16hvsatssu:9804: evamādayaḥ puruṣāḥ akuśalakarmakā api na narake patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9805: ata uktaṃ yaḥ pramādāya vyusṛṣṭaḥ tena kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ karma narakāya bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9809: yaḥ kuśalaṃ kartumagaṇayan mriyamāṇo durutpādakuśalacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9812: sa pūrvākuśalahetukaṃ mithyādṛṣṭi pratyayañca narake patati /
SA16hvsatssu:9816: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāvocat- yān sattvān paśyatha kāyikamithyācārān vācikamithyācārān mānasikamithyācārān tān jānīta narakaprekṣakāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:9833: yathā kaścitkarmavipākamajñātvā śraddhayā ca nānāvākkarma tathā karoti yathā vadanti ayaṃ puruṣo markaṭavadaticapala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9848: evamādyakuśalaṃ vācikaṃ karma kṛtvā yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9851: yo nāgagaruḍādīnāṃ śaktibalaṃ śrutvā praṇidadhāti sa tatrotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9852: uktañca sūtre- yo nibiḍasthāne mriyamāṇaḥ praṇidadhāti vipulaṃ sthānaṃ labha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9854: yaḥ paritarṣito mriyate sa jalārthitayā jaleṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9856: vyomāhāt laghu karmāṇi kurvan vyāmiśrakuśalatvāt makṣikālīkṣākṛmikīṭādiṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9857: yaḥ parānupadiśan asaddharme pātayati so 'vidvatpada utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9881: sa kṛpaṇaḥ yācanāṃ kurvati kasmiṃścit nāstīti vadan anṛtavāditvātpreteṣu patati /
SA16hvsatssu:9885: kadaryo 'yaṃ dānacāriṇaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ dānapatiṃ dvipyati /
SA16hvsatssu:9887: cirādārabhya kadaryacittavāsanayā na svayaṃ dadāti paramapi niṣedhati /
SA16hvsatssu:9888: yatkiñcidasti vihāre saṅghadravyaṃ yajñe ca brāhmaṇadravyam /
SA16hvsatssu:9889: [SSS_264] tat kaścit svayaṃ kevalamabhilaṣati na parasya dātumicchati /
SA16hvsatssu:9893: yo dānapuṇyavigataḥ sa tadupapattyāyatane vipākālābhī tato yācakādhikṣepakarmaṇo duḥkhaṃ tatraivānubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9894: ayaṃ kṛpaṇaḥ kṣuttṛṣṇārditaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nirdayacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9942: yaḥ pitroḥ pūjyānāñca satkāre svabhiruciko bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9945: manuṣyeṣu ca yo viśuddhakarmapratyayaḥ sa uttara[kuruṣū]tpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9948: yaḥ śuklakarma samyagācaran parānapīḍayitvā dhanamādatte dānāya nābhiṣvaṅgāya /
SA16hvsatssu:9949: svayañca śīlamācaran na pūrvāparaparivāreṣu śīlaṃ bhedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:9959: manuṣyeṣūktavat praṇidhānahetunā ca viśrutadeveṣu sukhavedanāpratyayaṃ kṛtakuśalakarmakāḥ sarve tatra janmagatiṃ praṇidadhati /
SA16hvsatssu:9960: yathoktaṃ- aṣṭapuṇyasargasthāne yaḥ karuṇāmuditopekṣāsu viharati sa utpadyate brahmaloke yāvadbhavāgram /
SA16hvsatssu:9964: yasya samyak prahīṇāni sa viśuddhataraprabho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9972: idaṃ karma narakeṣu preteṣu tiryakṣu deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9973: (pṛ) anyāsu catasṛṣu gatiṣu kuśalakarmavipāko vedayituṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9976: yathā [kaści]darcirnarakādvimukto dūrato vanaṣaṇḍaṃ dṛṣṭvā muditacitta āśu tasmin vane praviśati /
SA16hvsatssu:9977: śītavātakampite tasmin vane [yāvat] asitomarāṇi na patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9979: athavā kṣāranadīṃ dṛṣṭvā idaṃ prasannasalilamiti drutagati pradhāvya muhūrtaṃ sukhabhāgbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9986: ya eṣāṃ saptānāṃ vastunāṃ samagro vā asamagro bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9996: kecidāhuḥ- rājānaḥ pratipakṣiṇo rājñaḥ śāsanāvasare etadakuśalasaṃvarasamanvitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10004: (pṛ) kiṃ vadhitasattvāt saṃvaramimaṃ labhate kiṃ vā sarvasattvebhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10006: yathā kaścit śīladhārī sarvasattvebhyaḥ śīlasaṃvaraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10032: yo bhikṣuḥ parāvṛttendriyaḥ na sa vinaṣṭasaṃvaro bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10034: (pṛ) pañcasu gatiṣu kasyāṃ gatau sattvā akuśalasaṃvarasamanvitā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10036: kecidāhuḥ- [tathā nocet] siṃhavyāghrādayaḥ sadā duṣkarmaṇopajīvino 'pi samanvitāḥ syuriti //
SA16hvsatssu:10040: (pṛ) asattvākhyebhya imaṃ kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10043: kuśalasaṃvaro 'yaṃ trividhaḥ- śīlasaṃvaro dhyānasaṃvaraḥ samādhisaṃvara iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10046: ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- asti punaḥ prahāṇasaṃvaro yaduta kāmadhātuvīta[rāgaḥ] tasmin kāle kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10049: (pṛ) tīrthikā imaṃ śīlasaṃvaraṃ labhante na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10052: ācāryaḥ śīlamupadiśati adyaprabhṛti prāṇātipātādipāpaṃ mā kuryā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10053: (pṛ) anyāsu gatiṣu imaṃ śīlasavaraṃ labhante na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10054: (u) uktaṃ hi sūtre- nāgādayo 'pi dinamekaṃ śīlamupādadate /
SA16hvsatssu:10069: (pṛ) asti ca pratiṣedho vinaye pātakinīcavṛttikabhikṣuṇīdūṣakādayo na bhikṣucaryāṃ śṛṇvanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10077: (pṛ) kiṃ vadhyādisattvebhyaḥ kiṃ kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate kiṃ vā sarvasattvebhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10079: tathā no cet saṃvaraḥ prādeśikaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:10081: ayaṃ tu saṃvara upacīyamāno 'pacīyamāno nirgranthaputradharmasamaśca yaduta śatayojaneṣvantaḥ prāṇātipātādibhyo viratiḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10083: ya āha asya puruṣasya vadhādviramāmi na tasya puruṣasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:10094: ekāhorātraṃ vā ekadinamātraṃ vā ekarātrimātraṃ vā ardhadinamātraṃ vā ardharātraṃ vā yathaśakti kālaṃ svīkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:10096: ya āha- āhamekamāsamātraṃ māsadvitayamātraṃ vā ekavatsaramātraṃ vā [śīlaṃ samādada iti] /
SA16hvsatssu:10099: (pṛ) yaḥ kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate sa punaḥ saṃvarādbhraśyati na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10102: (pṛ) kiṃ pratyutpannasattvebhyaḥ śīlasaṃvaraṃ labhate kiṃ vā traikālikasattvebhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10104: yathā [SSS_269] kaścidatītān pūjyān pūjayitvāpi puṇyaguṇo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10111: yathaikasya puruṣasya tathā sarvasattvānāṃ samantādapi pratikṣaṇaṃ sadā pratilābhādapramāṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10131: yasmādayaṃ śīlasaṃvaraḥ sarvasattveṣu sadā pratikṣaṇaṃ labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10132: tasmāducyate catvāro ratnākarā nārhanti ṣoḍaśīṃ kalāṃ dinamekaṃ saṃvarasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:10146: tadā sampīḍanīyasattvebhya eva kuśalasaṃvaro labhyeta ityayamasti doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10161: avadātavasanānāṃ kuśaladharmo bhūyasā hīnaḥ mārgasya kāraṇatāmātraṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:10165: kecidāhuḥ- eme dharmā ekamupavāsadinaṃ rātriñca bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10167: bahvalpaṃ śīlaṃ yathā [balaṃ] upādāya ardhadinaṃ vā yāvadekaṃ māsaṃ vā sambhavatīti ko doṣo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:10170: asatyanyasmin manasā smaran vācā vadati- ahamaṣṭaśīlāni dhārayāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10177: ya idṛśopavāsasamarthaḥ tasya catvāro mahāratnākarā naikāmapi kalāmarhanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10180: bhagavān taṃ vigarhya [avocat]- yaḥkṣīṇāsravaḥ tena hīyaṃ gāthā vaktavyā / yathoktam-
SA16hvsatssu:10182: sa pumān puṇyamāpnoti mayā ca sadṛśo bhavet // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10183: yo dinamupavasati sa upavāsapuṇyamupabhuñjānaḥ śakratulyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10190: (pṛ) āryaścaka vartī rājā upavāsadharmasamādānamabhilaṣati [cet] kastaṃ samādāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:10191: (u) bhadantā brahmā devā bhagaddraṣṭārastaṃ śāsayitvā grāhayeyuḥ //
SA16hvsatssu:10198: adṛṣṭvā adrākṣamiti van [vyavahāre] pṛṣṭo vadati nādrākṣamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:10199: dṛṣṭvā nādrākṣamiti brūvan pṛṣṭo vadati- adrākṣamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:10204: dṛṣṭvā nādrākṣamiti brūvan pṛṣṭho vadati nādrākṣamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:10205: adṛṣṭvā adrākṣamiti bruvan pṛṣṭho vadati adrākṣamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:10224: navavidhaṃ karma- kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma trividhaṃ vijñaptiravijñaptirnavijñapti nāvijñaptiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:10234: tasmādyanmanasā praṇidhāya paścātkāya[kṛtaṃ] tanmānasaṃ karmāpi cetanetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10238: (pṛ) avijñapteḥ kāyajātāyā api kiṃ tāratamyavibhāgo bhaviṣyati na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10284: yathā puṣpaṃ tilaṃ vāsayati na tṛṇavṛkṣādi /
SA16hvsatssu:10296: yaduktaṃ bhavatā na tatra vitarkavicārau sta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10298: (pṛ) āryā aparyavasannasaṃyojanaprahāṇā vijñaptikarma kurvanti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10300: (pṛ) śvādīnāṃ sattvānāṃ [vāg]dhvaniḥ vākkarma bhavati na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10302: yadi vā vyaktalakṣaṇaṃ yadi vāhvānaṃ yadi vā veṇvādi sarvaṃ [tat] vākkarmetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10305: ataḥ puruṣāḥ svakāyikaṃ karma paśyanti svavācikaṃ karma śṛṇvanti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:10306: manovijñānasamutpannaṃ karma santatyāvicchinnaṃ sat svayaṃ paśyanti śṛṇvanti ca //
SA16hvsatssu:10314: (u) pañcaskandhāḥ pratikṣaṇavināśino 'pi punaḥ punaḥ santatyā samutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:10322: atha vā dṛḍhāsinābhihatya sahasā sattvān hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10334: adattādānamiti yadvastu yatpuruṣasambandhī tat tasmātpuruṣāccauryeṇa gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:10346: bhūmāvupari gataṃ dravyaṃ paraṃ rājasambandhi syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:10348: anāthapiṇḍadādaya āryā api hīdaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhṇanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10350: yaḥ svābhāvikadravyasya lābhaḥ na tat cauryam /
SA16hvsatssu:10354: yat [yasya] puruṣasya karmahetubalatiśayādhiṣṭhitaṃ tat dravyaṃ tatsambandhi /
SA16hvsatssu:10357: (u) bhagavataḥ saṅghasya vā dravye nāsti mamatācittam /
SA16hvsatssu:10359: dravyamidaṃ niyamena bhagavataḥ saṅghasya vā sambandhi /
SA16hvsatssu:10360: tasya caurye adattādāne vā akuśalacittaṃ samutpannamityataḥ pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10369: tayā saha kāmacāraḥ kathaṃ na kāmamithyācāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10371: yathoktaṃ vinaye- alpavayaskā jāyā yāvadekena śmaśrṛṇāntaritā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10372: (pṛ) yadi kācidasvāminī strī svayamāgatya prārthayate jāyā bhavāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10397: (pṛ) yadi kaścidvastuviparyayāt adṛṣṭvā vadati adrākṣamiti tasya kathaṃ na mṛṣāvādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10403: (pṛ) yathā vastusati sattva utpannasattvasaṃjño vadhapāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10406: natvadṛṣṭe dṛṣṭasaṃjñāmutpādayan na pāpaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10408: ataḥ sattve satyapi sattvasaṃjñāvihīno na labhate pāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:10410: asati sattve sattvasaṃjñāvān [vastutaḥ] sattvasyābhāvādapi na pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10411: sati sattve sattvasaṃjñāvān prāṇātipātapāpaṃ labhata eva /
SA16hvsatssu:10432: yat kaścitkaṭu vadati hitakarañca na bhavati parasyopāyāsamātramicchati /
SA16hvsatssu:10434: yastu karuṇācittena hitaṃ kurvan kaṭu vadati /
SA16hvsatssu:10437: [cikitsārthaṃ] kasmiṃścitkāyadeśe sūcyā vedhanaṃ kaṭvapi na pāpaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10450: satyavacane 'pi kāle cāhite amūlamanarthamakramaṃ vacanaṃ sambhinnapralāpaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10453: kintu bhūyasā vākkṛtameva vyavahārataḥ sambhinnapralāpa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10454: anyāni trīṇi vākkarmāṇi sambhinnapralāpasaṃmiśrāṇi bhavanti na vivekabhāgīni /
SA16hvsatssu:10456: tadā dvidhā bhavati mṛṣāvādaḥ sambhinnapralāpa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10458: tadā tridhā bhavati mṛṣāvādaḥ paiśunyaṃ sambhinnapralāpa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10466: ato buddhā eva bhagavadvādaprasādhane śraddheyāḥ nānye /
SA16hvsatssu:10469: (u) kecidvadanti- puṇyaṃ pāpamavaśyaṃ kāyavāgadhīnaṃ na cittamātrāt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10471: trividhasyāsya mānasakarmaṇo balādutpadyate kāyikaṃ vācikamakuśalakarma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10474: sarveṣāṃ leśānāmakuśalakarmotpādakatve 'pi idaṃ trividhaṃ paraṃ sattvānāmupāyāsakaratvādakuśalakarmapatha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10475: yadi rāgo madhyamo 'varo vā na sa karmapatho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10476: rāgo 'yamadhimātraḥ paramadhirajya saṃpīḍecchayā sopāyaḥ kāyikavācikakarmotpādakatvāt rāgerṣyā karmapatho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10478: yadi moha eva sarvakleśātmaka ucyata iti matam /
SA16hvsatssu:10486: yadi [vā] kaściddhanalābhāyākuśalaṃ karma karoti tadyathā suvarṇakārṣāpaṇāya prāṇinaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10487: dveṣeṇa vā [akuśalaṃ karma karoti] tadyathā amitraṃ coraṃ vā hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10488: atha vā na dhanalābhāya na dveṣeṇa,
SA16hvsatssu:10489: api tu mohabalenaiva parāparāvijñānāt prāṇinaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10490: (pṛ) catvāro durgatipratyayāḥ sūtra uktā [SSS_277] rāgato dveṣato bhayato mohataśca durgatiṣu patantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10493: yaducyate bhayata iti tanmohata eva bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10495: na jñānī yāvadāyurvināśapratyayamapi akuśalaṃ karma karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:10497: yat kleśavivṛddhiḥ kāyikavācikarmotpādayati sa kālo 'kuśalakarmapatha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10518: (pṛ) āryāḥ kimakuśalaṃ karma kuvanti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10521: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- śaikṣā anyān śapamānā āhuḥ samucchinnavṛṣaṇo bhava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10524: ayaṃ kṣīṇāsrava puruṣaḥ prahīṇakleśamūlaḥ cittameva notpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:10532: yadyāryā ihādhvani akuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā durgatau na patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10534: (u) āryāṇāṃ manasi tattvajñāne samutpanne sarve 'kuśalakarmapathā mandā bhavanti yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:10536: trīṇi ca viṣāṇi dvividhāni- durgatiprāpakāṇi tadaprāpakāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10542: te ca tīkṣṇaprajñāvidyā akuśalaṃ karma kṣapayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10545: kadācid buddhān smṛtvā kadācitkaruṇāṃ smṛtvā kuśalakarmahetubhi[rvā] akuśalebhyo vimuktiṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:10551: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo nityaṃ kāyena śīlaṃ cittena prajñāmabhyasyati sa narakavedanīyaṃ karmābhimukhībhūya laghu vedayate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10554: gurukarmāṇi sarvāṇi na kiñcidupayanti ca // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10557: āryāṇāṃ kuśalaṃ karma sudūragāmi khadira vṛkṣamūlavat /
SA16hvsatssu:10559: alpamakuśalaṃ bahukuśaleṣu vartamānaṃ na balavat yathā gaṅgāyāṃ kṣiptamekapalalavaṇaṃ na vikārayati tadrasam /
SA16hvsatssu:10564: yathāryāḥ satyapi pāpe na narakaṃ praviśanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10572: tadyathā gṛdhro vā kaṅka iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10576: dvividhasaṃyojanasamanvāgamāddhi durgatau patito yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:10578: te sadā kuśalakarmavipākaṃ samādadata ityato [SSS_279] durgatikakarmāṇi nāvakāśaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:10579: yathā pūrvaṃ ṣaṭkarmavarge pratipāditaṃ naraka[vedanīyaṃ] karmalakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:10610: sattvānāṃ vidyamānāḥ sarvā akuśalaparābhavahānipīḍā akuśalaiḥ [karmabhi]reva bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10612: yathā sainikavyādhādayo nānena karmaṇā bahumānaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:10613: coravadhapratyayaṃ dhanabhānaṃ labhata iti yat bhavata āśayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10626: akuśalacārī tamasastamaḥ praviṣṭaḥ pravṛttimārgatritayānna niryāṇaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10632: kiñcākuśalacārī svakāyaṃ kāmayannapi na vastutaḥ svātmānaṃ kāmayate /
SA16hvsatssu:10635: puruṣo 'yaṃ kāyasaṅgataḥ tadyathāmitracoreṇa [saṅgataḥ] svātmana eva duḥkhakārakatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:10639: akuśalakarmacaryā yadyapīdānīṃ nābhivyajyate vipāke tu adhyavasīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10642: yathā vā ṛṇamalpamapi krameṇa vṛddhyā vardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10643: parasya kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ paraḥ sadā na vismarati /
SA16hvsatssu:10651: akuśalakarmaphalāt vihāyasā gatvā samudre nimajyāpi na vimuktisthānaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10655: uktañca sūtre- pramādaḥ śatruvatkuśaladharmān hanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10657: kiñcākuśalaṃ karma buddhabodhisattvairarhadbhirāryaiḥ pañcabhijñairmaharṣibhiḥ puṇyapāpavedibhiravigītaṃ na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10659: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣamakuśalacittavaipulya eva bhāvavyāmohavikṣepopāyāsādhiduḥkhairvikṛtamukhavarṇaḥ pumānaprīto dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10665: triṣu karmasu kiṃ gurutaraṃ- kiṃ kāyikaṃ karma,
SA16hvsatssu:10666: vācikaṃ karma kiṃ vā mānasaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:10673: yathā kaścidimaṃ sattvaṃ hanmīti cittamutpādya kāyavāgbhyāṃ tatkarma sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:10684: mānasaṃ karma mahattaramiti cet [tadā] dānapuṇyaṃ labheta /
SA16hvsatssu:10691: ācaritā kasmāt sulabhamidaṃ karma tyaktvā durācaraṇaṃ dānādikarma kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:10702: cittaṃ laghu calaṃ durdamamityato 'kuśalākaraṇaṃ na kiñcit /
SA16hvsatssu:10713: uktañca sūtre- kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma audārikam /
SA16hvsatssu:10720: utpadyamānaṃ vijñaptikarma sarvaṃ kāyavacasā bhavati na mānasakarmaṇā /
SA16hvsatssu:10721: yathā parapuruṣanindā avaśyaṃ vākkarmādhīnā mṛṣāvādapāpaṃ gamayati /
SA16hvsatssu:10722: yatpūrvamuktaṃ caturbhiḥ pratyayaiḥ [SSS_282] prāṇātipātapāpaṃ labhate yaduta sattvasattā,

SA16hvsatssu:11425: durjanasahavṛttyā vā vyāpāda utpadyate yathā saunikavyādhādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11426: mandajñānabalādvā dveṣa utpadyate yathā vṛkṣāṇāṃ śākhopaśākhā vāteritā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11427: cirasamupacitadveṣānuśayasya āniryātanabhāvaṃ dveṣa utpadyate saunikavyādhasarpāṇāmāgamādvā dveṣa utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11428: paradoṣānusmṛtipremṇā vā dveṣa utpadyata iti yathā navakleśeṣūktam /
SA16hvsatssu:11430: jātyā vā dveṣa utpadyate yathā sarpādīnām /
SA16hvsatssu:11434: ātmabuddhimadhyayasya [tatra] mānaparipoṣaṇaṃ padārthādhyavasānañcetyevamādipratyayeṣu satsu dveṣa utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11437: (u) uktaṃ sūtre- dveṣaḥ kāmarāgād gurutaraṃ pāpam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11450: sattvāḥ sadā duḥkhinaḥ punardveṣeṇa pīḍitāḥ vraṇe prayuktakṣāravat /
SA16hvsatssu:11451: kiñca sūtre bhagavān svayaṃ dveṣadoṣānāha- dveṣabahulaḥ kutsitaḥ kharvākāro 'praśāntabuddhiśayaḥ sadā bhīrucitto janānāmaśraddheya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11454: bhrukuṭikṣepeṇa durabhigamo 'saṃśliṣṭamukhavarṇo durvimokasulabhakopaḥ sadā vyāpādopanāhamudito vigrahabhūṣaṇāyudheṣu prīto durmitrapakṣapātī sajjanavidveṣī,
SA16hvsatssu:11464: (u) yaḥ paragarhādiduḥkhaṃ kṣamate sa kuśaladharmapuṇyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11472: yo bhikṣuḥ kṣamāvān sa pravrajyādharmā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11475: ya ākāraveṣābhyāṃ bhikṣuḥ bhinnavyavahāro dveṣacittasahagataśca na sa bhavyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11479: dveṣakārī parān vyābādhituṃ kāmayānaḥ svātmānameva vyābādhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11482: ato jñāyate dveṣo mahāntamātmāpakarṣaṃ karoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11483: ataḥ prājñenātmano hitaṃ kartukāmena mahadduḥkhaṃ mahatpāpañcāpākurvatā kṣāntirācaritavyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11486: (u) yo 'nityatāṃ bhāvayati bahulīkaroti pratibudhyate sarvadharmā kṣaṇikāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:11489: śūnyatācittasya samyak bhāvanayā kṣamamāṇa evaṃ cintayati dharmeṣu vatustaḥ śūnyeṣu ko nindakaḥ ko vā nindāvedaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11491: ahaṃ satyato doṣavān iti pūrvapuruṣāḥ satyaṃ vadanti,
SA16hvsatssu:11496: aśubhanindāṃ śṛṇvan evaṃ cintayet sarve lokā yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayante /
SA16hvsatssu:11510: mayā śabdasyāsya nimittagrahaṇādeva daurmanasyopāyāsāḥ sambhavanti ityahameva duṣṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11512: kasmāt dveṣādīni pāpāni na sattvānāṃ doṣāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:11514: yathā bhūtacikitsako bhūtoccāṭanādhyavasito bhūtameva dviṣati na tu rogiṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:11518: yathā nindāpaṭavo brāhmaṇādayo buddhaṃ vividhaṃ nindanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11521: kiñcedaṃ cintayet lokā akuśabahulā ātmajīvitamahṛtvaiva kaṭukaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11523: kiñcaivaṃ cintayet- aśubhanindādinā na mama duḥkhamiti vedanā kṣantavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:11524: yathā bhagavān bhikṣūn śāsti- kāye krakaceṇa vidīrṇe 'pi vedanā kṣantavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:11527: nindāyāṃ labdhāyāṃ nirvedaṃ bhūyasā mātrayā suniśritamavagamyākuśalamācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:11528: sa jānāti ca nindāyā akṣamā ante duḥkhaṃvipākavedanā ityevaṃ cintayan narake mā bhūt pāta iti gurvīmapi nindāṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:11529: so 'tīva hryapatrapāsāpekṣaḥ cintayati ahaṃ mahāpuruṣasya bhagavataḥ śrāvako mārgabhāvayitā /
SA16hvsatssu:11531: kṣānticāribhirbodhisattvaiḥ śakrādibhiśca labhyaṃ kṣāntibalaṃ śrūyate ca /
SA16hvsatssu:11540: dharmāṇāṃ samavāyaḥ kevalaṃ prajñaptyā puruṣa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11549: sūtre ca vidyāyā artho vivṛtaḥ- yasya kasyacit jñānaṃ vidyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:11560: avidyā tu vikalpinīti na tarupāṣāṇayoḥ samānā /
SA16hvsatssu:11562: yathā puruṣasya cakṣuṣā rūpādarśanaṃ nādarśanadharmo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11567: pañcaskandheṣu asti pudgala iti mithyākalpanā ghaṭaśakale ca suvarṇasaṃjñotpadyata iti kasmādbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11572: (pṛ) na vidyā avidyā iti cet idānīṃ vidyāṃ vihāya sarve dharmā abhāvāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11578: evamiyaṃ vidyā savikalpāpi yathābhūtaṃ na prajānātītyavidyetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11588: vidyāyā abhāvo 'vidyeti yathā vadanti loke- adho 'rūpadarśī,
SA16hvsatssu:11590: viparītā vidyā avidyeti- yathā rātrau sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣa iti buddhirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11598: arhato buddhadharmeṣu vidyā nāstīti vidyāvidyā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11612: ato jñāyate sarve kleśā avidyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11617: ato jñāyate avidyāṅgāni sarve kleśā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11626: yaduta durmitrasaṃstavo 'saddharmaśravaṇaṃ mithyāmanaskāro mithyāsamudācāra [SSS_304] ityebhiścaturbhiḥ kāraṇairavidyotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11634: puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā astīti buddheḥ pūrvameva puruṣamanaskāra utpadyate paścānniścaya ityato 'vidyetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11644: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyānivṛtasya [bhikṣavo vālasya] tṛṣṇāsamprayuktasyaivamayaṃ kāyaḥ samudāgata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11645: siṃha nādasūtre coktam- upādānāni tṛṣṇānidānānīti / gāthā cāha-
SA16hvsatssu:11649: pṛthagjanā vedayante [sukhata] imān skandhān pañca [ye] 'śucayo 'nityā duḥkhāḥ śunyā anātmakāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11650: ya āryāḥ te tān duḥkhān vedayante /
SA16hvsatssu:11652: yathoktaṃ sūtre- ātmasaṃjñā mithyāviparyāsa iti prajānato na punarutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11657: tathā sattvā api dṛṣṭe 'lpāsvādagṛddhā bahūnādīnavān na pratīkṣante /
SA16hvsatssu:11658: tīrthikagranthairutpannamithyādṛṣṭikā vadanti na santi puṇyādīni iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11664: buddho bhagavān sarvajñaḥ śāstā trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samyak caryāviśuddha āryavinīta ityādi tīrthikā na vivicya prajānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11670: yathā kalpādau janā āsvādastuccha ityanabhijñāya [tatra] rāgādhyavasāyamutpādayāmāsuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11672: ato jñātavyamavidyayā sarve lābhāḥ pramuṣitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11680: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyā pāpīyasī gurvī durvimokā ca iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11686: karmaṇāmanupacayādvijñānādīnyaṅgāni na punaḥ prādurbhavanti ato jñāyate avidyā sarvaduḥkhānāṃ mūlamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11690: yathā ca māyā mūḍhānāṃ puraḥ pradarśayati mṛdaṃ suvarṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11691: prākṛtā mūḍhā dṛṣṭe pāpādhiṣṭhitā abhidhānenollapanīyā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11692: tathā lokā api cakṣuṣā aśuci dṛṣṭvā tadvañcitā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11701: susthāne prītivigataḥ sajjanadveṣī durjanasnidgho 'bhiprāyasya viparyayagrāhī priyamitre sadā pratikūlaḥ tucchavastuṣu sāragrāhī alpahrayapatrapo na vicikitsāpratīkṣī,
SA16hvsatssu:11702: na pareṣāṃ tarpaṇa ātmanāpi durniṣevaṇo mūḍho 'vijñātā sujīrṇamalinavastro bhramati /
SA16hvsatssu:11704: ātmanaivātmānaṃ mahāniti ślāghamānaḥ parasya laghūkaraṇe tṛpyati /
SA16hvsatssu:11708: apariśuddho 'nairyāṇiko bhāṣaṇe 'paṭuḥ sadā krodhopanāhamuditaḥ paropadeśaṃ viparyayato gṛhītvā [tatra] paramādhyāvasito durlabhamabhyasya suvinaśvaraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11716: kasmātsūtra uktam- avidyāyā bhaiṣajyaṃ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādabhāvanā vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11718: hetau bhrāntā vadanti- īśvarā dayo lokakāraṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11730: yathā ghaṭapadaṃ śṛṇvato manasi saṃśaya udeti kiṃ rūpādiḥ ghaṭaḥ kiṃvā rūpādivyatirikto 'nyo 'sti ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11731: evaṃ pañcaskandhātmakaḥ puruṣaḥ kiṃ vā tadvyatirikto 'nyo 'sti puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11732: samāhitacittaḥ kāya evātmā kāyādanya ātmā iti śāśvatocchadākhye 'ntadvaye na patati /
SA16hvsatssu:11733: yaḥ prajānāti ghaṭaḥ pratītyasamutpanno rūparasagandhasparśamaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11738: nāma sarvamadhvabhāvi nāma bhūyo na vidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11739: ekadharmasya nāmno 'sya sarve dharmā vaśānugāḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11743: api coktam- saṃskārāṇāṃ santatiṃ pañcaskandhānāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11745: ukta ñca sūtre- yaḥ pratītyasabhutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:11746: yo dharmaṃ paśyati sa buddhaṃ [SSS_307] paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:11747: evaṃ yo nāmajaṃ saṃśayaṃ prajahāti so 'parapratyayaḥ paramārthato buddhaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:11750: saṃkṣepata uktaṃ caturaśītidharmaskandhe- yā kācana prajñā sarvā sāvidyāvyāvartinīti /
SA16hvsatssu:11751: avidyā ca sarvakleśānāṃ mūlaṃ sarvakleśānāṃ sahakāriṇī cetyevaṃ pratītyasamutpāda [jñāne] avidyā prahīyate //
SA16hvsatssu:11774: yathā sthaviraḥ kṣemaka āha- na khalvāyuṣman rūpamasmīti vadāmi,
SA16hvsatssu:11780: api ca ma āyuṣman pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu anusahagato 'smīti mānaḥ asmīticchandaḥ asmītyanuśayo 'samuddhataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11786: (u) dhyānābhyāse 'lpāsvādalābhāt saṃyojanā nuśayaṃ vyāvartayati na punaścitte samudācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:11793: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣuḥ kathayati ahaṃ samuddhatavicikitsaḥ pratilabdhamārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11794: [tasya] purata evaṃ kathayet- atigabhīraḥ pratītyasamutpādo lokottaradharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11798: adhimānini buddhā bhagavanto mahākāruṇikā api [taṃ] dūrīkṛtya na dharmāvavādaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11803: tathāyamapi buddhaśāsanārṇavagataḥ alpaṃ dhyānasukhaṃ pratilabhya pāramārthikamārga iti tatrāsaṅgaṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:11804: adhimānī ante maraṇakāle na mārgaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:11816: yat sujane pūjye pṛṣṭhato 'satkāra uddhatamānaḥ saḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11820: yathoktaṃsūtre- ye kecit [śramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā] anityena rūpeṇa [duḥkhena vipariṇāmadharmeṇa] śreṣṭho 'hamasmīti samanupaśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11821: sadṛśo ['hamasmāti samanupaśyanti] hīno ['hamasbhīti samanupaśyanti] kimanyatra yathābhūtasyādarśanāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11828: kaḥ prājña imamapekṣya ucco 'smīti [manyeta] evamādikāyānusmṛtipratyaye tu nāsti mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11829: prājño jānāti sarve sattvā yadi vā daridrī yadi vā dhanī yadi vā pūjyo yadi vā jadhanyaḥ sarve 'pi asthimāṃsasnāyusirāpañcasandhipeśīkalalasamavāyamayakāyāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:11832: ābhyantaraṃ bāhyaṃ cittaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ sarvaṃ kṣaṇikamiti paśyato na bhavati mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11833: cittasamādhiñca samyak bhāvayato na bhavati mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11837: kiñca prājñasya śīlādiṣu satsu na bhavati mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11839: śīlādayo hi sarve eṣāṃ kleśānāṃ kṣayakarāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11842: kaḥ prājño 'nityena duḥkhena aśucinā padārthena mānaṃ kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11847: na tadā mānalakṣaṇamājñāsiṣam ahamiti vedanāvyākaraṇaṃ kutracidutpatsyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11864: anena rāgeṇa labdho gotrādimānastu vipulaṃ vardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11870: (u) ayaṃ samupāttadhārṣṭyo duḥsahabhāṣaṇo 'satkāracitto 'lpabhayaḥ svairācāramuditaḥ svayañca mahāduḥśāsano yatkiñcijjadhanya[mapi]svayaṃ bahumānī,
SA16hvsatssu:11876: śāstramāha- vicikitsā nāma tattvārthe buddhyaviniścaḥ kimasti vimuktiḥ kiṃ vā nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:11880: (pṛ) vṛkṣe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ sthāṇuḥ kiṃ vā puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11881: mṛtpiṇḍe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ mṛtpiṇḍaḥ uta kokila iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11882: madhukare saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ madhukaraḥ kiṃ vā jambūphalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11883: sarpe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ sarpaḥ kiṃ vā rajjuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:11884: ghoṭakamṛge saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ prabhā kiṃ vā salilaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11886: dhvanau saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ mayūrakṛta uta manuṣyakṛta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11887: gandhe saṃśayo bhavati kimutpalagandhaḥ uta saṃparkagandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11888: rase saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ māṃsarasa uta māṃsābhāsarasa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11889: sparśe saṃśayo bhavati kimautpattikatantava uta paripakvatantava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11891: yathā kimayaṃ dharmo dravyavān uta guṇamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:11892: vimastyātmā uta na ityevamādayaḥ kiṃ saṃśayā na santi /
SA16hvsatssu:11894: sthāṇurvā puruṣo va ityevamādibhistu na kleśā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11895: na ca te punarbhavasya pratyayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11900: pūrvaṃ dvidhāvasthitaṃ padārthaṃ sthāṇuṃ puruṣañca dṛṣṭvā paścāddūrataḥ paśyati [SSS_311] puruṣādi vastu tadā saṃśeta sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti /
SA16hvsatssu:11902: dvidhāśravaṇam- yadi kaścicchṛṇoti asti puṇyaṃ pāpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11905: dvidhājñānam- yadā deve varṣati nadī samṛddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11912: adṛśyaṃ vastu yathā vṛkṣamūlaṃ pṛthivyāmadhastāt jala[sthaṃ]vā /
SA16hvsatssu:11913: kiñcidavastu adṛśyañca yathā dvitīyaṃ śiraḥ tṛtīyo bāhuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11921: vimate vastuni yāvadviśiṣṭalakṣaṇaṃ na paśyati tāvatsaṃśayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11927: yathā bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'vadat vyavasāyena brāhmaṇalabdhaṃ gamīraṃ dharmamabhisametya pratyayān jānan paśyaṃśca prakṣīṇasaṃśayajālo bhaveyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11929: yathā jñānī saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ śrutvā vijñāya ca nirdhāsyati saṃsāro 'nādirityevamādi /
SA16hvsatssu:11931: (u) vicikitsābahulasya laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ sarvaṃ na sidhyati /
