SA16hvsatssu:11933: sandidghaḥ pumān na kāryaṃ karma karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:11941: kiñcāha bhagavān- vicikitsā nāma tamaso rāśiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:11942: sa tamaso rāśistrividhaḥ atīto 'nāgataḥ pratyutpanna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11945: vinā bhagavacchāsanaṃ na samyaksamādhimān iti vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11947: tadyathāha- aṣṭakādayaḥ pañcābhijñā maharṣayaḥ saṃśayālīḍhā vipannā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11948: saṃśayānasya dānādi kurvataḥ puṇyamavipākaṃ vā syādalpavipākaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:11951: tasya puruṣasya cittaṃ sadā vicikitsākaluṣitamityato nāsti kuśalam /
SA16hvsatssu:11952: uktañca sūtre- vicikitsitacitto dānaṃ datvā pratyantabhūmau vipākaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11968: na tasmin samaye cittaṃ nirdhārayati ayaṃ sthāṇurayaṃ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11970: mithyādarśanādasti vā nāsti veti vicikitsanna śraddadhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11975: samyadgarśanasambhavā śraddhā dṛḍhā bhavati śravaṇasambhavā tu naivaṃ bhavati //
SA16hvsatssu:11984: (pṛ) pañcasu skandheṣu ātmeti nāmakaraṇe ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11994: evaṃ bruvataḥ pañcaskandhā eva nityāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11996: tathā sati pañcaskandhā eka eva syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12001: ātmīye sati rāgadveṣādayaḥ sarve kleśāḥ samudbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12009: ima ātmakalpanayā kāyaśiraścakṣurhastapādasyaudārikaṃ vivekameva na labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:12015: yathoktaṃ sūtre- pṛthagjanāḥ śūnyānātmatāṃ śrutvā mahābhītimutpādayanti ātmā na bhaviṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:12017: evaṃ pṛthagjanā yāvatpāmopahataṃ kāyaṃ prārthayamānā na nirvāṇāya prayante /
SA16hvsatssu:12021: tuṣṭa āyuḥkṣaye bhoti rogasyāpagame yathā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12023: ātmāstīti yo vadati sa mithyādṛṣṭau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:12024: yadyātmā nityaḥ tadā sukhaduḥkhayorvikāro na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:12025: asati vikāre nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:12028: svabhāvato vimuktasyāpi nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:12033: yo nairātmyaṃ paśyati tasya yātāyātaṃ samucchidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12036: (u) martyo devaḥ pumān strī iti nāmanimittaṃ śṛṇvataḥ saṃjñāvikalpādātmabuddhirutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12038: hetvabhāvenātmabuddhirutpadyate yaduta yadyātmā nāsti kaḥ sukhaṃ sukhaṃ vedayet,
SA16hvsatssu:12048: tadyathā andha[kalpa]sya śakalādi labdhvā suvarṇamaṇisaṃjñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12051: (pṛ) paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ rūpakāye keśanakharomādyavayavān pratyekaṃ vibhinnān /
SA16hvsatssu:12063: aṇoraṇiyān mahato mahīyān ātmā guhāyāṃ nihito 'sya jantoḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12082: vedanādaya ime rūpe pratibaddhā ityata ucyate rūpa[vān] ātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:12100: tadā eka eva pumān bahvātmā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:12101: rūpādīnāṃ saviśeṣatvāt vaktuṃ śakyaṃ rūpamevā na vedanādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12108: lokasatyato 'styātmā paramārthato nāstyātmeti vacanaṃ samyak dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12109: paramārthato nāsti saṃvṛtito 'stīti vadan na dṛṣṭau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:12111: yathā vyāghrī svapotaṃ mukhenāpaharati atiniṣṭhuragrahaṇe kṣataṃ [bhavediti] atiśithilagrahaṇe bhraṃśo [bhavediti] /
SA16hvsatssu:12118: paramārthato nāstīti vadan saṃvṛtito 'stīti ca vadan antadvayaṃ parityajya madhyamāyāṃ pratipadi caratītyākhyāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12125: (pṛ) yo dharmaḥ paramārthato nāsti sa sutarāṃ nāstīti syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:12127: (u) sarvairlaukikairvyavahriyate astīti yaduta karma karmavipāko yadi vā bandho yadi vā mokṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12130: ime pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā māyopamāḥ jvālāvacca santānenotpannatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:12133: tadā pṛthagjanā vyāmuhya yadi vā ucchedavāde pateyuḥ yadi vā skandhānāṃ nāstītākathane avineyāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12134: puṇyapāpādikarmabhirbandho vā mokṣo vā na sidhyet /
SA16hvsatssu:12143: saṃvṛtyāstīti kathane na tadā punaḥ paramārthato [SSS_317] nāstīti vacanamapekṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12144: uktañca sūtre- yaḥ sarvadharmān niḥsvabhāvān prajānāti sa śūnyatāyāmavatarati /
SA16hvsatssu:12146: ato jñāyate pañca skandhā api na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12149: mahāśūnyatāsūtra uktam- yadidaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti vacanaṃ yadi vāyaṃ puruṣo jarāmaraṇa[-lakṣaṇa] iti vacanaṃ /
SA16hvsatssu:12150: yadi vā tīrthikānāṃ vacanaṃ kāya eva jīvaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:12153: kāya eva jīvaḥ anyaḥ kāyo 'nyo jīva itīdaṃ vacane na brahmacaryaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12154: yaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ayaṃ puruṣo jarāmaraṇa[lakṣaṇa] iti nairātmyasyābhidhānam /
SA16hvsatssu:12155: yaḥ pratiṣedha idaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti tat jarāmaraṇasya vyāvartanam /
SA16hvsatssu:12160: kiñcoktaṃ rādhasūtre- rūpaṃ rādha yūyaṃ vikirata vidhamata vidhvaṃsata vikrīḍanakaṃ kuruta [tṛṣṇā]kṣayāya [pratipadyata] tadyathā pāṃsvāgārikāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12167: yadā tu mahāvāte opūyate jalena vā pravāhitaḥ tadā vṛkṣasaṃjñā nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12168: evaṃ yadā vidhvaṃsitāni vikrīḍanakaṃ kṛtāni vikīrṇāni vidhmātāni niruddhāni pañcaskandhalakṣaṇāni,
SA16hvsatssu:12170: yathāha sūtram- rādha yūyaṃ [rūpaṃ] vidhvaṃsata vikrīḍanakaṃ kuruta vikirata vidhamata bhāgaśo vidalayata sattvakṣayāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12171: asmin sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhā anityāḥ sattvaśūnyāḥ na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12172: pūrvasmin sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhā vikīrṇā niruddhāḥ te dharmaśūnyā bhavanti iti //
SA16hvsatssu:12176: dharmāḥ samucchidyante vā śāśvatā vā iti yadidaṃ vacanaṃ tadanta[graha]dṛṣṭirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12177: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- yadā kaścidāha ātmā śāśvato vā aśāśvato veti iyamevāntagrahadṛṣṭiḥ na sarve dharmāḥ[śāśvatā vā aśāśvatā vā] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12179: dṛṣṭaṃ khalu pratyakṣaṃ [yat] bāhyaṃ vastu samucchidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12186: asti ca nāsti ca karma paraṃ maraṇādityatra yadastīti sa śāśvata[vādaḥ] yannāstīti sa ucchedavādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12188: (pṛ) ayaṃ caturtho graho na dṛṣṭiḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:12191: uktañca sūtre- ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni nirudhyante santyanyānīti śāśvatavādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12193: ātmā pūrvamakarot paścātkariṣyatīti yaddarśanaṃ sā śāśvatadṛṣṭiḥ ātmā pūrvaṃ nākarot paścānna kariṣyatītīyamucchedadṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12194: api cāha mithyādṛṣṭisūtram- puruṣasya saptakāyāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyavaḥ sukhaṃduḥkhaṃ jīvitamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:12196: kiñcāha- kṣureṇa ca krakacena prāṇino hatvā [eka]māṃsapuṃñca kuryāt nāsti [tato nidānaṃ]pāpaṃ [nāsti pāpasyāgama] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12199: asti paralokaḥ yaḥ kārakaḥ sa eva vedaka iti yadvacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:12203: (u) yena hetunā bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi vadanti tato nidānaṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12204: yena hetunā na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi vadanti tato nidānamucchedadṛṣṭirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12212: kathaṃ vaktavyaṃ [yathā] kṣīṇāsravo 'rhan kāyasya bhedā [ducchetsyati vinaṃkṣyati] na bhavati paraṃ maraṇāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:12224: ato jñāyate nocchedo na śāśvata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12225: kāyādanya upalabhyata ityato naikaḥ kāyena bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12227: pañcaskandhāḥ punaḥ santanyanta ityataḥ sattvo jāyate mriyata iti vaktameva na prabhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12228: santānena pravṛttatvādanya iti na vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12230: [SSS_320] ime skandhāste skandhāścānya ityabhidhānāt śāśvatavādo na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12231: svasantānapratyayabalena pravartata ityata ucchedavādo na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12234: vastutaḥ satsu dharmeṣu nāstīti cittotpādanaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12235: yathā vadanti na santi catussatyāni trīṇi ratnānītyādi /
SA16hvsatssu:12243_0: na santi śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ samyaggatāḥ samyak pratipannā ya imaṃ lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:12243_1: svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtya pravedayanti- kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:12245: iṣṭhaṃ iti vedokto devānāṃ kṛte yāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12249: sukṛtaduṣkṛtakarmaṇāṃ [phalaṃ] vipākaḥ ihalokaśubhāśubhakīrtyādiḥ devakāyādayaḥ pāralauke vipākaśca /
SA16hvsatssu:12256: sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ jñānadarśanamajñānadarśanam- idaṃ sarvamahetukam /
SA16hvsatssu:12259: saṃkṣipyedaṃ brūmaḥ- yadviparyayacittaṃ sarvaṃ tanmithyādṛṣṭiḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12269: abhidharme yāḥ pañcadṛṣṭayaḥ brahmajālasūtre ca dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ sarvā[stā] mithyādṛṣṭayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12276: laukikāḥ padārthā ahetukā apratyayā iti yadvadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12277: yadi vā vadanti īśvarādihetukā na tṛṣṇāhetukā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12288: atha vā manyante buddhaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ pūjyo nāsti puruṣa ityato nāsti [sa] buddha iti draṣṭavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:12290: samyakcaryayā taddharmapratilābhino na santītyato nāsti saṅghaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12295: kṛpaṇastu dhanika ityādibhiḥ nāsti kāraṇairvadanti dattamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:12301: yadi jīvo nityaḥ tadā nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtam /
SA16hvsatssu:12303: nāsti paro loka ityato nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:12308: maraṇātparaṃ na bhavati pratītyasamutpāda ityato vadanti nāsti paro loka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12315: dharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt mātā pitā ca kiṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:12322: tadā cakṣuṣā paridṛśyamāno 'yaṃ kāyaḥ khanyamāno mṛdbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12326: akāyātmaka ityayaṃ dvividho yadi cittātmako yadi vā cittavyatirikta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12336: sa kṣudhitaḥ sarvān dṛṣṭvā annaṃ prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:12349: paśyāmaḥ khalu sarve sattvāḥ prajñaptikāraṇakā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12351: paśyāmaśca sarvān sattvān karmakāraṇatantrān na svatantrān /
SA16hvsatssu:12352: ato vadanti nāsti balaṃ nāsti vīryaṃ [nāsti] ca tatphalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:12356: vadanti ca dharmā nirudhyamānāḥ punaḥ paramāṇavo bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12371: asti punaḥ sattvo yena śucīkriyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12374: skandhānāṃ santānena pravṛttiṃ dṛṣṭvā ekalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:12380: brahmā svayamāha- ahamasmi mahābrahmā prabhurdevānāṃ kartā jagata ityevamādi /
SA16hvsatssu:12381: kecidāhuḥ- yadi kaścitpañcakāmānāṃ sukhavedanāsampannaḥ ayamutkṛṣṭa dharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12382: kecitpunarāhuḥ - yadi kaścidviraktaḥ prathamadhyāna[mārabhya]yāvaccaturthadhyānamupasampadya viharati ayamutkṛṣṭa dharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12388: kecittasmin anutkṛṣṭasaṃjñāmutpādya vadanti- ayaṃ kṣatriyaḥ alpakālikaśikṣāmārgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12389: buddhavacanañca na cāṭukāvya[vat] kleśagurukaṃ na vedasadṛśam /
SA16hvsatssu:12396: śīladhāraṇa brahmacaryamātra āsajya devapūjādayaśca [vyavadānamārga ākhyāyeta] īśvara [prasādena] ca viśuddhiṃ labhata iti ca vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12399: punaḥ prayataḥ snātvā brahmayajñapaṭhanatadūrdhvabhojanaṃ viśuddhimārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12402: yat dharmā lokasatyataḥ santo 'pi abhāva ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:12403: abhāve bhāvasaṃjñeti yaducyate santi dravyāṇi astyavayavīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12420: (u) sarve doṣā vipattivyasanāni ca mithyādṛṣṭyā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12421: sa āha- nāsti pāpaṃ nāsti puṇyaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ phalaṃ vipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12422: ato dṛṣṭadharma eva na santi suvṛttāni /
SA16hvsatssu:12426: yathoktaṃ ṣaṭpādābhidharme- krimipipīlikāhananaṃ puruṣahananād gurutaram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12427: sa mithyādṛṣṭikaḥ puruṣaḥ lokadūṣakaḥ satvānāṃ bhūyasāpakārāya pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:12429: tena kṛtaṃ kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ karma sarvamaśubhavipākāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12430_0: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mithyādṛṣṭikasya [bhikṣavaḥ] puruṣapudgalasya yatkāyakarma yathādṛṣṭisamāttaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:12430_1: samādattaṃ yacca vākkarma........yacca manaḥkarma yā cetanā yā prārthanā yaḥ praṇidhiḥ
SA16hvsatssu:12430_2: ye ca saṃskārāḥ sarve te 'niṣṭāya akāntāya amanāpāya ahitāya duḥkhāya saṃvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:12431_0: tadyathā tiktakālābubījaṃ koṣātakībījaṃ picumandabījamādrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ nikṣiptaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:12431_1: yaccaiva pṛthivīrasamupādīyate yaccāporasaṃ tejorasaṃ vāyurasamupādīyate sarvaṃ tat
SA16hvsatssu:12433: evameva mithyādṛṣṭikasya puruṣapudgalasya cittacaitasikā dharmā aniṣṭāya [akāntāya [SSS_325] amanāpāya ahitāya duḥkhāya] saṃvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:12435: atastasya puruṣapudgalasya kṛtamapi dānādi neṣṭaphalaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12440: asya puruṣapudgalasya nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtamityato na yataḥ kutaścitprativiratiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12443: yaśca vadati nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ veti sa sadā citte 'kuśalameva kāṅkṣate /
SA16hvsatssu:12453: tathā ca pudgalo madhyamadeśa utpanna iṣṭāniṣṭavivekāya ṣaḍindriyasampanno 'pi na mārgapratilābhapravaṇo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12458: yathā karmavarge narakavimocakaṃ karma ityanena kāraṇena tatpuruṣakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ narakāya saṃvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:12459: na ca sa pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma kṣapayati /
SA16hvsatssu:12463: samucchinnakuśalamūlasya hi yadā kuśalaṃ na pravartate tadanantaraṃ narakānnaiva vimuktiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12464: citte mithyādṛṣṭikatvāt tasya kuśalamūlaṃ kathaṃ pravarteta /
SA16hvsatssu:12473: abhūtavastuni idameva satyamanyanmithyeti vacanaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12476: (u) sa puruṣo nyūnaguṇaṃ labdhvā ātmānaṃ pūrṇaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12484: yathāndho ghaṭaśakale suvarṇasaṃjñāmutpādya cakṣuṣmatāṃ laghu hāsyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12486: yat kaścit bodhimupekṣamāṇaḥ snānādiśīlena viśuddhiprāptiṃ kāṅkṣate tat śīlavrataparāmarśa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12491: (u) ye doṣā uktā dṛṣṭiparāmarśasya "nyūnaṃ vastu [labdhvā] sampūrṇaṃ manyate ityādinā ta eva doṣāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12496: yathoktaṃ sūtre- govratikaḥ saṃsiddha[vrata]ḥ [kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇāt] gavāṃ sahavyatāmupapadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12509: kasmāt ya ādito nācarati tasya mārgacaraṇaṃ sukaram /
SA16hvsatssu:12511: śatrurapi [SSS_327] na tathā pudgalaṃ glapayati yathā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12513: na hi śatrustathā pudgalaṃ paribhāvayati yathā mithyādṛṣṭayanugāmināṃ tīrthikācaritānāṃ nānāduḥśīlānāṃ nagnatānirlajjatābhasmarajaḥkāyatākeśolluñcchanādīnāṃ samādānam /
SA16hvsatssu:12517: sukhaṃ prārthayitvā duḥkhaṃ labhamāno vimuktiṃ prārthayitvā bandhaṃ labhamānaḥ puruṣaḥ kiṃ na mattaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12520: tasya puruṣasya mithyācāracāritvāt dānāya kāyajīvite satyapi na kiñcana hitaṃ bhavati //
SA16hvsatssu:12533: yadasantaṃ guṇaṃ khyāpayati tena janā vadanti astīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12535: lābhasatkārāyādbhutaṃ prakhyāpya pareṣāṃ manaḥprahlādinī vāk lapanā /
SA16hvsatssu:12536: paradravyalipsayā tallipsāmupagūhya vadati idaṃ vastu sundaramityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:12538: yadetatpuruṣanindāyai anyaṃ stauti- tava pitā vyavasāyī tvantu neti /
SA16hvsatssu:12540: yat dānena dānaṃ prārthayamāno vadati- idaṃ dānavastu amukātpatyantāllabdhamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:12542: yat puruṣasya nidrāvyādhau niratiḥ sā tandrītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12544: yat puruṣasya kāyasya jṛmbhaṇā adamanaṃ styānamiddhasya pratyayaḥ sā vijṛmbhikā /
SA16hvsatssu:12549: yo mahāmātrāṇāṃ vacanaṃ na satkaroti na bibheti /
SA16hvsatssu:12562: trayaḥ kleśā sāvānāṃ cetasi bhūyasā vartante /
SA16hvsatssu:12564: sarveṣāmavītarāgāṇāṃ maśakapipīlikāparyantānāmime trayaḥ kleśā eva cittavartinaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12570: yasya nāsti mohaḥ na tasya rāgadveṣau /
SA16hvsatssu:12573: santi ca tisra eva vedanā na punarasti caturthī /
SA16hvsatssu:12574: āsu tisṛṣu vedanāsu trayaḥ kleśā anuśayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12582: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhavedanīyasparśaṃ labhamānasya bhavati prītiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12589: tadā [khalvasya] tatra bhavati nirvāṇasaṃjñā vā vimuktisaṃjñā vā aduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñā vā ātmasaṃjñā vā /
SA16hvsatssu:12591: (pṛ) anuśayāḥ kiṃ dharme 'nuśerate ki vā sattve 'nuśerate /
SA16hvsatssu:12613: ayamanuśayo yadi prahīṇo yadi vāprahīṇaḥ sa ālambanataḥ saṃprayogataśca /
SA16hvsatssu:12618: ato jñāyate sattvamātre 'nuśayo na dharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12629: sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśaya iti sūtroktaṃ virudhyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:12631: vaktavyaṃ khalu sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ samutpanno rāgaḥ sattve 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12634: (u) saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpaprītyādinā rāga utpadyate na tu rūpādimātrāt /
SA16hvsatssu:12636: yathā vadanti- sukhī na prārthayate duḥkhī tu bahu prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:12639: duḥkhasya pīḍanātmakatvāt puruṣasya sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāmeva rāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12643: ata ucyate sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12644: tāsu triṣu vedanāsu trayaḥ kleśā anuśayā ityatastraya evocyante //
SA16hvsatssu:12647: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- traya āsravāḥ- kāmāsravo bhavāsravo 'vidyāsrava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12649: (u) kāmadhātāvavidyāṃ varjayitvā anye sarve kleśāḥ kāmāsravā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:12657: (u) vastuta āsravā dvividhāḥ satyadarśanaheyā [ye] āsravāṇāṃ mūlabhūtāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12667: (pṛ) catvāra oghāḥ kāmaugho bhavaugho dṛṣṭyodho 'vidyaugha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12669: (u) dṛṣṭimavidyāñca varjayitvā tadanye kāmadhātukakleśāḥ sarve kāmaugha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12686: kiñcittīkṣṇendriya evaṃ cintayati- yadi jīvo nityaḥ tadā aduḥkhasukhavikāraḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:12689: (pṛ) catvāro granthāḥ abhidhyākāyagrantho vyāpādaḥ kāyagranthaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ kāyagranthaḥ idaṃ satyābhiniveśaḥ kāyagrantha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12695: yaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśakaḥ kāmayate anena śīlavratena viśuddhiṃ labheya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12700: catvāra ime granthā avaśyaṃ kāyavāṅmayā iti kāyagrantha ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:12701: kecidāhuḥ- catvāra ime dharmā jananamaraṇe saṅgra 'thnantīti granthāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12702: (pṛ) pañca nīvaraṇāni- kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhaṃ auddhatyakukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:12706: īrṣyādayaḥ kleśāḥ kaśāśastrādiduścaritāni ca kāmacchandādutpadyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12708: styānamiddhena kiñcidviśramya punā rāgadveṣavikṣiptacitto na dhyānasamādhiṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:12710: aśuddhakarmakasya puruṣasya citte sadā daurmanasyakaukṛtyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12717: kecit teṣāṃ nīvaraṇānāṃ varjanāya vadanti- idaṃ kuśalamidamakuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:12718: sa tatra vicikitsate kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12720: eṣu pañcasu nīvaraṇeṣu trīṇi dṛḍhabalānīti kevalaṃ nīvaraṇamityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:12721: anye dve nīvaraṇe tanubale iti dvau dharmau sāṃsargikau /
SA16hvsatssu:12722: ime dve nīvaraṇe jananakāraṇasahite ityataḥ sāṃsargike ityucyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:12725: auddhatyakaukṛtyasya catvāro dharmāḥ pratyayāḥ- jñātivitarko janapadaḥvitarko 'maraṇavitarkaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:12737: pañcāvarabhāgīyeṣu saṃyojaneṣu kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ śīlabrataparāmarśaḥ avaragamanārthatvādavarabhāgīyāni /
SA16hvsatssu:12738: tadyathā govratikaḥ saṃsiddhaḥ kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇāt [SSS_333] gavāṃ sahavyatāmupapadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12756: tāni śaikṣajanānāṃ citta ucyante na pṛthagjanānām /
SA16hvsatssu:12757: (pṛ) auddhatyaṃ kasmāt rūpārūpyadhātukaṃ saṃyojanaṃ na kāmadhātukam /
SA16hvsatssu:12761: keṣāñcit rūpe ārūpye ca vimuktisaṃjñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12767: [tatra] āvāsamātsaryam- ahameva atra vasāmīti nānyān prayojayati /
SA16hvsatssu:12770: lābhamātsaryamiti- ahamevātra dānaṃ lapsya mānyebhyaḥ prayacchatu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12783: kaḥ punarvādaḥ [SSS_334] svīyān pañca skandhān tyajatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12788: mātsaryacittena dātarguṇaṃ pratigrahīturdeyañca samucchedayatītyato gurutaraṃ pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:12790: tadyathā jātyandhasya sapatnabahulānāñca janma na svātantrayaprāpakam /
SA16hvsatssu:12792: triṣu adhvasu daśasu dikṣu [gatānāṃ] buddhānāṃ śatruḥ san saṃsāre saṃsaran sadā mūḍho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12802: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santyāvāsamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- anāgatasya subhikṣorāgamanāya necchati /
SA16hvsatssu:12811: lābhamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- sadā sambhārasambhavāya klamati /
SA16hvsatssu:12814: varṇamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- anyeṣāṃ varṇaṃ śrutvā vyākulakaṣāyacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12818: sarveṣāṃ mātsaryāṇāṃ sāmānyata ime doṣāḥ santi- prabhūtadhanasañcayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12824: pañca cetaḥ khilāḥ- [ihāyuṣmanto bhikṣuḥ] śāstari vicikitsate,
SA16hvsatssu:12831: śāstari vicikitsaka evaṃ cintayati- kiṃ śāstā mahān,
SA16hvsatssu:12833: dharme vicikitsaka [evaṃ cintayati] kiṃ śāstuḥ pravacanamutkṛṣṭamuta vedasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:12836: śikṣāyāṃ vicikitsate kiṃ mānapānādi dharmo nirvāṇaṃ gamayati uta neti /
SA16hvsatssu:12837: anāttamanā āhata [citto] vyāpādabuddhyā bhayagauravacittaṃ vinā sajjanān garhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:12844: sa ca bālo mūḍho 'jño na tathāgatadharmānyadharmayorvivekaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:12849: na ca vedadīn granthān śṛṇoti adhyeti vā /
SA16hvsatssu:12851: adhvanyadhvani bahulamithyāvicikitsaḥ sadā kaluṣitacittatayā śāstrādau vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:12853: sa ca mithyādṛṣṭibahulaiḥ puruṣaiḥ samānakṛtyatayā vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:12854: kiñca vedavyākaraṇādīni mithyādṛṣṭisūtrāṇyadhīyānaḥ paribhinnasamyakprajño bhavati ityato vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:12855: dharmāṇāṃ [yathāśrute] 'rthe prītaḥ kusmṛtiṃ janayan na sūtrakṛdāśayaṃ labdhuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:12856: ato vicikitsate sarvadā svahitālābhapratyayataḥ śāstrādiṣu vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:12857: pañca cetaso vinibandhāḥ- yaḥ kāyo 'vigatarāgo sa kāya āsajyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12865: abhilāṣāvyākulatayā āryavacane upaśamapradarśane dharme na prahṛṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:12866: ataḥ śīlabāhuśrutyadhyānasamādhyādiṣvalpaṃ hitaṃ vastu labdhvā tenātmānaṃ pūrṇaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12869: [SSS_336] ayaṃ yadyaṣṭākṣaṇavihīnaḥ [saḥ] puruṣakāyaṃ duṣkaraṃ labdhvavānityataścittaikāgryeṇa vīryamārabheta /
SA16hvsatssu:12871: asya samagrasya pratyayasya vigame 'nye pratyayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12881: (u) sūtra uktaṃ- pṛthagjano viṃśatidhā svacittaṃ nigṛhyaivaṃ cintayet- mama vibhinnākāraveṣamātrasya vṛthā,
SA16hvsatssu:12899: naivāsti sukhalayaḥ kṛtayoḥ kuśalākuśalayornaiva vismṛtirvināśo vā āmaraṇaṃ na dānto bhaviṣyāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12918: evaṃ krameṇa santatyā vardhata ityanuśaya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12920: (pṛ) ayamanuśayaḥ kiṃ cittasamprayuktaḥ kiṃ vā cittaviprayuktaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12926: saumanasyamidaṃ yadi sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ vartate [tadā] rāgānuśaya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12933: uktaṃ hi sūtre- bālānāṃ maithunacittameva nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:12938: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- satkāyadṛṣṭisamucchede 'nuśayāḥ sahaiva samucchidyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12941: tathā nocet āryamārgeṇa kasya samucchedaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:12943: pṛthagjanāḥ śaikṣajanāśca yadā kuśalacitte 'vyākṛtacitte ca vartante /
SA16hvsatssu:12960: yathā ca caturdinajvarārto dinadvaye [jvarā]nudbhave 'pi jvarārta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12965: yaducyate bhavatā nāsti cetanā nāsti vikalpaḥ vijñānasyamālambanamasti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12967: yadāha bhavān- satkāyadṛṣṭiranuśayena saha samucchidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12980: yathā kaścinmāsavarjanadharmamasamādāno māṃsamabhuñjannapi na varjitamāṃsa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12995: mithyājīvo [yena] māyāśāṭhyādayaḥ pañcadharmāḥ puṣṭiṃ labhante sa mithyājīvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12999: vinaye yatpratiṣiddhaṃ tena ca svātmajīvanaṃ mithyājīvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13007: mārgāvacara evaṃ cintayet- bhagavataḥ śāsane 'vatāro mārgācaraṇārthaḥ na [SSS_339] jīvanārtha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13019: evaṃ cintayati- ahamanena śīlena svarga utpatsya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13037: śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ sthūladarśana ityato bahūnāṃ satvānāṃ gocaraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13054: anena kāraṇena ca daridrāṇāṃ nīcānāṃ kutsitānāmatejasvināñca sthāne patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13069: yathā kasyacitsvata utkṛṣṭavastulābhinaṃ putrameva paśyataścittaṃ duṣprītikaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13078: (pṛ) daśakleśamahābhūmikadharmāḥ tadyathā aśrāddhayaṃ kausīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā vikṣepo 'vidyāsamprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśca /
SA16hvsatssu:13089: ato jñāyate na sarvakleśacitteṣu te daśa dharmāḥ santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13100: sūtra uktam- mahābrahmā brahmakāyikānāmantryāha mā bhavanto śramaṇaṃ gautamamupasaṅkramantu /
SA16hvsatssu:13104_0: uktañca sūtre- [atha khalu kevadhaṃ] mahābrahmā taṃ bhikṣuṃ bāhau gṛhītvā ekamantamapanayitvā
SA16hvsatssu:13104_1: taṃ bhikṣumetadavocat- ahamapi na jānāmi yatremāni catvāri mahābhūtānyapariśeṣāṇi nirudhyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13109: īdṛśānāṃ pāpakānāṃ kleśānāṃ sattvāt jñātavyamasti ca [tatrā] akuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13110: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- mātāpitrupādhyāyācāryādiṣu yo rāgaḥ sa kuśalarāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13117: yanmānaṃ niśritya mānaṃ samucchedayati ayaṃ kuśalamānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13120: kiñcāhurābhidharmikāḥ- yaḥ kuśalaḥ na [sa] kleśo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13137: varaṃ saṃśaya eva pātayati na mithyādṛṣṭāvatārayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13150: ato jñāyate tṛṣṇayā sarve bhavasantānāṃ bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13160: (u) ime sarve dvidhāpi bhavanti satyadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:13161: kenedaṃ jñāyate yathā nāthaputrādayo bhagavacchrāvakān satkāralā bhino dṛṣṭvā īrṣyācittamutpādayamāsuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13167: yathā srotaāpannasya narakapatanapratyayaḥ aṣṭamaloke kāyavedakamāyā ca satyadarśanaheyāpi /
SA16hvsatssu:13168: (pṛ) kleśeṣu kati duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ kati samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13169: (u) pūrvoktāḥ satyadarśanaheyāḥ ṣaḍanuśayāścaturdhā bhavanti duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13185: yogī samudayasambhūtaṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā ucchedadṛṣṭiṃ vyāvartayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13189: ato duḥkhaṃ paśyan prajānāti- śīlaṃ duḥkhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:13201: (pṛ) rāgo māno mithyādṛṣṭiṃ varjayitvā anyāścatasro dṛṣṭayo duḥkhadaurmanasyendriye varjayitvā [tadanya]trividhendriyasamprayuktāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13208: paścādapi vakṣyate pañcasu vijñāneṣu nāsti kleśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13210: mātsaryantu na tathā ityatra nāsti hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13212: evaṃ māno na daurmanasyendriyasamprayukta ityatrāpi nāsti hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13215: samudayasatya[darśana]heyāśca mithyādṛṣṭidṛṣṭiparāmarśavicikitsā rāgapratighamānaviprayuktāvidyāśca ime sarvatragānuśayā anye 'sarvatragānuśayāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13235: yathā kāmadhātukakleśārūpadhātvālambanāḥ tathā rūpadhātukādṛṣṭayādayaḥ kleśā api kāmadhātvālambanāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13239: rāgaḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇālambano 'pi caturo devān tadadhastanāṃśca saṃkleśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13240: yathāha dīrghanakhasūtram- sarvaṃ kṣamata itīdaṃ saṃrāgāya /
SA16hvsatssu:13247: uktaṃ hi sūtre- īdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭimutpādya īdṛśaṃ vastu vadati yadasti jīva ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:13253: tathā no cet satkāyadṛṣṭyādayo 'pi pañcasu vijñāneṣu varteran /
SA16hvsatssu:13255: cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadati ahaṃ paśyamīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13258: kathamucyate pañcasu vijñāneṣu na kleśāḥ santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13262: manovijñāne hi vidyamānaṃ vikalpakāraṇaṃ na pañcasu vijñāneṣu /
SA16hvsatssu:13263: ato jñāyate pañca vijñāneṣu na santi kleśā iti //
SA16hvsatssu:13266: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- kleśā navavidhā- adhamamadhyamottamā adhamādhamādhamamadhyamādhamottamā madhyamādhama madhyamamadhyamamadhyamottamā uttamādhamottamamadhyamottamottamā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13275_0: sūtre bhagavānāha- tadyathā dakṣaḥ [SSS_345] karmakaro hastena paraśumādāya cakṣuṣā
SA16hvsatssu:13275_1: muṣṭipradeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā yānyaṃśasahasrāni pratidinaṃ kṣīyamāṇāni tānyagaṇayanannapi
SA16hvsatssu:13276: tathā sa bhikṣurapi mārgacaryāṃ bhāvayan kānyadya kṣīṇāṇyāsravasahasrāṇi kāni hyaḥ kṣīṇānyāsravahasrāṇīti agaṇayannapi kṣīṇamātre prajānāti kṣīṇa āsrava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13277: ato jñāyate 'pramāṇai jñānaiḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyanta natvaṣṭha nava vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13278: (pṛ) kaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya kaḥ kleśa prahīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13280: yathoktaṃ sūtre bhagavatā- prathamadhyānamupādāyāsravāṇāṃ kṣayo yāvadākiñcanyāyatanamupādāyāsravāṇāṃ kṣaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13281: tāni saptapratiśaraṇāni vināpi āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:13283: ato jñāyate kāmadhātukasamādhiṃ niśrityāpi āsravakṣayaṃ pratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13288: (pṛ) pūrvaṃ prathamadhyānādvītarāgaḥ kiṃ krameṇa dvitīyadhyānādīn prāpnoti kiṃ vā ekakālameva /
SA16hvsatssu:13293: yathā ca yāmyā devāḥ pariṣvaṅge kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13294: tuṣitā devāḥ pāṇiṃ gṛhītvā kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13296: paranirmitavaśavartino devā ākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13307: (u) yathā satyadarśanaheyāḥ sarve kleśā nirodhasatyadarśanena prahīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:13308: uktapūrvamidam yat nirodhadarśanapraheyāḥ [SSS_346] satkāyadṛṣṭyādayaḥ kleśāḥ sarve nirodhasatyadarśanena prahīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:13309: ūṣmadharmādārabhya anityādyākāraiḥ pañcaskandhalakṣaṇāni bhāvayitvā ādau praheyāḥ kleśā nirodhadarśanena kṣīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:13318: (pṛ) [nanu] sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhānanityādinā bhāvayitvā srotaāpattipalaṃ yāvadarhatphalaṃ vindate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13324: ayaṃ rūpanirodha iti sarvadā mama paśyato dharmaṃ vijānataḥ kleśāḥ prahīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13329: ato jñāyate skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyataḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13336: ato jñāyate 'saṃskṛtālambano mārga eva kleśān prajahātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13352: yat satvā viśuddhaṃ paramaṃ nirvāṇasukhamupekṣante pratyutātitucchaṃ kāmasukhaṃ bhavasukhaṃ kāmayante tadidaṃ sarvaṃ kleśānāṃ doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13353: yadā kleśān [SSS_347] prajahāti tadā mahāhitaṃ pratilabhante /
SA16hvsatssu:13382: yathoktaṃ bhagavatāsūtre- yaḥ pratilabdhavidyaḥ sanyastāvidyaḥ sa kiṃ pāpakaṃ karma puṇyaṃ karma āneñjyañca karma karoti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:13385: ato jñāyate prajñaptyanuyāyī kevalaṃ karmāṇi karotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13386: anāsravaṃ cittaṃ na prajñaptimavalambata iti na karmāṇi karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:13392: anāsravaṃ cittañca na caryālakṣaṇamityato nāstyanāsravaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:13395: ato jñāyate vidyamānaḥ kāyaḥ kleśahetu[ka] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13400: kleśavāneva [SSS_348] [jāyate] yatra bhavalakṣaṇaṃ kvarodanādi jananakāle pratyakṣamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:13401: ato jñāyate kleśaiḥ sahaiva sarve jāyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13402: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu sattvā bahavo varcaḥkuṭyādiṣu prasūyante na tu śilādiṣu /
SA16hvsatssu:13409: mriyamāṇā dūrato narakaṃ dṛṣṭvā idaṃ padmasara iti tadāsaṅgāttatrotpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:13410: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo nibiḍitasthāne vipulaṃ sthānaṃ labheyamiti mriyate sa pakṣiṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13412: yaḥ śītārto mriyate sa tapananarake jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13415: ya āhārāsaktaḥ sa kuṇapeṣu kīṭo jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13429: muhūrtaṃ daṇḍe viramatyapi [cakram] bhramatyeva na tu śāmyati /
SA16hvsatssu:13436: evaṃ jñānāgninā vijñānasthitiṣu dagdhāsu na vijñānabījaṃ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:13444: arhatastveṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ vaikalyānnāyatyāṃ kāyo bhavati iti jñātavyaṃ kleśapratyayā kāyavedaneti /
SA16hvsatssu:13447: ato jñāyate vigatakleśo nopapatiṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13455: bhavatoktaṃ yathā daśanaṃ paścātkrameṇa bhavati tathā kleśā apīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13459: yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:13460: pratyakṣaṃ khalu loke 'smin kleśajaḥ kāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13463: ato jñāyate āyatyāṃ pañcaskandhā api kleśajā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13473: jñātavyamime sattvā avaśyaṃ pūrvābhyāsasañcitamaithunarāgādikleśā ityatasteṣūtpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13479: tebhyaḥ pāpebhyo dṛṣṭa eva badhabandhanādiduḥkhamanu bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13487: kleśavivṛddhyā durgatau patati sa eva pāpakāyamanubhūya kleśān punarvardhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13497: teṣāmeva mahatvato duḥsthāne janmānuvartate yathā sūkaraśvādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13498: alpakeśatvataḥ susthāne jāyata iti yathā [kaścit] kleśatanutvāt dānaśīlādikarmācaran ṣaṭsu kāmadeveṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13503: paśyāmaḥ khalu sattvā kudeśabhūmau ratā durjanaiḥ saha kutsitamadhivasantīti sarvamāsaṅgādbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13508: śalabhā ime na jānanti agnirduḥkhasparśa ityatastatra patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13513: yathā ca kaścit kāmāsaktyā viprakṛṣṭāṃ vidiśaṃ gacchan na pratinivartate /
SA16hvsatssu:13515: yathā vṛkṣasya mūle 'nunmūlite sa vṛkṣaḥ punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:13518: yathāpi mūle 'nupadrute dṛḍhe cchinno 'pi vṛkṣaḥ punareva rohati /
SA16hvsatssu:13519: evamapi tṛṣṇānuśaye 'nuddhṛte nirvartayati duḥkhamidaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13521: svato 'vidyāṃ vinā ko jñānī tat vyayaduḥkhaṃ kāmayamāno vedayeta /
SA16hvsatssu:13533: yathā viṣasarpasampūrṇe gṛhaprakoṣṭhe 'prajvalite ca dīpe sukhādhyavasānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13535: tathā sattvā api avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ loke 'bhiramante /
SA16hvsatssu:13540: prārthanā hi dvividhā- kāmaprārthanā bhavaprārthanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13547: bhavapratyayā jātiriti jñātavyaṃ kleśāḥ kāyasya mūlamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13567: catasro jātayaḥ- aṇḍajo jarāyujaḥ saṃsvedaja upapāduka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13571: ato jñāyate catvāro jātivibhāgāḥ kāmatṛṣṇādhīnā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13572: catasraḥ kāyavedanāḥ- kaścidātmaghātako na paraghātaka ityādayaścatasraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13575: catasro vijñānasthitayaḥ- rūpopagaṃ vijñānaṃ tiṣṭhat rūpapratiṣṭhitaṃ rūpārambaṇaṃ nandyupasevanam /
SA16hvsatssu:13615: kleśā vedanāniśritā ityataḥ pañca vedanā indriyāṇi bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13622: [te] sarve kleśānāṃ nirodhāya bhavanti jñānī taddhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān skandhānupāśrayate /
SA16hvsatssu:13630: evaṃ kleśānāṃ kramaśo nirodhātkāyo 'pi kramaśo nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13634: draṣṭavyamavaśyaṃ rāgādipratyayamidānīmāyatyāñca glānyupāyāsān labhanta ityato 'vaśyaṃ [teṣāṃ] prahāṇaṃ prārthayante /
SA16hvsatssu:13642: bhagavānāha- tatra tatra sūtre nandirāgakṣayātsamyagvimuktiṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13662: śāstramāha- trividhacittānāṃ nirodho nirodhasatyaṃ yaduta prajñapticittaṃ dharmacittaṃ śūnyatācittam /
SA16hvsatssu:13670: (u) skandhānupādāya ye vikalpā tadyathā pañcaskandhānupādāya puruṣa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13675: evaṃ skandheṣu satsveva bhavati sattveti saṃvṛtiḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13676: yathā ca bhagavān bhikṣūnavocat- dharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmānaḥ pratītyasamutpannā aniyatasvabhāvā nāmamātramanusmaraṇamātraṃ bhogamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:13677: imāneva pañcaskandhānupādāya nānā nāma pravartate sattvo manuṣyo deva ityādi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13679: kiñcāha bhagavān- dve satye paramārthasatyaṃ saṃvṛtisatyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13689: buddhā bhagavanto laukikānāṃ prajñaptito viyojanāya lokasatyena vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13693: purā kila janā vastūpabhogakāmanayā vahuvastunāmutpattikāle ghaṭa ityādi nāma sthāpayāñcakruḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13700: na patati mithyādṛṣṭau sukhānte duḥkhānte ca /
SA16hvsatssu:13704: anena dharmeṇa taccittaṃ damayitvā mārgaśāsanaṃ grāhayitvā paścātparamārthasatyamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:13705: evaṃ jinaśāanamādāvagādhagabhīram- tadyathā mahāsamudraḥ kramaśo gabhīraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13707: yo mārgasya lābhajñānaṃ sādhayati [sa] paramārthadharmopadeśārho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13708: yathā bhagavata evaṃ cetaḥ parivitarka udabhut- paripavkāḥ khalu rāhulasya [bhikṣoḥ] vimuktiparipacanīyā dharmāḥ yannūnamahaṃ rāhulaṃ uttara āsravānāṃ kṣaye vinayeyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13709: tadyathā ghrāṇapākaḥ tadvināśe sukhaṃ janane durbhedanam /
SA16hvsatssu:13710: evaṃ lokasatyena cittaṃ damayitvātha paramārthajñānena vināśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13711: uktañca sūtre- dharmāṇāṃ pravicayapūrvakaṃ nirvāṇaṃ parijñātavyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13712: yogī pūrvaṃ dharmāḥ [kiṃ] prajñaptisantaḥ [kiṃ vā] paramārthasanta iti jñātvā paścānnirodhasatyaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:13724: yathoktaṃ sūtre- lokasamudayaṃ paśyataḥ nāstīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13725: lokanirodhaṃ paśyataḥ astīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13727: lokasatyato bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ satyameva yaduta astyātmā nāstyātmā ityādi paryāyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13732: asti vastutaḥ sattva iti yā dṛṣṭiḥ ayaṃ mahāmohaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13740: jananamaraṇavedakaḥ sattvo nāstīti vacanaṃ hi mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13741: yadi śūnyatābuddhipratilābhī vadati nāsti sattva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13743: yathoktaṃ sūtre- arhantī bhikṣuṇī pāpīyāṃsaṃ māramavocat-
SA16hvsatssu:13744: kiṃ nu sattva iti pratyeṣi māradṛṣṭigataṃ nu te /
SA16hvsatssu:13755: (u) yasya puruṣasya śūnyatātattvajñānaṃ notpannaṃ tasyāstyātmeti matirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13757: yathāha bhagavān- ye bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śūnyo nāstyātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:13758: na punaḥ karoti iti śrutavantaḥ te mahābhītā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13760: ato jñāyate apratilabdhaśūnyatājñānaḥ astyātmeti matyā nirvāṇādbibheti /
SA16hvsatssu:13764: apratilabdhaśūnyatātattvo nāsti kiñcanetidṛ ṣṭyā durgatau patati yadutocchedadṛṣṭi[rūpa]mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13765: yo 'yaṃ lokasatyato 'styātmeti prajñāya asti karmaphalamiti śraddadhānaḥ paścāt saṃskārā anityā utpattinirodhalakṣaṇā iti bhāvayitvā nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:13767: sa yadi nāsti kiñcaneti vacanaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:13770: kecittīrthikā apavadanti śramaṇo gautamaḥ paramārthata ātmānaṃ dūṣayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13771: ato bhagavānāha- lokasatyato vadāmi asti sattva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13772: samyagdṛṣṭiṃ prakāśayan vadāmi santi sattvāḥ sandhāvantaḥ saṃsaranta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13785: yathā citritaḥ pradīpaḥ pradīpa ityukto 'pi na pradipavṛttiko bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13786: evaṃ ghaṭo 'stīti kathito 'pi na vastusan bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13787: santi pañcaskandhā ityuktā api na paramārthāḥ //
SA16hvsatssu:13791: (pṛ) kathaṃ ghaṭādayaḥ prajñaptitaḥ santi na vastutaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13793: yathā vadanti idaṃ rūpaṃ idaṃ ghaṭarūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13811: yathā vedanā na vedayate vijānāti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:13825: yathā kaścidaśvaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadati- aśvaṃ paśyāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13841: manovijñānamapi sattvādau vikṣipati yaduta kāyaḥ sattvaḥ cittaṃ sattva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13842: evaṃ rūpādaya eva ghaṭa athavā rūpādivyatirikto ghaṭa ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:13843: paramārthavacane tu cittaṃ samādadhāti na vikṣipati /
SA16hvsatssu:13844: rūpaṃ paśyāmīti [vat] śabdamapi paśyāmīti na vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13850: rūpādayo dharmā jñeyādāvanabhidheyā iti na vyapadiśyante /
SA16hvsatssu:13857: yaḥ kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kuśalaṃ karoti sa vidvān /
SA16hvsatssu:13867: yathāha bhagavān- vidvān mūḍhaśca sarvaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:13876: yathāha- [kṣipraṃ] dharmaṃ vijānāti vijño jihvā sūparasaṃ yathā /
SA16hvsatssu:13890: rūparasagandhasparśānupādāya hi ayaṃ ghaṭa iti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13892: (13) prajñaptau ca bhavati saṃśayaḥ yathā sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13893: rūpādiṣu tu na saṃśayo bhavati rūpaṃ vā kiṃ vā śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13894: (pṛ) rūpādāvapi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13896: rūpaṃ paśyan naiva saṃśete ayaṃ śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13897: anyasmāt kāraṇāt saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13898: yathā rūpaṃ śūnyamiti śrutvā punā rūpaṃ paśyan saṃśete kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13900: (pṛ) nirodhasatye 'pi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti nirodhaḥ kiṃ vā nāsti nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13901: (u) abhiniviṣṭeṣu saṃśayo bhavati na tu nirodhasatye /
SA16hvsatssu:13902: asti nirodha iti mataṃ nāsti nirodha iti matañca yaḥ śṛṇoti tasya bhavati saṃśayaḥ kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13905: nirodhasatyaṃ paśyato na punaḥ saṃśayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13920: snehadveṣādivikalpo yaḥ kaścana sa sarvaḥ prajñaptisan /
SA16hvsatssu:13926: dāhyate [SSS_361] pradāhyate ityādi yā kācana kriyā sarvā sā prajñaptisatī /
SA16hvsatssu:13933: prāṇātipātādi pāpaṃ prāṇātipātaviratyādi puṇyaṃ sarvaṃ na paramārthasat /
SA16hvsatssu:13948: tathā śūnyatayā yat khaṇḍanaṃ tattu paramārthasat /
SA16hvsatssu:13959: anirvacanīyatvam- rūpādaya eva vā ghaṭaḥ kiṃ vā tadvayatirikto ghaṭa iti na nirvaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13966: (u) ekatvavāde doṣo yaduta rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratyekaṃ vibhaktam /
SA16hvsatssu:13974: (pṛ) yathā ekaikaṃ tilaṃ na kalāpaṃ sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13990: ato jñāyate rūpādaya eva na pṛthivīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13991: laukikā vadanti- pṛthivīrūpaṃ pṛthivīgandhaḥ pṛthivīrasaḥ pṛthivīsparśaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13992: na paśyāmo rūparūpamiti vadantaṃ yaṃ kañcana /
SA16hvsatssu:13993: anyadharmalakṣaṇenāvaśyaṃ pradarśyate- yathā amukasya puruṣasya kuṭīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14000: tathāpi svātmarūpeṇaiva svātmapradarśanaṃ [iti vadataḥ] ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14001: (u) yadyucyate pṛthivī rūpādinā svātmānameva pradarśayatīti nāyaṃ nyāyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14005: śilāpuruṣasya hasta iti pradarśane tadanyaḥ kāyaḥ śilāpuruṣa iti syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14008: tasmin samaye śilāpuruṣa eva na punastadanyo 'stītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14009: yathā bhagavānāha- santyasmin kāye keśā romāṇi raktaṃ māṃsaṃ ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:14012: ato jñāyate śilāpuruṣa iti vacanamapi mṛṣāvacanam, iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14021: rūparasagandhasparśavatī pṛthivī iti tu vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14037: na [SSS_363] syāt rūpamātre pṛthivīṃ paśyāmīti pṛthivīsaṃjñā /
SA16hvsatssu:14042: yathā kaścid vṛkṣaśākhāṃ chindan vadati- vṛkṣaṃ chindāmi,
SA16hvsatssu:14050: yathā pūrvamuktaṃ- śabdo rūpādivyatiriktaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ santānapravṛttaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14052: ato jñāyate na sarvāṇi bhautikāni śabdavantīti //
SA16hvsatssu:14074: ato jñāyate na pṛthak santi pṛthivyādayo dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14078: kāyendriyeṇa spṛṣṭvāpi jānīmaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14085: na hyandhakāre vivecayati ghaṭo vā jighrayate kapālaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:14086: ghaṭo vā rasyate kapālaṃ vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14087: (u) yadyapi na vivecayati kiṃ ghaṭa uta kapālamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:14088: tathāpi mṛdi jñānaṃ bhavati mṛdaṃ [SSS_364] jighrāmi,
SA16hvsatssu:14091: tadā dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā vā na nirdhārayati kimayaṃ ghaṭa śarāvaḥ kiṃ vā ghataśakalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:14092: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyañca na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14093: andhakāre ghaṭabuddhirutpannāpi na vivecayati suvarṇaghaṭo rajataghaṭo vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14094: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyamapi na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14097: yathā [cakṣuḥ] puṣpādi paśyati na vivicya jānāti gandhaḥ surabhirasurabhirvā raso madhuro 'madhuro vā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:14098: ato yadi mataṃ cakṣuḥkāyendriyābhyāṃ jānīmo dravyaṃ na ghrāṇajihvābhyāmiti /
SA16hvsatssu:14100: yathā ghrāṇajihve dravyaṃ pṛthakkṛtya na vikalpayataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14101: tathā cakṣuḥkāyendriye api dravyamapṛthagbhūtamapi na vikalpayataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14113: na tu sarvo rūpātpṛthagbhūto dharmo dṛśyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14119: yadi ca dṛśyadharmeṇa tadanyadharma upalabhya dṛśyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14127: indriyeṇa rūpaṃ dṛśyamitīdaṃ rūpalakṣaṇaṃ punaralakṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14139: na tatrāsti vinigamanā rūpamātramupalabdhikaraṃ nānye dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14147: yathā andho 'bhyastaghaṭaparimāṇo vinaṣṭacakṣuṣko 'pi spṛṣṭvā ghaṭaṃ jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:14151: bhavatāṃ sūtre 'pyuktam- kāyāgataspṛṣṭaḥ sparśo na pṛthivyaptejasāṃmiti jñātavyam- adṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:14154: andha imaṃ vāyuṃ jānannapi na jānāti vāyurayaṃ kiṃ dṛśyaḥ kiṃvā adṛśya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14163: (u) asmanmate rūpaṃ vihāya nāstyanyo dharmo dṛśyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14164: ato jñāyate mate ['smin] yatra rūpamutpannamasti tatra cakṣuḥ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14168: ato rūpadi vihāya pṛthagasti ghaṭa itīdaṃ na nyāyyam //
SA16hvsatssu:14183: yathā cakṣurvijñānena rūpaṃ jñāyate, na śabdādi /
SA16hvsatssu:14195: ato jñāyate paramārthato nānirvācyāḥ dharmāḥ prajñaptāveva ekatvanānātvasatvāducyate 'nirvācya iti //
SA16hvsatssu:14199: (u) abhāvatve na puṇyapāpādīnāṃ vipāko vimuktyādayaḥ sarve dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14200: vidyamānaṃ nāstīti grahe sa graho 'pi abhāvaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14202: asti nāstīti vādāḥ śraddhayoktāḥ pratyakṣajñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti anumitijñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14204: yatkiñcana nāstīti yat vacanaṃ tadeṣu triṣu na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14205: sūtraṃ vānusarāma iti bhavatāmāśayo [yaḥ] nāyaṃ yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14222: sarve dharmā abhāvā iti bhavata āśaye jñānamidaṃ kiṃ pratītya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14227: tadā sarve janā yathābhipretaṃ yatkiñcana kuryuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14233: tathā ca kena kāraṇenāha- sarvamabhāva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14235: yadi kāraṇena na prakāśayati [tadā] paragṛhītaṃ prakṛtitaḥ sidhyet /
SA16hvsatssu:14237: yo bhāvaḥ kāraṇena sādhyaḥ na so 'bhāva ityucyate //
SA16hvsatssu:14247: avayavinyagrāhye 'pi avayavā grāhyā iti bhavato yanmatam /
SA16hvsatssu:14258: sūkṣmāvayavān paśyato 'vayavabuddhiḥ sadā bhavati na ghaṭabuddhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14287: na hi cakṣuḥ sūkṣmaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14288: na ca mano gṛhṇāti pratyutpannaṃ rūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:14291: manovijñānantu atīte anāgate vartate na rūpe vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:14320: kiṃ rūpaṃ prāpya paśyati kiṃ vāprāpya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14331: (u) yadi cakṣuraprāptamapi jñānagocara ityucyate sarvasthaṃ rūpaṃ jñānagocaraḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14334: yadi sati pūrvameva cakṣuṣi rūpe ca paścāccakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14345: tathā hi- yadi ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurāśritaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:14347: yadi padārtho nirāyatanaḥ tadā āśritya tiṣṭhatīti na labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14348: yadi bravīṣi vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣo 'lpabhāga utpadyate yadi vā vyāpyotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14355: ekaikavijñānāvayavo na vijānāti avayavī tu vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:14373: ato jñāyate śabdo na śrāvya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14378: śabdo 'yaṃ prāpya aprāpya vā ubhayathāpi na śravaṇīyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14407: pūrvoktavat gandhaḥ prāpto vā aprāpto gṛhyata ityubhayathāsti doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14411: sūkṣmādyavayaveṣveva sparśajñānaṃ notpadyata iti yathāpūrvaṃ vaktavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:14418: manovijñānaṃ hi na pratyutpannān rūparasagandhasparśān gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:14421: (pṛ) yadi manovijñānaṃ rūpādīn dharmān na jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:14431: (u) yathā kasyacit cittaṃ svātmānamajñātvāpi cintā bhavati ahaṃ cittavāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:14443: hetau pūrvaṃ san vā guṇa utpadyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:14451: ato na hetau pūrvaṃ san guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14452: bhavato yadi mataṃ hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14456: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu śuklatantuḥ śuklapaṭaṃ sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14458: yadi [SSS_372] hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalaṃ sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14459: kasmāt śuklatantuḥ śukla[paṭa]meva sādhayati na kṛṣṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:14460: ato na hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14469: (pṛ) dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu ghaṭaṃ kiyamāṇam kathaṃ nāsti ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14499: hetau niruddhe kena phalamutpadyeta yathā avidyamānaḥ pitā kathaṃ putramutpādayet /
SA16hvsatssu:14503: yadi hetuḥ phalañca samakālam na tarhi ayaṃ nyāyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14504: yathā dve śṛṅge yugapadudbhūte nocyete vāmadakṣiṇe 'nyonyahetuke /
SA16hvsatssu:14515: laukikā na paśyanti kañcana dharmaṃ hetuphalayorapṛthagbhāvarūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:14525: na ca paścāmaḥ kañcana dharmaṃ svātmānaṃ [SSS_373] kurvantam /
SA16hvsatssu:14532: cakṣuṣo rūpasya naivaṃ bhavati- āvāṃ saha vijñānamabhinirvartayāva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14544: garbhe 'pi bālānāṃ cakṣurādikāyāvayaveṣu kaḥ sacittatvaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:14553: dṛṣṭe ca karmakaraṇe citte vikalpayati- evaṃ kartavyaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:14563: yat bhavān nānākāraṇairbravīti- sarve dharmāḥ śūnyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14583: tathāgatāḥ paraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvākāraṃ prakṛtito naissvābhāvyaṃ viśeṣasāmānyalakṣaṇāni sarvāṇi pratividhyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14587: (pṛ) yathā bhagavatā bodhimaṇḍagatena dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratilabdham /
SA16hvsatssu:14592: tadyathā bhagavānupadiśati sarvadharmāḥ pratītya samutpannā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14595: vicitrāṅkādīni rūpāṇi nṛttagītādayo nādā gandharasasparśā apramāṇaviśeṣā nopadeśyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14596: upadeśe 'pi nāsti mahaddhitam ityata īdṛśaṃ vastu nopadiśati bhagavān /
SA16hvsatssu:14598: yathā kaścit citrāṅkanādidharmavikalpamajñātvā vadati tāni na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14599: tathā bhavānapi yatkimapyasādhayitvā vadati nāstīdaṃ- vastu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14602: yathā jātyandho vadati nāsti kṛṣṇamavadātaṃ vā,
SA16hvsatssu:14605: yadyevam, pratītyasiddhatvānna santi sarve dharmā iti vaktuṃ pāryate /
SA16hvsatssu:14607: tathāgatastu āha- santi pañca skandhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14608: ato jñāyate rūpādayaḥ sarvadharmāḥ santi yathā ghaṭādayaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ santīti //
SA16hvsatssu:14616: (u) santi vastutaḥ pañcaskandhā iti cittaṃ dharmacittamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14617: pañcaskandhān śūnyān dṛṣṭvā samyagbhāvayato dharmacittaṃ nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14618: (pṛ) yogī paśyati pañcaskandhān śūnyān yaduta pañcaskandheṣu nāsti nityadharmaḥ sthiradharmo 'vināśadharmo 'vipariṇāmadharma ātmāmīyadharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14630: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacara idaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati yāvadidaṃ vijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ ṣaśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14631: na tu rūpādayaḥ pañcaskandhā na santīti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:14634: yathoktaṃ dharmamudrāsūtre- yogāvacaraḥ paśyati rūpādīn dharmān anityalakṣaṇān vikṣepalakṣaṇān vināśalakṣaṇān māyālakṣaṇān nirvedalakṣaṇān iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14637: taddarśanaṃ tāvadvayavadānā[tmakam] ato jñāyate pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14641: pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkurvatastu na tat punarabhimukhībhabati /
SA16hvsatssu:14643: tadyathā kaścana vṛkṣaḥ krakacakṛtto bhasmasātkṛtaḥ prakṣīṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14649: kiñcāhaikaṃ sūtrama- rūpaṃ rādha tathā vibhida,
SA16hvsatssu:14651: ato jñāyate yaḥ sattvaparibhedaḥ iyaṃ prajñaptiśūnyatā /
SA16hvsatssu:14653: bhāvanā ca dvividhā- śūnya[tā]bhāvanā nairātmyabhāvanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14655: yathā kaścit jalaṃ nāstīti ghaṭa śūnyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14656: tathā pañcaskandheṣu pudgalo nāstīti [tān] śūnyān paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14667: bhagavānāha- saṃskārāḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ santi māyāvat nirmitavat /
SA16hvsatssu:14669: paramārthataḥ śūnyamiti vacanam- ayamarthasatyataḥ śūnyo na saṃvṛtisatyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14670: paramārthaśca yaduta rūpaṃ śūnyamakiñcanam yāvadvijñānaṃ śūnyamakiñcanam /
SA16hvsatssu:14671: ato yadrūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śūnyatādarśanaṃ tat paramārthaśūnyatādarśanamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14676: tadarthamucyante pañca skandhāḥ paramārthataḥ śūnyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14677: (pṛ) kiṃ nu khalu sūtre noktam asti karma asti phalam,
SA16hvsatssu:14679: (u) ayaṃ hetuḥ dharmaṇāṃ kārakākhyo nopalabhyata itīdaṃ prajñaptiśūnyatābhidhānam /
SA16hvsatssu:14681: prajñaptisaṃjñā ca yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjarāmaraṇaduḥkhasamudayanirodho bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14682: asmādvacanāt jñāyate pañcaskandhā api paramārthato na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14685: ya āha- sa eva jīvaḥ tadeva śarīram,
SA16hvsatssu:14689: yeṣāmeṣā dṛṣṭiḥ na te macchrāvakā na brahmacāriṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14690: yat tasya jarāmaraṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate tat prajñaptikhaṇḍanam /
SA16hvsatssu:14698: uktañca sūtre- yo dharmo māyā sa mṛṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:14706: asat dṛṣṭaṃ sadābhāsamasadvai parayā dhiyā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14714: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhā na paramārthasanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14717: na sambhavati skandhāḥ satyaṃ skandhābhāvo 'pi satyamiti vaktum /
SA16hvsatssu:14720: tathā yo 'mugdhaḥ na sa paśyati skandhān /
SA16hvsatssu:14724: yathāhānandaḥ- dharmānupādāya asmīti sidhyati yaduta rūpaskandhaṃ yāvadvijñānaskandhamupādāyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:14726: kṣemakaḥ pratyāha- na khalvāyuṣmanto rūpamasmīti vadāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:14729: api ca me āyuṣmantaḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu [SSS_378] asmīti adhigatam /
SA16hvsatssu:14740: ato jñāyate pañcopādānaskandhā api śūnyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14744: na tīrthikānāmiva rūpaprahāṇakāle jñāyate vastusat rūpaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:14746: yogī avaśyaṃ rūpādīnāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyati nirodhadarśanāt animitte 'vatarati /
SA16hvsatssu:14747: ato jñāyate rūpādayo na paramārthasanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14751: phenasūtre bhagavānāha- yadi puruṣaḥ phenapiṇḍaṃ paśyet yoniśa upaparīkṣeta /
SA16hvsatssu:14766: ato jñāyate skandhā na paramārthasanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14782: yathāha bhagavān- yaccakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivī [dhātu]ḥ ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:14783: ya imāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratilabhate sa vadati nāsti yatkiñciditi /
SA16hvsatssu:14787: ato jñāyate sarve saṃskārā niruddhā bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14788: yadi vastusantaḥ saṃskārāḥ tadā na syuḥ samyak prahāṇavimuktinirodhāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14790: ato draṣṭavyaṃ paramārthataḥ saṃskārāḥ sarve 'bhāvātmakāḥ saṃvṛtitastu santi saṃskārā iti //
SA16hvsatssu:14808: śāstramāha- etāni trīṇi cittāni nirodhayato yogāvacarasya karmakleśā naiva punaḥ samudācaranti (pṛ)
SA16hvsatssu:14811: yathā pradīpo dharmaśca sati niśraye vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:14815: anāsravā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ sarvāṇi nimittāni tathā pradahati yathā na kiñcidavaśiṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14817: nimittābhāvāt karmakleśānāṃ na punaḥ samudayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14819: arhataḥ śūnyatājñānagatiṃgatasya asmimānarahitasya na punaḥ samudyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14822: yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:14823: asati ca tṛṣṇācitte na karmāṇi pacyante /
SA16hvsatssu:14824: yathā anabhiṣyanditāyāṃ bhūmau bījaṃ na prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:14825: yogāvacarasyāsya sarvavijñānasthitiṣu sarvanimittanirodhe vijñānaṃ nirāśrayaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14830: sa kleśābhāvāt vikalahetupratyayaḥ satsvapi karmasu nopapattiṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:14832: kāyaṃ vedayata ityataḥ tasya karmāṇi vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14835: yathā adharmeṇa prabalamadhitiṣṭhati uttamarṇo nāvakāśaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:14837: saṃsāre 'vartamānasya santyapi karmāṇi na vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14838: yathā baddhaṃ puruṣamanye janā yatheṣṭaṃ nindanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14839: evaṃ kleśabaddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ karmatāratamyavaśāt [kleśāḥ] vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14842: śūnyacaryāvihāritvādasya puruṣasya dharmeṣu svalakṣaṇa[saṃjñā] nāstītyataḥ karmāṇi na vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14846: kleśavege kṣīṇe tu na tāni pravartante /
SA16hvsatssu:14847: yathā cakraṃ gatisthamapi vegakṣayānna punaḥ pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:14849: yathā sutavatsalāyā mātuḥ raktaṃ stanyaṃ pariṇamate /
SA16hvsatssu:14855: ataḥ sadapi prāktanaṃ karma na vipākaṃ prayacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:14868: mārgasatyam- āryo 'ṣṭāṅgiko mārgaḥ samyak dṛṣṭiryāvat samyak samādhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14876: yadi bahuvāraṃ na bhāvayati tadā kṣiprameva vikṣipyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14892_1: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ dukhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāmimārgamāryasatyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14896: ato jñāyate laukikaṃ lokottarañca hitaṃ samāhitacittenaiva labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14899: yathoktaṃ sūtre avidyā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvaṅgamākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samāpattaye /
SA16hvsatssu:14901: [SSS_383] vidyā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvaṅgamā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samāpattaye anvageva hrīḥ apatrāpyam /
SA16hvsatssu:14904: ato jñāyate sarvaṃ satkuśalaṃ samādhimupādāya bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14908: (pṛ) uktaṃ bhavatā cittasyaikatrāvasthānaṃ samādhilakṣaṇamiti tatra samādhiścittañcaikaṃ uta bhinnam /
SA16hvsatssu:14928: yathā pūrvamuktam- yatra cittaṃ sukhi bhavati tasminnālambane 'vatiṣṭhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14937: tasya kālasya dvividhaṃ nāma samādhiriti prajñā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:14943: sā samādhirdvividhā ekā vimuktihetuḥ aparā avimuktihetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14951: cittaṃ kiñcitkālamavasthāya yadi parīttamālambanaṃ paśyati[tadā] parīttetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14958: yathā suvarṇakāraḥ suvarṇaṃ dravayati tāpayati secayati kāle ca sthapayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14971: samādherasyāstrividha upāyaḥ samādhyavatāropāyaḥ samādhyavasthānopāyaḥ samādhivyutthānopāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14979: (u) yogāvacaraḥ svacittalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhṇan evaṃ pragṛhṇan evaṃ vyuttiṣṭhan evaṃ parityajan samādhāvavatarati /
SA16hvsatssu:14988: yathā kiñcidviśuddharūpaṃ kiñcitprakāśarūpañca dṛṣṭvā vadeta- mahāhitaṃ labdhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:14989: anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyamityādyanusmarataḥ cittaṃ na sukhi bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15009: prathamadvitīyau yadi dāntau samau tadā labhete //
SA16hvsatssu:15015: (u) ekāṅgabhāvana iti yat samādhiṃ bhāvayati na prajñām /
SA16hvsatssu:15017: ubhayāṅgabhāvana iti samādhiṃ bhāvayati prajñāñca bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15022: yathā sthaviro bhikṣurāha- yogāvacaraḥ samādhinā cittaṃ bhāvayan prajñāmupādāya kleśān pratiṣedhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15023: prajñayā cittaṃ bhāvayan samādhimupādāya kleśān pratiṣedhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15024: samādhinā prajñayā ca cittaṃ bhāvayan svabhāvamupādāya vimucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15025: svabhāvo nāma yaḥ prahāṇasvabhāvaḥ viyogasvabhāvo nirodhasvabhāvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15028: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- ekāṅgabhāvana iti yadi samādhimupādāya raśmiṃ paśyati na rūpāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:15030: ubhayāṅgabhāvana iti yat rūpañca paśyati raśmiñca paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:15031: āryaḥ samyaksamādhiriti yat śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ pratilabdhaḥ samādhiḥ [SSS_386] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15033: (u) raśmimātraṃ paśyati na rūpamiti nāsti kiñcana sūtram sūtre kevalamuktam- ahaṃ prakṛtito raśmimapaśyaṃ rūpamapyapaśyam /
SA16hvsatssu:15036: bhavatā ca vaktavyaṃ kena kāraṇena raśmiṃ paśyati na rūpam ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:15038: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trayaḥ samādhayaḥ śūnyato 'nimitto 'praṇihita iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15040: (u) yadi yogāvacaro na paśyati sattvaṃ nāpi dharmam /
SA16hvsatssu:15049: śūnyaṃ bhāvayan hitaṃ labhate yaduta nimittaṃ na paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15056: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ yaḥ samādhiḥ śūnyānātmākāreṇa bhavati ayaṃ śūnya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15057: ya ākāro 'nityato duḥkhato hetutaḥ samudayato janakataḥ pratyayato mārgato yathāvadācarato niryāṇato bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15059: ya ākāro nirodhata upaśamataḥ praṇītato viyogato bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15062: (u) yadāha bhavān- anityato duḥkhata ākāraḥ apraṇihita iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15065: bhagavān sadā vadati yadanityaṃ tadeva duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:15069: hetutaḥ samudayato janakataḥ pratyayata ākāra iti matam /
SA16hvsatssu:15072: uktaṃ hi sūtre- yatkiñcitsamudayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ tannirodhalakṣaṇamiti paśyan nirvidyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15076: yathāsūtramuktam hīnaṃ madhyamaṃ praṇidhānaṃ na mārga āsaktijanakam /
SA16hvsatssu:15078: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhānnirodha ityucyate iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:15082: ato jñāyate ime traya ekārthakā iti na syādbheda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15087: (u) śūnyena pañcaskandhān śūnyān dṛṣṭvā ekena śūnyena punarimaṃ śūnyaṃ śūnyīkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:15089: apraṇihitena pañcaskandhān nirvidya apraṇihitena punarimamapraṇihitaṃ nirvedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15091: animittena pañcaskandhān praśāntān dṛṣṭvā animittena punaranimittaṃ na gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:15093: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- traya ime samādhayaḥ sāsravā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15109: yogāvacareṇa hi sāsravāṇāmanāsravāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodho 'dhigantavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15120: bhagavānāha- dvitīyadhyānaṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ nāmne saṃvartate anyadharmāya saṃvartate yathā piṇḍapātāya śrāvastyāṃ praveśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15139: tadarthamāha- pañcakāmasukhānāṃ viyoge paramaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhaṃ pratilabhadhva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15142: laukikā vadanti sukhaṃ gṛhasthasya na pravrajitasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:15143: ato bhagavānāha- idaṃ pravrajitasya dṛṣṭadharme sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15149: dvitīyā samādhibhāvanā laukikahitāya bhavati yaduta jñānadarśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:15157: ataḥ sūtra uktam- sasmṛtisamprajanyo [SSS_389] yogāvacaro yā vedanā vitarkāḥ saṃjñā utpadyante sarvā[stāḥ] pratijānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15168: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacaraḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāmudayavyayānudarśī skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15170: sarvāṇi laukikāni lokottarāṇi hitāni caturṣu saṅgṛhītānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15171: (pṛ) kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- caturthadhyāne 'rhatphalaṃ pratilabhamānasya ānantaryamārga āsravakṣaya ityucyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15173: (u) na hi tatrāsti viśiṣṭahetuḥ caturthadhyānamātrasyānantaryamārga āsravakṣayo nānyasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:15190: yathā suvijñaḥ suvijñāya sadā hitaṃ prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:15191: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi sarvasatvānāṃ kṛte sadā sukhaṃ prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:15194: (u) nityaṃ lakṣyata aihikāmuṣmikahitasukhaprakarṣaprārthanāṃ kurvan naiva viruddhāsukhaprārthanām /
SA16hvsatssu:15195: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi sattvānāṃ sukhameva prārthayate nāsukham /
SA16hvsatssu:15200: (u) citte dveṣasmṛtimutpādya satvān tāḍayituṃ vihisituṃ vā icchati /
SA16hvsatssu:15206: yogāvacarasya sarvasattvānāṃ lābhaprakarṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahatī prītirbhavati yathātmano hitalābhe /
SA16hvsatssu:15211: na kaścidadviṣan duḥkhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā dayate /
SA16hvsatssu:15212: yadā sarveṣu sattveṣu paramaṃ maitracittaṃ kaścidduḥkhopadravasambhrāntaṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭveva samācaratitasmin samaye pravṛttaṃ maitracittaṃ karuṇetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15213: atha vā kaścit parasya duḥkhe karuṇāmutpādayannapi na parasyotkarṣe pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15216: kiṃ punarlabdhavijayaṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā [na] pramodyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15217: yogāvacaraḥ sarvasattvān samṛddhilābhino dṛṣṭvā svābhedataḥ pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15219: ato jñāyate maitrīcittaviśeṣaḥ karuṇā muditā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:15221: (u) śatruṃ mitrañca paśyato maitracittaṃ na samamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:15226: ato yogāvacaro mitre maitramupekṣya śatrau śātravamupekṣya cittasāmyaṃ cikīrṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:15229: ataḥ sūtra uktam- rāgapratighaprahāṇāyopekṣāṃ bhāvaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15235: yathā vadanti uttamamaitracittena trīṇi dhyānāni bhāvayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15247: ] nāsmai agnirvā viṣaṃ vā śastraṃ vā kramate /
SA16hvsatssu:15250: yogāvacaro 'nusmarati- ahaṃ vyāpādamutpādya ahameva vipākamanubhavāmi nānya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15252: kiñca yogāvacaro manasi karoti ahamalpakena pāpakena anyasya kṛtena bahūni pāpakāni tacchataguṇāni tadabhinnānyanubhavāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:15259: garbhiṇī prasavitrī ca madarthaḥ duḥkhaṃ vyavasyamānā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15260: atha vā syāt mama pitā bhrātā bhāryā putro vā /
SA16hvsatssu:15263: anusmareccāgāminyadhvani mama pitā mātā bhrātā vā bhavet iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15264: arhan pratyekabuddho buddho vā bhavediti [anusmaraṇaṃ] kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15268: pūrvañca nibhṛtaṃ paśyet janasya svabhāvaḥ kuśalo 'kuśala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15278: kṣāntiguṇo yogāvacaro 'nuvicintayati- ahaṃ yadi paraṃ dviṣāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:15279: tadā pṛthagjanasya grāmīṇasya tasya [mama] ca nāsti bhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15287: na kṣametādhamaḥ sattvaḥ śilavṛṣṭiṃ yathā khagaḥ //
SA16hvsatssu:15289: kṣameta hi māhasattvaḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ yathā gajaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15293: yogāvacara ime sattvā mūḍhā avijñā bālasamānā na vidveṣyā iti prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:15298: atyantasukhāsaktān dṛṣṭvā ca cintayati- kathamahaṃ parapraṇihitaṃ hāpayeyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15300: duḥkhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭadharme duḥkhitvāt duḥkhī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15301: sukhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā anitya[sukha]tvāt duḥkhī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15302: ataḥ sarve sattvā duḥkhabhāgina ādāvante vā na vimuktilābhina ityanena pratyayena karuṇāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15304: (u) yogāvacaraḥ parahiterṣyālutā pṛthagjanalakṣaṇamiti dṛṣṭvā muditāṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15315: (u) viṣamacitte doṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā cittasāmyacikīrṣayā upekṣāṃ carati /
SA16hvsatssu:15319: (pṛ) ābhidharmikāḥ kecidāhuḥ- tṛtīyadhyānādūrdhvaṃ nāsti saumanasyendriyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15340: yaḥ sattvānāṃ sukhākāṃkṣī sa sukhavipākaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15343: ākāśe ca rūpaṃ nāstītyato vijñānānantyāyatanacittasyālambane paramasukhavihāritvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15355: bhagavānapramāṇasūtra āha- iha bhikṣurmaitrasahagatena cetasā ekāṃ diśaṃ[sphuritvā viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:15356: tathā] dvitīyāṃ tathā tṛtīyāṃ caturthī ityūrdhvamadhastiryak[sarvadā sarvatratāyai] sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ [maitrasahagatena cetasā] sphuritvā viharati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15357: rūpārūpyakadhātukasattvā anityā bhaṅgurā durgati gāmina ityasti hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15359: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- kāmadhātugato yogāvacara evāpramāṇānyupasampadya viharatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15362: (pṛ) yadi tanna jātā api upasampadya viharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15369: (u) astīdṛśaṃ karma satyapi nivṛttihetau na nivartante /
SA16hvsatssu:15377: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadi kaścidekāgracittena dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:15385: ata ucyate maitrī bhāvanayā anāgāmiphalaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15398: bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatkṣayāya vīryamārabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15400: ājñendriyeṇa sattvānāṃ [SSS_395] duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā [tat] apaneṣyāmīti niyamena cittoddhāpanaṃ mahākaruṇā /
SA16hvsatssu:15404: karuṇācittaṃ hi parasya pāpakaṃ smṛtvā pratighātamutpādayet /
SA16hvsatssu:15410: ātmano hitaṃ tyaktvā parasya hitamātramākāṃkṣata iti mahākaruṇā /
SA16hvsatssu:15416: uktaṃ hi sūtre- pañcāṅga[bhūtā] āryasamādhayaḥ yaduta prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaviśuddhiḥ prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvanālakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15422: prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvanālakṣaṇasya hetuṃ kṛtvā pañcaskandhān paribhedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15427: (u) bhagavān svayamāha- yogī cintayati mamāyaṃ samādhirāryo nirāmiṣa iti prathamajñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15429: samādhirayaṃ śāntaḥ praṇītaḥ prītipraśrabdhilabdha iti tṛtīyajñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15430: ayaṃ samādhiḥ pratyutpannasukha āyatyāñca sukhavipāka iti caturthajñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15431: sa khalu punarahamimaṃ samādhiṃ smṛta eva samāpadye smṛta eva vyuttiṣṭhāmīti pañcamaṃ jñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15437: samādhiṃ kṛtvā āryaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ chandayāmītīdaṃ prathamajñānamucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15453: ato nityaṃ smṛto vyuttiṣṭhati smṛtaḥ samādhimusampadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15460: (pṛ) uktaṃ sūtre- samādhayaḥ ṣaṭ aṣṭyekalakṣaṇabhāvanā ekalakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:15472: ekalakṣaṇā nānālakṣatvāya saṃvartata iti [SSS_397] yadi kaścit samādhimupādāya jñānadarśanamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15473: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇanānālakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartata iti yadi kaścit samādhimupādāya dhyānasamādhiṃ pañcaskandhopāya ñcotpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15475: (pṛ) kecidārmidharmikā āhuḥ- ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartata iti yadi kaścit caturthadhyānamupādāya arhatphalaṃ sākṣātkaroti tat /
SA16hvsatssu:15476: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā nānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit caturthadhyānamupādāya pañcābhijñāḥ sākṣātkaroti tat /
SA16hvsatssu:15477: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇanānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit caturthaṃ dhyānamupādāyārhatphalaṃ pañcābhijñāśca sākṣātkaroti tat /
SA16hvsatssu:15478: nānālakṣaṇā bhāvanā nānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit pañcāṅgabhūtasamādhīnupādāyārhatphalaṃ pañcābhijñāśca sākṣātkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:15494: (u) kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ yogī nirodhasamāpattāvatāramicchatītyato dhyāneṣu samāpatti (= praveśa)
SA16hvsatssu:15496: tasmānna syāt yadi vānulomyena yadi vā prātilomyena yadi vānulomyaprātilomyena vyutkramādiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15498: yogī nirodhasamāpattiṃ prāpayituravaśyaṃ kramaśo 'vataret kramaśaśca vyuttiṣṭhet /
SA16hvsatssu:15502: yathā ca vidagdho jano na punarabhiramate mūḍhe /
SA16hvsatssu:15506: sūtre kevalamuktaṃ kramikā dhyānasamādhīnāṃ [SSS_398] samāpattaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15510: yathā kaścit śreṇimāruhya ekaṃ sopānaṃ vyutkramet na dvau /
SA16hvsatssu:15515: sūtre yadyapyuktaṃ bhagavatā nirvāṇaṃ samāpadyamāno 'nulomapratilomaṃ vyutkramya dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15520: yadi yogino nirodhasamāpattāvatāraṃ vadati tadānulomyena samāpattiḥ syāt naikakṣaṇe pañcadhā /
SA16hvsatssu:15521: yogī yadi sākṣānnirodhasamāpattyavatāramicchati tadā naikakṣaṇe syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15523: vaśitvāparihāṇitvāt anulomapratilomaṃ vyuttiṣṭhati samāpadyate vyutkrāmati ca /
SA16hvsatssu:15532: yaduktaṃ yathā na kaścit bālakrīḍāyāmabhiramata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15534: yathā kaścidvṛddho naṭaḥ sarvadā nṛtyati na tṛpto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15536: evamāryaḥ anulomapratilomaṃ dhyāneṣu vyuttiṣṭhati samāpadyate vyutkrāmati ca devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pradarśanakāmitvāt maharṣīṇāṃ samādhiṣu vaśitābalācca /
SA16hvsatssu:15537: bhagavān parinirvāṇagamanakāle paramapraṇītadhyānasamādhibhirvāsitaśarīratvāt svatantraṃ samāpadyata vyudatiṣṭhat anulomaṃ pratilomaṃ vyudakrāmīt /
SA16hvsatssu:15543: [tat] bodhisattvapiṭaka uktaṃ vyuktrāntilakṣaṇam- prathamadhyānāt vyutkramya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15549: śāstramāha- sapta niśrayāḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśrityāsravakṣayaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15555: samādhimimaṃ niśritya āsravāṇāṃ kṣayākhyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ prārthayīta /
SA16hvsatssu:15558: (u) bhagavānāha- yogī yenākāreṇa yenālambanena prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate sa yogī tadākāraṃ tadālambanaṃ na punaḥ smarati /
SA16hvsatssu:15559: kintu paśyati prathamadhyāne yadrūpāṇi yadi vā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15563: yogī kāmadhātumohitaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ nirvāṇamiti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:15569: (u) uktaṃ hi susīmasūtre- atikramya sapta niśrayān asti āryamārgapratilambhanam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15571: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- prathamadhyānasāmantakamaprāptabhūmiṃ niśritya [api] arhatphalaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15584: kasmādāha bhagavān saptaniśrayāḥ sapta saṃjñāsamādhaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15586: sarve niśryāḥ saṃjñākaluṣitā na vimokṣāya bhavanti ityataḥ saṃjñāsamādhirityākhyā /
SA16hvsatssu:15587: āryāstu saṃjñāṃ bhaṅktvā samādhimimaṃ niśritya āsravāṇāṃ kṣayamupādadate /
SA16hvsatssu:15589: yathoktaṃ yogī dharmānimān paśyati rogato gaṇḍata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15593: śāstramāha- sūtra uktaṃ- aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ- adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati iti prathamo vimokṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15596: dvitīyavimokṣe hyuktam- adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15598: ato jñāyate yogāvacaraḥ prathamavimokṣe krameṇa kāyarūpamabhibhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15602: ato na paśyati adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā rūpañca /
SA16hvsatssu:15606: antarbahiśca no paśyan ahaṃ pṛcchāmi vastvidam // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15608: yathoktaṃ ṣaḍdhātusūtre- yo bhikṣavaḥ pañcasu dhātuṣu atyantanirviṇṇaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:15626: (u) tīrthikā vimokṣādhimuktyā rūpalakṣaṇaṃ vināśayanti na tu śūnyabhāvanayā /
SA16hvsatssu:15628: yathābhāvanādhimuktiprayogaṃ mṛtaparityaktaṃ kāyaṃ śmāśānikakṛmayo bhakṣayanti ityādi paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15633: āryāḥ punarārūpyasamādhimupādāya caturaḥ skandhān rogata ityādyaṣṭabhirākāraiḥ paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15642: na tu vivicya ayaṃ cittanirodhaḥ ayaṃ kleśakṣaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15643: yathoktaṃ sūtre- nirodho dvividhaḥ [kṣaya]nirodhaḥ anupūrvanirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15648: kiñcoktaṃ [SSS_402] sūtre nirodhasamāpattimupasampanno bhikṣuḥ kṛtakaraṇīya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15652: (u) sūtra uktaṃ śaikṣo navānupūrvasamādhīn labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15654: yogāvacaro yadi kṣayanirodhaṃ pratilabdhvā na dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15656: yadi dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyate na kṣayanirodhaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15664: (pṛ) anupūrva[vihāre]ṣu nirodho vimokṣeṣu nirodhaśca kiṃ nānā /
SA16hvsatssu:15677: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samāpannasya ākiñca nyāyatanasaṃjñā niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15678: nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannasya saṃjñā ca vedanā ca niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15680: eṣu nirodheṣu nirodho viśiṣṭo yaduta yogāvacaro rāgadveṣamohebhyo nirviṇṇo vimucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15681: (pṛ) kathaṃ jñāyate anupūrveṣu cittacaittānāṃ nirodhaḥ vimokṣeṣu kleśānāṃ nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15691: jñātavyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ sakṣātkurvataḥ sarve kleśā nirudhyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15699: kathaṃ sa kāyacittaśūnyatāṃ labhate kleśāṃśca kṣapayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15703: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mama bhikṣavaścīvaramupāditsoḥ kleśo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15710: kecidāhuḥ- catvāri dhyānāni catvāro 'rūpasamādhayaḥ sarve dhyānamityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:15713: samāpattiḥ dhyānavimokṣasamādhiṣu vaśitābalalābhaḥ yathāha- śāriputraḥ- saptabodhyaṅgeṣu samāpattiṃ vyutthānañca vaśīkaromi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15720: yadyupekṣācittaṃ nāsti tadāsamāpattiṃ samāpadyate iti nāsti dūṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:15721: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacaraścatura ṛddhipādān samyagabhyasan himavantaṃ parvatarājaṃ tathā dhamati yathā reṇuparyavasannaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15723: ato jñāyate aṣṭavimokṣeṣūcyate āsravakṣayanirodhaḥ na nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15724: uktañca sūtre- asti vidyāsvabhāvaḥ asti śūnyasvabhāvaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:15727: svabhāvaḥ astyākiñcanyāyatanasvabhāvaḥ asti naivasaṃjñāsaṃjñāyatanasvabhāvaḥ asti nirodhasvabhāvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15735: pañcaskandhān prajñaptilakṣaṇān yo na paribhedayati tasyāvidyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15738: yathā bhagavān ekaṃ bhikṣumanuśāsti- śūnyeṣu sarvasaṃskāreṣu saṃskārān śūnyān bhāvayitvā damaya svacittam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15739: yathā kaścitpradīpamādāya śūnyāgāraṃ praviśya paśyati sarvaṃ śūnyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15745: yogāvacara[ścintayati]- yatkiñcanamanaskāraḥ yatkiñcanakṛtakaraṇam sarveṣāṃ nirodhaḥ śreyāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:15747: (pṛ) ime svabhāvāḥ kaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya pratilabhyante /
SA16hvsatssu:15748: (u) sūtra uktam- vidyāsvabhāvo yāvat naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasvabhāvaḥ sarvaṃ khayaṃ samādhisamāpattiviharaṇātpratilabhate yaduta saṃskṛtamārgaviharaṇātpratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15751: dvitīyasvabhāvo 'pi rūpopādāno rupamupādāya tathā vivecayati yathā śūnyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15753: sarve saṃskṛtadharmāḥ śūnyā iti nirodhasamāpattyā nirodhaṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15755: ato jñāyate atrokto nirodhaḥ kṣayanirodho nirvāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15757: (u) yogāvacaro rūpaparibhedecchayā kāmadhātupratilabdhaṃ samādhiṃ vā rūpadhātupratilabdhaṃ vā samādhiṃ niśrayamāṇo rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15759: (pṛ) eṣu vimokṣeṣu kati sāsravāḥ kati anāsravāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15764: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī [eko] bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni /
SA16hvsatssu:15768: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati adhimātrāṇi[suvarṇadurvarṇānīti vistaro yāvat] idaṃ dvitīya[mabhibhvāyatana]m /
SA16hvsatssu:15769: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni [suvarṇadurvarṇānīti yāvat] idaṃ tṛtīya[mabhibhvāyatana]m /
SA16hvsatssu:15770: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhī rūpāṇi paśyati adhimātrāṇi [suvarṇadurvarṇānīti yāvat] idaṃ [caturthamabhibhvāyatana]m /
SA16hvsatssu:15771_0: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanirbhāsāni tadyathā
SA16hvsatssu:15771_1: umakāpuṣpaṃ[sampannaṃ] vārāṇaseyaṃ vā vastraṃ[nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsam /
SA16hvsatssu:15779: na kevalaṃ santīmāni nīlādīni catvāri rūpāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:15788: (u) pūrvaṃ sāsravāṇi santi śūnyatayā rūpāṇāṃ paribhede 'nāsravāṇi bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15791: ato bhagavān śrāvakāṇāṃ kṛta āha- abhibhvāyatanamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15795: navānupūrvavihārāḥ- catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ nirodhasamāpattiśca /
SA16hvsatssu:15796_0: prathamaṃ dhyānam- yathoktaṃ sūtre yogāvacaro vivicyaiva kāmairvivicyākuśalai [SSS_406]
SA16hvsatssu:15796_1: dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15801: na hi kaściccakṣuṣā rūpaṃ na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:15808: yathoktam- rūpādayaḥ padārthā na kāmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15810: vyavasāyī khalu rūpādiṣu sthitvaiva kāmaṃ prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:15811: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpādayastadbhāgā na kāmā bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15813: yasya rāgacittaṃ bhavati sa kāmān paryeṣate /
SA16hvsatssu:15815: yathoktaṃ mahānidānasūtre- tṛṣṇāṃ pratītya paryeṣaṇā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:15821: yathoktaṃ sūtre- savitarka savicāraṃ vihāraṃ viharāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15824: yadā samādhipariniṣpattyā cittaṃ na bhūyasā vikṣipati tadā vicāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15827: prītiriyaṃ prathamalabdhā kāyaṃ sukhayatīti sukhaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15832: tadā na syāt pañcāṅgaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam /
SA16hvsatssu:15835: uktañca sūtre- prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ savitarkaṃ savicāram /
SA16hvsatssu:15838: tadā saptasambodhyaṅgeṣu prasrabdhibodhyaṅgaṃ na pṛthaguktaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15843: prathamaṃ dhyānamapi pañcakāma[guṇā]nāṃ pratyāsannamiti [te] aṅgāni vaktavyāni syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15853: [tato] vyāvartane punassamādhinimittamupādāya tatrālambane cittaṃ samādhāya maulikaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:15863: yathā śiṣyeṇa saha gacchatīti kiñcidviprarṣe 'pi sahetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15865: yathā bhūtapīḍitaḥ puruṣo [bhūta] anudgrame 'pi pīḍita ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15870: yathoktaṃ sūtre- praśrabdhakāyaḥ sukhaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15871: (pṛ) tathā cet kathaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ pañcāṅgamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15873: yathā saptabodhyaṅgāni kālābhisandhiṃ labdhvā caturdaśa bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15882: prītau jātamātrāyāṃ kāyacitte aduṣṭhule sukumāre dānte ca bhavata ityataḥ praśrabdhirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15884: arogiṇaścaturmahābhūtānāmudayaḥ tadā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sukhīti nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:15887: yathoktaṃ sūtre- saṃskārāṇāmanupūrvanirodhaḥ- tathāhi- prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpannasya vāk niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15888: yāvannirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannasya saṃjñā vedanā ca niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15891: yadi mataṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ vitarkavicārasamprayuktamiti tadapi na yuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:15893: uktaṃ hi sūtre- yadi yogāvacaraḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15894: tadā vāk niruddhā bhavati iti vitarkavicārau ca vāco hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15904: ato jñāyate prathamadhyāne vitarkavicārau syātām iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15907: uktañca sūtre- prathamadhyānasya śabdaḥ kaṇṭaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15910: (u) prathamadhyāne samādhigataṃ cittaṃ kusume salilavat peśalam /
SA16hvsatssu:15921: [punaśca yogāvacaraḥ] vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamāt adhyātmaṃ samprasādanaṃ cetasa ekotibhāvamavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyadhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:15925: (u) yathā prathamadhyāne duḥkhendriye 'satyapi dvitīyadhyāne duḥkhendriyavyupaśama ucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15930: (u) prathamadhyāne santyapi vijñānāni na duḥkhendriyasyāśrayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15933: (u) tathā ce ddaurmanasyendriyaṃ manovijñānasvabhāvajamiti sarvatra bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:15947: ucyate ca duḥkhasya sukhasya ca prahāṇāt caturthadhyānamupasampadya viharatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15949: yogāvacaraḥ prathamadhyāne 'paripūrṇasamādhiḥ sadā vitarkavicārābhyāṃ vikṣipyata ityata ucyate dvitīdhyāne vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśama iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15955: cetasa ekotibhāvaścetasa [SSS_410] ekasmin mārge viharaṇaṃ dhyānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15988: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yasmin samaye yogāvacaro dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:15989: asya pañca nīvaraṇāni tasmin samaye na bhavanti,
SA16hvsatssu:15990: saptabodhyaṅgāni ca tasmin samaye bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15995: pūrvaṃ prītau samutpannāyāṃ paścādanāsravaṃ yadyathābhūtadarśanaṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15996: na ca sarvāḥ praśrabdhayaḥ prītiṃ pratītya bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15999: na vayaṃ brūmo jñānavinirmukto 'sti pṛthagvedanādharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16005: bhagavān sadopekṣācitte viharatītyata āha- asti bhagavataḥ prītiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:16013: (pṛ) yathā dvitīyadhyāye 'sti prītiḥ nāsti tu daurmanasyam /
SA16hvsatssu:16016: (u) sarveṣu dhyānasamādhiṣu asti daurmanasyaṃ yathā indriyārtheṣūcyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16022: anāsrave citte ca prīti rna bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:16025: uktaṃ hi sūtre- prathamadvitīyadhyānayoḥ kevalaṃ prītirasti na caitasikaṃ sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:16032: kintu paśyati prathamadhyānagatāni rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni rogato gaṇḍato yāvadanātmataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16033: (pṛ) rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghata ityetāni catvāri lokacaritāni nānāsravāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:16034: ata idaṃ sūtraṃ pramāṇīkṛtya nānāsravaṃ sādhayituṃ śaknoṣi /
SA16hvsatssu:16041: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- prītisukhacittena catvāri satyāni pratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16047: kiñca tatsūtraṃ prakāśayati na prītyā paramārthajñānaṃ pratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16051: prītyāśca virāgādupekṣako viharati smṛtaḥ samprajānan sukhañca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate yadāryā ācakṣante upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārīti tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16058: yogāvacaraḥ śāntaṃ tṛtīyadhyānaṃ labhamāno dvitīyadhyānaṃ prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:16061: yathā kaścit putrabhāryādibhiḥ sadā na prīto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16064: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi prītiṃ prathamata āgatāṃ tu sukhaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16068: yogāvacaraḥ kena duḥkhena pīḍitaḥ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ sukhaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16070: yogāvacaro 'nayā prītyā pīḍita iti aprītisamādhau sukhasaṃjñāṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:16079: yathā bhagavān kauśāmbibhikṣuvivikta āha- ahaṃ sukhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:16097: ataḥ sukhañca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata iti nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:16103: puruṣo 'yaṃ prajñāyopekṣate yat prītāvādīnavaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvidyata ityataḥ sūpekṣāṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:16111: (u) nāhamasmin śāstre vadāmi vedanāvyatiriktaṃ pṛthagasti upekṣāsukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:16130: sukhasya ca duḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva saumanasyadaurmanasyānāmastaṅgamādaduḥkhamasukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16142: sukhasya duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt cittaṃ neñjate /
SA16hvsatssu:16156: caturthadhyānaṃ prāpya sukharāgasya prahāṇāt smṛtiḥ pariśuddhā /
SA16hvsatssu:16175: (u) tathā cet aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā nānāsravā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:16183: atra kāmadoṣo 'tisūkṣmaḥ duravabodhaḥ ato 'vaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:16194: parvataṃ vā ārohati tadāśvāsaḥ sthūlo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16208: uktaṃ hi sūtre- sukhavedanāyāṃ tṛṣṇānuśaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16220: sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānāmastaṅgamāt nānātvasaṃjñānāmamanaskārā danantam ākāśam ityākāśānantyāyatanamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16225: etāḥ saṃjñā vividhakleśānāṃ vividhakarmaṇāṃ vividhaduḥkhānāṃ hetavaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16229: tatra saṃkṣepānnoktam asya samatikramādasya nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16230: kecidāhuḥ- sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñeti cakṣurvijñānāśritā saṃjñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16236: pratighasaṃjñā nirudhyata iti vadato rūpaṃ saṅgrahītameva /
SA16hvsatssu:16238: rūpasaṃjñāṃ pratighasaṃjñāñca vinā nāsti pṛthaṅmanovijñānāśritaṃ rūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:16245: kiñcāyaṃ kāyo maraṇavipannaḥ smaśānāgninā dagdhaḥ praṇaśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:16246: ato jñāyate kāyo 'yaṃ pūrvaṃ sākāśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16248: (u) ādita ākāśālambanaḥ svīyaskandhālambanaḥ parakīyaskandhālambanaśca siddho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16250: karuṇāśīrṣaka evaṃ cintayati- sattvā dayanīyā rūpasaṃjñāpīḍitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16256: rūpe tu cittaṃ na suprabuddhaṃ nābhiraktaṃ nābhyāsaktam /
