SA16hvsatssu:16257: yathoktaṃ sūtre- āryaḥ pañcakāmaguṇān dṛṣṭvā saṃsmaran na tatrābhinandati na prabodhayati nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:16262: yathā ca yogāvacaro rūpasaṃjñāvivikto 'pi ākāśāntena caturthadhyānamavalambate /
SA16hvsatssu:16281: (pṛ) asti punaḥ sūtravacanam- ālokaṃ pratītyākāśaṃ jānīma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16282: na rūpaṃ vihāyāstyanyo dharma ālokaṃ pratītya jñāpyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16310: (u) ākāśaṃ na pratyakṣadṛśyamiti pūrvameva dūṣitatvāt- yat tamasyapi jñāpyamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:16315: (pṛ) uktañca sūtre- ṣaḍ dhāturayaṃ puruṣakāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16320: (u) yo vastusan dharmaḥ sa sarvaḥ pratiṣṭhito bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16327: rūpe rūpaṃ pratihanyate rūpamasati viruddharūpe vivardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:16329: [yat] bhavānāha- na hi śaśaśṛṅga madṛśyamarūpamapratighamityucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16339: abhāvamātreṇa kṛtakāstitālābhādabhāvadharma iti jñāyate ato 'yaṃ samādhiradita ākāśamavalambate /
SA16hvsatssu:16342: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- arūpasamāpattayo nirodhālambanā api ayaṃ anumānajñānabhāgīyaṃ nirodhamātramālambate /
SA16hvsatssu:16355: yathā kāmadhātau rūpadhātau cābhijñābalādanyasmin rūpe anyasmin citte sthito 'pi na cyavate /
SA16hvsatssu:16362: samādhiṃ vinā yadi saṃkleśaḥ yadi vā vvavadānam sarvamākāśānantyāyatanamityākhyāyate ? //
SA16hvsatssu:16366: sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramya [anantaṃ vijñānamiti] vijñānānantyāyatanamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16370: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi ākāśaṃ pratītya rūpaṃ paribhedayan [ākāśa]mapi parijihīrṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:16371: vijñānānantyāyatanamiti yogāvacaro vijñānenānantamākāśamityavalambamānaḥ tadā anantaṃ vijñāna[mapi ālambate] /
SA16hvsatssu:16378: tatpariśramanirviṇṇo vijñānaṃ paribhidya tatparijihīrṣayā ākiñcanyāyatanamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16385: saṃjñā ca duḥkhopāyāyāsāya bhavati rogato gaṇḍataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16386: yasya saṃjñā nāsti sa punarmūḍho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16389: yogāvacaraḥ saṃjñāṃ vipadaṃ āsajñikaṃ sammohaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:16397: yadi rūpadhātau cittaṃ niroddhumalaṃ bhavanti kasmādārūpyadhātau nālam /
SA16hvsatssu:16400: idānīṃ punaścittaṃ nirudhyate rūpacittayoryugapannirodhaṃ paśyata utrāsasammohaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:16410: yathā nirmitagataṃ rūpam nirmitacitte punaḥ phalamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:16415: asaṃjñi samāpattau ca na cittaṃ nirudhyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:16421: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dīrgharātraṃ [hyetat bhikṣavaḥ] aśrutavataḥ] pṛthagjanasya adhyavasitaṃ mamāyitaṃ parāmṛṣṭam etanmama eṣo 'hamasmi eṣa ma ātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:16423: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- tīrthikāḥ trayāṇāmupādānānāṃ samucchedaṃ nirodhamupadiśanti nātmavādopādānasya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16425: yathā markaṭopamasūtram [aśrutavān] pṛthagjanaḥ kāyaṃ virajyeta na cittam /
SA16hvsatssu:16426: varaṃ [bhikṣavaḥ aśrutavān] pṛthagjana imaṃ cāturmahābhautikaṃ kāya[mātmata] upagacchet na tveva cittam /
SA16hvsatssu:16428: dṛśyate 'yaṃ [bhikṣava ścāturmahābhautikaḥ] kāya [ekamapi varṣaṃ] tiṣṭhan.....daśa varṣāṇi [tiṣṭhan] yāvacchatavarṣāṇyapi tiṣṭhan /
SA16hvsatssu:16429: yacca khalu [etadbhikṣava] ucyate cittamityapi mana ityapi vijñānamityapi tat rātyāśca divasasya cātyayena anyadevotpadyate anyannirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16430: tadyathā [bhikṣavaḥ] [SSS_421] markaṭa [araṇya upavane caran] śākhāṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:16432: ekameva bhikṣavo yadidamucyate cittamityapi mana ityapi vijñānamityapi /
SA16hvsatssu:16433: tat rātyāśca divasasya cātyāyena anyadevotpadyate anyannirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16434: ] tatra śrutavān [bhikṣavaḥ] āryaśrāvakaḥ pratītya samutpādameva sādhukaṃ yoniśo manasikaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:16437: sarve tīrthikā avikalpapratyayajñānatvāt na cittaṃ nirodhayitumalam /
SA16hvsatssu:16445: pṛthagjanānāñca dharmo [yat] uttamāṃ bhūmiṃ pratītyāvarāṃ bhūmiṃ vijahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:16447: kintu samādhibalena sūkṣmasaṃjñāmabhimukhīkṛtya cittasya prabodhāt vadati nāsti saṃjñeti /
SA16hvsatssu:16452: yathā vā sammūrchābhraṣṭacetanāḥ suṣuptāḥ krimayaḥ śītibhūtamakarāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16454: tathā tatrāpi vastutaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ satyāmapi saṃvṛtito 'saṃjñītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16457: sarvaśonaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samatikramya saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaṃ kāyena spṛṣṭvā viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16460: (u) uktaṃ khalvasmābhiḥ dhyānasamādhiṣu santi vitarkavicāraprītisukhādayo dharmā iti ato nocyate sarvaśaḥ samatikramyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:16470: (pṛ) yat sahaivoktaṃ asti kaṇṭako yaduta rūpasaṃjñā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:16480: yat bhavatā pūrvamuktaṃ navānupūrvikeṣu cittacaittānāṃ nirodha iti tat virudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16482: kleśānāṃ kṣayarūpā vimokṣeṣu vartate kleśānāmakṣayarūpā anupūrvaṃ [vihāre]ṣu vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:16488: atra saṃjñānāṃ vyupaśame 'pi anyasaṃyojanānāṃ sattvāt punaranutpādikā na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16498: yathā caturthadhyāne cittacaittān nirundhya āsaṃjñike praviśati /
SA16hvsatssu:16502: niruddhacittameva nirodha ityucyate na punaranyo 'sti dharmo nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16503: ato jñāyate imā navabhūmīrvihāyāpyasti cittanirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16509: saṃjñākārāṇāṃ prajñaptigatatvāt prajñaptiśca dvividhā- hetusaṃghātaprajñaptiḥ dharmaprajñaptiśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:16512: ataḥ saṃjñāveditanirodha ityuktau sarvanirodha ukto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16523: saṃjñāveditanirodha ityuktau ca sarvacittacaittānāṃ nirodha ukto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16538: (u) aṣṭavimokṣāḥ sarve kāyena spṛṣṭvā viharantīti vaktavyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16548: loke ca nāsti ko 'pi sattvo 'cittaka ityato 'yuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:16549: uktañca sūtre- āyurūsma vijñānamime trayo dharmāḥ sadāvyabhicāriṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16565: cittameva cetanā manaskāro bhavatītyavaśyaṃ nirodhena taṃ samatikrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:16577: atrocyate / yadbhavānāha- nāstyacittakaḥ sattva iti acitta[tā] sāmye 'pi maraṇe 'sti bhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16578: yathā sūtre paripṛcchati- yo 'yaṃ [bhante] mṛtaḥ [kālakṛtaḥ] yaścāyaṃ [SSS_425] saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16584: āyurūṣma tu kāyād vibhaktaṃ vartate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16606: yathā cakṣū niruddhaṃ sat na tadvijñānaṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:16609: yanmanaḥ yacca manovijñānam ime dve mithaḥ pratisambandhinī /
SA16hvsatssu:16612: yadavocaḥ santānasamuccheda eva cittaṃ nirudhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16614: trividho hi nirodhaḥ- rūpanirodhaḥ cittanirodhaḥ kadācidrūpacittobhayanirodhaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:16615: kadācidrūpasya nirodho na tu cittasya yathā nirodhasamāpattisamāpanne /
SA16hvsatssu:16617: yadavocaḥ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanno na mṛta ityucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16621: puruṣasyāsya ca āyurūṣma pratītya cittaṃ punarutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16623: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- yadi niruddhaṃ cittaṃ punarjāyate,
SA16hvsatssu:16630: yathā nirodhasamāpattivarga uktam- nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaḥ ṣaḍāyatanāni kāyajīvitañca pratītya punarvyuttiṣṭhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16632: nirvāṇaṃ praviṣṭasya cittaṃ paraṃ na punarutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16636: yathoktaṃ sūtre- nirodhasamāpattervyutthitasya cittaṃ nirvāṇabhāgīyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16644: yathā sukṛṣṭe kṣetre sasyamavaśyaṃ bahulaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16659: asyāḥ samāpattervyutthito nirvāṇālambana ityataḥ prajñaptisaṃjñayā viviktaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16660: api coktaṃ sūtre- yasya dānapateḥ satkāraṃ bhuṅktvā apramāṇasamādhimupasampadya [SSS_427] viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:16665: kiñca aṣṭabhirguṇai ralaṅkṛtamidaṃ puṇyakṣetram- samyak dṛṣṭiḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:16666: nirvāṇālambanaṃ cittaṃ anyāni cāṅgāni taiḥ samanvāgataṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16680: nirvāṇaṃ pratītya hi nānye skandhāḥ samutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:16683: yogāvacarāṇāmīdṛśo dharmaḥ syāt nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanne praṇihitānugamanāccittaṃ na pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:16685: (pṛ) imāṃ samāpattimevānupūrvaṃ samāpadyata iti kimanupūrvameva vyuttiṣṭheta /
SA16hvsatssu:16688: (pṛ) sūtra uktamnirodhasamāpattervyutthitaṃ cittaṃ prathamaṃ trayaḥ sparśāḥ spṛśanti- aniñjyaḥ [sparśaḥ] animittaḥ [sparśaḥ] apraṇihitaḥ [sparśa] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16690: (u) asaṃskṛtālambane citte vidyamānaḥ sparśaḥ aniñjyaḥ animittaḥ apraṇihita iti nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:16696: ata ucyate vyutthāne trayaḥ sparśāḥ spṛśantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:16701: yogāvacara etatsamāpattisamīpsayā prathamata eva sarvān saṃskārān paribhedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:16705: sūtra uktam- [saṃjñāvedayita]nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyamānasya bhikṣornaivaṃ bhavati] ahaṃ [saṃjñāvedayita]nirodhaṃ samāpadye iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16713: ataḥ sūtramāha [atha khalvasya] pūrvameva tathācittaṃ bhāvitaṃ bhāvati [yat tat tathātvāya] upanayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16715: tadā asaṃskṛtālambanaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayitvā kamupakāraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:16716: (u) dīrghakālaṃ bhāvitatvāt samāpattidārḍhye jñānadarśanaṃ suniścitaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16717: yathā saṃskṛtālambanaṃ cittaṃ paśyato 'pi nāsti kṣaṇikādanyat /
SA16hvsatssu:16723: yogāvacaraḥ parīttanimittaṃ gṛhītavān adhimuktibalena tat vipulayati /
SA16hvsatssu:16737: (u) dīrghakālaṃ tat bhāvayan sadā pṛthivīnimittaṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:16739: (pṛ) yoginā dṛṣṭaṃ pṛthivīnimittaṃ dravyataḥ pṛthivī na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:16740: (u) adhimuktibalāt darśane pṛthivī bhavati na dravyato bhavati pṛthivī /
SA16hvsatssu:16741: (pṛ) nirmāṇabalāt bhūyamānaṃ nirmitamapi kiṃ na dravyam /
SA16hvsatssu:16742: (u) nirmitaṃ samādhibalātsiddhamityataḥ kṛtakaṃ vastu yaduta prabhā aptejādi ca /
SA16hvsatssu:16743: (pṛ) kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- aṣṭakṛtsnāyatanāni caturthadhyānamātre vartanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16745: (u) yadi vartanta kāmadhātau triṣu dhyāneṣu ca ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16746: antime dve kṛtsnāyatane pratyekaṃ svabhūmau bhavetām /
SA16hvsatssu:16750: (u) yogī adhimuktyā ca cakṣuḥśrotrādyākāśalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyaṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:16753: (pṛ) uktañca sūtre- sarvapṛthivīsamādhiṃ samāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati- ahameva pṛthivī,
SA16hvsatssu:16769: (pṛ) vastuto nāsti khalu sarvaṃ pṛthivī ityādīni /
SA16hvsatssu:16782: vedanādi ca cittasya prabheda iti pratipāditameva pūrvam /
SA16hvsatssu:16783: kiñca yogī na paśyati vedanādi sarvatra vyāpi /
SA16hvsatssu:16807: yathā tīrthikānāṃ sūtramāha- triṇāciketasya kartā śāśvate pade jāyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16809: (u) bhavatāṃ śāsane 'pyuktam śakro devānāmindraḥ kratuśataṃ kṛtvā punaḥ patatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:16810: uktañca gāthāyām- śakrādayaḥ śatasahasrādhikānāṃ kratūnāmanuṣṭhātāro 'nityāḥ kṣīyanta itri /
SA16hvsatssu:16827: bhavatāṃ śāsane hyuktam- brahmā sahāṃpatirapi guṇānāṃ [prakarṣāya] sadā kratuṃ yajamāno vrataṃ dhatte iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16830: śrūyate ca bhavatāṃ granthe vacanam- asti brahmaṇaḥ [sahāṃ] patermaithunarāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16831: sati ca tasmin dveṣādayaḥ sarve kleśā avaśyaṃ bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16833: evaṃ pāpī kathaṃ nityaṃ vimokṣaṃ pratilabheta /
SA16hvsatssu:16834: na ca sarva ṛṣayo devān yajante /
SA16hvsatssu:16844: śīlasamādhiprajñādyapramāṇaguṇasampannā mahānto dīpaṅkarabuddhādayaḥ pratyekabuddhā mahāsammatādayaḥ kalpādyā rājānaḥ sarve 'pyanityāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16848_0: yathoktaṃ gomayapiṇḍisūtre- atha khalu bhagavān parīttaṃ gomayapiṇḍaṃ pāṇinā gṛhītvā
SA16hvsatssu:16848_1: taṃ bhikṣumetadavocat- nāsti kiñcidīdṛśaṃ rūpaṃ [yat rūpaṃ] nityaṃ dhruvaṃ [śāśvataṃ]
SA16hvsatssu:16849: asminneva sūtre punarvistaraśa uktam- śakrabrahmacakravartirājānāṃ [ye] phalavipākāḥ [te sarve] 'pi atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16872: sukhavedināṃ sadā saṃvāsaṃ priyaṃ vā vastutastu vidvān sarvathā vimuktimeva prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:16873: ato jñāyate samudayadharma na nityaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:16874: atha punarvaktavyaṃ samudayadharma sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ muhūrtamapi na tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:16878: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anityasaṃjñā bhāvitā [bahulīkṛtā] sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāti /
SA16hvsatssu:16883: yathā kaścit subhikṣakālo na dīrgha iti budhyan maithunarāga āsajyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16884: kusumaṃ nāticiraṃ navaṃ bhavatīti jānan sukhāyāśu tadupabhuṅkte /
SA16hvsatssu:16885: parasya [dayitājanasya] surūpaṃ na nityaṃ bhavatīti jānan maithunarāgaṃ drutataraṃ vardhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:16889: yāvattiryañcaḥ anityamiti jānanto 'pi na kleśān bhindanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16898: so 'nātmā ityanityamanātma ca bhāvayato yogino nātmabuddhirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16901: anityasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayan svaparakāyaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ maraṇa[dharma] ca paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:16906: yathā kaścidvālakaḥ śūnye hastaḥ tuccha iti jñātvaiva na [tatra]saṅgaṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:16908: yathā kaścit bhaṅguratvāt bhājane na pramudyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16909: yathāpi ca kācinnārī amukasya puruṣasyāyurna saptadinānyeṣyatīti śrutvā [vadati] satsvapi subhikṣakālārjavabahumānadhanaprabhāvabaleṣu ko vā prīyeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16916: tadā sa bāhyaṃ vastvanityaṃ paśyan śocyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16920: vidvāṃstu duḥkhahetau sthita eva na duḥkhaṃ nirodhyamiti jñātvā tyajati duḥkhahetuṃ yaduta pañcaskandhān /
SA16hvsatssu:16921: ayaṃ yogī ābhyantaraskandhān paribhettuṃ anātmasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:16923: anātmapratilābhī kiṃ punaḥ prārthayīta anityasajñyapi na kiñcitprārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:16926: ata uktaṃ sūtre- ekāgreṇa cittena pañcaskandhānanityān bhāvayet /
SA16hvsatssu:16927: ya ādhyātmikān skandhān aparibhidya bahirdhā vastu anityaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:16932: eṣāṃ satyapi anityajñāne na sādhubhāvanā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16941: ata ucyate- ekāgracittena anityamiti samyambhāvanā kleśān vināśayati / iti / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16943: sati tattvajñāne na bhavanti kāmādayaḥ kleśāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16954: dharmā anityā iti jñānānna moha utyadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16962: pratyutpanne vastuto duḥkhaṃ yadasiśastrādi tad duḥkhaduḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:16965: śūnyānātmajñānalābhino yaccittaṃ bhavati saṃskṛtadharmāḥ sarve viheṭhanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16971: na hi duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayitā kāmaprītiṃ sevate /
SA16hvsatssu:16975: dharmā anityā anātmakā api na duḥkhajanakāḥ tadā naiva tyājyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16978: sarve sattvā atitarāṃ bhītā bhavanti yadidaṃ duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:16979: yadi taruṇo vṛddho vā pāmaraḥ paṇḍito vā āḍhyo daridro vā jānāti idaṃ duḥkhalakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:16981: sarve yogacāriṇaḥ puruṣā nirvāṇe śāntopaśamasaṃjñotpādakā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16988: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat rūpaṇamanityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharma,
SA16hvsatssu:16994: ato bhagavānāha- ye duḥkhaṃ budhyanti teṣāmahaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ vyākaromi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17000: anayā saṃjñayā ca sarvasattvānāṃ saṃsāre yātāyātānāṃ mānasaṃ kliśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:17010: duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayato mano na catasṛṣu vijñānasthitiṣu sukhaṃ viharati sarvatra duḥkhadarśitvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:17011: yathā mugdhāḥ śalabhāḥ sukhasaṃjñayā pradīpe patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:17023: yogī sarve dharma bhaṅgavipariṇāmalakṣaṇā iti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:17024: yasmin rūpe āttmatayābhiniviśate idaṃ rūpaṃ vipariṇāmadharma /
SA16hvsatssu:17027: yathā kaścit girinirjharānuvāhito yatkiñcidavalambya tadvihāya mucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17033: pṛthagjanā ātmasaṃjñayā paramārthato duḥkhe na duḥkhaṃ paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:17034: anātmasaṃjñayā tu atyalpe 'pi duḥkhe tadupaghātaṃ budhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17038: yadi paramārthaṃ [SSS_436] jānāti tadā hāyapati duḥkhamanātmakaṃ vināśyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:17047: nāstyātmātmīyamiti cintayato dharmeṣu vinaṣṭheṣu na duḥkhamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17051: idaṃ vastu ātmano hitamityataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17054: ahamāyuṣo 'nte kariṣyāmi na kariṣyāmiti dṛṣṭivicikitsā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17058: cittaviśuddhyā ca kāñcanaṃ loṣṭaṃ candanamasidhārāṃ praśaṃsāṃ nindāñca samaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17072: svakāye puruṣasaṃjñāṃ parakāye ca strīsaṃjñāmutpādya [tatra] abhiniviśate /
SA16hvsatssu:17084: kāmadhātau yāni santi duḥkhāni sarvāṇi tāni annapāna maithunarāgaṃ pratītya bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:17087: yathā kalpādau sattvāḥ svargādāgatya loke 'smin upapādukā abhūvan /
SA16hvsatssu:17090: evaṃ krameṇa jarāvyādhimaraṇaśālinaḥ yāvadvatsaraśataṃ bhūyasā duḥkhaiḥ pīḍitāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17091: āhārābhiniveśavaśāt sarve te tādṛśemyaḥ phalemyaḥ praṇaṣṭāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17095: tebhyo 'kuśalaṃ karma kurvanti akuśalakarmataḥ trīn doṣān vardhayitvā devamanuṣyāṇāmapakurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:17096: tasmāt sarvāḥ kleśavipattaya āhārakāmāt bhavanti jarāvyādhimaraṇalakṣaṇāni annapānādhīnāni /
SA16hvsatssu:17100: yadi vā bālo vṛddho gṛhasthaḥ pravrajito vā anāhārapīḍito bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17111: ye samucchinnāhārāḥ teṣāṃ kleśā na kṣīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:17120: dantena carvitaṃ lālayā siktaṃ liṅgaṃ vāntavadāmāśayapatitaṃ kāyasya hitakaram /
SA16hvsatssu:17123: yadi kaścinmadhuramāhāraṃ labhamāno 'pi punarvāntaṃ na bhunakti /
SA16hvsatssu:17130: yathoktaṃ karmavarge- yastarṣito mriyate sa jalakrimibhāvenotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17142: ayañca yogī bhāvayati prītiviviktaṃ samādhiṃ tadyathā anātmasaṃjñāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñāmāhāre pratikūlasaṃjñāṃ maraṇasaṃjñām /
SA16hvsatssu:17154: pratyutpanno daridro na pratyayopalabhyanirgama iti prajānānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17158: yathoktaṃ sūtre- alpatarāḥ susthāna utpadyante bahutarā dusthāna utpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:17161: puruṣo 'yaṃ paśyati kāmādayo doṣāḥ kleśāssadā santānamanuvartanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17167: sa cettu pāpakaṃ karma kariṣyati karoṣi vā /
SA16hvsatssu:17175: tadyathā āśīviṣakaraṇḍaḥ pañcokṣiptāsikā vadhakāḥ śūnye grāme coraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17178: tadyathā lavaṇatiktatṛṣṇānadīvāhitaḥ pañcakāmaguṇaviṣaśalya [viddhaḥ] avidyāndhakārāṅgārakarṣau [patitastādṛśāni] duḥkhāni sattvānanuvartante /
SA16hvsatssu:17181: kasmāt, [yasmāt] pratidīnaṃ lokaistūyamānā vanaṣaṇḍaprasūtasphītaphalasamṛddhiśālino ['pi] bhūpā na dīrghakālasukhalābhino dṛśyante /
SA16hvsatssu:17187: tāṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayatā kṣipraṃ mokṣo labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17191: asya ca citte na kleśā udbhavanti /

SA16hvsatssu:18704: yathā kaścit punaḥ punarmaithunacittaṃ bhāvayan bahūn kāmānabhinirvartayati /
SA16hvsatssu:18706: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo yadvastucittaṃ manasi karoti sa tatra pratipannaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:18710: ato jñāyate cittamidaṃ kṣaṇikamapi bhāvayitavyaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:18713: yathoktaṃsūtre- yogī khalu ayoniśo manasikārāt kāmādīnāsravānanutpannānutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:18717: tadyathā bījādaṅkuramaṅkurātkāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍānnāḷaṃ nāḷāt patraṃ patrātpuṣpaṃ puṣpātphalamiti pratyakṣato hetuto 'nupūrvaṃ vivardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:18719: pratyakṣato dṛṣṭaṃ khalu vāsitatilasya gandhaḥ saṃṅgkrātyā vardhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18722: ato jñāyate kṣaṇikā dharmā api bhāvayitavyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18727: (u) nāsti kaścidvidyamānadharmaḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ kṣaṇikā iti pūrvameva sādhitam /
SA16hvsatssu:18731: svarūpata eva sadāsthitasya bhāvanayā ka upakāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:18741: ato 'prāptaṃ na bhāvyata iti tava vacanaṃ na dūṣaṇāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18742: pratyakṣato dṛśyate ca hetuphalayorayaugapadye 'pi bhavatyeva hetoḥ phalaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:18745: evaṃ prajñā pūrvacitaṃ bhāvayati tadūrdhvacittamupacitaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18758: yathā bhavatāṃ sūtra uktaṃ- agnisaṃyogādaṇuṣu kṛṣṇavarṇe niruddhe raktavarṇaṃ jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18761: yadyādāvagnisaṃyuktadharmasya raktavarṇamutpadyata iti punaḥ paścādagnisaṃyuktadharmaḥ kimartham /
SA16hvsatssu:18766: yadi bhavatāmabhisandhiḥ raktavarṇaṃ kramaśo jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18769: sarve dharmā sahetusapratyayā api kramaśo jāyante /
SA16hvsatssu:18771: evaṃ prajñāsamādhyādayo dharmāḥ kṣaṇikā api avaramadhyottamadharmakrameṇa jāyante /
SA16hvsatssu:18773: yathā pakṣacchadasyoṣmaṇi mṛdunyapi aṇḍaṃ kramaśo vikriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18786: yathā bahubhiḥ puṣpairekasmin samaye tilaṃ vāsayati na yathā puṣpālpāni kramaśaściraṃ vāsayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:18787: medasā paripuṣṭiḥ jale [naukā] nimajjanaṃ bhittinirmāṇaṃ ityādirapi tathā /
SA16hvsatssu:18791: bālakādīnāṃ śarīraṃ stanyapānādinā paripacyata itīdamapi tathā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:18792: ato jñāyate dharmabhāvanā sūkṣmā praṇītā duravabodhā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:18801: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaḥ kuśaladharmeṣu na bhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ kuśaladharmānanupādāya kevalaṃ praṇidadhāti āsravebhyaścittavimokam /
SA16hvsatssu:18810: kintu pariśuddhatailaṃ pariśuddhavartikāñcobhayamapekṣya [anya]vastusaṃsparśacāñcalyarāhitye ca tatprakāśaḥ pariśuddho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18813: nāpi ca praṇidhānamātrāt deho rūpaṃ balañca labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:18817: ko jñānī hetoḥ phalaṃ jāyata iti prajānan taddhetumupekṣya anyasmātphalamākāṃkṣeta /
SA16hvsatssu:18819: dharma bhāvayan dṛṣṭa eva phalavipākaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:18820: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tiṣṭhantu saptadināni mayā śāsitāḥ śrāvakā muhūrtaṃ tāvatkuśaladharmaṃ bhāvayanto 'pramāṇavarṣeṣu nityaṃ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ spṛśanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18821: bhikṣuṇyo bhadantamānandamavocan- vayaṃ smṛtyupasthāneṣu supratiṣṭhitacittā viharantyaḥ pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣaṃ samprajānīma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18822: sūtre ca bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha- aśaṭhasya māmupasaṅkramato yanmayā prātarupadiṣṭo dharmaḥ tadartha sāyaṃ vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:18823: yat sāyamupadiṣṭo dharmaḥ prātastaddhitaṃ vindata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18824: yaccārhanmārgaṃ spṛśati na tat parapudgalaḥ prayacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:18827: anuttaraṃ buddhamārga eva nanu kuśaladharmasyopacitabhāvanayā spṛśati /
SA16hvsatssu:18828: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha- dvau dharmau niśrityāhamanuttaraṃ mārgaṃ samāpannaḥ yat śubhābhiratāvanirvedo mārgabhāvanāyāmaklāntiśca iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18843: yogī sucaritacaryāyā asti phalavipāka ityanusmṛtya alabhamāno 'pi na viṣādaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:18844: kiñca yogī manasi kuryāt- mayā bhāvanāyāḥ phalavipāko 'nuprāpta eva /
SA16hvsatssu:18850_1: vimuktāvapi cādhimuktatā abhyāgatasambuddhitā ityetaiḥ pratyayaiḥ samanvitaḥ kathaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:18853: [SSS_484] kleśānāṃ prahāṇamatisūkṣmaṃ dūravabodhaṃ vāśījaṭāyāṃ kramaśaḥ kṣayavat /
SA16hvsatssu:18856: ato jñāyate kuśalaṃ bhāvayituṃ vīryamuttamaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:18857: alpīyasī prajñāpi kleśān vināśayati yathā alpīyān prakāśo 'ndhakāramapanayati /
SA16hvsatssu:18864: yogī samanucintayet samādhisamāpattiratikṛcchrā yathā purā bodhisattvaḥ puṇyena prajñayā ca ghaniṣṭhaḥ ṣaṭvarṣāṇi vyavasyan ante 'nuprāptaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:18879: sadā kuśalasya bhāvayitā dṛṣṭa eva kāyena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ spṛśet /
SA16hvsatssu:18880: yadi vā maraṇakāle spṛśet yadi vā āyuṣo 'nte susthāna upapadya tadantarā spṛśet /
SA16hvsatssu:18882: yogī adhyātmaṃ cittaṃ vīralakṣaṇaṃ puraskṛtyaivaṃ cintayati ahaṃ kleśāvaraṇamaparyādāya na kadācidvṛthā pratinivarta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18883: kiñca yogī mānacittamāśrityaivaṃ cintayati- śraddhādīni kuśalendriyāṇi santīti anye samādhiṃ pratipadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:18886: yathā purā bodhisattvaḥ arāḍādibhyo munibhyo dharmaṃ śrutvaivamacintayat ime śraddhādikuśalendriyatvāt dharmamanuprāpnuvan /
SA16hvsatssu:18888: yogī prajānāti- kleśā durbalāḥ prajñā balavatī /
SA16hvsatssu:18890: yathoktaṃ- bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato mukhamārutena himavantaṃ [parvatarājamapi] pradalayet /
SA16hvsatssu:18893: kiñca yogī cintayati- ahaṃ pūrvādhvani na samādhiṃ bhāvitavān /
SA16hvsatssu:18899: api ca yogī cintayati- yadyahaṃ sadā vīryamārabhe yadi cānanuprāptamanuprāpnomi /
SA16hvsatssu:18907: prajñāptau prajñeti saṃjñā na tu jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:18910: āryaśrāvakāḥ prajñāsinā saṃyojanānubaddhān anuśayaparyavanaddhān sarvān kleśān samucchedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:18918: yathoktaṃ sūtra- anityasaṃjñā bhāvitā [bahulīkṛtā] sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāti /
SA16hvsatssu:18922: prajñayā yaḥ kleśānāṃ samucchedaḥ [sa eva] saṃjñayetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18923: [SSS_486] asti bhagavato dvividhaṃ vacanaṃ- paramārthavacanaṃ saṃjñāvacanamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:18925: ayaṃ maitrīdharmaḥ paramārthato na saṃyojanaṃ samucchedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:18927: yathoktaṃ- jñānāsiḥ sarvān kleśān samucchedayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18928: ato jñāyate maitrī saṃyojanaṃ samucchedayatīti saṃjñāvacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:18931: yat anityaṃ rūpaṃ anityamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:18941: tattvajñānameva kleśān samucchedayatītyataḥ prajñaiva tattva[jñāna]miti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18943: yogī paśyati vai loke sarve devāśca mānuṣāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:18945: laukikā bhūyasā tucchakaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ subhamityādi dṛṣṭvā tattvajñānādbhaṣṭā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:18949: āha ca bhagavān sūtre- yasya dhanaṃ vinaṣṭhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:18955: āhaca- pradyotānāṃ candrasūryapradyota alpīyān prajñāpradyoto 'gra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18965: ato jñāyate prajñā vastutaḥ paramārthālambanā bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:18976: uktaṃ hi sūtre- kiṃ vijānāti vijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:18981: ato laukikaṃ cittaṃ prajñaptimātramālambate na tattvamiti bhavadvacanamayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:18984: kiñcāha bhagavān- dve samyak dṛṣṭī laukikī lokottareti /
SA16hvsatssu:18985: puṇyapāpādyastitva [samyak dṛṣṭi]laukikī yadāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgānālambya anāsravasmṛtyā samprayuktā prajñā lokottarā /
SA16hvsatssu:18988: adhvanāṃ śatasāhasraṃ na yāvaddurgatau gataḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18989: uktañca sūtre- mithyācāriṇaḥ susthāne janma bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18996: āha ca bhagavān- trividhā prajñā śrutamayī prajñā,
SA16hvsatssu:19003: āha ca pañcadharmā aparipavkaṃ vimukticittaṃ vipācayanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19011: bhagavān svayamāha- dharmajñānamanvayajñāna paracittajñānañca laukikaṃ jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19013: api cāha- dharmāṇāṃ sthitijñānaṃ nirvāṇajñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19018: (pṛ) yo dharmo bhave pātakaḥ sa sāsravaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19024: yadbhavatoktam- asti laukikaṃ cittamaprajñaptyavalambanaṃ yadviṣayādīnāṃ vijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19027: āha khalu bhagavān- pṛthagjanāḥ satataṃ prajñaptimanudhāvantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19029: sarvapṛthagjanacittaṃ prajñaptiṃ na paryādātītyataḥ sadā asmitālakṣaṇamanudhāvati /
SA16hvsatssu:19034: ato jñāyate sarvaṃ laukikaṃ cittaṃ prajñaptimavalambata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19035: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- laukikī prajñā yaduta dvidhā samyagdṛṣṭirityādi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19036: tatredaṃ prativaktavyam- asti cittadvaividhyaṃ mohacittaṃ jñānacittamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19042: idaṃ pṛthagjanacittaṃ sadā prajñaptigataṃ sat prajñaptimavalambate /
SA16hvsatssu:19045: idānīṃ yadi sarvaṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ prajñaptimavalambate /
SA16hvsatssu:19061: pṛthagjanā yadvadanti ghaṭa iti pudgala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19063: śaikṣā ātmadṛṣṭivihīnā api samyaksmṛtipramoṣat pañcasu skandheṣu asmimānalakṣaṇena vadanti- ayaṃ pudgalaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19066: yathā mahākāśyapaḥ saṅghāṭiṃ dṛṣṭvā āha- iyaṃ mameti [yat] divyarddhau vicikitsāṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19067: bhagavān tadvivṛṇvannāha- ayamatyantasamuddhatamānendriyaḥ pradagdhahetupratyayaḥ kathaṃ sābhimānaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:19071: dve samyagdṛṣṭī ityādī sūtraṃ kathaṃ neyam /
SA16hvsatssu:19073: bhagavān dharmāṇāṃ tattvalakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī vineyasattvānanusṛtya vividhaṃ nāma sthāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19076: api cāha anityādisaṃjñā bhāvitā sarvān kleśān paribhedayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19077: āha ca- caturthamakṛṣṇamaśuklaṃ karma sarvakarmāṇi śaikṣacetanākhyāni kṣapayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19078: kiñcāha- manasā sarvānabhiviveśān prajahātīti / āha ca-
SA16hvsatssu:19088: vaktavyā ca dvividhā saṃjñā lokaṃ pratītya satyaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:19092: kācit mohakāṣṭhātmikā saṃjñā yāvat laukikakuśalākuśalāni na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:19096: itīyaṃ saṃjñā skandhalakṣaṇaparibhedakaṃ jñānamanukūlayatītyato bhagavānupadiśati jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19097: iyañca saṃjñā tattvajñānasya hetuṃ karotītyato jñānami tyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19104: saptāsravasūtre ca vacanaprahāṇavṛttiprahāṇādaya āsravahetava āsravā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:19111: (pṛ) smṛtyupasthāneṣu uṣmādiṣu ca gataṃ cittaṃ tattvadharmamālambate /
SA16hvsatssu:19114: ato yatra prajñaptividhamanaṃ cittaṃ tadanu samāgataṃ cittamanāsravaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19120: anātmasaṃjñayā cittaṃ bhāvayatāṃ kṣipraṃ rāgadveṣamohebhyo vimucyate ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:19122: anātmasaṃjñayā hi cittaṃ bhāvayatāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñā pratitiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:19133: (u) sūtra uktam- anityasaṃjñābhāvitaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ cittamanātmasaṃjñāyāṃ pratitiṣṭhati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19137: ātmavādī hi paralokasādhanāyāha- ātmā nitya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19138: ataḥ pañcaskandhā anityā iti paśyan anātmāna iti prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:19143: ātmā ma utpadyate vyeti cetyasyāgataṃ bhavati / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19161: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā vāśījaṭopamasūtre- jānataḥ paśyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ vadāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:19162: kiṃ jānataḥ kiṃ paśyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19169: evameva bhāvanānuyogamanuyuktasya bhikṣornaivaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati etāvatko bata me 'dyāsravāṇāṃ kṣīṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:19171: atha khalvasya kṣīṇe kṣīṇānta eva jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19176: ato jñāyate smṛtyupasthānādigato mārgāṅgabhāvanānuyogamanuktaḥ srotaāpattiphalapratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19177: yadyekasmin kṣaṇe yadi vā pañcadaśasu kṣaṇeṣu na bhāvanānuyogaṃ vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:19181: iti vedanā iti jñānamiti prathamamuktamādyaphalasya mārgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19191: ataḥ smṛtyupasthānādau pūtibhūtaḥ san pṛthagjano bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19195: ato jñāyate smṛtyupasthānādigataḥ viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19196: kiñcogreṇa saṅghe nimantrite devatā upasaṅkramya ārocayanti- amuko gṛhapate arhan yāvadamuka ādyaphalapratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19200: kiñcoktaṃ bhagavatā sūtre- yasya [khalu bhikṣava imāni] pañcendriyāṇi (śraddhādīni) na santi /
SA16hvsatssu:19201: tamahaṃ bāhyaḥ pṛthagjanapakṣe sthita iti vadāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19206: ayamābhyantaraḥ pṛthagjana ārya ityupyucyate pṛthagjana ityapyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19215: atha ca [tatra] channasya [cittaṃ] na dharmaniyāme praskandati /
SA16hvsatssu:19220: (u) yo nirodhaṃ paśyati sa tattvataḥ pratipannakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19221: yo dūrabhāgīyakuśalendriyagataḥ paśyati pañcaskandhā anityāḥ duḥkhā śūnyā anātmāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19225: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti- kathaṃ dharmaṃ paśyema iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19227: tatsahabhuvo vedanāsaṃjñā cetanādayaḥ sarve [dharmā] anityā vipariṇāmadharmāṇaḥ aśraddheyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19237: yoginaścitta evaṃ bhavati- idaṃ praṇītamupaśamapadaṃ yat sarveṣāṃ mṛṣābhūtānāṃ kāmatṛṣṇānāmapagamaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:19238: yadasmin dharme cittaṃ praskandati adhimucyate neñjate na parāvartate na śocate na paritrāsate /
SA16hvsatssu:19240: ato jñāyate yogī anityādyākāraiḥ pañcaskandhānavalokayan viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19241: teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyan sannikṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19242: yathā channaḥ sthavirān prativadati- mamāpyevaṃ bhavati- rūpamanityaṃ [vijñānamanityaṃ rūpamanātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:19246: atha ca punarme] sarvasaṃskārasamarthe tṛṣṇākṣaye nirodhe nirvāṇe cittaṃ na praskandati,
SA16hvsatssu:19252: ] na khalvimaṃ dharmaṃ paśyato bhavati / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19253: kiñcāha- yogī yadasmin dharme mṛduprajñayā kṣāntiṃ śraddadhate sa śraddhā[nusārī] pratipannakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19255: yastīkṣṇaprajñayā kṣāntiṃ śraddadhate sa dharmā[nusārī] pratipannakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19258: ato jñāyate nirodhaṃ paśyan sannikṛṣṭaḥ pratipannako bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19264: bhagavān dvādaśanidānānāṃ nirodhaṃ dṛṣṭvā anuttaramabhisambuddho 'bhūt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19265: dharmamudrāyāñcoktam- pañcaskandhānanityān vipralopān mṛṣābhūtānasārān śūnyāṃśca paśyato yogino jñānadarśanamaviśuddhaṃ bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19266: sūtramidamanta āha- yogina evaṃ bhavati- yanmayā dṛśyate śrūyate ājighryate rasyate spṛśyate manyate tat sarvaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ vijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:19267: yadasya vijñānasya hetupratyayā nityā vā anityā vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19269: anityebhyo hetupratyayebhya utpannaṃ vijñānaṃ kathaṃ nityaṃ bhavet /

SA16hvsatssu:19798: bhagavān vimuktyarthamāha- yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti jñānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19802: na vayaṃ vadāmaḥ pūrvaṃ kṣāntiḥ paścāt jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19817: na savikalpikeyaṃ kṣāntiḥ idaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19818: yathā laukikī vipaśyanā catussatyānusāriṇī kṣāntirityapyucyate jñānamityapyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19822: (pṛ) sūtre hi pṛthugucyate samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyak jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19824: (u) tathā cet samyagdṛṣṭirna samyag jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19825: yadi bhavato mataṃ samyag [SSS_509] dṛṣṭiḥ samyag jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19827: pañcāṅgadharmakāye prajñāskandhāt pṛthaguktaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ na prajñā bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:19828: tathā ca kṣayajñānamamutpādajñānamapi na prajñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19830: yaduta sarvakleśānāṃ kṣayo 'rhataścitte samutpadyata ityata[stata] samyag jñānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19850: prathamata ālambanagatatvāt na dṛṣṭiriti yadi matam /
SA16hvsatssu:19853: bhavatāṃ hi śāsanaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ santānālambanaṃ yathā manovijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19863: dṛṣṭiḥ jñānaṃ prajñā ityādi sarvaṃ nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:19870: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- santyaṣṭadṛṣṭayo yaduta pañcamithyādṛṣṭayo laukikī samyagdṛṣṭiḥ śaikṣadṛṣṭiraśaikṣadṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19871: etā aṣṭadṛṣṭirvarjayitvā anyā prajñā na dṛṣṭirityucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19873: (u) jñānadarśanaṃ vimuktilābhaḥ pratisaṃvedanaṃ sākṣātkāra itīdaṃ sarvamekārthakam /
SA16hvsatssu:19874: iyaṃ dṛṣṭiriyaṃ na dṛṣṭiriti yat vacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:19876: (pṛ) uktaṃ nanu sūtre- jānan paśyan āsravādvimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19878: (u) yat jñātvā ādau prajñaptiṃ vidārayati tat jñānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19891: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rāhulo bhikṣurvimuktiprāpiṇīṃ prajñāṃ sampādayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19892: vedādīn vyāvahārikagranthān śṛṇvannapi nānāsravāṃ prajñāmutpādayatītyato na [sā] śrutamayī prajñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19893: yat sūtrāṇāmarthaṃ cintayati sā cintāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:19894: yathocyate- yogī dharmaṃ śrutvā tadarthagatiṃ cintayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19896: api cāha- yogī dharmaṃ śrutvā tadarthaṃ cintayan sadā pratipadamanuvartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19899: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yūyaṃ bhikṣavo dhyānasamādhiṃ bhāvayanto yathābhūtajñānadarśanamabhimukhaṃ labhadhve /
SA16hvsatssu:19901: kiñcoktaṃ saptasamyagjñānasūtre- yat bhikṣu dharmaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:19912: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- trīṇyāyudhāni śrutāyudhaṃ vivekāyudhaṃ prajñāyudhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19945: api coktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān dharmamupadiśati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇamante kalyāṇamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:19946: taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoti satpuruṣastaruṇo vṛddho vā /
SA16hvsatssu:19949: tadaiva bhogaskandhaṃ prahāya jñātiparivṛttaṃ prahāya agārādanāgāraṃ [SSS_512] pravrajati /
SA16hvsatssu:19957: tatra yat dharmaṃ śṛṇoti taruṇo vā vṛddho vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19959: śrutvā yat pratisañcikṣati- sambādho gṛhāvāso 'bhyavakāśā pravrajyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:19972: tatra niṣevya santaṃ puruṣaṃ saddharmamupaśrutya cetīyaṃ śrutamayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:19980: evamādinā tatra tatra sūtre bhagavān trividhāṃ prajñāmavocat /
SA16hvsatssu:19985: yathā hastaka upāsako 'tapyaddeveṣūpapadya tatra dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19992: (u) kena pratyayena kāmadhātau nāsti bhāvanāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:19993: (pṛ) na kāmadhātukamārgeṇa sarvāṇi nīvaraṇāni sarvāṇi paryavasthānāni prajahāti yena kāmadhātukaparyavasthānaṃ nābhimukhībhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:19994: (u) bhavatāṃ śāsane nedaṃ vacanamasti yat na kāmadhātukamārgeṇa nīvaraṇāni paryavasthānāni prajahāti yena kāmadhātukaparyavasthānaṃ nābhimukhībhavediti /
SA16hvsatssu:19998: yathoktaṃ sūtre- aśubhabhāvanāṃ bhāvayan kāmarāgaṃ samūhanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20004: (u) dauṣṭhulyādinā kleśān prajahāti nāśubhādinā iti nāsti kiñcana sūtravacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:20005: uktaṃ hi sūtre- aśubhādinā kleśān samūhanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20010: yadi nāsti, vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kasmādasti aśubhādiḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:20014: atrāpi kāraṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ kasmāt kāmadhātau na samucchedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20019: yayoktaṃ sūtre- cittasamādhānaṃ mārgaḥ cittavikṣepo 'mārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20031: (u) tīrthikāḥ prahīṇasaṃyojanā api punaḥ kāmadhātau samutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:20036: api coktaṃ sūtre- kṣīṇatrisaṃyojanastrīṇi viṣāṇi samūhantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20037: prākṛto na trīṇi saṃyojanāni kṣapayatītyato na vītarāgo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20052: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dvāvimau bhikṣavaḥ aśanyā phalantyā na santrasataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20053: [katamau dvau] bhikṣuśca kṣīṇāsravo rājā ca cakravartī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20063: vastutastu pṛthagjanasya vītarāga iti kathyamānasyāpi nedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:20069: āha ca arāḍaḥ kalāma udrako rāmaputro rūpe vītarāga ārūpya utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20073: ato [yat]bhavatoktaṃ pṛthagjanaḥ kṣīṇakleśo 'pi punarutpadyata ityato na kṣīṇa[kleśa] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20075: bhavānapyāha- pṛthagjanasya sarvāṇi vidyamānāni prahīṇānīti idaṃ vastutaḥ pratiṣiddhamityataḥ kṣīṇo vīta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20077: ahaṃ mameti yā cintā mriyamāṇo jahāti tām
SA16hvsatssu:20081: yo bālaḥ svabhūmiṃ tyajati taṃ satkṛtavatāmapi nāsti mahāvipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20085: ato jñāyate pṛthagjano vastutaḥ prahīṇa[kleśo] vīta[rāga] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20088: yadi satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ vyāvṛttavān tadā pūrvokto doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20093: ataḥ pṛthagjano na vastutaḥ prahīṇasaṃyojana iti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20103: na tatrāsti kāraṇamāsannabhūmiṃ niśrayate na kāmadhātukasamādhimiti /
SA16hvsatssu:20107: susīmasūtre coktam- pūrvaṃ khalu dharmasthitijñānaṃ pañcānnirvāṇajñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:20109: kintu dharmasthitijñānamavaśyaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtvā paścādāsravakṣayo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20126: uktañca sūtre- yogī śubhaṃ pratilabhamāno 'śubhaṃ tyajati tadyathā nandaḥ apsaratṛṣṇāmupādāya pūrvatanakāmaṃ jahau iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20132: yadyāryaśrāvakaḥ kadācit pañcakāmaguṇā na prītisaumanasyajanakā ityanusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:20147: yadbhavatoktaṃ- śubhaṃ praṇītaṃ pramodamupaśamarasañca pratilabhamāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20155: yathā sūtre bhagavānāha- bhikṣūṇāṃ cīvaraṃ gṛhṇatāṃ triṣu [kleśa] viṣeṣu satsvapi cīvarāsaṅgo niruddha eveti /
SA16hvsatssu:20169: ataḥ satyadarśanamārge na laukikaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20176: yathoktaṃ sūtre- janapadaniruktau nābhiniveśeta yogī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20180: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santi catvāro bhāṣitadharmāḥ kiñcidbhāṣitaṃ sārthagati nākṣayakaram /
SA16hvsatssu:20187: yathāha- santi catvāro bhāṣitadharmāḥ kaścidarthopāyaḥ na vyañjanopāyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20191: ya etaccatuḥpratisaṃvitprāptaḥ sa upāyasampanno duṣpradhṛṣyo duradhigamyo dharmabhāṣaṇe /
SA16hvsatssu:20206: (pṛ) catasra imāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ kasmin dhātau vartante /
SA16hvsatssu:20219: yathā jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ yāvadavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20220: asti vā tathāgato nāsti vā tathāgataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20221: eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ sadā sthita ityato dharmasthitijñānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20227: yataḥ asti vā tathāgato nāsti vā tathāgataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20244: api coktam- santi dvidhaiva dharmāḥ saṃskṛto 'saṃskṛta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20247: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ye vidyante saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā nirodho nirvāṇaṃ teṣāmagramākhyāyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20254: bhagavān bahudhātukasūtra āha- vidvān saṃskṛtadhātumasaṃskṛtādhātuñca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:20258: sarveṣu sūtreṣu nāsti kiñcinniyataṃ vacanaṃ nirvāṇamasaddharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20259: ato jñāyate yannirvāṇamasaditi tat bhavataḥ svasaṃjñāvikalpa eveti /
SA16hvsatssu:20260: ucyate / yadi skandhānāṃ viyoge 'pi punarasti dharmāntaraṃ nirvāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:20267: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogī rūpalakṣaṇaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati yāvaddharmalakṣaṇaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20268: sūtre ca tatra tatroktam- sarve dharmā anityāḥ sarve dharmā anātmānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20273: yadi nirvāṇaṃ dharmaḥ tadā nāsti svabhāva iti darśanaṃ nopalabdhuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20277: ghaṭe vinaṣṭe tu ghaṭo vinaṣṭa iti vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20283: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadidaṃ bhikṣavo duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate anyadduḥkhaṃ notpadyate na punastatsantatirasti /
SA16hvsatssu:20284: idaṃ sthānaṃ paramaṃ śāntaṃ śiva yaduta [SSS_521] sarvapratinissargaḥ kāyikacaitasikarāgātyantavisaṃyogo nirodho nirvāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:20286: anyaddaḥkhaṃ notpadyata iti vacane ko dharmo nirvāṇādanyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20299: tathā no cet cīvarakṣayādirapi pṛthak dharmaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:20307: yathā yatra yannāsti tatra tena śūnyamiti jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:20320: yena jñānena na raṇāyate pareṇa saha /
SA16hvsatssu:20333: (pṛ) tathā cet bhagavato buddhasya kevalamidaṃ jñānaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:20338: yat yogī prakṛṣṭamuttamaṃ jñānaṃ sarvadhyānasamādhibhiḥ paribhāvitaṃ parivardhitaṃ pratilabhya [sva]jīvitasya bṛddhau hrāse vaśitāṃ vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:20344: ṣaḍabhijñāḥ- kāyarddhiḥ dviyacakṣuḥ divyaśrotraṃ paracittajñānaṃ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtirāsravakṣaya[jñāna]miti /
SA16hvsatssu:20367: kecidāhuḥ- prathamadhyānābhijñayā brahmalokaṃ gacchati yāvaccaturthadhyānābhijñayā rūpaparyantaṃ gacchatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20378: yathoktaṃ sūtre rūpe vā ārūpye vā pūrvatanīnamupapattyāyatanaṃ bhagavān sarvaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:20385: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- ālokalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvayan jñānadarśanaṃ sādhayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20397: (pṛ) divyacakṣuṣaḥ saṃsthānaṃ kiṃ mahat kiṃ vālpam /
SA16hvsatssu:20415: yathā sāsraveṇa sāsravaṃ jānāti anāsraveṇa anāsravaṃ jānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20417: neme vadanti kāraṇaniyamam- anena kāraṇena sajātīyamevālambanaṃ jānātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20421: yathā kaścidavitarkasamādhimupasampannaḥ prajānāti asmāt samādhervyutthite evamevaṃ vitarko bhaviṣyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20426: āha ca- pratyekabuddho mārgasatyadarśanagatatṛtīyacittaṃ jñāsyāmīti saptamaṃ cittameva paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:20434: kiñcaikasmin samaye manasyacintayat- rājā bhūtvā [SSS_525] yathādharmaṃ lokaṃ vineṣyāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20436: devā api jānanti- ayamarhan yāvadayaṃ srotaāpattipratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20438: tadyathā bhagavati parinirvāṇābhimukhe sati anirūddho bhagavatopasampannān dhyānasamādhīn yathākramamajānīt /
SA16hvsatssu:20466: yathā śāriputraḥ bhagavantaṃ pratyāha- ahamatītānāgatānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ cittamajānannapi teṣāṃ dharmaṃ jānāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20467: śuddhāvāsā devāstathāgatacittaṃ jānantītyato bhagavantamupasampadyāhuḥ- atītatathāgatānāṃ bhagavan iryāpatho 'pyevamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:20468: (pṛ) pūrvanivāsā[nusmṛti]vibhaṅge kasmāduktaṃ saha nimittena saha jātyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:20469: (u) anusmṛtirviśadetyata evaṃ nimittasaṃjñāmavocat amukaḥ pudgalaḥ ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:20472: yathāhuḥ- idaṃ tava kulaṃ iyaṃ tava jātiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:20473: jātiṃ nimittañca militvā vadatītyato jñānadarśanaṃ viśuddham /
SA16hvsatssu:20485: asti hi pudgalasya aṣṭamahāsahasrakalpān jānato 'pi nāstīyaṃ cintāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:20495: sūtre kasmāduktam- ahamekanavatikalpānāgatya nāpaśyaṃ [kimapi] dānamapacīyamānaṃ vinā vipākena iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20533: (u) uktameva pūrvaṃ dhyānasamādhīn gabhīraṃ bhāvayan ṛddhipādān sākṣātkarotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20537_0: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tathāgate loka utpanne supuruṣā dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajitāḥ śīlaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:20537_1: samādadānā apanītapañca nīvaraṇāḥ samādhiṃ bhāvayantaḥ satyaṃ paśyanti ityādi sarvamāsravakṣayasyopāyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20538: kecidāhuḥ- dānādayaḥ kuśaladharmā api āsravakṣayasya nidānāni /
SA16hvsatssu:20539: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogino dānaṃ kṣīṇāsravaśūnyānātmajñānaṃ sādhayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20557: yathā paśyāmaḥ stanyaṃ śuṣyat punaḥ prasravati /
SA16hvsatssu:20558: asti kaścit kālaḥ [yadā] stanyaṃ pratiruddhapayaḥprasūti bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20561: yathā ca tapte 'yasi kṛṣṇalakṣaṇaṃ niruddhaṃ punarutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20565: yasmin samaye nimittāni niruddhāni na punarutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:20571: yadi kiścit cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mithyāmanaskāreṇa mithyā vikalpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20574: (u) yadyogī pañcasu skandheṣu prajñaptaṃ sattvaṃ na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:20584: teṣu dharmeṣu virajo dharmacakṣuḥ pratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20589: prākṛtā ajñā vadanti- te vastusanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20590: śaikṣāḥ punaḥ prajānanti- te tucchā riktā māyāvaditi /
SA16hvsatssu:20592: ato jñāyate yayā prajñayā dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti iyamāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyābhijñeti //
SA16hvsatssu:20595: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- yo yogī saptabhirupāyaistribhirarthāvalokanaiḥ samanvitaḥ so 'smin dharme kṣipramāsravakṣayamanuprāpnotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20597: (u) saptopāyā nāma śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā ca /
SA16hvsatssu:20600: ayaṃ rūpasamudayaḥ ayaṃ rūpanirodhaḥ iyaṃ rūpanirodhagāminī pratipat,
SA16hvsatssu:20605: (u) yadyapīyaṃ śrutamayī cintāmayī prajñā tathāpyevaṃ pañcaskandhān vikalpayan ātmamatiṃ vibhedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20607: trividhāvalokanajñānaṃ yaduta saṃskārā anityā duḥkhā anātmāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20608: skandhadhātvāyatanamukhena saṃskārān paśyato nāstyartho hitaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:20609: (pṛ) tathā cet pūrvamādīnava uktameva- anityā duḥkhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20612: (u) trividhāḥ śikṣate- pūrvaṃ śrutamayīṃ cintāmayīṃ prajñām /
SA16hvsatssu:20614: pūrvaṃ śrutamayyāṃ cintāmayyāṃ prajñāyāmuktāḥ sapta prakārāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20617: yadanityaṃ tat duḥkhamiti lakṣaṇasya bhaṅgo [SSS_529] nāma anityasya bhaṅgaḥ nānityasaṃskārāṇāṃ bhaṅgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20624: (pṛ) yogino 'pi buddhe dharme saṅghe śīladiṣu kṣāntirasti /
SA16hvsatssu:20630: pūrvaṃ hi mārgānukūlāṃ cintāmayīṃ prajñāṃ prayujya paścātpratyakṣajñānamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:20631: yathā hastipakaḥ pūrvaṃ hastipadaṃ dṛṣṭvā tena jñānena prajānāti- atra vartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20633: tathā yogyapi pūrvaṃ kṣāntyānvayajñāne na nirvāṇamabhyūhya paścāt tena jñānenābhimukhīkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:20634: ataḥ sūtra uktam- [evaṃ] jānan[evaṃ] paśyan āsravakṣayamanuprāpnotīti //
SA16hvsatssu:20637_0: (pṛ) kecidābhidharmikā vadanti arhan kṣayajñānaṃ sākṣātkurvan sāṃvṛtāni nava jñānāni
SA16hvsatssu:20648: (pṛ) yo vītarāgaḥ san na prathamadhyānasamāpattiṃ nādyāpi pratyakṣīkṛtavān /
SA16hvsatssu:20650: (u) sūtre tūktam- asminnantarāle samāpadya paścāttāṃ samutpādayediti /
SA16hvsatssu:20652: (pṛ) yadi [SSS_530] rāgādvirajyamānasyātītānāgatāni sarvāṇi dhyānāni mūlataḥ prāpnāni /
SA16hvsatssu:20654: (u) anāgataṃ karma akṛtamabhūtaṃ na vipākaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20655: atītāni dhyānāni citta utpannacarāṇi yadi vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:20668: tadānāgate 'dhvani samy dṛṣṭiṃ prāpnoti kaścidārūpyasamādhiṃ niśrityārhatphalaṃ prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:20669: ayamanāgate samyaksaṅkalpaṃ samyagvācaṃ samyakkarmāntaṃ samyagājīvaṃ prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:20674: yadi ca nāsti anāgata[dharmaḥ] kathaṃ bhāvako phalāni dhyānasamādhyādīnanuprāpsyati /
SA16hvsatssu:20677: tathā no cet phalāni gaṇayitvā gaṇayitvānuprāpnuyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:20681: ucyate / yat bhavatoktam- aṅgaiḥ samanvita iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20688: yathā manuṣyajātiḥ prāptetyato manuṣyalakṣaṇaṃ prāptaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20691: (pṛ) yogino vidyamānaduḥkhādīnāṃ jñānāni kramikāṇīti sarvaṃ parihṛtameva /
SA16hvsatssu:20695: tadā prāptiḥ prayoga iti nāsti bhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20704: yathā samāpattapañcaśīlaḥ punaḥ pravrajyāsaṃvaramanuprāpnuvannapi na maulikaśīlebhyaḥ parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20706: yathā kaścidādau vastu jānannapi viśiṣṭavastu[darśanāya yatata] iti pravibhāgo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:20712: (pṛ) imāni laukikajñānāni kṣayajñānena sahārhataḥ samādhisamāpattivyutthānacittakriyāṃ prāpayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:20716: tathā no cet na navajñānāni prāpnuyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:20717: uktañca- anāgatabhāvanāyā nāsti hetuḥ pratyayo vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20719: ete hi vadanti- satyadarśanamārge kevalaṃ nimittābhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20726: śraddhāvibhukto darśanaprāptatvena parivartamānaḥ sarvasminnānantaryavimuktimārge na sāṃvṛtaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20727: samayavimuktaḥ akopyavimuktatayā parivartamāno navānantarya[mārgeṣu] aṣṭavimokṣamārgeṣu saṃvṛtaṃ mārgaṃ na bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20731: ato bhavān yadi vā samyagdyetuṃ brūyāt yadi vā śraddhāpayet /
SA16hvsatssu:20733: ūṣma[gatā]diṣu sthitikāle uttamāni sarvāṇi kuśalamūlāni bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20736: ata ūṣmagatādidharmakālāt yāvat kṣayajñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvanā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20746: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānānandamāmantryāha- asmin dharme evaṃ jñānena dṛṣṭvā evaṃ pratibudhyasva /
SA16hvsatssu:20750: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bālaḥ pratyutpannaṃ dharmaṃ bahumanyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20752: kiñcāha- pratyutpannāḥ kāmā anāgatāḥ kāmāśca mārasenā māradheyā mārabandhanā ityādau sarvatrocyate pratyutpannavādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20765: dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānañca sarvaṃ sāsravamanāsravamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:20766: imāni jñānāni ūṣmagatādidharmeṣu sāsravāṇi niyāmāvakrāntiprāpyāṇi anāsravāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:20769_1: [SSS_533] saṃskārāṇāṃ hetau yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ
SA16hvsatssu:20769_2: nirodhe yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge
SA16hvsatssu:20772: (u) uktaṃ hi sūtre- bhagavānānandamāmantryāha- atītae 'nāgate caivaṃ prajānīhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20774: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- yogī anusmaret- ahamidānīṃ dṛṣṭarūpeṇopadruto bhavāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:20780: pratyakṣamālokya ca janma duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathātītamapīti viddhi /
SA16hvsatssu:20781: yathā ca tat duḥkhamidañca duḥkhaṃ tathānāgatamapyavehi /
SA16hvsatssu:20782: [bījasvabhāvo hi yatheha dṛṣṭo bhūto 'pi bhavyo 'pi tathānumeyaḥ /]
SA16hvsatssu:20783: patyakṣataśca jvalano yathoṣṇo bhūto 'pi bhavyo 'pi tathoṣṇa eva // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20788: yogī hi atīte 'nāgāmini pratyutpanne ca duḥkhe nirvidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20799: tadarthameva ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- asti prāptiraprāptirityato 'nupūrveṇa satyaṃ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20802: ata ekasmin samaya ubhayajñānaṃ na sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20812: yogī anityaṃ duḥkhamiti paśyan śūnyamanātmeti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:20819: yathoktam- adhyātmavimuktatvāt tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣaye nirodhe svata evārhan prāpta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20821: (pṛ) nanu sūtre kiṃ noktaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ prahāṇalakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:20822: (u) ayaṃ yogī adhyātmanirodhaṃ sākṣātkṛrvan sarvatra nirviṇṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20829: (u) evaṃ darśane sati skandhānāmanityatādidoṣamapi dṛṣṭvā duḥkhanātmasaṃjñāṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20835: ātmana utpādo vyayaḥ syādityato jñāyate anātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:20840: evaṃ yoginaḥ samyak anityamanātma ca bhāvayataḥ kāyacittamupaśāmyati /
SA16hvsatssu:20841: sarvasaṃskāreṣu samutpanneṣu teṣāṃ vihiṃsāmanubhavato duḥkhasaṃjñā samutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20844: mūḍhastu ātmasaṃjñāvaśātsatyapi mahati duḥkhe na tadupāyāsamanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20854: yathoktaṃ sūtre- abhūtanimittamidamabhūtaṃ saṃjñāmātramiti prajānato duḥkhāni kṣīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20858: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kaścidarhan tathāgatasya purato vyākaroti- bhagavatā deśitāni na santi mama /
SA16hvsatssu:20860: sadā mama samāhitaikāgrasya samyak caryāmanusmarataḥ kāmādīnyakuśalāni na cittasyāsravā bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20865: yathā sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā ayaṃ puruṣa iti saṃśerate /
SA16hvsatssu:20867: sadā animittavihāricittatvāt pūrvaṃ sattvaśūnyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā pañcasu skandheṣu na paśyatyātmānam /
SA16hvsatssu:20879: yathā kaścit tatra tatra pratibaddha ekasmānmukto 'pi na vimukta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20887: kṛtaṃ karaṇīyamiti karaṇīyāni sarvāṇi kṛtvā prajānāti- asmādbhavāt nāsti bhavāntaramiti /
SA16hvsatssu:20888: ato jñāyate arhanneva sarveṣu karaṇīyeṣu vaśitāṃ prāptaḥ kṣayajñānenānutpādajñānena ca samanvitaḥ syāt,
SA16hvsatssu:20893: jitvā mṛtyorhi senāñca viharāmi anāsravaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20899: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- sarve sattvāḥ samaṃ jñānasamanvitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20901: (u) yo jinauraso jānāti dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20909: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- catuścattvāriṃśat jñānāni yaduta jarāmaraṇe jñānaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:20920: yathoktaṃ sūtre- [tadyathā] nagarasvāmī nagare niṣaṇṇaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:20921: [tatra] kiñcit dūtayugamekasmāt dvārādāgatyopasṛtya nagarasvāmino yathābhūtaṃ vacanaṃ niryātya [yathāgatamārgaṃ] pratipadyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:20928: dūtā nānādvārebhya āgatā api ekameva sthānamupasarpanti /
SA16hvsatssu:20930: yathā rāhula ekānte niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ cintayan evaṃ prajānāti- īdṛśo dharma parikīrtitaṃ nirvāṇaṃ prati anuprayātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20932: kiñca bhagavān dharmasyāniśaṃsāyāmāha- dharmo 'yaṃ sarvān kleśāgnīna nirodhayatīti nirodha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20940: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhādayo dvārāṇi nirvāṇaparāyaṇāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:20949: (pṛ) ucyate ca jarāmaraṇasamudayaḥ jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhamārga ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:20961: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- saptasaptatijñānāni yaduta jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti [jñānam] /
SA16hvsatssu:20970: tatra kasmānnoktaṃ- jarāmaraṇasya svabhāvo nirodho mārga ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:20973: tīrthikā bahavo nidāne bhrāntā vadanti- laukikānāṃ padārthānāṃ heturlokātmaka ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:20984: (u) pratyutpannamatītādhvanaḥ kadācidbhinnadharma bhavati yadutātītānāṃ sattvānāmāyurapramāṇaṃ prabhāvaśca devatulya ityevamādi /
SA16hvsatssu:20985: āyurādi bhinnaṃ jarāmaraṇapratyayo 'pi bhinno bhavediti janā vadeyuriti bhītyā niyama ucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20993: kasmāt tatra rūpasya svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya ca svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20995: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣavaḥ saptabhiḥ sthānopāyaiḥ tribhirvipaśyanārthaiśca samanvitaḥ sa kṣipramāsravāṇāṃ kṣayamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:20997: ityādi nidānajñānāni apramāṇaśatasahasrāṇi santi yaduta [SSS_540] cakṣurvijñānamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:21011: kāmarāgasya mithyāvitarkaḥ pratyayaḥ ityevamādipratyayānāṃ jñānamapramāṇamanavadhi svayamevonnetavyam //
